fields.podcast_name: The Wheel Weaves Podcast: A Wheel of Time Podcast
fields.podcast_summary:
Welcome to The Wheel Weaves Podcast!!

The Wheel Weaves is a Wheel of Time podcast suitable for first time readers. Join Dani and Brett as they journey into the series for chapter analysis, character break-downs, and (probably wrong) predictions - all from the perspective of a WoT First Time Reader. Guided by Brett, the long-time super fan, Dani reads through the series knowing absolutely nothing! No spoilers here!

This show is part of the Spreaker Prime Network, if you are interested in advertising on this podcast, contact us at https://www.spreaker.com/show/5482260/advertisement

fields.podcast_name: Wheel Takes
fields.podcast_summary:
An irreverent journey through Robert Jordan's THE WHEEL OF TIME, hosted by Gus (who has read the whole series) and Ali (who has not). New episodes every Friday!

This show is part of the Spreaker Prime Network, if you are interested in advertising on this podcast, contact us at https://www.spreaker.com/show/5747467/advertisement

fields.podcast_name: Tar Valon After Dark | A Wheel of Time Comedy and Discussion Podcast
fields.podcast_summary: Join us at The Thirsty Tinker to see what happens in Tar Valon when the sun goes down. Featuring LezbiNerdy, Nae'Blis, and Jess from The Amyrlin's Study.

fields.podcast_name: Queers of Time Podcast
fields.podcast_summary: Welcome to the Queers of Time podcast! We're all about shining light on and discussing the queerer aspects of Robert Jordan's The Wheel of Time series and the Amazon TV show. We discuss theories, representation in the books and the TV show, fan-shipping, the Divine Gift that is Siuaraine, and much more!

fields.podcast_name: Watch Party: Wheel of Time
fields.podcast_summary:
Welcome to “Watch Party: Wheel of Time,” where Ages come and pass, leaving podcast episodes that become legend. Join us as Rhuarc and Saimma guides you, along with a panel of brilliant guests, through Amazon‘s blockbuster adaptation of Robert Jordan‘s fantasy masterpiece, The Wheel of Time. Never read the books? That‘s ok, because neither has the panel. Rhuarc and Saimma will break down every episode, discuss the themes, and answer your questions. This podcast can be enjoyed by die hard fans, and first timers. 

Let the Dragon ride again on the winds of time.

If you want to join the conversation, send your comments and questions to watchpartywot@gmail.com, or find us on Facebook.

fields.podcast_name: Talk'aran'rhiod: The Wheel of Time Showcast
fields.podcast_summary: Join Joe, Jen, and Tom as they delve into the highly anticipated television adaptation of The Wheel of Time and provide comprehensive coverage of all aspects of the series. From the latest news to critical analysis, the trio aims to explore how Amazon will tackle the monumental task of bringing the 14-book epic to life. For Wheel of Time enthusiasts seeking to stay informed and engaged, this podcast offers an invaluable resource.  (Some episodes do contain spoilers for the books. Look for episodes tagged "Spoiler Free" if you haven't read the series.)

fields.podcast_name: The Black Tower: A Wheel of Time Podcast
fields.podcast_summary: Three guys, chilling and wheeling, talking all things Wheel of Time!

fields.podcast_name: Cool Story - A Wheel of Time Podcast
fields.podcast_summary: A Storytelling/Book Club/YouTube Reaction Video podcast where Matt (he/him) and Enn (They/Them) discuss Robert Jordan's The Wheel of Time series and the upcoming Wheel of Time TV Series on Amazon. Matt's a first-timer and Enn has read the series many many times, so we're spoiler-free! Join us as we discuss Enn's favorite fantasy series, and enjoy all the tangents and jokes. New episodes weekly on Thursdays!

fields.podcast_name: Road to Tar Valon : The Wheel of Time Podcast
fields.podcast_summary: Join hosts and longtime friends Amber and Traci as they make a cross continental connection every week. They are history lovers, architecture admirers, avid readers, and "New Spring" super fans. New episodes every Wednesday, and for more, check out their YouTube channel! https://linktr.ee/roadtotarvalon?fbclid=PAAabwgzN-zbbdGu-PtpGRqByLfcqfcvgMBS1pFDBdRG6m2bCZOqQ1GC3UQ08 Support this podcast: https://podcasters.spotify.com/pod/show/roadtotarvalon/support

fields.podcast_name: North Harbor Podcast
fields.podcast_summary: Join Adelorna and Rebecca Sedai at the beautiful North Harbor in Tar Valon. We will be reading and discussing the Wheel of Time books from last to first. Find out what goes on at North Harbor.

fields.podcast_name: WoT Spoilers
fields.podcast_summary:
A deep dive into the hidden meaning, identity, and motivation in the story of The Wheel of Time. Designed for readers who have finished the series and are looking for more understanding without memorizing all the different Aes Sedai.

This show is part of the Spreaker Prime Network, if you are interested in advertising on this podcast, contact us at https://www.spreaker.com/show/5493125/advertisement

fields.podcast_name: Wheel of Time Barside Chats
fields.podcast_summary: Barside Chats from The Dusty Wheel is a talk show about epic fantasy, and The Wheel of Time in particular. The hosts, Matt and Brian, delve into the mysteries and wonder of the world of the Wheel of Time. It's just pure, good, clean fun! A podcast for all ages and for fans old and new. Come join the crew as they cover wide-ranging topics and have lots of fun along the way!

fields.podcast_name: Tar Valon Or Bust
fields.podcast_summary:
Longtime fans Jenn and Preeti revisit the Wheel of Time series in preparation for the TV show’s launch, and dig into their personal connections with the books, how well they hold up, and what they think will make it to screen. Join them for two episodes a month, featuring recaps of the books and the show (eventually), interviews, recommendations, obsessing about Mat Cauthon, and more.

Get bonus content on Patreon

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.

fields.podcast_name: WoT In Color with Keba and Shar
fields.podcast_summary: THEE dopest Black woman hosted podcast for THEE preeminent Wheel of Time series by Robert Jordan and Brandon Sanderson! WoT In Color is hosted by a first-time reader (Keba) along with her bestie and long-time reader (Shar). Join them as they read and discuss this epic series through their lenses of being Black women. New episodes drop every Wednesday. Come in love, or go in peace!

fields.podcast_name: They Might Be Darkfriends - Revealing the Mysteries and Stories Behind the Wheel of Time Fandom
fields.podcast_summary:
Now all of Randland can rejoice!
Here comes another content choice!
Revealing tips and tricks and mysteries,
And some WoT Fan Stories...
Since 1990!
They Might Be Dark Friends
Po-odcast!

Join self proclaimed nerds Lauren (Unraveling the Pattern), Rob (Weekly Wheel News) and Alyssa (One Power Ballads) as they give advice as to how to uncover Darkfriends, discover how fans fell in love with "The Wheel of Time," nerd out about various subjects in the "Nerd Corner" and get sneak peaks into future headlines from WWN. Plus, a healthy dose of references to the fabulous band, "They Might Be Giants."

fields.podcast_name: The Kevin Podcast! (and friends)
fields.podcast_summary: Welcome to The Kevin Podcast!, hosted by none other than Kevin Angus. Created as a vehicle to share his hilarious friends with the world, Kevin & a guest share their inane, and occasionally funny, conversations in an unscripted format.

fields.podcast_name: Feather and Mountain
fields.podcast_summary:
Veteran Wheel of Time reader, Delusions of Graendal, guides first time viewer, Virgil (and later, Greyhame Confusion), through the fantastic world created by Robert Jordan, brought to life by Amazon Prime. Prepare for some hot takes and judgment!

Currently reviewing the Rings of Power on Amazon Prime, where DoG finds herself wearing the mantle of the #NeverReader, as she cannot and will not read the works of Tolkien. Her father, new co-host Greyhame Confusion, has been an avid Tolkien enthusiast for over 4 decades, and happily provides context and critique to the new Lord of the Rings show.

fields.podcast_name: Podcast of the Dragon: An Analysis of the Wheel of Time
fields.podcast_summary: With emotion and empathy, bursts of humor and a fair few F-bombs, this spoilery topical literary analysis of Robert Jordan's fantasy series looks at characters, themes, plots, scenes and other Wheel of Time subjects while following the path of the story. For fans familiar with the books looking for something different. (Expect full spoilers, including references from New Spring, WoT Companion, Wiki, Dragonmount, Theoryland, etc.)

fields.podcast_name: The Wheel Reads: A Wheel Of Time Podcast
fields.podcast_summary: Alan guides Ian and Chris through their first Wheel of Time read through. Support this podcast: https://podcasters.spotify.com/pod/show/thewheelreads/support

fields.podcast_name: Thank the Light: The Wheel of Time Podcast
fields.podcast_summary: Fatty, Jeremy, and Desmond McNeese discuss the Amazon show, The Wheel of Time, based on the Robert Jordan novels. Fatty and Jeremy are long time fans of the saga and Des, a newcomer to the series break down every episode to help us all understand the vast universe that's being created. We spend the off season catching up on some lore and using the books to imagine what the next season will bring us. Want to get into the conversations? Please email us at thankthelight@gmail.com or find us on Twitter @ParchedAielman

fields.podcast_name: The Light’s Work
fields.podcast_summary: The Light's Work is a Wheel of Time podcast all about the phenomenon that is WoT fandom. Anas and Grace, two sentimental superfans who work in healthcare professions, discuss the Healing power, the sense of belonging, and the shared creativity among WoT fans. They may also be slightly obsessed with making, documenting, and building upon great fandom moments. Their projects have been known to make people cry tears of joy.

fields.podcast_name: Everybody Hates Rand: A Wheel of Time Podcast
fields.podcast_summary: Just two hyper-critical English majors talking some pretty big game about The Wheel of Time. Co-hosts Emily and Sally gather around their kitchen table each week to serve you up a full fantasy feast of oft-misremembered summary, hot analysis, scraps of literary theory, and a whole lot of hating Rand.

fields.podcast_name: Heroes of the Horn: A Wheel of Time Podcast
fields.podcast_summary: Welcome Friends & Heroes of the Horn! The last battle draws nigh. This will not be the 'Time of Return'. This will be Tarmon Gai'don! Will you answer the call? Join us as we discuss Robert Jordan's EPIC Wheel of Time series! Follow us on Twitter @thehornofvalere and send us a message at thehornofvalere@gmail.com ... Remember, "The Grave is no bar to my call"

fields.podcast_name: WOTCast: A Wheel of Time Book & Watch Club
fields.podcast_summary: WOTCast: A Wheel of Time Book Club is a podcast where we read through the epic fantasy series by Robert Jordan and Brandon Sanderson, then watch the new Wheel of Time TV series on Amazon. Every week, join hosts Caleb Wimble, Catie Jarvis, Daniel Kutinsky, and Keeley Frank as we examine these sprawling stories, characters, themes, and their social relevance today.

fields.podcast_name: Blood and Ashes: A Wheel of Time Spoilercast
fields.podcast_summary: Blood and Ashes is a spoiler filled, chapter by chapter discussion of the Wheel of Time series of fantasy novels penned by Robert Jordan and Brandon Sanderson.Join us, three middle aged dads, as we re-read the series and enthusiastically discuss all the best bits from each chapter. Do we know every single thing about the world of The Wheel of Time? No. Do we know half? Probably not. Does that stop us from wildly speculating and tapping into half faded memories from our teens? Definitely not!It's all just a good ol' time for anyone looking to relive the highs and lows of Rand's journey. Pull in!

fields.podcast_name: tWoTcast
fields.podcast_summary: tWoTcast is the Wheel of Time podcast featuring Jono, Joe and Tom. Enjoy rereads and commentary of the Wheel of Time book series written by Robert Jordan and completed by Brandon Sanderson. Also, LIVE shows from conventions, rereads of other book series and other general nerd culture discussions.

fields.podcast_name: The Dragon Reread
fields.podcast_summary:
We're rereading Robert Jordan's Wheel of Time series of fantasy novels! Why? Because they're so much fun!

We recap the events of the story as we go, so you don't have to read along unless you want to.

These books are pretty great already, but what we add is a lot of jokes of varying hilarity, and a little insight. We have a great time recording these and we hope you'll have a great time listening. Join us!

fields.title: WoT Show Season 2: Episode 8
fields.description:
Everything is going down at Falme! The Whitecloaks attack! Elayne and Nynaeve launch their rescue attempt of Egwene! Mat summons the Heroes of the Horn! Perrin makes best enemies with Dain Borhold! Oh yeah, and Rand is proclaimed Dragon Reborn by, uh, a giant dragon!

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

  • (00:18) - Intro
  • (00:30) - Pre Watch
  • (05:04) - Post Watch
  • (26:36) - Outro

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

fields.title: WoT Show Season 2: Episode 7
fields.description:
Rand must escape his captivity from the Amyrlin Seat. So he asks Lanfear for help. She helps by blowing up Cairhien. Then Rand, Moiraine, Lan, and Lanfear all team up to go to Falme. Oh yeah, and Moiraine wasn't really stilled, just shielded, and Rand fixes that.

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

  • (00:19) - Intro
  • (00:36) - Pre Watch
  • (05:06) - Post Watch
  • (17:51) - Outro

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

fields.title: WoT Show Season 2: Episode 6
fields.description:
Egwene, Nynaeve, and Elayne get familiar with the Seanchan, which is unpleasant. Rand hangs out in Cairhien with Moiraine's family, which is awkward. Mat discovers that Min is working for Ishamael, which is nonsensical.

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

  • (00:19) - Intro
  • (00:30) - Pre Watch
  • (02:38) - Post Watch
  • (15:32) - Outro

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

fields.title: WoT Show Season 2: Episode 5
fields.description:
We spend a lot of time watching Moiraine and Verin, neither of whom does much worth mentioning. So forget that sentence. Perrin meets Aviendha, who is pretty cool. Also Nynaeve and Elayne evade the Seanchan, but Egwene does not.
★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

  • (00:18) - Intro
  • (00:51) - Pre watch
  • (06:21) - Post watch
  • (22:27) - Outro

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

fields.title: WoT Show Season 2: Episode 4
fields.description:
Nynaeve, Egwene, and Elayne walk right into Liandrin's Seachan trap (the first of many, perhaps). Selene is revealed to be Lanfear when Moiraine runs her through with a sword while Rand is running her through with... not a sword.
★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

  • (00:18) - Intro
  • (00:35) - Pre watch
  • (04:56) - Post watch
  • (22:56) - Outro

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

fields.title: WoT Show Season 2: Episode 3
fields.description:
Nynaeve faces her Accepted test. Rand and Selene go anti-slumming it in a fancy party to get some fancy wine so Rand can bribe fancy Logain. Mat and Min team up but it turns out Min sucks now.
★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

  • (00:19) - Intro
  • (00:27) - Pre watch
  • (21:50) - Post watch
  • (23:13) - Outro

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

fields.title: WoT Show Season 2: Episode 2
fields.description:
The Wheel of Time show continues! As do we, your intrepid (re)viewers. Do Moiraine and Lan work out their feelings? Does Rand go grim and violent way ahead of schedule? Does the most Daughter-Heir-est of Daughter-Heirs finally make an appearance? Yes, yes, and oh, yes.

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★ Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

fields.title: WOT Show Season 2: Episode 1
fields.description:
We return once more for the premiere of season 2 of the Wheel of Time TV show! Our feeling for the first season was... less than positive. Will season 2 exceed our basement-level expectations?

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

  • (00:18) - Intro
  • (11:55) - After Show

We are Alice Sullivan, Micah Sparkman, and Jeff Lake.

Find us at armadillo.club!

Music: Intrigue by Alexandr Zhelanov licensed under CC-BY 4.0.

fields.title: The Eye of the World Rereread: Chapters 48-53
fields.description:
The party of mostly-Emond's-Fielders finally reaches the titular Eye of the World. They meet a very nice and very green man, then they meet a couple of very not-nice Forsaken. Then it's finally time for Rand and Ba'alzamon to settle their theological debate (with swords).

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: The Eye of the World Rereread: Chapters 43-47
fields.description:
With time growing short, the party turns to the Ways to reach the Eye of the World in time. The Ways are quite nice, if you like pitch blackness and gibbering madness creatures hounding you to death. They do make it to Fal Dara, where they find out just exactly who this Lan guy is.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: The Eye of the World Rereread: Chapters 38-42
fields.description:
Moiraine and Lan (and Nynaeve!) rescue Perrin and Egwene from the Whitecloaks. Rand draws the attention of a princess, a prince, a queen, an Aes Sedai, a general, a soldier, and a beggar. That's how Two Rivers folk lie low.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: The Eye of the World Rereread: Chapters 33-37
fields.description:
Rand and Mat hitchhike to Caemlyn, and are accosted by darkfriends at almost every stop. It's enough to make a man suspicious. They do make it to Caemlyn, where Thom's name opens some doors for them (and slams shut others).

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: The Eye of the World Rereread: Chapters 29-32
fields.description:
Perrin and Egwene are chased by some bad birds, and find refuge in a stedding. Their rest doesn't last long, as some Children of the Light arrive and inspire Perrin to turn some white cloaks red. Then Rand and Mat walk themselves into a trap and only escape via some lucky lightning.

Bonus: artist's rendition of Elyas Machera, Long Tooth.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: The Eye of the World Rereread: Chapters 24-28
fields.description:
Egwene and Perrin spend some time absorbing immaculate vibes with the Tuatha'an while Rand, Mat, and Thom hasten south on a rivership. When the river crew reaches Whitebridge, things take a turn for the tragic, and Rand and Mat continue on with a lot less glee, man.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: The Eye of the World Rereread: Chapters 19-23
fields.description:
In the cursed city of Shadar Logoth, the party's cozy camp is disrupted by Trollocs and a thing that eats Trollocs for fun. Some end up on a boat, some end up traveling with a wolf pack, and some are just trying to catch up.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: The Eye of the World Rereread: Chapters 15-18
fields.description:
Rand and Mat get up to zany hijinks in Baerlon, if you consider antagonizing the Whitecloaks zany. Then their party must flee the town for (mostly) unrelated reasons. They end up in an even bigger, and much more evil city: Shadar Logoth.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: The Eye of the World Rereread: Chapters 10-14
fields.description:
Rand, Mat, and Perrin (and Egwene and Thom) flee from trouble to trouble, pursued by ever-more-terrifying monsters. They make it across the river and to the "city" of Baerlon, where surely they'll be safe.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: The Eye of the World Rereread: Chapters 5-9
fields.description:
Rand and Tam head back to the farm to make themselves a stew, when a band of uninvited Trollocs show up and try to stew them instead. They escape back to town where Moiraine and Lan have spent the night making crispy Trolloc fritters.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: The Eye of the World Rereread: Prologue-Chapter 4
fields.description:
We start on the next Wheel of Time book, which turns out to be The Eye of the World, because time is a big thing that goes around.

Rand and his best buds are all ready for a really swell holiday season, but a band of visiting Shadowspawn have other plans.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: NS: Chapters 20-Epilogue
fields.description:
Moiraine and Lan travel together grudgingly to Chachin, where they exit each other's company as quickly as possible. They find themselves tangled up with either end of a dark plot and their only hope is to meet in the middle.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: NS: Chapters 13-19
fields.description:
Moiraine enjoys being a full Aes Sedai, but then she has to flee Tar Valon before she gets enthroned. Lan returns to the borderlands and finds both physical and political peril waiting for him. They finally meet, and one of them ends up in the drink.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: NS: Chapters 6-12
fields.description:
As the search for the Dragon Reborn continues without Moiraine or Siuan's involvement. They're busy studying for their Aes Sedai final exam, which involve a lot more nudity than one might expect.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: NS: Chapters 1-5
fields.description:
Young Moiraine and Siuan are studying hard for their final Aes Sedai certification, but they keep getting distracted by the Aiel War, Elaida's harassment, and the dark prophecy that threatens to destroy their world.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: aMoL: Chapter 46-Epilogue
fields.description: The Battle concludes, with Rand, Mat, and Perrin cleaning house of various malefactors. The Dark One issue is settled. For good? Nope, because time is like a big round thing that turns. We finally finish the main series. Your hosts are Jeff Lake (@jeff_lake), Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan. Support us at armadillo.club! Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

fields.title: aMoL: Chapters 38-45
fields.description:
Egwene's incredible sacrifice inspires Rand. Mat's battle strategy pays off after the forces of Light get a little lucky. It helps that a loophole in the rules lets Olver summon the Heroes of Legend to help. The Dark One is running out of Forsaken after Aviendha, Lan, Talmanes (!), and Egwene have trimmed their head count a bit.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

 

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: aMoL: Chapter 37 Part 4
fields.description:
In the Battle, Mat's counterstrike depends on Fortuona deciding to come to the rescue. They could really use that Horn but it seems like it's about to be eaten by Trollocs. Egwene isn't waiting around, though; she decides it's time to clean up this "M'Hael"/Balefire problem for good. Lan draws the curtains on the Demandred show.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: aMoL: Chapter 37 Part 3
fields.description:
Mat's battle plan is baffling everybody, hopefully in a good way. Rand and the Dark One continue their debate. Demandred is on top of the world, since he's winning the battle and he still has time to sword-fight the Andoran nobles who keep wandering in.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: aMoL: Chapter 37 Part 2
fields.description:
Mat's Last Battle plan has achieved the "so crazy" part but he's still working on the "it just might work" part. Rand and the Dark One weave the fabric of reality in their duel to determine the future. Gawyn discovers why nobody tried just running up and stabbing Demandred before.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: aMoL Chapters 34-37 Part 1
fields.description:
The Last Battle has begun. Mat is in command, to the perplexity of everybody who knows him. Rand has engaged with the Dark One directly. The forces of Light (Lightspawn?) have finally committed themselves, and all hangs by a thread.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: aMoL: Chapters 30-33
fields.description:
Things on the battlefield don't get worse. In fact they get slightly better, as Hessalam's devious manipulation is revealed by Perrin (of all people). But after all this worse-getting, it's pretty dire. It's time for Mat to round up the troops for one last stand.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: aMoL: Chapters 26-29
fields.description:
You're not going to believe this: the war is going even worse than before. The political leaders finally realize the dark source of their generals' troubles. Egwene meets Fortuona. Mat prevents them from strangling each other, which may be his most impressive victory yet.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: aMoL: Chapters 23-25
fields.description:
We thought the war was going bad before, but now it's really going downhill. Rand heads to his fate in the Pit of Doom. Mat and the Seanchan mobilize to join the fight. Perrin has a whole bunch of awesome adventures that nobody else can see but are very important.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: aMoL: Chapters 19-22
fields.description:
Things are going from worse to worser on the battlefield. Egwene learns that the Sharan ambush was led by the previously missing Demandred. Perrin gets sidetracked from his hunt for one dream-villain when he discovers another one.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: aMoL: Chapters 15-18
fields.description:
The various battles against the Shadowspawn are intensifying and worsening. Mat painstakingly sneaks into Tuon's palace, only to find out that he lives there. Then Rand does what Mat should have done and walks right in the front door. 

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: aMoL: Chapters 11-14
fields.description:
War is everywhere. Rand and Perrin both encounter Lanfear in dreams. Mat decides to join an ongoing Seanchan assassination competition. Things go well at the Black Tower (for once).

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: aMoL: Chapters 7-10
fields.description:
As Elayne gets down to business to defeat the Dark One, the war opens on four fronts. Luckily she has four top-flight generals to handle them. She personally oversees the battle at Caemlyn, where she decides that the best way to fix a half-burnt city is to make it a whole-burnt one. Then Elayne and Rand "catch up".

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: aMoL: Chapters 4-6
fields.description:
While Androl and Pevara lead a rescue mission that would make Nynaeve proud, Rand presents his organizing document to the Lords and Ladies (and Egwenes) of the land. The negotiation isn't going well until Rand gets a surprise assist from a long-dead frenemy.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: aMoL: Chapters 1-3
fields.description:
Rand and Perrin catch up, then Rand and Aviendha "catch up". Meanwhile things are getting serious for Androl and Pevara, who need to get into each other's heads to get out of their predicament.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: aMoL: Prologue
fields.description:
We keep hearing about who is no bloody hero, but in this prologue Talmanes shows us what a bloody hero bloody looks like. We also check in with various schemes and plots among the light and the dark. You guys, I think the Last Battle might actually be close this time.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: ToM: Chapters 55-Epilogue
fields.description:
Mat makes good his escape from the world of the foxy folk with the aid of luck, bombs, and an unexpected sacrifice. Egwene, Elayne, and finally Rand have arrived at the appointed meeting place, and it appears that the Last Battle is about to become the Current Battle.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: ToM: Chapters 52-54
fields.description:
Mat and his companions venture into the Tower of Ghenjei. They meet up with those foxy fellows, who are good at both riddles and skinning people. Mat will have to keep an eye out.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: ToM: Chapters 47-51
fields.description:
Perrin meets Elayne and they hash out the consequences of his kinda-rebellion in her kinda-kingdom. Faile takes care of the details for him since this is more of a talking situation than a hammering one. Aviendha gets some very bad news in Rhuidean. Then Rand finally meets the Borderland rulers and they give him the old Borderland slap test.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: ToM: Chapters 41-46
fields.description:
Perrin finally wins Galad over with his "rescue you and all your friends from Trolloc cookpots" plan. Combined with his previous plans ("destroy the Dragonsworn", "destroy the Aiel marauders", and "bring your mother back from the dead"), Perrin has finally convinced Galad that he might not be evil.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: ToM: Chapters 36-40
fields.description:
Egwene springs Mesaana's trap with a trap of her own. It turns out that Mesaana has another trap for Egwene inside her trap. Egwene has to figure out how to trap Mesaana from within Mesaana's trap that has sprung Egwene's trap. Also, Perrin is there.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: ToM: Chapters 32-35
fields.description:
Ituralde's no good very bad day of siege ends when Rand arrives and gives him a special one-time demonstration of what happens when Trollocs meet a Dragon. Perrin attends his own murder trial and opts to tell the whole truth about his inclinations. It's a relief for him, but as a legal strategy it is not very effective.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: ToM: Chapters 27-31
fields.description:
While Egwene consolidates her Tower power, things are getting desperate for Ituralde. Even if you win a street battle, if they're your streets it's a bad day. Then Mat uses a chancy tactic to deal with his squishy nemesis.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: ToM: Chapters 23-26
fields.description:
Elayne has a really good idea and decides to mix it up with the Black Ajah by herself and gets a dagger in the side for her trouble. While Ituralde remains besieged, Rand visits Bandar Eban and inspires some initiative. Perrin meets Galad, who really wants to have a battle and is surprised that his stepmom is pouring Perrin's tea.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: ToM: Chapters 20-22
fields.description:
Nynaeve finally takes the test to become a full Aes Sedai. Her success depends on her skill (which is good) and her tact (which is not good). Also, Ituralde leads a fighting retreat which goes well until it doesn't. And Mat gets advice on being a legend from Birgitte, a literal legend.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: ToM: Chapters 16-19
fields.description:
Faile works out her issue with Perrin with a romantic evening. Then she works out her issue with Berelain with a knife fight. Mat presents his plan for vastly increasing the lethality of warfare to Elayne, and she enthusiastically accepts.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: ToM: Chapters 9-15
fields.description:
Mat runs into his old friend the gholam in their favorite hang-out spot: a puddle of Mat's buddy's blood. Then Perrin meets Galad, who confirms that the best of Whitecloaks is the worst of everyone else. Rand returns to Tear, and he's got his stuff together.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: ToM: Chapters 4-8
fields.description:
Perrin starts to make progress with his wolfish nature, boding well for his state of mind. His state of body is less secure though, since his army has encountered Galad's army of white-clad jerks. Meanwhile Mat finds himself sharing a tent with a certain rubbery horror.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: WoT Show S1 E4-8
fields.description:
We finished Season 1 of the Wheel of Time TV Show! Our final review: could be better! The changes to the plot and characterization left us fuddled. Who is this show for? Not us, apparently.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: ToM: Prologue-Chapter 3
fields.description:
After a surprisingly relevant prologue, Rand returns from his mountain retreat. He has used the time hanging out on his own funeral mound to get in touch with his inner selves. He meets with Egwene and the Aes Sedai and does a poor job of not freaking them out.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: Show Episodes 2-4
fields.description:
We progressed through the first half of Season 1 of the Wheel of Time TV show! We generally think that where they followed the books, things are looking good, and where they diverged, it's pretty rough. Look what they did to our boy Thom.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: WoT S1E1
fields.description:
We watched episode 1 of the Wheel of Time TV show! The one starring Rosamund Pike, not the one starring Billy Zane. We talk about what we liked (a lot), and what we didn't like (also a lot).

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: tGS: Chapters 47-Epilogue
fields.description:
After Cadsuane contrives a meeting between him and Tam, Rand spirals into mental instability. His plan to massacre the Seanchan goes off the rails (if genocide can be considered on the rails) and the only person who can talk Rand out of destroying the world is Lews Therin. Not our first choice.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: tGS: Chapters 42-46
fields.description:
Rand is not doing very well as he gives up on the omnishambles he's created in Arad Doman and goes to meet with that borderlander army that has been hanging around for a while. It goes poorly. Then Egwene finally launches the assault on Tar Valon and it goes extremely well.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: tGS: Chapters 38-41
fields.description:
Egwene gets a very special present from the mysterious Verin who finally (and permanently) demystifies herself. Then the long-Foretold Seanchan attack happens, and Egwene has to stop being a novice and start being an awesome battle wizard warrior queen to deal with it.

 

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: tGS: Chapters 33-37
fields.description:
Mat received a surprise visit from the ever-mysterious Verin. She hands him another mystery. Then Rand solves the Graendal problem using a tactic that she'd never see coming, because only a maniac would use it.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: tGS: Chapters 29-32
fields.description:
The new grimdark Rand searches for clues to Graendal's whereabouts in Bandar Eban. Nynaeve helps the only way she knows how: kicking down doors and beating people up.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: tGS: Chapters 24-28
fields.description:
Aviendha finally levels up as a Wise One, and Gawyn helps the rebel Aes Sedai find a useful lead (along with a lifetime supply of cockroaches). Then Mat resupplies at a town with a very rough after-dark scene.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: tGS: Chapters 19-23
fields.description:
Tuon is exercising her power, Mat is exercising his horses, and Perrin is adjusting to normal life. Faile has a poignant ceremony to remember the friends she killed to get home. Then Rand has an incredibly painful lesson about why you don't keep Forsaken in the home.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: tGS: Chapters 14-18
fields.description:
Rand/Lews Therin meets Moridin/Ba'alzamon/Ishamael in a relatively laid-back hell dream. The Elaida decides to have a debate with Egwene in front of the Aes Sedai leadership, which is like a penguin deciding to debate a polar bear.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: Bonus: WoT Show Trailer Reaction!
fields.description: We watched the trailer for the upcoming Wheel of Time TV show, and we talked about it! Find out which of us loved it, and which hated it (you probably won't be surprised who is who). Join us!

fields.title: tGS: Chapters 9-13
fields.description:
Rand adds Ituralde to his collection of Great Captains, as the Last Battle marches ever closer. Egwene marches closer to control of the White Tower as her campaign of subversion begins to reach the higher levels of the Aes Sedai. Then Gawyn makes the first good decision of his life.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: tGS: Chapters 3-8
fields.description:
As Egwene deals with the White Tower literally changing underneath her, Rand outlines a workable plan to deal with the chaos in Arad Doman. We also check in with Rodel (winner), Gawyn (loser), and Aviendha (TBD).

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: tGS: Prologue-Chapter 2
fields.description:
After brief check-ins with Renald, Falendre, Tylee, Mishima, Graendal, Rodel Ituralde the Wolf of Arad Doman, and Masema, we find Rand recovering from his encounter with Semirhage and preparing to enact his plan to stop fighting non-last battles before the Last Battle starts.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: Bonus: JordanCon 2021 Saturday
fields.description:
After a second, very long day at JordanCon, we check in again. We we met some people, learned some things, explored some places. What a con!

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: Bonus: JordanCon 2021 Friday
fields.description:
Here's a dispatch from the field! Specifically, the field of Atlanta, where we attended JordanCon 2021. A quick update on what we saw there!


Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: KoD: Chapters 36-38
fields.description:
Tuon's guard finally catches up with Mat. He's happy to put her on a horse back to her home base, but before she goes she seals the deal: they're married! And Mat is some kind of prince now. He gives her a parting gift of massacring the rogue army hunting her.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: KoD: Chapters 31-35
fields.description:
Elayne has a very eventful day which starts with her leading a raid on the Black Ajah, proceeds with a desperate rescue mission led by Birgitte, and concludes with her becoming the undisputed (ish) ruler of Andor.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: KoD: Chapters 27-30
fields.description:
Perrin solves his "blacksmith puzzle". The solution was to hit it with a hammer. Then he solves Faile's unwanted admirer problem the same way.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: KoD: Chapters 24-26
fields.description:
Egwene slowly conquers the Tower with words, Mat is reunited with his battle brother Talmanes, and Perrin launches his commando mission to rescue his wife. They're all getting back to the things they respectively do best: acquiring power, leading armies, and Faile.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: KoD: Chapters 21-23
fields.description:
Rand finally moves from his seclusion. He visits Tear, and sets his plan to win the Last Battle in motion. This causes a wave of surprise visits by Asha'man, including Logain, who has gotten surprisingly cool since last we saw him.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: KoD: Chapters 16-20
fields.description:
While Elayne deals with the siege of Caemlyn, Rand prepares his grand plan to befriend the Seanchan before the Last Battle. Erith manages to wed the most interesting Ogier in the world: Loial. Their wedding is briefly interrupted by an epic battle against a horde of shadowspawn.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: KoD: Chapters 11-15
fields.description:
Mat and Perrin visit the local urban scenes and find violence and horror, respectively. Elayne struggles to fight her twin battles against the opposing Andoran nobles and against pregnancy brain.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: KoD: Chapters 6-10
fields.description:
Mat's tries to manage the conflict between Tuon and the Aes Sedai while avoiding Seanchan detection. He makes some progress bonding with his future wife, then he gets a message from beyond the grave. Well, from beyond the melted portal at least.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: KoD: Chapters 1-5
fields.description:
The capture of Egwene has upset the plans of both the rebel Aes Sedai and the loyal Forsaken. Meanwhile Perrin and Faile develop competing plans to free Faile from her captivity.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: KoD: Prologue
fields.description:
We start in on Knife of Dreams with another full-size prologue! We check in with (deep breath) Galad Damodred, Rodel Ituralde, High Lady Suroth, Pevara Sedai, Alviarin Sedai, Galina Sedai, and Egwene Sedai. The upshot is that things aren't going very well for anybody.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: New podcast: Living Dead in Austin
fields.description: Announcing our new podcast: Living Dead in Austin. We're (re)reading the Southern Vampire Mysteries, aka the Sookie Stackhouse books, by Charlaine Harris! Check us out at livingdeadinaustin.com.

fields.title: CoT: Chapter 29-Epilogue
fields.description: Mat's chaperoned shopping date with Tuon takes a murderous turn. Then Egwene embarks on a dangerous mission that may tip the balance in the siege of Tar Valon. Your hosts are Jeff Lake (@jeff_lake), Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan (@alicemsullivan). Support us on Patreon! Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

fields.title: CoT: Chapters 25-28
fields.description:
Perrin finds food for his forces in a forlorn town. Then he witnesses a windy winnowing of weevils. Then Mat stops avoiding Tuon and starts dating her.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: CoT: Chapters 20-24
fields.description:
As Egwene begins the hunt for a Saidin-wielding murderer which may eventually lead to her own tent, Alviarin accidentally intrudes on a brutal performance review for her own Forsaken boss. Then Rand unveils his intent to turn his evil enemies into evil friends.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: CoT: Chapters 16-19
fields.description:
Egwene manages the affairs of the army besieging Tar Valon. The rebel sisters grapple with the issue of whether to ally with the Black Tower against the White. Meanwhile, the forsaken living in Egwene's tent has become a real headache.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: CoT: Chapters 13-15
fields.description:
Elayne meets with her supporters for the throne of Andor, and they're very young, even compared to her. Then we check in with various darkfriend and darkfriend-adjacent schemers in Caemlyn.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: CoT: Chapters 9-12
fields.description:
Elayne engages in the business of ruling Andor while also trying to become its ruler. She also takes a really nice bath.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: CoT: Chapters 5-8
fields.description:
Perrin's army finds the captors of Faile, and it turns out it's a whole city of Aiel. He can't execute his usual kill-them-all plan, so he'll have to rely on his unreliable allies, including the sex pest Berelain and the madman Masema.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: CoT: Chapters 1-4
fields.description:
Mat and his companions hide from the Seanchan in the circus (both literal and figurative). He has to juggle aggressive sea captains, Aes Sedai fugitives, innocent performers, and his future wife.

Note: the audio quality is sub-par in this episode. The person responsible has been sacked.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: CoT: Prologue
fields.description:
We start in on Crossroads of Twilight! The prologue is the now-standard revue of incidental characters, plotting and scheming around the world. Ituralde, Valda, Samitsu, Yukiri... We may not know who they are, but now we know what they're up to.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: WH: Chapters 32-35
fields.description:
After Cadsuane frees Rand from a Far Madding prison cell, she tags along to Shadar Logoth as he and Nynaeve attempt the impossible: cleansing the Dark One's taint from Saidin. The Forsaken will have something to say about that.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: WH: Chapters 27-31
fields.description:
Mat and his allies execute his plan to free the Aes Sedai from Seanchan captivity and escape Ebou Dar. It goes well, except for the part where he accidentally fulfills a dire prophecy in the process. Mat really tries to avoid doing that these days.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: WH: Chapters 23-26
fields.description:
Cadsuane and a motley band Travel to Far Madding to chase after Rand, which is a dangerous move considering how he responds to being chased. Meanwhile, Elayne is doing the mundane work of ruling Andor when she is surprised by the arrival of some people we've been awaiting for two books.

Note: as usual, the audio is worse than usual in this episode. The person responsible has (as usual) been sacked.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: WH: Chapters 18-22
fields.description:
Mat, failing utterly to escape Ebou Dar, gets caught up in a variety of schemes and counter-schemes under the Seanchan occupation. Meanwhile Rand is in Far Madding playing a confusing game of who's-hunting-whom.

Note: the audio is worse than usual in this episode. The person responsible has been sacked.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: WH: Chapters 13-17
fields.description:
Mat, uncrushed by that wall, is still in occupied Ebou Dar. He's staying under the Seanchan radar while trying to stop having sex with the queen. His plan is complicated by the arrival of his prophesied bride, Tuon.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: WH: Chapters 10-12
fields.description:
Elayne, having survived the assassination attempt, appoints her savior captain of her bodyguard. Then a surprise visit from Rand leads to that rarest of events in the turnings of the Wheel of Time: a mature relationship talk.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: WH: Chapters 6-9
fields.description:
Perrin grapples with the consequences of Faile's capture. Elayne struggles to balance her various responsibilities to Andor, Rand, and the White Tower. Then an assassination attempt almost succeeds when she falls for the old poisoned tea trick.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: WH: Chapters 1-5
fields.description:
As Faile is marched into Shaido captivity, Perrin is torn between his urge to go after her and his duty to keep his army together (and also torn between the ax and the hammer, but that's normal).

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: WH: Prologue
fields.description:
We're back with the prologue of Winter's Heart. Elaida's Darkfriend hunters strike Black (Ajah) gold, Elayne gets recursively interrupted several times, and Rand has done a poor job of leaving Cairhien.

Note: you may hear children laughing during this episode. This phenomenon can be attributed to creeping madness on the part of the listener.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: PoD: Chapters 28-31
fields.description:
Elaida's Black Ajah hunters arrive at a breakthrough, Elayne arrives in Caemlyn, Perrin arrives to meet Masema, and Egwene's army arrives at Tar Valon. Rand learns that neglecting your army of channeling warriors can have negative consequences: for instance, sometimes your throne room explodes.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: PoD: Chapters 25-27
fields.description:
The White Tower is in tumult thanks to the influence of the Black Ajah. However, Elaida's secret Black Ajah hunting squad is closer to their quarry than even they suspect. Meanwhile Rand and Cadsuane have a jackass competition and Rand, unusually, loses.

Why Doesn't Randland Have an Actual Name? By Sylas K. Barrett:  https://www.tor.com/2020/04/30/why-doesnt-randland-have-an-actual-name/

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: PoD: Chapters 22-24
fields.description:
Rand leads an army into battle with the Seanchan. Things start off well as his literal lightning campaign catches them off-guard, but having an insane commander eventually proves to have a downside too.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: PoD: Chapters 18-21
fields.description:
Egwene makes her attempt to seize true power over the rebel Aes Sedai. It depends on her being unshakably confident in her own righteousness and also being annoyingly, technically right about legal minutiae. In other words, Egwene's specialties.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: PoD: Chapters 14-17
fields.description:
Rand meets with his variously trustworthy Asha'man and plots his next move. Then Egwene is set up to make her big move to realize her power as the Amyrlin Seat by a helpful Andoran army. Hopefully she won't have to destroy them.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: PoD: Chapters 10-13
fields.description:
Perrin meets with Queen Alliandre of Ghealdan, and it goes swimmingly. Then Rand meets with a mud-spattered remnant of Sammael's army and it goes poorly. When it comes to diplomacy, you want the blacksmith not the shepherd.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: PoD: Chapters 7-9
fields.description:
Perrin rescues the incognito Morgase and company from zealots trying to cut her ears off. Then he rescues her from unemployment by giving her a job in his wife's household.

NB: As has become usual, there are some audio quality issues in this episode. The person responsible has been sacked. Surely the next one will get it right.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: PoD: Chapters 3-6
fields.description:
Elayne and Nynaeve finally do something about the unseasonable weather! Not personally, of course. But they did supervise. Then they have a typically nasty run-in with the Seanchan.

NB: There are some audio quality issues in this episode. The person responsible has been sacked.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: PoD: Prologue-Chapter 2
fields.description:
We start in on Path of Daggers! First we check in on the doings of minor players old and new, and then Nynaeve and Elayne's much enlarged entourage makes its exit from Ebou Dar right before the place starts exploding.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: CoS: Chapters 40-41
fields.description:
Rand wakes from his second evil injury and leaps back into action: he finally launches his much-delayed strike at Sammael. Then he learns an important lesson: if you're going to have a balefire fight, don't get distracted.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: CoS: Chapters 37-39
fields.description:
Nynaeve and Elayne finally find the bowl, and they also find trouble in the form of a deadly Darkspawn from the Age of Legends. Luckily Mat is along to face it with them. Not so lucky for Mat, of course.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: CoS: Chapters 34-36
fields.description:
Rand goes to meet the Sea Folk, which goes well. Then he goes to meet the rebel lords organizing against him. It goes well too, until the fog monsters show up and dismember everyone.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: CoS: Chapters 30-33
fields.description:
Nynaeve is finally reunited with Lan, and it only took an attack of evil time magic to do it. Meanwhile Elayne gets some things straight with the Ebou Dar Aes Sedai in an official way, and Rand gets some things straight with Min in a sexy way.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: CoS: Chapters 26-29
fields.description:
Morgase makes her escape from the Whitecloaks, a day too late. Mat moves into the palace, which is the last place he wants to be. Luckily they finally make some progress finding that magic bowl.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: CoS: Chapters 22-25
fields.description:
Nynaeve and Elayne actually apologize to Mat, the hardest person in the world to apologize to. Unfortunately, Mat is too hungover for his usual street fight so Nynaeve and Elayne get in one instead.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: CoS: Chapters 18-21
fields.description:
The plot twists for Rand as a mysterious new Aes Sedai arrives in Cairhien threatens to confound his plans. Meanwhile Mat and Birgitte bond over their knowledge of the Old Tongue and their love of drinking.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: CoS: Chapters 14-17
fields.description:
Mat is in Ebou Dar. He spends a day gambling, chasing women (figuratively and literally), killing "robbers", trying to avoid having sex with the Queen. The usual stuff.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: CoS: Chapters 12-13
fields.description:
Egwene has to face some of the realities of leading an army to war, with the help of Gareth Bryne (who is awesome). Then a conspicuously missing person returns, while Nynaeve and Elayne meet with the Sea Folk and find themselves out of their depth.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: CoS: Chapters 9-11
fields.description:
Egwene spends a busy day being the Amyrlin Seat. It turns out that it's a lot of work. Factional strife, blackmailers, dwindling resources... It's a wonder she finds time to worry about the terrifying Forsaken with a grudge against her.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: CoS: Chapters 5-8
fields.description:
Rand faces down the usurper Colavaere. He decides to do something even worse than executing her: he makes her get a job. Then Egwene grapples with her new set of problems. Moghedien is on the loose, none of the Aes Sedai respect her authority, and Gawyn's dream self keeps making sweet love to her.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: CoS: Chapters 2-4
fields.description:
Perrin accompanies Rand on his return to Cairhien. The threat of violence looms as Rand learns what has been happening in the city since his captivity. Everyone in the palace is about to play a game of "who can shift their allegiance (again) the fastest?"

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: CoS: Prologue-Chapter 1
fields.description:
We start in on Crown of Swords! First there's the usual recap chapter where we check in with various villains and antagonists. Then Perrin grapples with the aftermath of the battle at Dumai's Wells. Battles aren't so much fun when it's people you're chopping up.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: LoC: Chapter 53-Epilogue
fields.description:
Perrin leads a desperate chase to free Rand before it's too late. It culminates in a showdown that will change the worldwide balance of power. Those Aes Sedai should have thought twice before they put a Two Rivers blacksmith's friend in a box.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: LoC: Chapters 49-52
fields.description:
After an angry encounter with the Salidar Aes Sedai, Rand flees to Cairhien where he gets in much worse trouble. Luckily Perrin is back, because Rand is going to need his wolf bro.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: LoC: Chapters 44-48
fields.description:
Perrin meets his in-laws. It turns out that they are crazy, which explains why his wife is also crazy. Meanwhile, Mat, Elayne, and Nynaeve arrive in Ebou Dar, the city that is to knife fights what London is to fog.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: LoC: Chapters 38-43
fields.description:
Mat arrives in Salidar and executes his favorite tactic of barging in and making wrong assumptions. Then Min arrives in Caemlyn with the Salidar Aes Sedai delegation and soon afterward arrives in Rand's lap.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: LoC: Chapters 32-37
fields.description:
Egwene gets spanked by a belt, travels through the dream, then gets elected boss of all Aes Sedai for her trouble. Worth it. Then, Mat gets sent to Salidar by Rand via magic shortcut and now has to deal with a town of upset Aes Sedai. Much easier, but definitely not worth it.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: LoC: Chapters 28-31
fields.description:
Rand is attacked by a Grey Man, who is immediately destroyed by Taim, who couldn't be more suspicious if he tried. Meanwhile, Nynaeve does the impossible and Heals Logain. Not necessarily a good thing, but still very impressive!

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: LoC: Chapters 25-27
fields.description:
Rand studies the Andoran history of kissing cousins, while Egwene gets some hands-on (lips-on?) practice in kissing with Gawyn. Then Rand meets the White Tower's delegation and they have a competition to see who can underestimate the other the most.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: LoC: Chapters 20-24
fields.description:
Egwene is almost back in action. Mat fends off a sneak attack by some mystery Aiel and finds a grisly message. Rand meets some semi-friendly Ogier and takes them on a field trip to Shadar Logoth.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: LoC: Chapters 16-19
fields.description:
Rand splits his time between ruling Caemlyn and Cairhien, and gets an message from Sammael that is pleasantly worded but unpleasantly delivered. Then Egwene and Rand have a snippy argument, just like old times.

Note: the audio is crackly in some places. The person responsible has been sacked.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: LoC: Chapters 13-15
fields.description:
Nynaeve and Elayne discover that the fate of the world hinges on a mysterious bowl in a locked room in a city with no street signs. Then they survive a furniture attack! Meanwhile, Egwene discovers dream sex the hard (but fun) way.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★
