fields.title: LoC: Chapters 10-12
fields.description:
Rand takes a break from ruling Caemlyn to reach out to some friendly Aes Sedai and gets a nasty surprise. Meanwhile, the Salidar Aes Sedai find out that the fastest way to get a rule broken is to tell Nynaeve about it.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: LoC: Chapters 7-9
fields.description:
Elayne and Nynaeve are feeling stifled now that they’re back to being Accepted and no longer in charge. Then we check in with the leader of the Whitecloaks who has no idea how out of his depth he is. Don’t feel bad Niall, we’re having trouble keeping track of things too and we have a glossary!

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: LoC: Chapters 5-6
fields.description:
Mat is now a general in charge of his own army: The Band of the Red Hand. How cool is that? He generals all day and parties all night as he prepares to enact Rand's secret plan to defeat Sammael. Meanwhile a whole lot of Forsaken do a whole lot of scheming without telling us a whole lot.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: LoC: Chapters 1-4
fields.description:
Rand hasn't been resting. In between taking on 5 swordsmen at once for practice (and winning!) and taking on the mad ghost in his head (and not really winning) he's been teaming up with our new favorite character Davram Bashere to take the fight to Sammael in Illian.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: LoC: Prologue
fields.description:
The lengthy prologue of Lord of Chaos follows various evil-doers (and a few good-doers) as they plot their next move now that Rand has set the world spinning in a new direction. Everybody's got a plan until they get balefired in the face.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: tFoH: Chapters 53-56
fields.description:
Rand takes the fight to Rahvin himself, in Caemlyn! Mat and Aviendha come along for the ride, and there's a special guest appearance by Nynaeve. Killing a Forsaken is a team effort.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: tFoH: Chapters 50-52
fields.description:
In Cairhien, Rand and Mat both find their relationship troubles turn deadly. In Mat's case it's a sexy darkfriend. For Rand it's a millenia-old ex girlfriend who skins people when she gets angry. And she's very angry with Rand.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: tFoH: Chapters 47-49
fields.description:
Nynaeve and Elayne leave the menagerie and fight their way aboard a ship headed for Salidar and the good Aes Sedai. It turns out that an army of Shienarans is very useful to have around.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: tFoH: Chapters 43-46
fields.description:
It all goes down outside the gates of Cairhien. A massive battle resolves the Shaido issue in a river of blood as Rand invents artillery warfare. Mat accidentally takes command of several divisions and inadvertently slays the enemy commander.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: tFoH: Chapters 38-42
fields.description:
Nynaeve takes a break from the circus and has a fun day in the city. She meets a one-eyed soldier, a mad prophet, and a sexy Whitecloak. Meanwhile Mat is slowly losing his struggle to avoid becoming the coolest guy in the universe.


Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: tFoH: Chapters 33-37
fields.description:
Nynaeve and Elayne are having a grand old time after joining the circus but things go very wrong very fast when Nynaeve gets in a dream-fight with Moghedien. Her usual strategy of punching her way out does nothing against somebody who can turn you into a horse.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: tFoH: Chapters 27-32
fields.description:
Siuan Sanche sells her plan to the Aes Sedai in Salidar, despite Gareth Bryne's untimely intrusion. Then, Rand and Aviendha teleport to the other side of the world, build an igloo, get naked, and get busy.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: tFoH: Chapters 21-26
fields.description:
Rand leads the Aiel after Couladin's trail of destruction while Egwene follows her bliss and walks herself into another trap. Meanwhile Siuan rejoins the Aes Sedai she led a month ago, and they're like, "Who are you again?"

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: tFoH: Chapters 16-20
fields.description:
There's a lot of running away in this chapter. Nynaeve and Elayne have to run away when they're spotted by Galad (who is now a Whitecloak, boo). To hide, they join the circus (yay!). Also, Morgase manages to escape her mind-twisted captivity with the help of her true loyalists (double yay!).

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: tFoH: Chapters 11-15
fields.description:
While Siuan and company learn to make their way in the wide world without being able to channel, Nynaeve learns some hard lessons in her dreams. Lesson one: watch out for Egwene, she's a maniac.


Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: tFoH: Chapters 6-10
fields.description:
Rand and Mat barely survive an attack by Darkhounds, then Rand finally decides to move the Aiel. Meanwhile Nynaeve and Elayne employ their tried-and-true investigation method of finding a trap and jumping into it.


NOTE: This episode has some explicit discussion of torture.


Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: tFoH: Chapters 2-5
fields.description:
In Rhuidean, Egwene studies dreamwalking with the Wise Ones while Rand (ahem, that's Lord Dragon Car'a'carn Rand al'Thor to you) tries to complete the set of Aiel clans before Couladin does.

NOTE: The audio is extra bad this episode. The person responsible has been sacked.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: tFoH: Prologue - Chapter 1
fields.description:
As The Fires of Heaven opens, we take a tour of various dastardly deeds and shadowy meetings that bode ill for the forces of Light. Also, Siuan Sanche and company have trouble adjusting to civilian life and run afoul of the criminal justice system.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: tSR: Chapters 55-58
fields.description:
Glorious! Perrin and his Emond's Field crew have their final showdown with the Trolloc hordes, and it doesn't seem like anything can save them. Meanwhile, Rand finally springs his trap to trap the other trappers. We also have a surprisingly deep discussion on how this book compares to the rest of the series.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: tSR: Chapters 51-54
fields.description:
It's all coming to a head! Nynaeve and Elayne finally strike at the Black Ajah (accompanied by their Seanchan BFF Egeanin) while Perrin and Faile decide that a Trolloc siege is the perfect destination wedding.


Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: tSR: Chapters 47-50
fields.description:
Turns out Min is always right. The Tower is in turmoil as Siuan Sanche is deposed by a cabal led by Elaida. Meanwhile Rand is upset when the forces of darkness invade his sex dream.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: tSR: Chapters 43-46
fields.description:
Perrin leads his friends and neighbors in glorious battle against the forces of darkness! Not bad for a blacksmith with a wolf complex. Meanwhile Nynaeve and Elayne put on revealing dresses and bludgeon some people unconscious in the street. When in Tanchico, do as the Taraboners do.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: tSR: Chapters 39-42
fields.description:
Nynaeve and team finally arrive in Tanchico, and have no idea what they've gotten into. Meanwhile Perrin kills Trollocs as planned. He also figures out that all he had to do to patch things up with Faile was be gravely injured. Easy!


Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: tSR: Chapters 34-38
fields.description:
We get our first real glimpse of Aiel life. Egwene begins her Dream job, some obviously evil new people show up, and Rand starts acting crazy(er). Luckily, Mat has gotten a new brain to go with his new hat and medallion. It's all about accessorizing!


Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: tSR: Chapters 29-33
fields.description:
It's all Perrin all the time this episode! Perrin returns to Emond's Field and finds it being oppressed under the twin thumbs of Whitecloaks and Trollocs. He rallies the countryside! And embarks on what should be named Operation Kill Them All.


Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: tSR: Chapters 24-28
fields.description:
Mat explores another dimension through another twisted doorway in another ghost city. This time he manages to steal zero knives. Rand relives the lives of his ancestors back to the Age of Legends and learns the many secrets of the Aiel. Meanwhile Perrin and Faile bicker.


Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: tSR: Chapters 19-23
fields.description:
We finally get to hear Rand's big announcement: he's taking some time off to get in touch with his roots. Meanwhile Elayne and Nynaeve take ship with the Sea Folk where they encounter courtesy and co-ed toplessness.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: tSR: Chapters 13-18
fields.description: Here's a digressive episode for you! Jordan's romantic writing has us discussing consent, and we also contrast his  curiously recurring characters with those of his arch-nemesis George R. R. Martin. Also, Perrin and Faile bicker a lot. Like, a lot. Your hosts are Jeff Lake (@jeff_lake), Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan (@alicemsullivan). Support us on Patreon! Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

fields.title: tSR: Chapters 8-12
fields.description:
A lot happens here! Selene finally clues Rand in on her true identity, Rand starts acting like a hero (good thing with all these Trollocs around), and Egwene learns to use the ultimate dream weapon: nudity.


Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: tSR: Chapters 3-7
fields.description:
Our heroes divide their time between recovering from the magic attacks, interrogating Darkfriends, and working out their relationship issues. Which one of those is the most important? Feelings, of course!


Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: tSR: Chapters 1-2
fields.description:
Here we go again! After some recaps and foreshadowing, we rejoin Rand and Co in the Stone of Tear, where there are strange goings-on.

Will Perrin defeat the twin threats of axe and metaphor? Will Mat stop stabbing his cards long enough to play them? And will Rand figure out what that half-naked lady in his bedroom is hinting at?

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: tDR: Chapters 50-56
fields.description:
This is the big finish! All our story lines come together again as everyone chips in to help Rand prove that he's the Dragon Reborn (for the second time) and defeats Ba'alzamon (for the third time). Climactic!

We are Alice Sullivan, Micah Sparkman, and Jeff Lake.

Find our other podcasts at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: tDR: Chapters 44-49
fields.description:
Mat follows in Rand's (trespassing) footsteps in Caemlyn and finds himself riding to the rescue like the Big Damn Hero he keeps claiming not to be.


Meanwhile Egwene and Nynaeve start their investigation in Tear in the most obvious place: the local drug store.


We are Alice Sullivan, Micah Sparkman, and Jeff Lake.

Find our other podcasts at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: tDR: Chapters 39-43
fields.description:
Nynaeve and Egwene walk out of the last trap they walked into, then walk into another trap. Luckily, the last trap helps them out with the this trap so they can get back on their way to the trap they were walking into in the first place.


Also, Perrin arrives at an inn and kills a bunch of people... as usual.

We are Alice Sullivan, Micah Sparkman, and Jeff Lake.

Find our other podcasts at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: tDR: Chapters 33-38
fields.description:
Perrin gets a love interest! Of course, he hates the whole thing, just like he hates having awesome wolf powers.

Meanwhile, Egwene and friends walk into another trap. But it's a nice trap, full of friendship.

We are Alice Sullivan, Micah Sparkman, and Jeff Lake.

Find our other podcasts at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: tDR: Chapters 27-32
fields.description:
Egwene and Nynaeve get a new assignment: go walk into a Black Aja trap. Just like last time. But this time they know it's a trap, so that's better, right?

Also, Mat has become really good at rolling dice and killing people. In that order.

We are Alice Sullivan, Micah Sparkman, and Jeff Lake.

Find our other podcasts at armadillo.club!


Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: tDR: Chapters 22-26
fields.description:
We finally get to Egwene's test to become Accepted, and we get an intriguing peek into her future. We also find out that Mat has been upgraded with significant staff fighting skills (though still not any social skills).

We are Alice Sullivan, Micah Sparkman, and Jeff Lake.

Find our other podcasts at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: tDR: Chapters 13-21
fields.description:
A completely Randless episode! Egwene and Nynaeve are given a dangerous mission by the Amyrlin Seat (and a spanking). Plus, Mat finally gets that personality transplant!

We are Alice Sullivan, Micah Sparkman, and Jeff Lake.

Find our other podcasts at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: tDR: Chapter 6-12
fields.description:
Perrin sets out to chase after Rand (again), and to avoid thinking about his wolf powers (again). But we spend more time with Team Nynaeve in the most yonic of all towers: Tar Valon.

We are Alice Sullivan, Micah Sparkman, and Jeff Lake.

Find our other podcasts at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: tDR: Prologue-Chapter 5
fields.description:
We dive into book 3 of the Wheel of Time! These chapters are mostly recap, but there is some good stuff in here. Like the scene where Perrin gets naked and goes wolf-crazy. That's pretty cool.

We are Alice Sullivan, Micah Sparkman, and Jeff Lake.

Find our other podcasts at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: tGH: Chapters 43-50
fields.description:
What a climax! These last chapters of The Great Hunt deliver on what this book has been promising: heroes, legends, glory! It doesn't make much sense, and the characterization is inconsistent, but forget all that. GLORY!

We are Alice Sullivan, Micah Sparkman, and Jeff Lake.

Find our other podcasts at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: tGH: Chapters 38-42
fields.description:
This is a very dark set of chapters. Egwene gets a taste of what it's like to live among the Seanchan invaders, and it's an awful experience. It's not much more fun to read about it.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: tGH: Chapters 32-37
fields.description:
Rand and his pals get to go to a party! Finally, something nice happens. Then, Rand and his pals get hurled on a terrifying voyage through time and space. So, you know, mixed bag.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: tGH: Chapters 26-31
fields.description:
Things are heating up in Cairhien. The reunion with Thom is as welcome as it is brief and we get back to Rand failing upward in the Great Game. Rand's problems are diverse: the attention of the Great Houses, the wrath of the Illuminators, and of course misshapen monsters, but the solutions are all the same: FIRE.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: tGH: Chapters 20-25
fields.description:
Another big city! Cairhien is the second major metropolis we've seen, and Rand plunges in, immediately getting up to his neck in local politics. Way to go, Rand. Maybe this not-at-all-evil mystery woman can help you out with that?

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: tGH: Chapters 14-19
fields.description:
Rand and his companions travel through another world! A world of giant burned swathes and no life forms. Except for evil ones. Oh yeah, and this lady they meet. She's not evil though. Right?

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: tGH: Chapters 9-13
fields.description:
Does it still count as the Great Hunt if you already had the Horn but lost it? (oops) Well, some of our heroes are setting off on the hunt anyway. Others are setting off on a different hunt for knowledge and power at wizard school. Nothing goes as quite as planned.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: tGH: Chapters 5-8
fields.description:
Terror and romance! We get a shot of Robert Jordan's trademark grisly horror reminding us of the stakes on these adventures. Then we get a shot of Robert Jordan's other trademark cheesy romance. Plus, my personal favorite thing: Dark Prophecy!

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: tGH: Prologue-Chapter 4
fields.description:
We tear into the Great Hunt, book 2 of the Wheel of Time! There is a lot of throat clearing in these chapters, which is to say that not a lot happens. We do finally get a strong argument for why you would want to be a Darkfriend: you get to go to sweet masked terror parties.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!


Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: tEotW: Chapters 47-53
fields.description:
This is the climactic final episode of season 1 of our podcast, as we cover the climactic final chapters of The Eye of the World! This ocean of foreshadowing finally pays off in a fiery blaze of action and, well, fire.

Special note: on several occasions Jeff mistakenly refers to Shayol Ghul as Shadar Logoth. The person responsible has been sacked.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: tEotW: Chapters 42-46
fields.description:
The story shifts into high gear as our heroes hurtle onward on their desperate quest. They meet yet another ancient evil and we finally get to see another country of this ever-broadening world.

Also, this episode is chock-full of Lan-service.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: tEotW: Chapters 37-41
fields.description:
Here's a fun one! Rescues, fantastic creatures, even some palace intrigue. Finally, some good news for our heroes!

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: tEotW: Chapters 32-36
fields.description:
Dark times for our heroes as Rand and Mat make their way down the Caemlyn Road. Their money is running low and Darkfriends are around every corner. Running for your life is hard work and no fun.

You know what is fun, though? Us talking about it!

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: tEotW: Chapters 26-31
fields.description:
In which bad things happen to good people. Some of our heroes have a lot of trouble in Whitebridge while the rest run afoul of the Children of the Light. Man, I hate those guys.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: tEotW: Chapters 21-25
fields.description:
Our heroes are scattered! Rand and Mat head downriver on a sailing ship while Perrin and Egwene meet some real strange folk. Like, wearing a red skirt and a yellow blouse strange. Can you imagine?

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: tEotW: Chapters 16-20
fields.description:
Our heroes' time in Baerlon is cut short. They have to make another desperate dash, and they discover that there are worse things out there than Trollocs and Fades.


Also, Mat makes his worst decision yet.

Note: the last episode was misnamed 16-20 but was actually 11-15. The person responsible has been sacked.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: tEotW: Chapters 11-15
fields.description:
We see what happens when our dear village folk get their first look at a big(ish) city in Baerlon. Whitecloaks, suspicious townsfolk, and darkfriends around every corner!

They don't know who to trust. Maybe they should trust... the Devil?

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: tEotW: Chapters 6-10
fields.description:
We discuss the epic story telling and tense action as the party is pulled away from their home and thrust into a much wider and more dangerous world. Also, we have a lot of trouble pronouncing Nynaeve.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: tEotW: Prologue-Chapter 5
fields.description:
Blood and ashes! We begin our odyssey with the first book of the series: The Eye of the World. We'll get our first taste of the sharp characterization and epic scale that makes these books so much fun to read.

We'll also dig in to the question that drives this whole series: is Bran al'Vere a cannibal?

Note to the wary: this episode has a few SPOILERS for the rest of the books. We got carried away, but we will do better at avoiding spoilers in future episodes.

Your hosts are Jeff Lake, Micah Sparkman, and Alice Sullivan.

Support us at armadillo.club!

Music: Treasures of Ancient Dungeon by Alexandr Zhelanov, licensed under CC-BY 3.0

★ Support this podcast on Patreon ★

fields.title: We Love the Seafolk?! | A Fantasy Comedy & Discussion Podcast
fields.description:
We have some ✨opinions✨ about episode 305 of The Wheel of Time. Even Jess, which is actually kind of shocking. You're welcome.

 

✈️ Bring Jenny to WoTCon: https://gofund.me/739b4121

fields.title: Swords Are Dumb | A Fantasy Comedy & Discussion Podcast
fields.description:
The Wheel of Time Season 3 Episode 4 was frickin amazing so that's all we're talking about. Sketches are for losers. You're welcome.

✈️ Bring Jenny to WoTCon: https://gofund.me/739b4121

fields.title: Chekov's Saidin Gun | A Fantasy Comedy & Discussion Podcast
fields.description:
To hell with sketches, we are talking about the first 3 episodes of The Wheel of Time season 3 (spoiler alert, we liked them). You're welcome. 

✈️ Bring Jenny to WoTCon: https://gofund.me/739b4121

fields.title: We Won the Gay Agenda | A Fantasy Comedy & Discussion Podcast
fields.description:
Part 3 of the TVAD Tuesday Triple Header (it's Tuesday somewhere, shut up)! With The Wheel of Time season 3 dropping in mere days, we're talking about what we're looking forward to most. You're welcome.

✈️ Bring Jenny to WoTCon: https://gofund.me/739b4121

fields.title: We're Getting Elaida?! | A Fantasy Comedy & Discussion Podcast
fields.description:
Part 2 of our TVAD Tuesday Triple Header, featuring BRIAN (aka Recappa Sedai) who jumped on to chat with us about the 11 minute Wheel of Time sneak peek and dissect literally everything. You're welcome.

✈️ Bring Jenny to WoTCon: https://gofund.me/739b4121

fields.title: News Me, Daddy | A Fantasy Comedy & Discussion Podcast
fields.description:
Part 1 of the Triple Header TVAD Tuesday because Jess is, you know, Jess. Please to enjoy our dicussion of Star Trek vs Star Wars and some other stuff, k byeeeeeeeeee

✈️ Bring Jenny to WoTCon: https://gofund.me/739b4121

fields.title: Welcome to This Disaster | A Fantasy Comedy & Discussion Podcast
fields.description:
We've got Small Talk, we've got News, we've got Jess being bad at how time works, and we discuss some of our favorite scifi and fantasy villains. You're welcome.

 

✈️ Bring Jenny to WoTCon: https://gofund.me/739b4121

fields.title: They Call Me Kevamine | A Fantasy Comedy & Discussion Podcast
fields.description: OUR LONG NATIONAL NIGHTMARE IS OVER! We are back from our hiatus and have we got some good shit for you! We have new sketches, a more flexible format, and we've expanded our repertoire to encompass all of science fiction and fantasy, so we have even more stuff to nerd out about.

fields.title: Elaida's Alignment is Incompetent Good | A Wheel of Time Comedy and Discussion Podcast
fields.description: We came out of hibernation to talk about the teaser trailer that dropped on 12/11 and we said it was gonna be a short one but we LIED. Naebs was once again on the high seas, so it was just two neurospicies and a neuro-not-sure and to be honest, it sounds like it. You're welcome.

fields.title: Spilling the Tea on Verin | A Wheel of Time Comedy and Discussion Podcast
fields.description: HAIL, HAIL, THE GANG'S ALL HERE and we spend an inordinate amount of time gushing about Verin because, well, she's Verin. We also have Eyes & Ears, WoT for Bros, Lini's Advice Hive, Unnotable Quotables, and WoT If, so basically this episode is amazing. You're welcome.

fields.title: Oops! All Commercials Vol. 1 | A Wheel of Time Comedy and Discussion Podcast
fields.description: Evidently the hosts of this show have personal lives? And couldn't record? So Jess made one that's all commercials. You're welcome.

fields.title: Fantasy Casino Heist | A Wheel of Time Comedy and Discussion Podcast
fields.description: The gang's all here and we've got Eyes & Ears, Remedial Ji'e'Toh, we empty that bombastic Mail Sack, and Kevin brings a brand new segment to the table. It's amazing. You're welcome.

fields.title: Do We Even Like These Books? | A Wheel of Time Comedy and Discussion Podcast
fields.description: We have Eyes and Ears, we have WoT Hot, we empty the turgid mail sack, and we talk about what we actually like about these books. You're welcome.

fields.title: Attack of the Sapphics | A Wheel of Time Comedy and Discussion Podcast
fields.description:
Shut up, this is not late, we don't know what you're talking about. ANYWAY, you're in for a super gay treat because Kevin is sick and Naebs is out of town (on yet another cruise, we assume), so it's just Jess and Jenny talking about which non-canon female ships they'd smash together like Barbies if they could. You're welcome.

Don't forget to support the show by joining our Patreon, and/or going to buy queer stuff at Queerencia with promo code TVAD. Links below

fields.title: Have We Mentioned That WoTCon is Great? | A Wheel of Time Comedy and Discussion Podcast
fields.description:
We're back from WoTCon and we will absolutely not shut up about it. We've got Eyes and Ears, Belladonna the Busty Bard finally shows up after however long, we see the Light with Truth Defense Dispatch, learn how to fight with ASMR Sword Forms, and just generally have a really great time. You're welcome.

Jess's husband is fixing to get a lung transplant, so if you'd like to help out check out their GoFundMe: https://gofund.me/ebed03d0

fields.title: Get in There and Ride That Donkey | A Wheel of Time Comedy and Discussion Podcast
fields.description: Jenny's not here and it's scary. We have Eyes & Ears, Lini's Advice Hive, a brand new ASMR segment, some other stuff, and we do a deep dive into Moghedien. You're welcome.

fields.title: Naebs Thinks Gawyn is Daddy | A Wheel of Time Comedy and Discussion Podcast
fields.description: We've got Eyes and Ears, WoT for Bros, Small Talk, and WoT If, plus we talk about Chuck Norris, Seanchan Barney, the time Jenny doxxed herself in a Jeri Ryan fan chat room back in the day, and the funniest moments in the Wheel of Time. You're welcome.

fields.title: Happy Birthday to Us, Nerds | A Wheel of Time Comedy and Discussion Podcast
fields.description: We're 100 episodes old, suckers! This episode has EVERYTHING. Well, it has some of the usual stuff. But there's also a Big Surprise™️ and you're just gonna have to listen to find out what it is. It's definitely NOT a special guest, and that special guest is definitely NOT Brian. Why would we even do that.  You're welcome.

fields.title: Triggered by Barney | A Wheel of Time Comedy and Discussion Podcast
fields.description: Yooooooooooooooo! We've got Eyes and Ears, we engage in some Small Talk, Jenny has some WoTHot takes, and Naebs is bringing the new segment this time. And then we have a nice, long, rambling chat about the Horn of Valere. There's also a weird amount of Barney discussion. The dinosaur, not the guy from season 1. You're welcome. PS: Jess's husband is getting a lung transplant and they need money. So. You know what to do. And fuck off. ❤️

fields.title: The 5th Power is Vibes | A Wheel of Time Comedy and Discussion Podcast
fields.description: Hey, we're all here! We've got Eyes and Ears, we empty the mail sack, we engage in some Small Talk, and Jenny brings a new segment to the table. And since we're all present and accounted for, we have a nice long debrief about JordanCon, and how awesome the WoT community is. It's a real love fest in here. So gross. Anyway, you're welcome. PS: please donate to Jenny's WoTCon GoFundMe.

fields.title: FUCK OFF! *gasp* | A Wheel of Time Comedy and Discussion Podcast
fields.description: Kevin had to parent again, which is frankly preposterous. We chat a bit about JordanCon, Naebs' video color is WAY off, we do some sketches probably, and we get another entertaining story from Jenny's youth. Have you donated to Jenny's WoTCon GoFundMe yet? Do it again. You're welcome.

fields.title: Countdown to Season 3??? | A Wheel of Time Comedy and Discussion Podcast
fields.description: We swear that Kevin is still a co-host on this show. We've got Eyes & Ears, some news, some other stuff that Jess can't remember because JordanCon made her brain shut off and she's posting this like two weeks late. Also, donate to Jenny's WoTCon GoFundMe. Also, come to WoTCon. You're welcome.

fields.title: Where's Kevin?? | A Wheel of Time Comedy and Discussion Podcast
fields.description: We're back! Our long national nightmare is over! Kevin overslept though, so there's that. We've got Eyes & Ears, WoTHot, we empty the mail sack, we forget to do a new commercial...we are very good at podcast. Also, donate to Jenny's GoFundMe so she can come to WoTCoN! You're welcome.

fields.title: Controlled Chaos (Barely) | A Wheel of Time Comedy and Discussion Podcast
fields.description: Naebs left us for dead again ("I have a job" he says), but we actually did pretty okay without him. So welcome to The New TVAD starring everyone but Naebs. Please to enjoy Lini's Advice Hive, Small Talk, WoT Hot, and some other stuff probably. You're welcome.

fields.title: I Swear to God, It's the Lag | A Wheel of Time Comedy and Discussion Podcast
fields.description: We're back! Naebs has recovered from the plague, Jess has a 5-day headache, Jenny is harassed by that song clip (you know the one), and Kevin is charming. There's Eyes and Ears, Mail Sack, WoT Hot, and Kevin wrote something that we can't remember now because tbh that was like 2 days ago. You're welcome.

fields.title: Ceci n'est pas une Late Podcast | A Wheel of Time Comedy and Discussion Podcast
fields.description: Jess may or may not have completely forgotten to post this last week. We're not commenting on that. By which we mean Jess, who is writing this, is not commenting on that. Anyway, we do some stuff that we (Jess) can't remember now. You're welcome.

fields.title: Pyroclastic Ejaculate | A Wheel of Time Comedy and Discussion Podcast
fields.description: We've got Eyes and Ears, we've got WoT Hot, we empty the Mail Sack, and we even have a new segment. Naebs also starts a misinformation campaign about volcanology, and we talk about some of the many, many, MANY mistakes and missteps made by characters in The Wheel of Time. You're welcome.

fields.title: Nae'blis's Butt is a Black Hole | A Wheel Of Time Comedy And Discussion Podcast
fields.description: Happy frickin' new year. This one's a banger, and gets out of pocket pretty much immediately. We've got Eyes and Ears, Belladonna the Busty Bard, Small Talk, Jenny brings another amazing new segment to the table, Kevin does something else that Jess can't remember right now, and we talk about if the Shadow actually should have won the Last Battle. You're welcome.

fields.title: This Is An Absolute Mess | A Wheel Of Time Comedy And Discussion Podcast
fields.description:
Naebs was out again. We forgot like half of our sketches. We had no idea how to make Streamyard do the thing right. We were kind of bad at making conversation. So the key takeaway here is that without Naebs we are basically just a herd of kinda dumb turtles. But, you know, you're welcome.

Also, we are out of office until January 9th for the holidays. Maybe Jess will finally make some best-of compilations. Ha ha. Yeah right.

fields.title: Top 3 Moments in WoT Season 2 | A Wheel Of Time Comedy And Discussion Podcast
fields.description: We've got Eyes and Ears and WoT Hot 3, we empty the bulging mailsack, and Jess is obsessed with her new puppy, who is very cute. Then we talk about our top favorite moments in season 2. It was surprisingly Liandrin heavy, even though she's a bitch. You're welcome.

fields.title: A Very TVAD Thanksgiving | A Wheel Of Time Comedy And Discussion Podcast
fields.description: Jess bailed on this episode so she has no idea what happened but there's probably an Eyes & Ears report, Kevin probably did somthing funny, Jenny probably did something playful but smart, and Naebs probably did something horrifying. You know, the usual. You're welcome.

fields.title: Cocaine Rhuarc. Thats the title. | A Wheel of Time Comedy and Discussion Podcast
fields.description: Jess doesn't really remember what happened this episode. Rhuarc definitely did cocaine. Kevin did something funny, probably, and it's safe to assume we traumatized Jenny somehow. You know, just TVAD stuff. You're welcome.

fields.title: We Have No Idea What We're Doing | A Wheel of Time Comedy and Discussion Podcast
fields.description: Jenny, Jess, and Kevin were on their own this week and they were very confused and scared. If this episode sucks, please direct your complaints to Nae'blis. He bailed and left them for dead because he's the worst.

fields.title: It's Kevin 2: Electric Boogaloo | A Wheel of Time Comedy and Discussion Podcast
fields.description: Kevin's back this week, and why not? He's a goddamned delight. We have Eyes and Ears, Jess actually came up with a new segment for the first time in like a year, and we talked for like two hours. So. You're welcome.

fields.title: OH MY GOD IT'S KEVIN | A Wheel of Time Comedy and Discussion Podcast

fields.title: Wait, there's a WoT TV show?? | A Wheel of Time Comedy and Discussion Podcast

Their worlds are dynamic, their characters are fun to follow, and their stories are taut with romantic and narrative suspense. FT’s other titles include In Deeper Waters, So This is Ever After, Spell Bound, and more. Today we’re here to talk about their newest release...

We talked about incidental queerness, issue-of-the-week queerness, what we mean by that, and how overall The Wheel of Time TV show handled queerness in its first season. Ah, also there's a musical. And generational trauma.   Send us your hate mail! Or your fan mail, if you really insist... Support the show Check out our Twitter, Instagram, TikTok, and Patreon. ...

fields.title: There is No Moiraine and Thom in Ba Sing Se
fields.description: This episode contains spoilers for all the Wheel of Time books. Do we ship it or skip it? In which we talked about some of the popular ships in the Wheel of Time, especially queer ships, and whether we enjoy them or would rather forget about them...   Send us your hate mail! Or your fan mail, if you really insist... Support the show Check out our Twitter, Instagram, TikTok, and Patreon.  Intro and outro music by Julius H.

fields.title: The Blight Dicks
fields.description: This episode contains spoilers for all the Wheel of Time books.  The Queer Horrors of Time, a Halloween Special just for the spooky season. Some in the queer community call Halloween the October Pride, so we had to celebrate by talking about our favorite creepy moments from The Wheel of Time books and the TV show. Stick until the end to get Matt's gay horror book recommendations!   Send us your hate mail! Or your fan mail, if you really insist... Support the show Check out our Twitter, Instag...

fields.title: All I Know Is I'm A Sagittarius and Sagittariuses are Sluts
fields.description: This episode contains spoilers for all the Wheel of Time books. We're joined by Wil al'Seen to discuss poly relationships and non-monogamy in both The Wheel of Time books and TV show. Non-monogamy isn't widely seen in popular fiction, and The Wheel of Time was a lot of people's first exposure to poly relationships in fantasy. The books had a very specific view of poly relationships, so of course, we at the Queers of Time Podcast had to talk about it...   Send us your hate mail! Or your fan ma...

fields.title: Be The Suroth You Want To See In The World
fields.description: This episode contains spoilers for the second season of the Wheel of Time TV show and up to Book 4, The Shadow Rising. A special, post-NY Comic Con episode! We had a lot to savor from the Wheel of Time panel that we just had to talk about it and release this discussion for you all as soon as possible!   Send us your hate mail! Or your fan mail, if you really insist... Support the show Check out our Twitter, Instagram, TikTok, and Patreon.  Intro and outro music by Julius H.

fields.title: We're Going To Take Away Your Lesbian Card
fields.description: This episode contains spoilers for the full book series. In previous episodes, we've spent a lot of time talking about queering heroes of the Wheel of Time. We've also had discussions and games in which we shipped those heroes with some of the Forsaken. But our favorite baddies don't need a romance with our heroes to be queer. Today, we'll be queering two of the Forsaken: the OG crazy ex-girlfriend, Lanfear, and our problematic fav, Balthamel.   Send us your hate mail! Or your fan mail, if yo...

fields.title: Either Way, You're Gonna Need a New Couch
fields.description: This episode contains spoilers significant spoilers up to Book 4, and light spoilers for the whole book series. In which we deep dive into our hopes and dreams for the second season of the Wheel of Time TV show. How gay do we want it to be? The answer is very!   Send us your hate mail! Or your fan mail, if you really insist... Support the show Check out our Twitter, Instagram, TikTok, and Patreon.  Intro and outro music by Julius H.

fields.title: This Is a Good Christian Family Podcast
fields.description: This episode contains spoilers up to ACoS.  And we're back with Ali Shields, from the Wheel Takes Podcast, to continue our discussion about tropes. How is the Wheel of Time TV Show handling tropes? What was done well, and what could be improved? What will they need to be careful about in future seasons?   Send us your hate mail! Or your fan mail, if you really insist... Support the show Check out our Twitter, Instagram, TikTok, and Patreon.  Intro and outro music by Julius H.

fields.title: And Number Six Is [Redacted]
fields.description: The main discussion of this episode does not contain spoilers past the Wheel of Time TV show. The game at the end contains very light spoilers up to ACoS. Ali Shields, from the Wheel Takes Podcast, joined us to discuss tropes and writer's rooms. How does a writer's room function? What is a trope? What role do tropes play in the entertainment industry?   Send us your hate mail! Or your fan mail, if you really insist... Support the show Check out our Twitter, Instagram, TikTok, and Patreon.  In...

fields.title: How Dare Robert Jordan Make Us Do Math?
fields.description: This episode contains spoilers for all of the Wheel of Time books. Plenty can be said about how Robert Jordan uses gender in his books. In this episode, we focus on Saidar and Saidin, the two halves of the One Power, and the gender dynamics (and stereotypes) they often involve. We also talk about what the TV show has done so far, and how this magical system could be a bit less... binary.   Send us your hate mail! Or your fan mail, if you really insist... Support the show Check out our Twitter...

fields.title: Throw a Gay a Boner
fields.description: Spoilers for all the books of the Wheel of Time.  In which we dive into the queer men of The Wheel of Time, from the examples and themes present in the books to what the TV show has given us so far and could expand on in later seasons. Also, Camille gets bullied. A normal episode, overall. Send us your hate mail! Or your fan mail, if you really insist... Support the show Check out our Twitter, Instagram, TikTok, and Patreon.  Intro and outro music by Julius H.

fields.title: The One Without an -ussy
fields.description: Spoilers for the first season of The Wheel of Time TV show on Amazon Prime.  Cover your ears, kids, because in this episode? We’re going to be talking about sex. And not just any kind of sex, but queer sex. And not just queer sex, but queer sex in season one of The Wheel of Time. Okay, so there’s also some straight sex in there, but also lesbian wizard sex. Today we're joined by Bree Bridges, or @mostybree on Twitter, one half of the talented pair writing under the name Kit Rocha and our firs...

fields.title: Through the Dragon's Dick We Are All Cleansed
fields.description: Spoilers for all the books of The Wheel of Time.  There are countless turnings of the Wheel of Time. But in this age, called by some the Rainbow Age, the threads spin a rather colorful pattern in which four major characters are…gay as hell. Today we’ll be talking about Nynaeve, Cadsuane, Rand, and Perrin, and how their stories and the overall threads of the pattern might change this new weaving. Send us your hate mail! Or your fan mail, if you really insist... Support the show Check out our T...

fields.title: Only Your Emotions?
fields.description: Spoilers for the first season of The Wheel of Time TV show on Amazon Prime.  Our first show-focused episode! The first season of The Wheel of Time TV show was gayer than many expected. Our Queers of Time hosts took a look at the queerest moments from this season... and ranked them. No game this time, because we went overtime and then just... forgot. Ah. Send us your hate mail! Or your fan mail, if you really insist... Support the show Check out our Twitter, Instagram, TikTok, and Patreon.  In...

fields.title: Now We're Going to Paddle Him
fields.description: Minor spoilers for side relationships showing up in ACoS and AMoL.  Discussing Pillow Friends, Part Three: In which we talk about queer tropes connected to pillow-friendships in the books, how we would like for the show to handle this, and queerness in Fantasy before The Wheel of Time came out. Professor Matt drops knowledge on us, and we love it! Send us your hate mail! Or your fan mail, if you really insist... Support the show Check out our Twitter, Instagram, TikTok, and Patreon.  Intro an...

fields.title: It's a Stress [REDACTED]
fields.description: Spoilers for all the books of The Wheel of Time.  Discussing Pillow Friends, Part Two: In which we take a look at the examples of pillow-friendships in the book series and, well... We had a lot to comment on. Send us your hate mail! Or your fan mail, if you really insist... Support the show Check out our Twitter, Instagram, TikTok, and Patreon.  Intro and outro music by Julius H.

fields.title: How Many Men Smooth Their Skirts?
fields.description: Minor spoilers up to ACoS up to the game, then spoilers for all the books of The Wheel of Time.  Discussing Pillow Friends, Part One: What exactly did Robert Jordan say about same-sex relationships in The Wheel of Time? We're going through what's in the books, what Jordan said at interviews, as well as some very interesting remarks in his Aes Sedai notes—did you know that Galina is "by nature a most definite top"? 'cause we sure didn't! Source for the quotes: The Thirteenth Depository. Send u...

fields.title: What Happens in the Tinker Caravan
fields.description: The obligatory introduction episode!  The hosts will be talking about how they first got introduced to The Wheel of Time, what it means to them as queer readers, and why they wanted to make this podcast. This discussion contains some SPOILERS for the Wheel of Time books up to book 5: The Fires of Heaven.   They also play the game "Crack Ships: Jur Grady & Ila". This part contains SPOILERS up to the last book. Send us your hate mail! Or your fan mail, if you really insist... Support t...

fields.description:

Elyas has a lycanthrophic/misanthropic philosophy of life; Elayne has a bumbling good-heart; Anvaere has good armour; Aviendha is allergic to swords; there's no party like a Brown party; we want justice for Ryma & Basan.

fields.title: 67 - Season 2 Episode 7: Daes Dae’mar
fields.description:
Daes Dae'mar finds our panel on Black Alert, Little Lord Fauntleroy is a Darkfriend, Anvaere is James Bond, Selene's neighbours get a shock return, Velma Sedai continues her sleuthing, Alanna has a democratic polycule, the Amyrlin Seat gets to Siuan' head, the Seanchan continue their corporate propaganda, we imagine Nynaeve and Elayne bonded for life, and we hope Siuaraine are separated rather than divorced. Also, Lan is smart but we question his timing in untying knots. FQ: what topics of conversation will happen in the Ways? Join us as we discuss Season 2, Episode 7, "Daes Dae'mar."

fields.title: 66 - Season 2 Episode 6: Eyes Without Pity
fields.description:
Eyes Without Pity is a heavy episode with some great digressions: could the Seanchan society even exist without enslaved people; Rand and Moi are more similar than we realised; we prove how the Black Ajah doesn't exist; Axel delivers a BA-DUM! and has thoughts about the French and knows how to destroy Whitecloaks; does Randland have an Earl of Sandwich, and Voltron Theory LIVES! Join us as we discuss Season 2, Episode 6, "Eyes Without Pity."

fields.title: 65 - Season 2 Episode 5: Damane
fields.description:
Damane breakdown gives us a small panel with lots to say! High Lord Turak leads the Hollandaise Return, we want head-exploding power, Elyas needs Crowley's sunglasses so he can grab a beer in a pub, we want to be in the Brown Ajah Scooby Gang bookclub with wine every night, the Black Ajah is revealed - there is no Black Ajah, Aviendha fills her dance card very quickly, Aiel flirtation is very straightforward and Perrin doesn't know what to do with his face, Lanfear is definitely dressed to meet her ex, and Scott Pilgrim is the new Voltron theory. Also, how many bad guys are there in this series?! FQ: who would you like to see in a sitcom? Join us as we discuss Season 2, Episode 5, "Damane."

Ishy-the-can-opener starts letting the Forsaken out, Arafelians are hobbits, Hopper is the best boy, Alanna has the best "Oh Shit" face, Anvaere wins the sibling standoff, and when not subverting a trope is more subversive than subverting a trope. fields.title: BONUS - A Watch Party of Ice and Fire: Episode 1
fields.description:
Please enjoy this special bonus drop of the inaugural episode of Watch Party's newest podcast, A Watch Party of Ice and Fire. If you plan on watching HBO's House of the Dragon, this podcast is a must. Go subscribe to their feed at https://watchpartyiaf.podbean.com/, or through your favorite podcast service. Now available on every major podcast platform.
>>>>>>
In this inaugural episode of A Watch Party of Ice and Fire, our Small Council convenes for the first time to discuss tourneys, break down the first trailer for HBO's House of the Dragon, and debate points of lore. Would the Targaryans have won the Iron Throne without dragons? Will the catspaw dagger be significant in House of the Dragon? Will House of the Dragon feature Mushroom's version of events? 
Thank you for checking out the pod. Please come back every week as Solar, Constance, Morrigan, Sam, and Uzma discuss HBO's House of the Dragon, future adaptations, and all things A Song of Ice and Fire.
Listen to the end for some trivia questions, and remember to send us your answers. Every correct answer earns you a Maester's link. Earn five links and we will enter you in a random drawing for fun prizes, like a hand-sewn Targaryen bookmark.!
Join the watch party and send your trivia answers to:
Email: watchpartyoficeandfire@gmail.com
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/AWPOIAF

fields.title: 13 - Origins 5-6 and X-Ray Bonus Material
fields.description:
The crew covers the last two "origins" vignettes: "The White Tower," and "An Ogier's Longing," as well as Amazon's X-Ray, behind the scenes bonus material. They gush over the show's excellent music, sets, and practical effects.
If you are a newbie to Wheel of Time, don't worry - this podcast is spoiler-free! Watch the show along with us!

fields.title: 12 - End of Season Spectacular! Season 1 Review
fields.description:
The first season of The Wheel of Time is in the can, and what a spectacular first season it was! Rhuarc and the panel, joined by special guest Madelyn, look back at Season 1 to discuss its high points, its still unanswered mysteries, theories for next season, and more! This episode is "Uno approved."
And don't worry, the first season of the show may be done, but we are not going anywhere. We'll be right here, weaving flows of hot air all offseason.  Many great things to come.
If you are a newbie to The Wheel of Time - this podcast is spoiler-free! Watch the show along with us!
Do you have a question you need answered? A theory? Want to join the watch party? Contact us at watchpartywot@gmail.com.

fields.title: 11 - Episode 8: The Eye of the World
fields.description:
If you are anything like us then your eyes were glued to the tube to find out whether Moiraine and co. can save the world. Join us as Rhuarc and the panel break down "The Eye of the World," the epic finale of the first season of The Wheel of Time.  Moiraine and Rand brave the blight, Nynaeve and Egwene use their power to protect the city, while Perrin meets Padan Fain. Moiraine has worked toward this moment for 20 years, but can Rand resist the Dark One's call? 
If you are a newbie to The Wheel of Time, don't worry - this podcast is spoiler-free! Watch the show along with us!
Do you have a question you need answered? A theory? Want to join the watch party? Contact us at watchpartywot@gmail.com.

fields.title: 10 - Episode 7: The Dark Along The Ways
fields.description:
If you are feeling in the dark about The Wheel of Time and looking for spoiler-free ways to learn about the lore, then listen along as Rhuarc and the panel discuss Episode 7, "The Dark Along The Way." Voices in the dark force Moiraine and the travelers out of the Ways to the borderlands, where they have to make a difficult choice, their bonds are strengthened, tested, and masked, and a new origin story is revealed. 
If you are a newbie to The Wheel of Time, don't worry - this podcast is spoiler-free! Watch the show along with us!

fields.description:

Between the beautiful scenery, rapid introduction of central characters, action sequences, and more than a few interesting theories, there is plenty to discuss. Stay tuned for our discussion of Episode 2 (Shadow's Waiting) and Episode 3 (A Place of Safety), coming out tomorrow and Wednesday.

In this inaugural episode of Watch Party: Wheel of Time, Rhuarc introduces our brilliant panel of Wheel of Time newbies - DW, David, Samaria, Siobhan, Greg, and Axel -  all of whom will be experiencing the Wheel of Time for the time through Amazon's blockbuster series. Johnston, to get his takes on the buildup to season 3, as he will be rejoining our episode recaps as our resident never-reader! Hear Brendan pull a bait and switch, and get a last word! Hear Joe plug an interview and seek vindication! Hear Jen relive bad memories and restate the goals for a show favorite! Hear Tom go off on a rant and put words in people's mouths! All that, plus a digression on "The Rundown!" ...

fields.title: It's All Too Much!
fields.description: In this episode, Joe, Jen, and Tom cover the latest news, which includes...well, there's just an awful lot of news, isn't there? Cast interviews, promo videos, new posters, show clips... It's all here! Hear Jen go off on a rant! Hear Tom defend his guy Dain! Hear Joe get shocked by what a picture reveals! All that, plus Shrek 5 and a blog post! As always, spoilers abound, as do some of us getting in our feelings! Read Pevara's blog post: https://www.talkaranrhiod.com/post/visual-symbolism-in-...

fields.title: Don't Junk It, Press Junket!

It's Ayoola and Ceara and Daniel and Donal and Joshua and Marcus and Natasha and Rafe and Rosamund and Sophie... and us!! If this doesn't get you hyped up for season 3, check your pulse! We keep this spoiler-free through book 4, so feel free to share with your show-watcher friends! Sign up to watch the first episode of season 3 ...

Joe wants no magic items brought into the Tower! Jen wants a Supermarket Sweep! All that, plus Joe has to streeeetch it out! As always, spoilers abound, as does a choice to live in denial! Jen has some very justified problems with Morgase's sex life! Tom has some problems with his head! Joe has some problems with this whole story! All that, plus the New Year is off to a smashing start. All that, plus Jen gives uncool advice by confusing running and walking! The first part is spoiler-free, the last bit is spoiler-filled, a...

fields.title: Oh, I Just Daes in Dae'mar Tonight

fields.description: In this episode, Joe, Jen, and Tom discuss the latest show news, and then dive into the fascinating artifact, The Horn of Valere! What is it? How does it work? What exactly does it sound like?! Hear Jen ask the unanswerable questions! Wonder as Joe ponders the imponderable! Journey as Tom discusses religious artifacts in a world without religion! All that, plus serious talk about toasters! As always, spoilers abound, as does a complete inability to follow our own rules!  https://www.spoilerco...

fields.title: 54. This is not a Siuan Song...
fields.description: Listen to Joe, Jen, and Tom as they dive into the latest show news, including the re-start of filming, and official images from set! We then jump into our patent denied deep dive of the master politician , and amazing Amyrlin, Siuan Sanche! Listen as Tom justifies the means! Come on down as Joe plays Rod Roddy! Be stunned as Jen blows us away with her preparation! As always, spoilers abound, as do awesome tunes!   Androl Bard of Time: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC5qLEzSUScSbNwQLsU5z9aw T...

fields.title: 53. (WoT History Pt. VI) War! Aiel Is It Good For?
fields.description: Join Joe, Jen, and Tom as they battle location and power issues to bring you all the latest show news, including some exciting Insta-brag #Horsenews! We then go into our patent-denied Deep Dive into the sixth and final look at the pre-history of The Wheel of Time, covering The War of the Hundred Years and the Aiel War! Join as Jen welcomes guest star Hank! Marvel as Tom goes into a rant about the importance of leadership! Cry as Joe loses power midway through the show! As always, spoilers abo...

fields.title: 52. A Multiverse of Possibility! (Podcastiversary YouTube 8/29/20)
fields.description: Join Joe, Jen, and Tom as they celebrate a year of podcasting, roughly! We play some fun games, review the latest news (production is about to re-start!), and oh yeah, we stream this episode live to YouTube! Wonder as Joe marries a Trolloc! Enjoy as Jen chooses to think of eating her young! Marvel at Tom's sappy utterances as the night progresses! It's been a year with the coolest fan base in the world, and here's to many more! As always, spoilers abound, and Wakanda Forever!  View the live s...

fields.title: 51. How Does It Feel? (Like A Portal Stone)
fields.description: A huge episode, before our huger anniversary episode! Joe, Jen, and Tom cover a massive ton of news, as production ramps up and big casting news is announced for Siuan and Min! Then we take our (patent pending) Deep Dive into Portal Stones! Hear Tom parse the meaning of a single word! Hear Jen multi-task to demand an answer on blinking! Hear Joe long to mispronounce words! As always, spoilers abound, as do odd references to Doctor Who!   Please show your support by rating/reviewing us. http:/...

fields.title: 50. Eye Can Show You The World
fields.description: In this episode, Joe, Jen, and Tom celebrate their silver anniversary! We cover the latest show news, and then take a crack on how we think the adaptation of the end of The Eye Of The World will look - to be clear, what happens at the actual Eye of The World! What will make the show? What will be cut? How will it look? Save as Jen cuts the cord! Marvel as Tom spends ALL the money! Relish as Joe constantly gets interrupted! As always, spoilers abound, as does in depth discussions of gimp masks...

fields.title: 49. (WoT History Pt. V) I Can Fly Higher Than An Eagle, For You Are The Wind, Artur Hawkwing...
fields.description: In this episode, Joe, Jen, and Tom cover the scarcity of latest show news, then jump back into our multi-part Deep Dive (patent - sigh - still pending) into the pre-history of the Wheel of Time, where we talk about the ta'veren we're all cheerin', Artur Hawkwing! Listen as Joe bring us some sweet story time! Sit in terror as Jen gets sick of our foolishness! Marvel as Tom comes up with something rather well-reasoned with out any prep-time! Sure, we get a little silly here, but this is an exci...

fields.title: 48. Come On, Baby, Let The Good Tam's Roll
fields.description: In this episode, Joe, Jen and Tom cover some of the latest show news, and then take a patent-pending Deep Dive into everyone's favorite Daddy, Tam al'Thor! Listen as Joe brings us down, as Jen brings us story-time, and as Tom rages against the dying of the light! We all reveal our dad crushes (is that even a thing?) about Tam, and let's face it, so do you! As always, spoilers abound, as does - wait, just for the record, all three of our dads are terrific. Love you, Dad!  Live stream: https://...

fields.title: 47. Sweet Charity (Cybersmile Podcastathon Livestream YouTube 7/25/20)
fields.description: In this episode, Joe, Jen, and Tom are LIVE, as in, this was part of a 24 hour live stream on YouTube for the Cybersmile Foundation to work to end cyber-bullying.  We discuss the very large amount of show news, and then address a grab bag of listener questions! Listen as Tom stays hydrated, as Joe ruins the books, and as Jen displays great parenting skills! Watch us try and look into the camera! And donate to the charity, or at the very least, be excellent to each other! As always, spoilers a...

fields.title: 46. (WoT History Pt. IV) Why Do You Build Me Up, Just to Break Me Down?
fields.description: In this episode we cover the latest news, and argue about how excited we should be about it. Then we go back to our patent-still-pending Deep Dive into the history of the world of the Wheel of Time, where we discuss the foundation of the White Tower, and the Trolloc Wars! We get a little nutty, to be honest--like Trolloc sitcoms, time distorting weather phenomena, and how to square a circle nutty. Hear Joe struggle with pronunciation! Feel Tom struggle with the heat! Marvel at Jen coming up w...

fields.title: 45. If Alanna Be My Lover, You Gotta Not Bond My Friends
fields.description: In this episode we spend an inordinate amount of time on the latest news, and then jump into our latest (patent still pending, what the heck is going on) Deep Dive, into an amazingly rich and complicated character, Alanna Mosvani! We break down the first appearances of the character, touch on some of her future plot-lines, and discuss how (we hope) she'll be portrayed in the show. Hear Tom crow about cheating! Hear Joe pitch a second round of the Pronunciation Game: Czech edition! Hear Jen wi...

fields.title: 44. (WoT History Pt. III) Breaking Up (The World) Is Hard To Do
fields.description: In this episode, we cover the latest news, including two cast members confirmed, and then move right along into our patent-pending Deep Dive (the patent office isn't even returning my calls) of the history of the Wheel of Time, where we discuss The Breaking! Hear Joe get lost in an actor's timeline! Hear Tom get lost in the Dark One's metaphysics! Hear Jen get lost in her own questions! The Time of Madness is here! As always, spoilers abound, as do ten dollar founding fathers!  Please show yo...

fields.title: 43. (WoT History Pt. II) Paradise Falls, and News Picks Up
fields.description: In this episode, Joe, Jen, and Tom cover what turned out to be a huge news week. Indications about when the show will resume filming, production information, and casting, casting, casting! We hit all that news, and what it may mean for our poor, tattered episode breakdowns - as well as what it may mean for the investment Amazon has put into the show! After that conversation, we pick back up with our multi-part Deep Dive (patent still pending... still....) into the history of the Wheel of Time...

fields.title: 42. The Ultimate Answer to Life, The Universe, and Jennifer Cheon Garcia!
fields.description: In this episode, Joe, Jen, and Tom cover the latest news - and there's a lot of news this week! Wolves, interviews, show news, a veritable cornucopia of news! Hear Joe bring the research! Hear Jen bond over shared names! Hear Tom fanboy out at someone passionate about their work! More importantly, hear Jennifer Cheo...

fields.title: 41. (WoT History Pt. I) This Age is Going To Be Legend....ary!
fields.description: In this episode, Joe, Jen, and Tom review the latest news, and then start Part I of a Deep Dive (patent still pending, for Pete's sake) into the Age of Legends - with special guest, The Innkeeper of The Dusty Wheel, Matt Hatch! Hear Jen out research Joe!, Hear Joe cheat and and start with the first age! Hear Tom shoot down all of his own theories! Hear Matt be awesome, and bring some deep cut facts - and Jordan's own notes! As always, spoilers abound, as does...De'ath!   Check out Matt at The...

fields.title: 40. I See Liandrin and I Want to Paint Her Black
fields.description: The big 4-0! In this episode, Joe, Jen, and Tom cover the latest in show news, and then go into one of their patent-pending "Deep Dives", into the fiendish female with the rosebud mouth, Liandrin! We also discuss something close to her "heart", the Black Ajah!  Hear Jen read in the dark! Sympathize as Tom gives up on understanding a madman! Marvel as Joe reveals undiscovered countries!  As always, spoilers abound, as do Friends references!   Please show your support by rating/reviewing us. ht...

fields.title: 39. The Wheel of Time Pronunciation Game!

Joe, Jen, and Tom cover the latest show news, and welcome some special guests, author Brendan T. Johnston, and Tony Hanson, Dan Isgro, and Vinny Pro of Audio Dungeon! Together, we play everyone's favorite game show, as guests who haven't read the books try and pronounce words from The Wheel of Time! As you can imagine, this is a fun one, folks! As... never, actually, no spoilers abound, so i...

fields.title: 38. Walking In A Winter Dragon Land
fields.description: In this Very Special Episode, Joe, Jen, and Tom cover the latest news, then are joined by some very special, very good-looking guests to review the cinematic masterpiece: Winter Dragon! Join Sarah, Dan, and Michelle as we review the bastard pilot and money grab from Red Eagle Entertainment! Hear Dan get swept away by the dramatic acting! Hear Sarah reminisce about 90's weekend television! Hear Michelle find secret volcanoes! As always, spoilers abound, as does your pal, Billy Zane!  Link to W...

fields.title: 37. I Am My Sister's Keeper
fields.description: In this episode, Joe, Jen, and Tom (but especially Joe) crow a little, then jump right into this week's topic, a patent-pending deep dive into our favorite Keeper of the Chronicles, Leane Sharif, and the role she holds at the start of the series! Hear Joe gain confidence in pronunciation! Hear Jen gain her voice! Hear Tom ask a question no one can answer! As always, spoilers abound, as does narrow parsing a single adverb!   Don't forget to check out the new hit single from @AndrolGenhald "Bar...

fields.title: 36. Pulled in Two Rivers, Feelin' 'bout Half Past Dead...
fields.description: After covering the latest of breaking news, Joe, Jen, and Tom jump in to a brave new world of breakdowns, doing a 7th grade Social Studies project on The Two Rivers! We review its geography, its society, its government, and of course its history, as the great nation of Manetheren! Hear Joe expound on his love of geography! Hear Jen bring the inside scoop on the Women's Circle! Hear Tom express joy about getting to reference the Fertile Crescent! As always, spoilers abound, as does Lan, old bu...

fields.title: 35. Need long, flowing hair? Try Logain!
fields.description: In this episode, Joe, Jen, and Tom review the latest uncovered news and interviews, and theorize over translations! After all that fun, we jump into one of our patent-pending "deep dives" into that royal would-be Dragon, the man with the best hair in Ghealdan, Logain Ablar! Listen as Tom shoots down conspiracy theories, as Jen asks questions that we are unprepared to answer, and Joe references classic cinema! As always, spoilers abound, as does pragmatic prophecy prognostication!   Please sho...

fields.title: 34. Call Me Ishamael!
fields.description: The only pre-planned episode title we had comes into play this week, as we take one of our patent pending "deep-dives" into the Foremost Forsaken, Ishamael! As always, spoilers abound, as do the infinite miseries of immortal nihilism!   Please show your support by rating/reviewing us. http://getpodcast.reviews/id/1479634263  wots...

As always, spoilers abound, as do three gorgeous faces! ...

fields.title: 32. Feel The Beat of the Children of the Light
fields.description: Whitecloaks? Who needs 'em?! Joe, Jen, and Tom try and find out as they dig into the organization of zealots, and some of their notable members! fields.title: 31. Oh Me, Oh My, Oh Gee, Ogier!
fields.description: Join Joe, Jen, and Tom as they cover the latest news, interviews, leaks, and see if you can match or beat their crazy theories. Then buckle up, as the trio take their Deep Dive (patent pending) into Ogier and stedding, and try and break you brain! Please show your support by rating/reviewing us. http://getpodcast.reviews/id/1479634263  wotsho...

fields.title: 30. Questions & Answers & Quarantines
fields.description: Despite the shutdown of filming due to COVID-19, this week had a ton of news, and Joe, Jen, and Tom dive into it all, with the help of their friends live chatting during recording! Sarah Nakamura on The Dusty Wheel? Rafe's Instagram Q&A? We cover it all. Try and chart Tom's drink count! Marvel at Joe's organizational skills! Be jealous of Jen's table service! As always, spoilers abound, as does fear of Billy Zane!    Please show your support and rate/review us. http://getpodcast.reviews/i...

fields.title: 29. Loial With Cheese
