The Showcast tries something new, with fans listening and commenting on Discord to the live recording! Then Joe, Jen, and Tom take one of our patent pending "deep-dives" into the big guy, the OG Ogier, Loial! Hear Joe gain confidence in pronunciation! Marvel at Jen's eloquence! Be warned as Tom spoils American Beauty! As always, spoilers abound, as do violently trembling ears!   Please show your...

fields.title: 28. Have You Scene It? Tell Me, Have You Seen It?
fields.description: In this episode, Joe, Jen, and Tom tackle the latest news, battle COVID-19, and try and make plans for the future, when show news is apt to slow down! Then they turn to the featured topic, what "off-page" scenes from the book they'd like to see adapted in the show. Hear Jen lose track of wishes! Hear Joe advocate hard for flashbacks! Hear Tom talk about Sherlock Holmes for no good reason! As always, spoilers abound, as do show tunes!   Please show your support and rate/review us. http://getpo...

fields.title: 27. The Mysterious Case of Mysteries
fields.description: In this episode, we cover the latest news, and then we put on our deerstalker caps and try and determine how some of the early book mysteries may play out on screen. Hear us debate whether "American Psycho", "Sweet Home Alabama", or "Robin Hood: Men in Tights" is the best movie! Listen as we translate Trolloc language! Marvel as we ruin all the mysteries of the first two books! As always, spoilers abound, as do games afoot!   Please show your support and rate/review us. http://getpodcast.revi...

fields.title: 26. Fain! I'm Gonna Live Forever!
fields.description: In this episode we cover a ton of news - some which isn't technically new, but it's new to us. Then we take one of our (patent pending) deep dives into the character who's crazier than a long-tailed cat in a room full of rocking chairs, Padan Fain! Hear Joe give lessons in Czech geography! Hear Jen ask questions we don't have answers to, as the Research Team feels her wrath! Curse along with Tom as his computer gets killed by Mashadar! As always, spoilers abound, as do wildly shifting persona...

fields.title: 25. Merrilin We Roll Along!
fields.description: Our Silver Anniversary episode! In this special episode: Horse News Returns - twice! Tom asks good questions! Jen quibbles with pronunciation! Joe ponders the hard life of trees! Plus, Tom takes his shaving punishment for ignoring WoT barbers! All that, and we take our patented deep dive into the Grey Fox, Thom Merrilin. Also, a special episode warrants a special guest star, Rob Spataro of Audio Dungeon! As always, spoilers abound, as do flowing mustaches!   Please show your support and rate/...

fields.title: 24. Episode and Emotional Breakdowns (Part II)
fields.description: There were some exciting leaks this week, and the team covers those, then jumps back into the second part of our projected episode breakdowns, covering what we believe episodes 5-8 will entail. Listen as Tom gets his groove back, as Joe wears out his eraser, and how Jen teaches us all how to plot descending action! As always, spoilers abound, as do wolves, apparently!   Please show your support and rate/review us. http://getpodcast.reviews/id/1479634263   wotshowcast.buzzsprout.com ...

fields.title: 23. Episode and Emotional Breakdowns (Part I)
fields.description: In this episode, we cover the latest news, including some areas of controversy, and we devastate Tom so much he looks for a razor. We also break out a new segment that has us coco-nuts! Then we get to the meat of this episode, where we attempt to do episode breakdowns based on what we know. We cover episodes 1-4, each in our own way. Hear Jen totally make us look bad, and then mismanage the clock! Hear Joe insist it's important to know the land speed of horses over time! Hear Tom really cheat...

fields.title: 22. Lan Me Your Ears
fields.description: In this episode, the latest news is covered, including the awesome set photo leak! (Costumes!!) Then we do our patented deep dive into the Man Alone, al'Lan Mandragoran! The Lord of The Seven Towers rules the roost, and we get a little punchy talking about the elite fighter. Hear Joe talk about "mad ups"! Hear Jen give a linguistics lesson! Hear Tom try hard to talk about Star Wars! As always, spoilers abound, as do Cats Crossing The Courtyard!  Please show your support and rate/review us. ht...

fields.title: 21. A Stitch in Time Saves Nynaeve!
fields.description: In this episode, Joe, Jen, and Tom discuss the latest flood of casting news and mystery, and then do another character deep dive into the master of healing, Nynaeve! The one-time Wisdom cures last week's madness! Listen as Joe casts from the 90s, as Jen brings insight and throws away credit, and as Tom hears news that may cause him to leave the show! As always, spoilers abound, as does wanton braid tugging!   Please show your support and rate/review us. http://getpodcast.reviews/id/1479634263...

fields.title: 20. Blood Boils Blood
fields.description: In this week's episode, Joe. Jen, and Tom review the latest news. There are three pieces of news, one is interesting, one looks great, and the third... Well, we have thoughts. As always, spoilers abound, as do a sea of cruel, cruel cuts!  Please show your support and rate/review us. http://getpodcast.re...

fields.title: 19. Like Guinevere... Get It?

Marvel as we find out Egwene's secret family history, as we discover Jen's ability to remember her feelings, and the shock as we learn Tom cannot speak Dutch! fields.title: 18. News, Notes and Sick Houses
fields.description: In this week's episode, you find out that Tom writes the Show Notes, and he missed this episode as his entire family is down with the flu!  Listen as we discuss more casting and location news, Jen really explores the space, and Joe mispronounces some names, I'm sure! As always, spoilers abound, as do reminders to get your flu shot!    Please show your support and rate/review us. http://getpodcast.reviews/id/1479634263   wotshowcast.buzzsprout.com  Email: talkwotpodcast@pro...

fields.title: 17. Shadar Logoth Rules!

Please show your support and rate/review us. http://getpodcast.reviews/id/1479634263   wotshowcast.buzzsprout.com  Email: talkwotpodcast@protonmail.com  Twitter: @aran...

fields.title: 16. News, Notes, and Cursed Computers!
fields.description: In this week's episode, Jen's computer gets shut down by update Gremlins, and Joe and Tom update you on the latest news, leaks, and posts, and theorize how the upcoming show will be impacted. Please show your support and rate/review us. http://getpodcast.reviews/id/1479634263   wotshowcast.buzzsprout.com  Email: talkwotpodcast@protonmail.com&n...

Please show your support and rate/review us. http://getpodcast.reviews/id/1479634263   wotshowcast.buzzsprout.com  Email: talkwotpodcast@protonmail.com  Twitt...

fields.title: 14. WOT Wednesday - A Sunny Four-Cast
fields.description: The Talk'aran'rhiod team goes a little bananas talking about the four latest casting announcements, and rates how great they were at predicting these choices. Listen to us talk about TV shows we haven't seen, debate the merits of shapely calves, and of course, glorious hair.  Spoilers abound, as do mispronunciations!  Please show your support and rate/review us. http://getpodcast.reviews/id/1479634263   wotshowcast.buzzsprout.com  Email: talkwotpodcast@protonmail.com  Twit...

fields.title: 13. O, Wolfbrother, Where Art Thou?
fields.description: In this lucky 13 episode, we discuss the latest news, and how we think it all impacts the show. Then we do a deep dive into our favorite yellow-eyed blacksmith, Perrin! Spoilers abound, as do conspiracy theories!  Please show your support and rate/review us. http://getpodcast.reviews/id/1479634263   wotshowcast.buzzsp...

fields.title: 12. Feeling Rand-y!
fields.description: This week's episode we discuss more of the latest info on the upcoming Amazon series (casting and location!), and dig in our main man, Rand al'Thor. We do our patented deep dive into Rand, his history, his actions in the first book, and his glorious, glorious hair. Our crack research team worked hard on this one, and we ignored most of their notes! Spoilers abound, as do sea turtles!   Please show your support and rate/review us. http://getpodcast.reviews/id/1479634263   wotshowcast.buzz...

fields.title: 11. Don't Moiraine on My Parade!

fields.title: 10. WOT Wednesday - A Tam Fine Day!

Please show your support and rate/review us. http://getpodcast.reviews/id/1479634263   wotshowcast.buzzsprout.com  Email: talkwotpodcast@protonmail.com  Twitter: ...

fields.description: Joe, Jen, and Tom breakdown what shadowspawn are, and which appear in the Eye of the World. As always, spoilers abound, as does discussions about what exactly "eyeless" means!   Please show your support and rate/review us. http://getpodcast.reviews/id/1479634263   wotshowcast.buzzsprout.com  Email: talkwotpodcast@p...

Please show your support and rate/review us. http://getpodcast.reviews/id/1479634263   wotshowcast.buzzsprout.com  Email: talkwotpodcast@protonma...

fields.title: 07. These Dreams Go On When I Close My Eyes... (Tel'aran'rhiod Part II)
fields.description: Joe, Jen, and Tom continue their deep dive into the World of Dreams, reviewing some of the dream sequences in The Eye of The World, and breaking down their meaning and intentions, as well as some real world parallels. Please show your support and rate/review us. http://getpodcast.reviews/id/1479634263   wotshowcast.buzzsprout.com  Email: talkwotpodcast@protonmail.com  Twitter: @arant...

fields.title: 06. In Dreams, I Walk With You...(Tel'aran'rhiod - Part I)
fields.description: Listen as Joe, Jen, and Tom take their first podcasting steps into the World of Dreams. We talk about what it is, how it works, and of course, how we think they'll address it in the upcoming Amazon series. Spoilers abound in this wide-ranging discussion, the Talk'aran'rhiod research team really earned their pay th...

fields.title: 05. WOT Wednesday - Table Read Video

Spoilers abound! So does fun!  Please show your support and rate/review us. http://getpodcast.reviews/id/1479634263   wots...

fields.title: 04. Dream Casting, Not Dreamcasting!

Please show your support and rate/review us. http://getpodcast.reviews/id/1479634263   wotshowcast.buzzsprout.com  Email: talkwotpodcast@protonmail.com  T...

fields.title: 03. Don't Change That Channel(ing)!

fields.title: 02. Who Makes The Cut?

fields.title: 00. Prologue
fields.description: Being a Wheel of Time fan, we're certain you know how important a prologue is.  While ours is not nearly as mystifying or long as some of The Wheel of Time prologues, it's still important to set the stage on which we play, and underscore how we've progressed since we started this podcast however many turnings of the Wheel have passed.  If you're a first time listener, we recommend you listen to this before taking the next step.  Can you feel the Pattern pulling you?  Oh......

fields.description: Send us a text In this episode, Matt and Enn discuss Chapters 12 & 13 of Robert Jordan's The Fires of Heaven from the Wheel of Time series! Nynaeve and Elayne have found themselves in a precarious situation, but Thom and Juilin are close by - this week we find out what they are up to. Elayne discovers she may have an ANTM style makeover coming up, and speaking of disguises, Min and company arrive to their destination and Siuan takes a chance in a seedy common room...will it pay off? Ch. 1...

fields.title: Men! Amirite Ladies? (TFOH: Ch 08-09)

She and Elayne are able to disguise themselves enough to fool some folks, but when it matters most, will their identities be revealed? Get ready for the Tea to be served and spilled peopl...

We also learn some interesting information about the effects of Balefire on the pattern which can be game (or at least pattern) changing. Egwene then takes us on a journey through and around all of her friend's dreams bef...

fields.title: Wise One Wing-Women (TFOH: Ch 04-05)
fields.description: Send us a text In this episode, Matt and Enn discuss Chapters 4 & 5 of Robert Jordan's The Fires of Heaven from the Wheel of Time series! This week Rand struggles to understand the women in his life (shocker) while Egwene struggles to avoid the smell of burning cow dung. Aiel, ya gotta find something else for kindling! Also she, Egwene and Aviendha all have their own experiences with the steadfastness of the Wise Ones. Ch. 04: TwilightCh. 05: Among the Wise OnesFrom the Episode: Special t...

fields.title: Tar Valoon - Traveling Circus (TFOH: Ch 02-03)
fields.description: Send us a text Next week we will be taking Thursday off and returning Aug 11; Thanks for understanding! <3  In this episode, Matt and Enn discuss Chapters 2 & 3 of Robert Jordan's The Fires of Heaven from the Wheel of Time series! Then we dive into the first chapter with Matt (4 persepective shifts - this one gets it's own episode lol.) The horses are giving us My Little Pony vibes, and in addition to new perspectives ...

fields.description: Send us a text In this episode, Matt and Enn discuss The Shadow Rising and each main character's trajectory throughout. Elaida displays her audacity in the most grand and heartbreaking ways, Min wonders how she got wrapped up in all of this and Gawyn shows his true colors. Siuan and Leane fill themselves with vengeance and Alvierin proves to have quite a mouth on her...this chapte...

fields.title: The Cockles of your Heart (SIDE QUEST: Prime E08)
fields.description: Send us a text In this episode, Matt and Enn discuss the Wheel of Time Amazon Series Season 1 finale; Episode 08! fields.description: Send us a text In this episode, Matt and Enn discuss the Wheel of Time Amazon Series Episode 07!  This one features lots of new characters including Min! It's the big episode we've all been waiting for, and it did. not. disappoint! We get some major moves forward plot-wise, and an unexpected romance! We're both still puzzling out the twist ending, and can't wait...

fields.title: 176 Rewatching Season 2 "What Was Meant to Be" Episode 8
fields.description:
☯️ Road to Tar Valon Links ☯️ •Ad Free & Early Access Videos https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCt80DwpQzBKscH2zg9pX_DA/join and Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/roadtotarvalon •Discord: https://linktr.ee/roadtotarvalon •Blue Sky: https://bsky.app/profile/roadtotarvalon.bsky.social •Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/roadtotarvalon/

Lanfear throws Moiraine and Lan out of the Ways outside of Falme. She then transports herself and Rand into the city, where Rand confronts and kills Turak and his men. This causes Ishamael to learn of Rand's presence and realize that Lanfear has betrayed him. Ishamael orders Padan Fain to deliver the dagger from Shadar Logoth to Mat, in an attempt to kill Rand. However, Mat refuses to take the dagger and escapes. The Whitecloaks, led by Dain and his father Geofram, attack Falme in an attempt to eradicate the Seanchan. During the chaos, Ingtar, Loial, and Masema escape with the Horn of Valere and join the battle alongside Mat, Perrin, and the Aiel. Ingtar is killed in the process. Egwene manages to break free from her a'dam and kill Renna. Mat is forced to blow the Horn, summoning the Heroes of the Horn and turning the tide of the battle. At the same time, Perrin kills Geofram out of rage due to him killing Hopper. Rand, Egwene, Nynaeve, Perrin, and Mat reunite and are confronted by Ishamael. Ishamael has Rand shielded from the One Power and tricks Mat into wounding Rand. While Egwene and Perrin fight Ishamael, Moiraine frees Rand from the shield, allowing him to slay Ishamael. Rand is then proclaimed the Dragon Reborn before the whole city. After the battle, Moghedien confronts Lanfear and informs her that all the Forsaken have been released.

fields.title: E175 Moiraine Damodred: The Female Gandalf & Wheel of Time News for Audiobook lovers
fields.description: Amber here today, joined with the wonderful Jordan Rannells audio engineer and editor for "The Prancing Pony" podcast, and https://www.youtube.com/@alongexpectedsoundscape as we talk about, compare and contrast Moiraine Damodred from The Wheel of Time and Gandalf from The Lord of the Rings.

fields.title: E174 It’s the Year of the Dragon!
fields.description:
First off - full spoilers! If you’re one of those brave folks who doesn’t give a fig if you’re spoiled, then go right ahead.  All others have been warned. 

Inspired by the new year, the year of the dragon, we each picked our favorite Dragon Reborn moment from the book series.  It should come as little surprise that we picked something from points in the books that perfectly balance each other.  This was a super fun way to take a look at what it means to be the Dragon.  What do you think your favorite moment is? Would you be interested in more characters covered this way? 

For opportunities to get in early on content or a chance to participate in our weekly live recordings open only to patrons, we have a Patreon account for you to sign up to.  Patreon link below

fields.title: E173 How about a Forsaken focused Age of Legends movie?  We’re for it!
fields.description:
Well, it didn’t take long for us to take a little detour from the books to discuss recent news in the WoT world.  There’s been another announcement regarding taking Wheel of Time source material and turning it into a movie.  What will this movie look like? How will we wrap our heads around new actors for Ishamael and Lanfear now that we love the actors in the WoT show? How deep will they go into the darkness that makes up who the Forsaken become? We are curious and excited and invite you to join us as we hypothesize over what this movie is going to look like.

For opportunities to get in early on content or a chance to participate in our weekly live recordings open only to patrons, we have a Patreon account for you to sign up to.  Patreon link below

fields.title: E172 Gareth Bryne, Boar-horses, and Bad Choices  Fires of Heaven Chapters 11-15
fields.description:
We are back in the books!  This is a spoiler free episode if you have read up to Fires of Heaven, through chapter fifteen, which happens to be Amber’s favorite chapter in the entire series.  There’s a heavy load of sarcasm added to that statement and you should listen to find out why.  There’s other stuff that happens that’s definitely on the lighter side, most importantly we are introduced to Valan Luca’s caravan of circus performers.  Are those whippets in sparkly tutus we see? If not, we’d like to. 

Just a couple of announcements wrap up this episode.  Traci has big news and a podcast she’s been working on.  Paperback Cabaret can be found on all major podcasting platforms. Click here to find it on Spotify.  

For opportunities to get in early on content or a chance to participate in our weekly live recordings open only to patrons, we have a Patreon account for you to sign up to.  Patreon link below

fields.title: E171 Spicy Takes - Wheel of Time Season Two
fields.description: Full spoilers for the books and the show.  Just making sure that’s the first thing you read.  Please, consider yourself warned

fields.title: E170 Is it coupling or romance? Both? Wheel of Time Romance Investigated
fields.description:
Before you jump in we want you to know, full spoilers for the books and the show.  

The Wheel of Time is filled with couples, but how believable are some of these relationships?  Are they all needed? Is there any true “romance” found in the book series?  The tv series has a chance to do things differently, and indeed has shown us endearing moments that build on the romances barely fleshed out in the books as well as places where maybe certain couples aren’t going to make it to the screen. 

For opportunities to get in early on content or a chance to participate in our weekly live recordings open only to patrons, we have a Patreon account for you to sign up to.  Patreon link below

fields.title: E169 Can’t Resist a Fun List -  Highly Anticipated Wheel of Time Character Team Ups
fields.description:
First off, your spoiler warning; we made a cut off at the end of book five, Fires of Heaven. 

Second, and most importantly, today we are discussing an article from ScreenRant with their choice for ten WoT character team ups to look forward to in season three.  We take our own ideas and blend them with theirs for what is, once again, a perfectly splendid chat. 

For opportunities to get in early on content or a chance to participate in our weekly live recordings open only to patrons, we have a Patreon account for you to sign up to.  Patreon link below

fields.title: E168 The Sea Folk, Tanchico, and Rhuidean News for WoT Season Three
fields.description:
Spoilers don’t go past book four, The Shadow Rising, for this episode.  

We took a recent article from the Hollywood Reporter to discuss what we may or may not see in season three now that we have some confirmed locations, as well as the introduction of yet another group of people claiming Rand as the key person in their prophecies.  

For opportunities to get in early on content or a chance to participate in our weekly live recordings open only to patrons, we have a Patreon account for you to sign up to.  Patreon link below

fields.title: E167 Wheel of Time Season 2 Wrap Up
fields.description:
It’s full spoilers over the entirety of the books while pondering some of our remaining questions from season two.  Thank you to all our friends in chat who share their Sunday afternoons with us and join in making our recordings such a fun process.  

For opportunities to get in early on content or a chance to participate in our weekly live recordings open only to patrons, we have a Patreon account for you to sign up to.  Patreon link below

fields.title: E166 Wheel of Time Season 2 Episode 8 - First thoughts and reactions Part One
fields.description:
Full spoiler episode for the books! You do be warned, friends. We waited so long and season two has already come to an end far faster than we could have hoped.  But what a finale!!!! We couldn’t make it all the way through all the things we wanted to talk about so this is only part one.  We certainly have more speculating to do! 

For opportunities to get in early on content or a chance to participate in our weekly live recordings open only to patrons, we have a Patreon account for you to sign up to.  Patreon link below

fields.title: E165 Wheel of Time Season 2 Episode 7 - First thoughts and reactions
fields.description:
Full spoilers, friends! Listen responsibly.  There were some doubts on where this episode would be taking us but we find ourselves giddy with excitement at what has been unraveled through the Daes dae'mar episode.  We also get a little side tracked with speculations on what changes might happen for season three and wraps with our anticipation for the finale of season two.   

For opportunities to get in early on content or a chance to participate in our weekly live recordings open only to patrons, we have a Patreon account for you to sign up to.  Patreon link below

fields.title: E164 Wheel of Time Season 2 Episode 6 - First thoughts and reactions
fields.description:
Eyes without pity, indeed! We did spoiler free for the first part of the episode,  and then rolled through further speculations fueled by the full book series.  This episode was by far the darkest and perhaps truest to the books story line we have gotten so far and we approve! 

For opportunities to get in early on content or a chance to participate in our weekly live recordings open only to patrons, we have a Patreon account for you to sign up to.  Patreon link below

fields.title: E163 Wheel of Time Season 2 Episode 5 - First thoughts and reactions
fields.description:
Full spoilers for the books abound in this episode.  We can’t be restrained! There are many places in our discussion where we just need that information to figure out where the show may be taking us book readers.  While the episode is peppered with questions, the biggest of them all may just be; are we ever going to get creatures???

For opportunities to get in early on content or a chance to participate in live chats open only to patrons, we have a Patreon account for you to sign up to.  Patreon link below

fields.title: E161 Wheel of Time Season 2 Episode 4 - First thoughts and reactions
fields.description:
Be warned, full spoilers for the books abound in this episode.  Daughter of the Night revealed! How are we feeling about that?  Is Selene/Lanfear what we were all hoping for? Moiraine isn’t the only Damodred made of thin, invisible steel and we can’t wait to see where Anvaere’s character is going to take us.  Upon arrival at the halfway point for the season, we are feeling pretty good.  This episode was juicy and leaves us waiting with baited breath for the next one.  
For opportunities to get in early on content or a chance to participate in live chats open only to patrons, we have a Patreon account for you to sign up to.  Patreon link below

fields.title: E160 Wheel of Time Season 2 Episode 3 - First thoughts and reactions
fields.description:
Traci declares this her favorite episode so far and Amber has…questions.  You know it’s good when questions are involved.  We throw chronological episode coverage out the window and pull apart our favorite and least favorite parts in a most delightful fashion.  

For opportunities to get in early on content or a chance to participate in live chats open only to patrons, we have a Patreon account for you to sign up to.  Patreon link below

fields.title: E159 Wheel of Time Season 2 Episode 2 - First thoughts and reactions
fields.description:
It’s only episode two but it seems clear we have some serious powerhouse acting happening this season.  Ceara Coveney makes a perfect Elayne and Kate Fleetwood is drawing us in with her mesmerizing performances.  For as many changes as have happened, there are still some scenes that feel pulled straight from the book to the screen.  This blend of book and show appeal feels really fun and we are here for it! 

For opportunities to get in early on content or a chance to participate in live chats open only to patrons, we have a Patreon account for you to sign up to.  Patreon link below

fields.title: E158 Wheel of Time Season 2 Episode 1 - First thoughts and reactions
fields.description:
Are you all excited? Because we are excited!!!! We agreed that at some point, we threw out the books and just allowed ourselves to be swept away with the new way things were unfolding.  Tiny criticisms here and there but, over all, we are looking at an elevated…everything. Sets, costumes, music, acting, it’s all better than last season and everything we hoped for.  

For opportunities to get in early on content or a chance to participate in live chats open only to patrons, we have a Patreon account for you to sign up to.  Patreon link below

fields.title: E157 Perrin Aybara, Westlands 101
fields.description:
Perrin Aybara's story is a journey of self discovery. As a blacksmith from the Two Rivers, he becomes a warrior and leader. Today we highlight some of his best moments, his Wolfbrother abilities the forging of Mah'alleinir, and his role in many battles. Loyalty, compassion, inner strength, struggles with leadership and grappling with his own nature make him relatable while his unwavering moral compass and dedication to protecting others make him a beloved character in Robert Jordan's "The Wheel of Time".


As per usual, we alert listeners of spoilers before we get there, and our recordings are opened up to Patreon members for $1. Find out how to join here, and also check out our Discord channel!

fields.title: E156 - Another Scoop of Wheel of Time Season Two Images - FULL SPOILERS for show and book series
fields.description:
The countdown is definitely on and Amazon Prime is offering tid-bits to get us geared up for season two.  And it’s working!  Is our trio of gals, Egwene, Nynewve, and Elayne, about to step into the Ways, and if so, what will draw them there?  Who will be their guide? Is this a place where the story lines from book to show can take off in a completely new direction? Perrin is the definition of fierce, blood splattered and yellow eyes ablaze; is the Way of the Leaf forever behind him? Will Mat ever find his way into something other than his threadbare duds? No Heroes of the Horn as of yet, but do we dare offer the idea of Heroes of the Hooves? Of course we do!  

We have opened our weekly recordings to a live chat on Discord with our Patrons.  This is for all our patrons, starting at $1 a month, and we just uploaded new merch perks as well. Patreon link below

fields.title: E155 - Season Two Show News - FULL SPOILERS for books and tv series
fields.description:
We are back just in time to cover some of the exciting news, leaks, and images for season two of Wheel of Time. Do we dare hope the incomparable Shohreh Aghdashloo will actually portray the indomitable Cadsuane? Or are the clues pointing to her playing Elaida? A transcribed script between Aviendha and Perrin reveals the possibility of “sexual tension” between the two; will this actually play out on screen? If it does, will it make sense or will we hate it? We sift through the possible episode titles and the images released in the Entertainment Weekly article to see if we can piece through where this season will and won’t take us.  

Thank you to Lauren from Unraveling the Pattern for an in depth look at the possible episode titles for season two.  Personally, we hope “Horses” is legit. 

We have opened our weekly recordings to a live chat on Discord with our Patrons.  This is for all our patrons, starting at $1 a month, and we just uploaded new merch perks as well. Patreon link below

fields.title: E154 Forming friendships, Forkroot tea, and a hint of figs and mice - Fires of Heaven
fields.description:
We rejoin Nyneave, Elayne, Thom, and Juilin as they attempt to get back to Tar Valon. The trek from Tanchico has been eventful and the gals are barely in Amador.  There’s an uncovered message from the White Tower, an unexpected capture, and a heroic rescue in the first three chapters this week. We also find Siuan hunting out an agent for the Blue Ajah’s eyes and ears in Murandy’s capital city. Amber posits a question too entertaining too resist: Is Lugard a place where drag queens run the taverns? If it is, we would very much like to go there.  Or at least see it on the show. 

Music Credit to: A Son’s Path by Bear McCeary from the God of War Ragnarök 

We have opened our weekly recordings to live text with our Patrons when we record. This is for all our patrons, starting at $1 a month, and we just uploaded new merch perks as well. Patreon link below

fields.title: E153 Moiraine’s Looting Rhuidean! Fires of Heaven Chapters 4-7
fields.description:
We love Moiraine, and she takes it upon herself to cart lots of goodies away from the Waste. Just imagine of she took those objects of the One Power back to Tar Valon considering who the new Amyrlin is... this week we strap up and leave the Waste behind. Rand's relationship with Aviendha is slowly heating up, Egwene levels up with the Wise Ones, and begins her explorations into her friend's dreams. Lots of fun moments this week! 
We have opened our weekly recordings to live text with our Patrons when we record. This is for all our patrons, starting at $1 a month, and we just uploaded new merch perks as well. Patreon link below

fields.title: E152 Pretty sure it’s the beginning of Fires of Heaven
fields.description: While RJ insists on neither beginnings nor endings in his series (and we love him for that!), it is definitely time for us to begin our Fires of Heaven reread.  Book five kicks us off with some meaty chapters and tantalizing situations.  Will Elaida manage to turn fear to obedience among the Aes Sedai? Is Padan Fain’s excursion to the White Tower hindered or helped with the new Amyrlin in charge? Will Rand be able to unite all the Aiel, including the Shaido? Can Mat win a dagger tossing event blindfolded and more than a little deep in his cups? Not to mention that crazy barn burning and near hanging in Kore Springs. And we are still only in the first few chapters. Join us, won’t you?

fields.title: E151 Moghedien, The Spider, Westlands 101
fields.description:
Is Age of Legends Moghedien a power suit wearing, risk taking, law flouting, financial shark or is she more like her namesake, a spider hiding in the shadows, playing with her food? Either way, she stands as a cunning saboteur, one of the few Forsaken to infiltrate the Dragon’s chain of command in the War of Power.  What awaits the Spider in the Third Age as she spins a new web for her victims? Who do you want to play Moghedien in the show? 

We have opened our weekly recordings to live text with our Patrons when we record. This is for all our patrons, starting at $1 a month, and we just uploaded new merch perks as well. Patreon link below

fields.title: E150 Asmodean, Joar Addam Nessosin, Westlands 101
fields.description:
What type of musical istrument should Asmodean play in the Wheel of Time TV show? How does his backstoy align with the mythos of American Delta Blue player Robert Johnson? What about Faust? Today we talk about the origins of the artist formally known as Joar Addam Nessosin, theorize on his strained relationship with his mother, and ask how to inject some good ol Americana into the television series. That and much much more, on this week's episode. As per usual, the first half is spoiler free, for any new reader looking for insight into the character, and then we dive deep into Asmodean's role within the book series.


  • Join us for live recordings by becoming a Patreon member. All tiers can listen in for 1 dollar a month.
  • Find us on Twitter here.
  • Intagram here.
  • Check out some cool Wheel of Time merch here.
  • And join our discord server here.

fields.title: E149 Westlands 101: Lanfear, Daughter of the Night
fields.description:
Is it time to retire the crazy ex-girlfriend trope? Today we talk about Lanfear, one of the most over the top female villains in fantasy. We chat about her very important origin story, theorize on the confusing bits, question her big Brandon Sanderson 10 year anniversary reveal, how Prime Video could approach her character, and if she will get one of those cool cold opens we all love. Who wants to see the explosion of the Sharom on the Collam Daan? Who wants to see utter chaos? Let us know. Send us a message! 

As per usual, the first half of this episode is spoiler free, and then we get into the nitty gritty. 

Join the Discord server here:

https://linktr.ee/roadtotarvalon

Check out our Patreon membership here, where all members starting at 1 dollar can join us for live recordings:

https://www.patreon.com/roadtotarvalon

fields.title: E148 Ishamael, Betrayer of Hope, Westlands 101
fields.description: Ishamael is on of the most destructive forces within The Wheel of Time, but how does one betray hope? How does he manage to influence the world all while being tucked away inside the seal on the Bore? What is his goal? What is his punishment? We talk about theories on the lack of advancement within the WoT, how the show got it right, and much much more and we breakdown the man formally known as Elan Morin Tedronai. We encourage our listeners to check out our Patreon page where all members can join us for live recordings, for the 1 dollar per month tier. Find links to it, and all social media pages here. https://linktr.ee/roadtotarvalon

fields.title: E147 Wet and Wild in the Aiel Waste, The Shadow Rising Chapters 57 - 58
fields.description:
The final episode of the Shadow Rising is here!! Rand, with a large army of Aiel coalescing around him, arrives at Alcair Dal where thousands more Aiel await an important proclamation.  Competing car’a’carns reveal themselves, but who will the Aiel follow?  Rand has short time to think of this as he also has a couple low down forsaken to take care of. Thank you to all of our Patron members for joining us in chat and hanging out with us!! 

We have opened our weekly recordings to live text with our Patrons when we record. This is for all our patrons, starting at $1 a month, and we just uploaded new merch perks as well. Patreon link below

fields.title: E146 Tanchico to the Two Rivers! Traipsing to the End of the Shadow Rising!!, The Shadow Rising Chapters 55 - 56
fields.description:
We imagined this would be our final episode on TSR, however, excitement is difficult to contain when there’s so much happening in these chapters. Only covering chapters 55 and 56 this week in order to get into all the nitty gritty details and fun theories. In these chapters; Nyneave, Elayne, and Egeanin got into the Panarch’s palace, but now it’s time for the trio plus one to find their way out. And Perrin is preparing his mind and the village for what will certainly be the worst attack, if not the last, on Emond’s Field.

We have opened our weekly recordings to live text with our Patrons when we record. This is for all our patrons, starting at $1 a month, and we just uploaded new merch perks as well. Patreon link below

fields.title: E145 Torture is Torture… And Not Cool!!! , The Shadow Rising Chapters 51 - 54
fields.description:
Elayne and Nyneave are entertaining their new gal pal, Egeanin, when Domon Bayle arrives and reveals that she is Seanchan. Things have not been going well in Emond’s Field.  More trolloc attacks have pinned the little village down and supplies are running short. Dire news pushes Perrin back to the Wolf dream and leaves him with a new bride.

We have opened our weekly recordings to live text with our Patrons when we record. This is for all our patrons, starting at $1 a month, and we just uploaded new merch perks as well. Patreon link below

fields.title: E144 So Much Exposition… The Shadow Rising Chapters 47 - 50
fields.description:
There is fighting in the Tower and safety depends on which side you choose. Rand is still traveling through the Waste to Cold Rocks Hold with a less than pleasant Aviendha still trailing him. The first view of Cold Rocks Hold is a pleasant surprise, covered in greenness and shade. And in an attempt to mollify Aviendha, Rand decides to find her a gift.
We have opened our weekly recordings to live text with our Patrons when we record. This is for all our patrons, starting at $1 a month, and we just uploaded new merch perks as well. Patreon link below

fields.title: E143 A Brief “Battle”, The Shadow Rising Chapters 43 - 46
fields.description:
Shit’s about to get real! Perrin awakes seriously weakened from his healing but determined to take care of his responsibilities.  Plans change when the village is alerted to the presence of Trolllocs approaching and defenses need to be pulled into full force immediately. Egeanin is trailing tricky Floran Gelb as he seems about to kidnap another woman that she doesn’t want to have to kill or sell into slavery. And Elayne and Nyneave are dressed in silk but carrying staves for protection as they wander through the dangerous, impoverished streets of Tanchico.

We have opened our weekly recordings to live text with our Patrons when we record. This is for all our patrons, starting at $1 a month, and we just uploaded new merch perks as well. Patreon link below

fields.title: E142 Whaaaa???, The Shadow Rising Chapters 39 - 42
fields.description:
In these chapters, Elayne and Nyneave arrive in Tanchico, with a slightly sullen Thom and Juilin in tow. Perrin with his growing band of Two River’s lads has been good to his word and hunting has been good.  But all good things must come to an end.  An attack coming from an unexpected angle sees the first deaths of the young men and leaves Perrin grievously injured. Very exciting episode full of many “Whaaaa???” moments to enjoy!

We have opened our weekly recordings to live text with our Patrons when we record. This is for all our patrons, starting at $1 a month, and we just uploaded new merch perks as well. Patreon link below

fields.title: E141 - Feminism in The Wheel of Time, Westlands 101
fields.description:
Loaded topic today folks, so bear with us as we consider the many angles of this conversation, which I might add is deeply contested. Topics may include: is Lanfear a feminist icon? Gender essentialism. The First Sister bond, which Wheel of Time book is the most feminist, and why Daniel Henney should be narrating New Spring with the incredibly talented Rosamund Pike and more.  

*** As always make sure you check out our Patreon page where you can listen in during our recording session and hang out with us in chat. That starts at 1 single US dollar. If you'd like to support the podcast in another way, subscribe to the Youtube channel, check out the merch shop, or just share the episodes far and wide. All links can be found here. ***

fields.title: E140 The D*ck of the Pattern, The Shadow Rising Chapters 35 - 38
fields.description:
Egwene and Elayne meet in The World of Dreams on their way to Tanchico. Mat gets several of his staple items from a caravan of peddlers who join the Aiel. Rand tells Mat that they ride with evil now. Trollocs and myrddraal ruin a brief respite as cries can be heard out of the dark and big baddies descending on the camp of the Aiel. And we end on a chapter that gives us perspectives in Tanchico, a den of secrets and a Black Ajah hiding spot.

We have opened our weekly recordings to live text with our Patrons when we record. This is for all our patrons, starting at $1 a month, and we just uploaded new merch perks as well. Patreon link below

fields.title: E139 Rand is Back with Bedazzled Tattoos!! , The Shadow Rising Chapters 31 - 34
fields.description:
Welcome to the Bedazzled Boyz Biker Club. Requirements are as follows: Bedazzled Tattoos, Bedazzled Jeans, and a Badazz Attitude. Newest member of the club is Rand Al’Thor, with his crazy shiny tattoos. Meanwhile, Perrin is leading in the Two Rivers, gathering every able body to get ready for a big rescue! White Cloaks are being spooky and scary ( as per usual ) and Dain Bornhald is drinking away his pain and doubts as White Cloaks are dying.

We have opened our weekly recordings to live text with our Patrons when we record. This is for all our patrons, starting at $1 a month, and we just uploaded new merch perks as well. Patreon link below

fields.title: E138 P is for Perrin (Poor Poor Perrin), The Shadow Rising Chapters 27 - 30
fields.description:
There’s great alliteration ahead, although an awful atrocity reaches one of our closest members in the group. Perrin returns to the Two Rivers after strange dreams including a new stranger. Upon his return home, he gets some of the worst possible news one could imagine. Grief hits him hard, but Faile comforts him as he makes a plan for what his next move needs to be.

We have opened our weekly recordings to live text with our Patrons when we record. This is for all our patrons, starting at $1 a month, and we just uploaded new merch perks as well. Patreon link below

fields.title: E137 The Reds are like the Feds
fields.description: This week Traci goes on sabbatical and I'm joined with Laura. We focus on the TV show, I bob and weave avoiding spoilers while she makes some shockingly on point observations, we chat about dragons, fantasy, question the Dark One's propaganda tactics, question teenage sex scenes, and why that ferryman had it coming. As per usual, if you'd like to take part in our live recordings, check out our Patreon landing page. Tiers start a 1$ and you can find the link here: https://linktr.ee/roadtotarvalon

fields.title: E136 Uncharted "She's not evil... she's just an idiot"
fields.description: We are back and we are uncharted once again. This week we are talking all about how some of the bigger WoT moments will translate to the screen. We speculate on what type of changes will can expect. Dumai's Wells, the Attack on Tar Valon, and many more. Full spoilers ahead! Thanks to our hilarious patrons for joining us in chat, and if you'd like to take part, check out our patreon landing page here: https://linktr.ee/roadtotarvalon

fields.title: E135 Secrets of the Real Deal Aiel, The Shadow Rising Chapters 25 - 26
fields.description:
Today we are going backward, or forward… or… where the heck are we going? This is an open chat special episode with lots of funny and silly moments all throughout. All though… you weary travelers who journey down the Road to Tar Valon can’t have too much fun... So have yourself a drink… maybe a frothy Frosty from Wendy’s?

We have opened our weekly recordings to live text with our Patrons when we record. This is for all our patrons, starting at $1 a month, and we just uploaded new merch perks as well. Patreon link below

fields.title: E134 Off To Adventure Land aka Rhuidean, The Shadow Rising Chapters 22 - 24
fields.description:
Rand, Moiraine, Lan, Egwene, and the Aiel are all on their way to Rhuidean using the Portal Stone. Despite its success, the welcome they receive is less than warm. Mat is feeling unsure he made the right decision to join Rand, but he’s determined not to die and this IS what those Snake people told him to do.

We have opened our weekly recordings to live text with our Patrons when we record. This is for all our patrons, starting at $1 a month, and we just uploaded new merch perks as well. Patreon link below

fields.title: E133 Berelain sur Paendrag Paeron; Westlands 101
fields.description: An introspective deep dive on this determined young ruler who will do anything to keep her small nation of Mayene sovereign. Lots of discussion today on the male gaze, sexuality, and if during our read of the series we judged "The First of Mayene" too harshly. As per usual, our Westland 101 episodes are split into two halves, the first being spoiler free. Special thanks to our Patrons for choosing this episode! *** Found below is the link to our Patreon landing page where all members can join us weekly for live recordings. Also found in the link is an invite to our Discord server. https://linktr.ee/roadtotarvalon ***

fields.title: E132 Moiraine = Shady Lady Vibes? TSR 18 - 21
fields.description:
Perrin is packed and ready to leave, but is still having issues with Faile before the Stone suddenly starts ringing. Elayne and Nyneave are heading to the harbor in search of a fast ship to take them to Tanchico. And Moiraine is walking into the Heart of the Stone to join the group of nobles Rand has assembled.
We have opened our weekly recordings to live text with our Patrons when we record. This is for all our patrons, starting at $1 a month, and we just uploaded new merch perks as well. Patreon link below

fields.title: E131 Loial Holds the Door, TSR 14 - 17
fields.description:
This episode has unexpected heroes and unexpected quarrels. Perrin is in his room preparing for his departure to the Two Rivers before he’s visited by two women, each wanting something different from him. Faile is off to give Berelain a piece of her mind and perhaps a knuckle sandwich… Mat has decided that he needs to go through the Red stone doorway in the Great Holding. While Elayne’s preparing to leave Tear with Egwene and Nyneave, they are interrupted by a stone-faced warder with a soft spot for Nyneave. And Thom has been doing his best to perform double duty as he has been wandering the halls of the Stone with a song to sing and gossip to spread.
We have opened our weekly recordings to live text with our Patrons when we record. This is for all our patrons, starting at $1 a month, and we just uploaded new merch perks as well. Patreon link below

fields.title: E130 Revelations from the World of Dreams, TSR 10-13
fields.description:
Rand returns to his room only to discover several uninvited “guests”. Egwene enters Tel’aran’rhiod for the first time without the aid of the stone ring in the hunt of the Black Ajah. And Mat is taking a little time for himself at an inn in the Maule but our lucky boy overhears something that catches his interest.
We have opened our weekly recordings to live text with our Patrons when we record. This is for all our patrons, starting at $1 a month, and we just uploaded new merch perks as well. Patreon link below

fields.title: E129 Westlands 101 : Ogier Gardeners of Seanchan
fields.description: Harmony, peace, singing, and slaughtering. We look at the duality of Seanchan's Ogier versus the Ogier in the Westands and question which group is more in line with what they were before they left their home world? You know the drill, history and background in the first half, and then later book spoilers in the second. Check out our Patreon page for extra goodies, Discord to join in on our conversations, and our merch shop for Wheel of Time hoodies, t-shirts and more. All links can be found here: https://linktr.ee/roadtotarvalon

fields.title: E128 Love is in the Air! - The Shadow Rising Chapters 6 - 9
fields.description:
Our gals chat about love and Moiraine gives them all the realest response. Elayne and Egwene go to Rand with a reason but things do not go as expected. Rand is love struck but the high lords keep trying to get one over on him. Then Rand gets a visit and darkness waits on the other side of his door…

We have opened our weekly recordings to live text with our Patrons when we record. This is for all our patrons, starting at $1 a month, and we just uploaded new merch perks as well. Patreon link below

fields.title: E127 Smell Me and Tell Me My Emotions Perrin! - The Shadow Rising Chapters 2-5
fields.description:
We are back to Tear, where everything from the last book wrapped up.  Perrin, Mat, and Rand all come under a most unexpected attack.  Nyeave and Egwene are attempting to get answers from their Black Ajah prisoners, but little is revealed that offers a definitive direction for our sleuths.

We have opened our weekly recordings to live text with our Patrons when we record. This is for all our patrons, starting at $1 a month, and we just uploaded new merch perks as well. Patreon link below

fields.title: E126 Westlands 101 : Sadistic Semirhage, Spooky Season Edition
fields.description:
Semhirage, one of the thirteen Forsaken, is indeed the Lady of Pain. Her rampages of cruelty during the War of Power were so legendary that many prisoners would attempt to take their own lives rather than being left to her horrific treatment. A healer turned torturer, we cover her story from the Age of Legends, all the way into the Third Age, when she emerges at the will of the Dark One. Beginning is spoiler free and we let you know before we jump into spoiler territory. Thanks for joining us!
We have opened our weekly recordings to live text with our Patrons when we record. This is for all our patrons, starting at $1 a month, and we just uploaded new merch perks as well. Patreon link below

fields.title: E125 The Shadow Rising: Chpt 1 - All Over the Map
fields.description:
Kicking off book four!  This first chapter thas Min returning to the Tower and seeing visions of certain death for many there. Elaida is stalking the hallways of the Tower brooding and plotting.  We take a jump to the Two Rivers where the White Cloaks (aka The Dirty Weasel Boys), plan to invade and bring to the light anyone they see as walking in the Shadow.  Lastly, we have to give a nod of appreciation to the High Lady Suroth, giving off HBIC vibes while assuming command of the Hailene.  Thank you for joining us as we continue our weekly discussions of our beloved WoT series.

We have opened our weekly recordings to live text with our Patrons when we record. This is for all our patrons, starting at $1 a month, and we just uploaded new merch perks as well. Patreon link below

fields.title: E124 House of the Dragon Episode 10
fields.description: The finale is here!!! Here's our non book reader thoughts on motherhood as motivation, hatching dragons, and a few predictions for season 2. We are thinking about planning a few episodes on "The Knight of the Seven Kingdoms" novellas and if you would like to read along with us, so be sure to hop on our discord server. All our patrons have access to live episode recordings starting at our 1 dollar tier. Find links to that, Discord, our YouTube channel and more here: https://linktr.ee/roadtotarvalon

fields.title: E123 Rings of Power Episode 8
fields.description:
Rings of Power, season one is at an end and we are…relieved? Moderately satiated? Still confused on many of the plot points? All of the above and more would probably be the safe answer, but you can listen to the episode and find out.  Thanks for joining us on this detour series! Stay with us to find out where our rambles take us next.  

We have opened our weekly recordings to live text with our Patrons when we record. This is for all our patrons, starting at $1 a month, and we just uploaded new merch perks as well. Patreon link below

fields.title: E122 Uncharted: Rethinking Season 2
fields.description:
Did you really think we were going to let a teaser like that pass by without examining it fully?  No way!  And we are sure glad we did! There are a lot of things to see and appreciate, little flashes of what the series is going to give us.  I think it’s safe to say we’re excited! We hope you continue to join us as we travel all over the map trying to reach Tar Valon.
We have opened our Discord Channel to live recordings with our Patrons. This is for all our patrons, starting at $1 a month, and we just uploaded new merch perks as well. Patreon link below

fields.title: E121 House of the Dragon Epiosde 9
fields.description:
Feet stuff, wardrobe changes, and the plight of the common people, we are talking all about episode 9 of House of the Dragon, "The Green Council". All hail Rhaeneys, the Queen that never was. 

Check out our patreon page, discord community, and youtube channel here https://linktr.ee/roadtotarvalon

fields.title: E120 Rings of Power Episode 7
fields.description:
We have almost reached the end of the first season for the Rings of Power and we are...confused.  So many unanswered questions and loose threads waiting to be pulled together.  With only one episode remaining we feel there will be a waiting game to play before getting any answers. In the mean time we will continue to heap praise on our queen, Disa, discuss that all important horse, Berek, and, as usual, have a heck of a good time. 

Thanks so much for joining us! Check out our Patreon page to help fund the show, peruse our awesome Wheel of Time shop, or join the Road to Tar Valon discord server! All links found here: https://linktr.ee/roadtotarvalon

fields.title: E119 The Dragon Reborn: Wrap up!
fields.description:
And that’s the end of book three in the Wheel of Time! So much to talk about in these chapters but Traci and Amber are bringing the heat to break it all down. With that being said, this is a full spoilers episode so listen with caution!! This is going to be a long ride… so perhaps grab a snack and a frothy ale for this one.

We have opened our weekly recordings to live text with our Patrons when we record. This is for all our patrons, starting at $1 a month, and we just uploaded new merch perks as well. Patreon link below

fields.title: E118 House of the Dragon Episode 8
fields.description: What's up with Baela? Religious tyranny? Viserys makes a last stand, and we make some non book-reader predictions. Our House of the Dragon discussion continues on "The Lord of the Tides". As always, check out our Patreon page to have access to our 1$ "live recording" tier. You can find links to that, our merch shop, and our Youtube library here. https://linktr.ee/roadtotarvalon More episodes await you there

fields.title: E117 Top Ten Takeaways fom the WoT Comic Con Panel
fields.description:
Naval Battles? Will Loial's perspective on violence influence Perrin? Pot scrubbing? Is The Wheel of Time changing the face of fantasy fans? Here's our top 10 takeaways from the Comic Con panel.

Join us on Patreon! Access tp live episode recordings are only a dollar. https://linktr.ee/roadtotarvalon

fields.title: E116 Rings of Power Episode 6
fields.description: One lengthy slow clap for Berek the horse! Another fun episode where Traci tries her best to suspend disbelief, Amber is here for the horse armor, and we consider the epic blast of that volcanic eruption. As always, one of the perks to all Patreon tiers is the ability to join us every week live for a recording. Check out links to our Discord channel, shop, Patreon page here: https://linktr.ee/roadtotarvalon also while you're at it, make sure you are subscribed to our Youtube Channel. As we inch closer to season two of The Wheel of Time, you don't want to miss the content that we put out.

fields.title: E115 TDR Chpts. 48 - 51 Everyone’s Chilling in Tear
fields.description:
Our characters are all arriving in Tear and things are getting exciting! Thief Catcher Julien Sandar is introduced and is assisting Nyneave. Perrin and crew are looking for a place to stay while they are locating Rand and any other mysteries in the city. While Mat and Thom are on the docks trying to stop Comar. Things are really coming to a head in these last few chapters!

We have opened our weekly recordings to live text with our Patrons when we record. This is for all our patrons, starting at $1 a month, and we just uploaded new merch perks as well. Patreon link below

fields.title: E114 Twenty Questions with Author Jason Denzel
fields.description: From The Wheel of Time, to Dune, to his own book series, The Mystic Trilogy, who's the guy behind Dragonmount.com what type of magic systems does he write, and what type of weapon would he wield in the apocalypse.  Buy the books here: https://jasondenzel.com/

fields.title: E113 House of the Dragon Episode 7
fields.description: Discussions on child rearing, family, blood versus name. Sides have been chosen, and things get dark. No Fire and Blood spoilers here! Be sure to check out our Youtube channel, and if you would like to help make the show, join us on Patreon. All tiers are welcome to listen in on live recordings each week. https://linktr.ee/roadtotarvalon

fields.title: E112 Rings of Power Episode 5
fields.description: Comfort in tropes, writing versus design, loves & criticisms. Was this the best episode so far? Let's jump into it! We record live every week, so check out our patreon page to join us live. Tiers start at 1 dollar.  Find the link here https://linktr.ee/roadtotarvalon

fields.title: E111 The Wheel of Dragon Rings
fields.description:
Unfortunately Amber is out sick for this episode, but show editor Aydan  joins in and chats with Traci about The Wheel of Time TV Show, The House of les Dragon, and a bit of The Rings of Power. Mostly focused on the second episode of The Wheel of Time and breaking down some of the amazing scenes and characters that are making this fantastic book series come to life. With little bits and pieces of the other fantasy type shows sprinkled in to see where The Wheel of Time stands with its contemporaries.

We have opened our weekly recordings to live text with our Patrons when we record. This is for all our patrons, starting at $1 a month, and we just uploaded new merch perks as well. Patreon link below

fields.title: E110 House of the Dragon Episode 6
fields.description: Will no one rid me of this troublesome Harwin? House of the Dragon kicks off with a time jump and heats up in more ways than one. We are going to discuss all our favorite points and character moments without any Fire and Blood spoilers. Be sure to follow us on Youtube to check our catalog of Wheel of Time content and all links to support the channel can be found here: https://linktr.ee/roadtotarvalon

fields.title: E109 The Rings of Power
fields.description: We answer the call of Middle Earth with our impressions of Amazon Prime's fantasy budget buster, The Rings of Power.  This episode covers the start of the episode, up until the end of episode 4 so if you haven't watched it, get caught up with that show, and then come join us.  As always thanks for listening and check out our Youtube channel, Patreon page, and merch shop here! https://linktr.ee/roadtotarvalon All patrons can join us for live recordings.

fields.title: E108 TDR Chpts 44-47 Here and there and back again
fields.description:
Moiraine uses forbidden magic to help the crew escape from Illian, Mat’s in and out of trouble (shock) and Caemlyn before we make it through our chapters this week. We are almost at the end of the Dragon Reborn and the reunion of our main character since way back at the end of book one is just around the corner! Anyone else excited?

We have opened our weekly recordings to live text with our Patrons when we record. This is for all our patrons, starting at $1 a month, and we just uploaded new merch perks as well. Patreon link below

fields.title: E107 House of the Dragon Episode Five
fields.description:
The Detour Series has begun! We usually cover "The Wheel of Time" but we are kicking things off with a DETOUR TO WESTEROS. Join us for a recap, as we talk about all of this DRAMA! This episode is spoiler free, so feel free to jump in. No Fire and Blood spoilers here. 
As always thanks for listening and check out our Youtube channel, Patreon page, and merch shop here! https://linktr.ee/roadtotarvalon
All patrons can join us for live recordings.

fields.title: E106 TDR Chpts 40-43 Ruh-roh, Darkhounds!
fields.description:
Mat pretends he’s a hard ass, but attempts to help one of a swarm of refugees and later swings from a stable loft to defend a stranger in the dark. The encounter is illuminating and spurs Thom and Mat on their way to Caemlyn.  Perrin arrives in Illian and while the presence of wolves feels uncomfortably distant, he’s got an entirely different canine problem to occupy his mind.  Moiraine defends their party with forbidden magic against an unexpected enemy and once again the pull of the Dragon pulls them west.

We have opened our weekly recordings to live text with our Patrons when we record. This is for all our patrons, starting at $1 a month, and we just uploaded new merch perks as well. Patreon link below

fields.title: E105 TDR Chpts 36-39 Hacking, slashing, and laughing
fields.description:
Perrin’s got girl problems, from falcon to forsaken, and his nights are every bit as tumultuous as his days.  We are given glimpses into the structure and prophecies of the Aiel, Nyneave stokes her anger engine for some serious healing, and a dance is ended with a flash of Power. Each group continues its travels, apart but together and all aiming for the same destination: Tear.

We have opened our weekly recordings to live text with our Patrons when we record. This is for all our patrons, starting at $1 a month, and we just uploaded new merch perks as well. Patreon link below

fields.title: E104 Westlands 101: Liandrin Guiraile of the Red Ajah
fields.description:
Oh, Liandrin Sedai, what is there to say about her? Between the books and the show, plenty! While we agree book Liandrin has few redeemable qualities, but we were truly surprised to find her downright likeable when being portrayed by the immensely talented Kate Fleetwood.

We have opened our weekly recordings to live text with our Patrons when we record. This is for all our patrons, starting at $1 a month, and we just uploaded new merch perks as well. Patreon link below

fields.title: E103 TDR Chpts 32-35 Mounting Mandarb and Brainy Berelain
fields.description:
Mat and Thom narrowly make it onto the first ship leaving Tar Valon where Mat is assumed to be a young lord in disguise on his way to Andor; what else explains that flash of cash and farm boy wardrobe? We come back to Perrin’s POV where two of Min’s viewings are about to come to vivid life.

We have opened our weekly recordings to live text with our Patrons when we record. This is for all our patrons, starting at $1 a month, and we just uploaded new merch perks as well. Patreon link below

fields.title: E102 TDR Chpts 28-31 Arrival at the Tipping Point
fields.description:
Are you guys ready? The travels of all the young people are about to kick off, danger and intrigue riding alongside them, and we have the reemergence of one badass troubadour. This is the tipping point, where it’s time to hold onto your butts and get ready for the ride. There’s much show speculation sprinkled throughout and a mini history lesson involving spit dogs.  You’re welcome.
We have opened our weekly recordings to live text with our Patrons when we record. This is for all our patrons, starting at $1 a month, and we just uploaded new merch perks as well. Patreon link below

fields.title: E101 TDR Chpts 24-27 Warder Yard Shenanigans and Dangerous Dreams
fields.description:
We thought this would be a fun one because of Mat and his scene with the Trakand boys, not to mention our gals making their first trip to tel’aran’rhiod, but what we hadn’t prepared for was Amber’s impromptu quote creation and more scene developments for Wheel of Time the musical featuring some Be Kind Rewind stylings. It may take us forever to reach our destination, but we are having a damn good time doing it!

We have opened our weekly recordings to live text with our Patrons when we record. This is for all our patrons, starting at $1 a month, and we just uploaded new merch perks as well. Patreon link below

fields.title: E100 Rafe’s Tipsy Tweets
fields.description:
But first: thank you!!! We made it to episode 100 and we couldn’t have done it without you.  Our journey has been exceptional in so many ways and we are grateful to everyone who has joined us. For this episode we pull apart some of the questions and answers regarding WoT season two given by Rafe Judkins on Twitter recently.
We have opened our recordings to live text with our Patrons when we record. This is for all our patrons, starting at $1 a month, and we just uploaded new merch perks as well. Patreon link below

fields.title: E99 Westlands 101: The Aiel
fields.description:
We covered as much as we could, but let’s be honest the Aiel culture is as expansive as it is fascinating. Perhaps there’s a part two somewhere in the future? First half spoiler free, second half spoiler time fun time!
We have opened our recordings to live chat with our Patrons when we record. This is for all our patrons, starting at $1 a month, and we just uploaded new merch perks as well. Patreon link below

fields.title: E98 TDR Chpts 20-23: White Dresses and Rings
fields.description:
Hey everybody, it’s Lanf…we mean Selene!  Chatting up Mat while he’s sick, channeling at him when he’s skeptical. Just an all around quality gal.  Egwene is pulled into Verin’s chambers (which we would gladly live in!) and leaves with trouble and hope in her hands.  She’s whisked away to be taken to the bowels of the Tower; it is time for her to face her fears in the test to become Accepted.  It’s so hard to stop after we have wrapped our four chapters, but a halt must happen here.  Next week we have a romp through the Waste and talk about those wacky Aiel.

We have opened our recordings to live text with our Patrons when we record. This is for all our patrons, starting at $1 a month, and we just uploaded new merch perks as well. Patreon link below

fields.title: E97 TDR Chpts 16-19:The Trickster is Healed
fields.description:
Surprise, surprise, Nyneave decides to defy the Amyrlin by recruiting her own help for the hunt of the Black Ajah. Elaida shows up and is a predictable killjoy. Mat is finally healed, separated from the Shadar Logoth dagger, and already plotting his escape. We say it nearly every week, these chapters are so good! And we keep going with chapters 20-23 next week.

We have opened our recordings to live text with our Patrons when we record. This is for all our patrons, starting at $1 a month, and we just uploaded new merch perks as well. Patreon link below

fields.title: E96 TDR Chpts 12-15: The Pull of the Strings
fields.description:
The return of our “runaways” to the White Tower is not exactly what was expected.  Verin is grilled by the Amyrlin Seat, Egwene is beginning to feel like her tiny novice room is really a cell to hold her indefinitely, and a dangerous quest is set before the two young women from Emond’s Field.  Next week we cover chapters 16-19 and finally get a Mat POV! Huzzah!

We have opened our recordings to live text with our Patrons when we record. This is for all our patrons, starting at $1 a month, and we just uploaded new merch perks as well. Patreon link below

fields.title: E95 Westlands 101: All the Greals
fields.description:
Objects of power in the Wheel of Time are a bit puzzling for many reasons.  What are they? What aren’t they? What are they good for? Why are they always being turned to weapons? We take a little jaunt away from The Dragon Reborn this week to answer some of these questions and more.  Join us next week when we swerve back on course for chapters twelve through fifteen.
We have opened our recordings to live text with our Patrons when we record. This is for all our patrons, regardless of tier and we just uploaded new merch perks as well. Patreon link below

fields.title: E94 TDR Chpts 8-11: Another Wolfbrother & Runaways Returned
fields.description:
In pursuit of Rand, Moiraine, Lan, Perrin, and Loial arrive in the small town of Jarra. Surprises and nightmares follow Perrin. POV jump to Egwene and a tumultuous return to Tar Valon. The danger has just begun, children. Next week will be the next four chapters in the Dragon Reborn and it just keeps getting better from here.
We are opening our recordings to live chat with our Patrons, as we will do every week. This is for all our patrons, from our $1 tier and up. Patreon link below

fields.title: E93 TDR Chpts 4-7: The Twisted Ones Come!
fields.description:
These chapters are the kind that draw us in and reaffirm our absolute adoration for this series. We are past the ramp up period, racing through trolloc attacks and laying down threads that will be pulled together later. Just so good! Next week will be the next four chapters in the Dragon Reborn and it just keeps getting better from here.

We are opening our recordings to live chat with our Patrons, as we will do every week. This is for all our patrons, from our $1 tier and up. Patreon link below

fields.title: E92 TDR Prologue-Chpt 3: Welcome to the camp of the Dragon Reborn?
fields.description:
It’s time!!! We are beginning our foray into The Dragon Reborn and we are excited…mostly. Why, why, why begin the book with a Whitecloaks chapter?! That said, we found many things to love and laugh about, as per usual. Next week, will be the next four chapters in the Dragon Reborn and it just keeps getting better from here.

We are opening our recordings to live chat with our Patrons, as we will do every week. This is for all our patrons, from our $1 tier and up. Patreon link below

fields.title: E91 River of Souls, Bao the Wyld
fields.description:
One word: JUMARA!!! Hell, yes. It’s a Sharan focused, Bao the Wyld backstory, prophecies and a glint of humanity. Spoiler free Shara info in the beginning, book discussion and big big spoilers at the end. We are opening our recordings to live chat with our Patrons, as we will do every week. This is for all our patrons, from our $1 tier and up. Patreon link below ☺️ Nexr week: the time has arrived! The Dragon Reborn will be the map for this part of the journey.
Thank you, thank you for joining us!  Merch is listed on our Cozy Contorta website found on our linktree.  If you appreciate our content, you can contribute to Road to Tar Valon listener support:  https://anchor.fm/roadtotarvalon/support
Our website: https://roadtotarvalon.weebly.com/
Our Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/roadtotarvalon?fan_landing=true

fields.title: E90 Uncharted: Meandering and Musings
fields.description: We began with our favorite “Hell yeah!” moments, moved along to some of our thoughts on gender and class in the series, and wondered aloud about the many magic systems shown in the Wheel of Time. Spoilers and speculation abound! Next week: River of Souls

fields.title: E89 Wanderlust With Friends!
fields.description:
Uncharted and live chat with our lovely discord community! Flashback focused, we chat over what background moments we want to see on the screen.

We opened this one up to everyone; future episodes will be for all our patrons, from our $1 tier and up. Patreon link below ☺️

Thank you, thank you for joining us!  Merch is listed on our Cozy Contorta website found on our linktree.  If you appreciate our content, you can contribute to Road to Tar Valon listener support:  https://anchor.fm/roadtotarvalon/support

Our website: https://roadtotarvalon.weebly.com/

Our Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/roadtotarvalon?fan_landing=true

fields.title: E88 Uncharted…again!
fields.description:
We are feeling emboldened to just step up to the mic with a couple ideas and see where they take us. One topic tends to direct us each time and this week we traversed some of the unpopular opinions associated with the Wheel of Time.  Is it unpopular?  Is it earned?  Would it be different if the series was written now? We can’t say conclusively, but we happily speculate away in this full spoiler episode.

Thank you, thank you for joining us!  Merch is listed on our Cozy Contorta website found on our linktree.  If you appreciate our content, you can contribute to Road to Tar Valon listener support:  https://anchor.fm/roadtotarvalon/support

Our website: https://roadtotarvalon.weebly.com/

Our Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/roadtotarvalon?fan_landing=true

fields.title: E87 Westlands 101: Tear
fields.description:
Tear the nation, Tear the city, the Stone of Tear, Tear and its flaming nobles.  It’s another 101 with information about one of the great cities of the Westlands with one of the most questionable reputations.  Split into spoiler free front half and all things spoiler related after the break.

Thank you, thank you for joining us!  Our new shop with Wheel of Time merch can be found here: https://cozy-contorta-creations.myshopify.com/ There are also links and merch for the other projects we are currently developing.  Go look it over and let us know what you think.

Don’t forget we post bi-weekly content on youtube as well.

Road to Tar Valon listener support https://anchor.fm/roadtotarvalon/support

Our website: https://roadtotarvalon.weebly.com/

Our Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/roadtotarvalon?fan_landing=true

fields.title: E86 Road to Tar Valon IN PERSON!!! Full Spoilers
fields.description:
Eighty six episodes later and we are actually recording in the same room, the same time zone, breathing the same air! Don’t mind our excitement.  All this happy energy tumbled out in a full spoiler conversation ranging from our love of the creepy crawlies that live in the Blight to our desire for Talmanes to be played by dreamy Wes Chatham, and discussing the parallels between Egwene and Rand.

Next week, back to the 101s with the nation of Tear and our regular spoiler free front half and full spoilers in the second half.

Thank you, thank you for joining us!  Our new shop with Wheel of Time merch can be found here: https://cozy-contorta-creations.myshopify.com/ There are also links and merch for the other projects we are currently developing.  Go look it over and let us know what you think.

Don’t forget we post bi-weekly content on youtube as well.

Road to Tar Valon listener support https://anchor.fm/roadtotarvalon/support

Our website: https://roadtotarvalon.weebly.com/

Our Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/roadtotarvalon?fan_landing=true

fields.title: E85 Road to Tar Valon: Uncharted
fields.description:
Uncharted, but totally in sync.  If you ever wanted a full peek into where our imaginations take us, this is the episode for you.  We thought we would end up being all over the map with this one and instead it became a feast of ideas on cold open ideas for season two of the show.  We still don’t know why Amazon hasn’t hired us yet…

Thank you, thank you for joining us!  Our new shop with Wheel of Time merch can be found here: https://cozy-contorta-creations.myshopify.com/ There are also links and merch for the other projects we are currently developing.  Go look it over and let us know what you think.

Don’t forget we post bi-weekly content on youtube as well.

Road to Tar Valon listener support https://anchor.fm/roadtotarvalon/support

Our website: https://roadtotarvalon.weebly.com/

Our Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/roadtotarvalon?fan_landing=true

fields.title: E84 Westlands 101: The Borderlands - Protectors Against the Blight
fields.description:
Arafel, Kandor, Saldaea, and Shienar; the nations that protect the southern nations of the Westlands from all the crazy dangerous creatures waiting to descend from the Blight.  This week we cover them all.  First half spoiler free, second half spoilers.
Thank you, thank you for joining us!  Our new shop with Wheel of Time merch can be found here: https://cozy-contorta-creations.myshopify.com/ There are also links and merch for the other projects we are currently developing.  Go look it over and let us know what you think.
Don’t forget we post bi-weekly content on youtube as well.
Road to Tar Valon listener support https://anchor.fm/roadtotarvalon/support
Our website: https://roadtotarvalon.weebly.com/
Our Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/roadtotarvalon?fan_landing=true

fields.title: E83 Westlands 101: The Ogier - Glory to the builders, indeed!
fields.description: First, show news?! Then we are back to the 101s! There’s so much to know about the Ogier that doesn’t come up in the books.  What’s their social structure, are they peaceful or violent, where the heck do they come from?  We answer all these questions and more in a primarily spoiler free episode.  Enjoy, friends!  The Westlands 101-athon is moving forward with the Borderlands next week.  So excited! Thank you, thank you for joining us!  Our new shop with Wheel of Time merch can be found here: https://cozy-contorta-creations.myshopify.com/ There are also links and merch for the other projects we are currently developing.  Go look it over and let us know what you think. Don’t forget we post bi-weekly content on youtube as well. Road to Tar Valon listener support https://anchor.fm/roadtotarvalon/support Our website: https://roadtotarvalon.weebly.com/ Our Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/roadtotarvalon?fan_landing=true

fields.title: E82 It’s the Great Grunt Wrap-Up
fields.description:
And that’s our third book down! We take a quick wrap up on the book for the first half hour and the rest is a spoiler full discussion on what we loved and didn’t love in The Great Hunt.  We are taking a short break from the books to do something we love: Westlands 101s, baby! Next week we are looking into one of our favorite non-human groups in The Wheel of Time, the Ogier.

Thank you, thank you for joining us!  Our new shop with Wheel of Time merch can be found here: https://cozy-contorta-creations.myshopify.com/ There are also links and merch for the other projects we are currently developing.  Go look it over and let us know what you think.

Don’t forget we post bi-weekly content on youtube as well.

Road to Tar Valon listener support https://anchor.fm/roadtotarvalon/support

Our website: https://roadtotarvalon.weebly.com/

Our Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/roadtotarvalon?fan_landing=true

fields.title: E81 Macho Lan Randy Savage TGH Chpts 45-48
fields.description:
