Traci and Amber chit-chat about the 1990s and the Wheel of Time.  We don’t know how we got there either, but it sure was fun.  Join us as we wrap up the most exciting chapters of the book.  Next week, end of The Great Hunt and a wrap up conversation.  Fun for everyone!

Thank you, thank you for joining us!  Our new shop with Wheel of Time merch can be found here: https://cozy-contorta-creations.myshopify.com/ There are links and merch for the other projects we are currently developing.  Go look it over and let us know what you think.

Don’t forget we post weekly content on youtube as well.

Road to Tar Valon listener support https://anchor.fm/roadtotarvalon/support

https://roadtotarvalon.weebly.com/

https://www.patreon.com/roadtotarvalon?fan_landing=true

fields.title: E80 TGH 41-44
fields.description:
The Wheel of Time turns, Min has visions, Min wears pants, Min loves Rand and men love Min! Egwene is captive (again) and we explore Falme. The Great Hunt is coming to an end and we will see you next week! 
https://roadtotarvalon.weebly.com/
Read other series with us here!

fields.title: E79 Peep holes and plot holes TGH Chpts 37-40
fields.description:
The flicker of what could be haunts one group of characters while our gals in the White Tower receive an unexpected offer to help people they care about from someone they don’t know if they can trust.  All paths lead to one place as we near the end of book two.
Thank you, thank you for joining us!   Next week we wrap up The Great Hunt! And don’t forget we post weekly content on youtube as well.
Road to Tar Valon listener support https://anchor.fm/roadtotarvalon/support
https://roadtotarvalon.weebly.com/
https://www.patreon.com/roadtotarvalon?fan_landing=true
https://roadtotarvalon.threadless.com/

fields.title: E78 Westlands 101: Atha'an Miere
fields.description:
This week we DIVE into one of the most secretive and lesser known cultures in the Wheel of Time world. We've got lore, theories, the people of Tremalking, and question... what REALLY happend on that infamous wedding night between one of our favorite Wheel of Time couples??? https://roadtotarvalon.weebly.com/

Also, if you are a sci-fi fan, be sure to join THERE IS NO BOOKCLUB! We have a lovely group of people getting together to read Leviathan Wakes, the first book of The Expanse series. Hop over to our Discord Channel and join the chat. https://thereisnobookclub.weebly.com/

fields.title: E77 Thom Wick, TGH 33-36
fields.description:
Heartbreak, revenge, Thom is on a mission and ready to watch the world burn. Bayle is back, the Seanchan aren't here to play, and Padan Fain is up to some tricks. These chapters are full of new characters, excitment, and beautiful Stedding settings. 


Become a patron and help us create the show: https://www.patreon.com/roadtotarvalon?fan_landing=true

fields.title: E76 TGH Shadowkiller and Deceptive Daes dae’mar, Ch. 29-32
fields.description:
Whitecloaks in disguise along the coast of Almoth Plain, Seanchan taking a hold of the West Coast, and Rand receives invitations that even he thinks twice before burning.  We get a chance to play with the bigwigs (literally) of Cairhien as items taken are sought to save Mat and the Westlands.
Thank you, thank you for joining us!   Next week is more Great Hunt fun and don’t forget we have content on youtube as well.
https://roadtotarvalon.weebly.com/
https://www.patreon.com/roadtotarvalon?fan_landing=true
https://roadtotarvalon.threadless.com/

fields.title: E75 TGH Parfum de Séléné, Ch. 25 - 28
fields.description:
We arrive in Cairhien where Rand’s head is set aspin by his quick entry into the Game of Houses and the perfume of an unexpected companion returned.  We rejoin with Perrin, Mat, Verin Sedai, and the Shienarans when a one eyed man sights a one man army.
Thank you, thank you for joining us!   Next week is more Great Hunt fun and don’t forget we have content on youtube as well.
https://roadtotarvalon.weebly.com/
https://www.patreon.com/roadtotarvalon?fan_landing=true
https://roadtotarvalon.threadless.com/

fields.title: E74 Westlands 101: Cairhien
fields.description:
Is there a place in the Westlands filled with more schemers and square shaped architecture than Cairhien? We think not.  Our first 101 of 2022 and we are thrilled to be joined once again by our friend Zak from Two and a Mic Podcast.

Thank you, thank you for joining us!   Next week is more Great Hunt fun and don’t forget we have content on youtube as well.

https://roadtotarvalon.weebly.com/

https://www.patreon.com/roadtotarvalon?fan_landing=true

https://roadtotarvalon.threadless.com/

fields.title: E73 TGH, Let the intrigue begin! Ch. 21 - 24
fields.description:
We are IN IT now! Small correction, the sisters who are sisters are of the Brown & Green ajah. Cairhien, the birthplace of daes dae'mar, is given a more proper introduction, and we are given a taste of what we may expect as our journey takes Rand and the Horn of Valere toward the capital. Nyneave faces her fears in the White Tower, while Egwene, gets thrown for a loop when she meets not one, but two young women in the Tower wanting to know how Rand's doing.   
Thank you, thank you for joining us!   Next week we will be doing our first Westlands 101 of 2022! We will be going through the history, people, and politics of Cairhien.  We also have  content on youtube as well in the event you need even more WoT RtTV in your life.
https://roadtotarvalon.weebly.com/
https://www.patreon.com/roadtotarvalon?fan_landing=true
https://roadtotarvalon.threadless.com/

fields.title: E72 TGH, Season 2 Speculation, Ch.17-20
fields.description:
We get our first visuals of The White Tower, and the outskirts of Cairhien. The map gets bigger as our Emond's Fielders have some exciting encounters with strangers. These chapters mimic where Amazon left us in season one; naturally we must speculate how they maneuver our beloved characters in Season 2.
Thank you, thank you for joining us!   Next week is more Great Hunt fun and don’t forget we have content on youtube as well.
https://roadtotarvalon.weebly.com/
https://www.patreon.com/roadtotarvalon?fan_landing=true
https://roadtotarvalon.threadless.com/

fields.title: E71 TGH Selene, Grolm, & Portal Stones, Ch.13-16
fields.description:
As we take up the hunt again, our gang is splintered even further.  Rand wakes up in a dismal mirror world with Hurin and Loial and the only way to return to their world requires a step Rand wishes to never take again.  Perrin and the wolves take the lead for Ingtar’s lance of Shienarans.  Both groups are joined for one purpose: find the Horn.  Oh, and save Mat too.
Thank you, thank you for joining us!   Next week is more Great Hunt fun and don’t forget we have content on youtube as well.
https://roadtotarvalon.weebly.com/
https://www.patreon.com/roadtotarvalon?fan_landing=true
https://roadtotarvalon.threadless.com/

fields.title: E70 The Decompression Session: Episode Eight of the WoT Series
fields.description:
Heavy Book Spoilers this episode. It doesn’t seem possible that the first season of Wheel of Time is already over.  What a month it was for us! We took just a teeny breather before recording our feelings regarding the last episode, the full season, and our hopes for season two, and here they are for you.  

While the season has ended we still have plans for plenty of content.  The Great Hunt begins again next week, we have a staggering list of 101 topics we want to get to, and we are working to line up more guests to join us for future recordings.
Thank you, thank you for joining us!
https://roadtotarvalon.weebly.com/
https://www.patreon.com/roadtotarvalon?fan_landing=true
https://roadtotarvalon.threadless.com/

fields.title: E69 Finally, Fal Dara! Episode 7 of the WoT Series
fields.description:
For these two Borderland fan girls arriving in Fal Dara has been a long awaited experience. It probably won’t surprise you to know, we have our opinions about it.  Please join us for this lightly spoilery discussion about episode seven and our speculation of what may be in store for us in the season finale.
Thank you, thank you for joining us!
https://roadtotarvalon.weebly.com/
https://www.patreon.com/roadtotarvalon?fan_landing=true
https://roadtotarvalon.threadless.com/

fields.title: E68 Tattoo Meanings & the Gift that isn't a Gift? Episode 6 is HERE!!!!
fields.description: VERY LIGHT SPOILER WARNING! The SS Siuanraine ship has sailed! ALL ABOARD! This week we talk about a few moments that left us confused. We decipher Siuan's tattoo meanings, and we celebrate another epic episode! Images to Siuan's Tattoos can be found here.

fields.title: E67 Liandrin Love: Episode Five of the WoT Series
fields.description:
Super spoilery speculation and much alliteration await you in this episode. For reals,though, there do be spoilers here! My aged grandmother...something.  Anyway, if you don’t mind spoilers or you’ve read all the books, please join us for our reaction to episode five of the Wheel of Time TV series, along with some of the things we are missing and hoping for in the last three episodes of this first season.
As always, we thank you for joining us!
https://roadtotarvalon.weebly.com/
https://www.patreon.com/roadtotarvalon?fan_landing=true
https://roadtotarvalon.threadless.com/

fields.title: E66 Heart Eyes for Nyneave! Episode Four WoT TV
fields.description:
First off, not a spoiler free episode.  Sorry to anyone who is new, but think of this as your chance to get started on the books for yourself!  Here we are, the halfway mark of the season, and whoa.  Goosebumps.  Episode four of the Wheel of Time series gives the Jordan slow burn payoff that we would expect from this series.  Join us and please feel free to join us for the conversations forming around this amazing new show and deeply beloved series.

You can find an extension of this reaction as we watch the episode together on YouTube.  Our channel can be found on our website listed below.

All social media, Discord, Patreon, and Threadless links can be found on our (NEW and beautiful) website -

https://roadtotarvalon.weebly.com/

fields.title: E65 It’s here! Second thoughts on the WoT Show
fields.description:
First off, not a spoiler free episode.  Sorry to anyone who is new, but think of this as your chance to get started on the books for yourself! Amber and Traci, spanned their six hour time difference to sit down and watch the very first episodes together, not wrapping up recording until shortly past 5:00 am for Amber.  We realized, that like the books, there is always something that was missed the first time around and, huge surprise, we decided we needed to talk about it.  Again.  Some more.  Forever. Join us and please feel free to join us for the conversations forming around this amazing new show and deeply beloved series.

We say second thoughts because we already released two videos on our YouTube Channel.  You can find our channel through our website listed below.

All social media, Discord, Patreon, and Threadless links can be found on our (NEW and beautiful) website - https://roadtotarvalon.weebly.com/

fields.title: E64 Will I Like the Wheel of Time Books?
fields.description:
Also known as Amber and Traci can’t stop talking about New Spring.  After watching the Wheel of Time tv series official trailer we have even more love for the petite, yet mighty, prequel to the series.  But this episode is about why we think other people would find the series enjoyable, why we keep coming back to it over and over again, how we have been talking about it together for over a year and it still gets us in the feels every time.  We know it’s a big investment of time and emotional energy, but it is so very worth it.

Spoiler free and big patron thank you in the first half, and spoiler splurge time in the second half along with answers to some of the questions that came to us from our Discord server through a recent AMA.  Thank you to everyone that listens to and supports us in all the ways possible!  We feel truly fortunate.

All social media, Patreon, and Threadless links can be found on our website:

Road to Tar Valon

fields.title: E63 WoT Official Trailer Reaction and Breakdown
fields.description:
We shall label this episode “spoiler light.”  The official WoT trailer from Amazon Prime was all we could ask for and so much more!  We already released the video reaction last week, but the audio is more in depth in some places, and we are more descriptive of the images we are seeing.  If you have seen the video, you may still want to listen, if you haven’t you can check it out on our YouTube channel.

As always, THANK YOU for joining us!  The show is a little over two weeks away and it’s impossible to keep our excitement at bay.  We hope you will continue to join us on this new WoT journey!

https://roadtotarvalonawheeloftimepodcast.wordpress.com/

fields.title: E62 A Spooky Season Tribute: Bubbles of EVIL! *Full Spoilers*
fields.description:
E62 A Spooky Season Tribute: Bubbles of EVIL! *Full Spoilers*

There was no way we were going to let this time of year pass us by and NOT use our super fun spooky season intro again.  This year we decided on bubbles of evil, and to get the full effect we had to go bring in the entire series.  If you are not all the way through the books, this episode will either spoil you or make no sense.  Either way, your choice, as always.


For those of you listening in today, it’s all about the putrescence that is seeping loose into the Wheel of Time world as the Seals to the Dark One’s Prison become ever more fragile.  What forms of nightmare do they take, and are they really as scary as Jordan intended them to be?  It’s always a laughing matter on the Road to Tar Valon.


We sincerely thank each and every one of you for listening.  For more about us, as well as links to our social media accounts, Patreon page, and Threadless shop, follow this link to our website.  And, we have been steadily launching videos on YouTube, like with our faces and stuff, so you may want to check that out and please subscribe, here.

fields.title: E60 TGH Chpts 9-12: The Last Embrace of the Mother
fields.description:
The true hunt for the Horn of Valere begins and the searchers depart from Fal Dara following an assasination attempt on the Amyrlin.  Urgency drives them to follow the Darkfriends and Shadowspawn carrying away Mat’s dagger and the Horn, leaving behind them a trail of “murder and worse.”  Bayle Domon is being pulled into a plot he never thought would touch him and he races towards Toman Head in the hopes of escaping his pursuers. Egwene and Nyneave set out along the road to Tar Valon, with lessons in the Power along the route.  Egwene is a rosebud opening to the soft light of saidar, while Nyneave’s thorny side shows up in the form of fire.

First half is spoiler free, second half - full spoilers through the entire series.

Find our social media pages, Patreon information, and Threadless shop here: https://roadtotarvalonawheeloftimepodcast.wordpress.com

As always, thanks for joining and supporting us!!

fields.title: E59 TGH Chpts 5-8: Treason, Trollocs, and Tears
fields.description:
Moiraine and Siuan know they are treading a treacherous path that could see them both stilled, Fal Dara keep comes under attack by the Shadow, and the Emond’s Fielders find themselves moving in directions they never could have imagined when they left home.

First half is spoiler free, second half - full spoilers through the entire series.

Find our social media pages, Patreon information, and Threadless shop here: https://roadtotarvalonawheeloftimepodcast.wordpress.com

As always, thanks for joining us!!

fields.title: E58 Gender, misogyny, and divide in the Wheel of Time *Full Spoilers*
fields.description:
After a little over a year of recording we decided it was time.  The presentation of men and women given to us by Robert Jordan in the Wheel of Time is worthy of being addressed.  Gender and the way we perceive it in Western society is experiencing a much needed awakening to a more nuanced world.  Speaking about our experiences has value, connecting it to the Wheel of Time and seeing the world through that lense gives a wider perspective on how the world is and how others may imagine it.

We were thrilled to be joined in this conversation by Zak from Two and a Mic podcast.  He’s a long time Wheel of Time fan as well as an avid promoter of civil discourse and gender equality.   Check out his brilliant conversations here.

This is a FULL SPOILER episode and the conversation ranges over the full series.  Thanks for joining us! 

Find our social media pages, Patreon information, and Threadless shop here: https://roadtotarvalonawheeloftimepodcast.wordpress.com

fields.title: E57 TGH Chpts 1-4 Fanfare in Fal Dara
fields.description:
We may be excited that we are resuming our journey in the Borderlands, but Rand is definitely feeling like he should have been long gone by now.  The Amyrlin comes to Fal Dara, Egwene is sneaking visits with Padan Fain, Rand makes unwise decisions  (surprise, surprise…), and we get a moment inside Moiraine’s head as she attempts to determine what drew the Flame of Tar Valon to Shienar.

Our regular format is in place for this episode; spoiler free first half, full spoilers second half.

Find our social media pages, Patreon information, and Threadless shop here: https://roadtotarvalonawheeloftimepodcast.wordpress.com

fields.title: E56 TGH Shadowpal Party, The Prologue
fields.description:
Yes, friends, it is indeed time for us to move along on this journey and begin our foray into the Great Hunt.  This book feels different, darker, more nuanced than Eye of the World.  It is safe to say, we’re not in the Two Rivers anymore and any thought of an idyllic existence has faded in the presence of the encroaching Shadow.

First half, spoiler free, second half...all the spoilers.

Find our social media pages, Patreon information, and Threadless shop here: https://roadtotarvalonawheeloftimepodcast.wordpress.com

We are always so grateful to have you joining us as we continue along the Road to Tar Valon.

fields.title: E55 Aes Sedai Fashion; Vogue Through History
fields.description:
Amazon Prime's The Wheel of Time pulls out interesting new takes on fashion rooted in our past. This week we tip our hats to the Brown Ajah with an extra dose of research and encourage you to join us as we examine Aes Sedai costumes; vogue through history.
We are a bit heavy on the spoiler free section this week, but we did leave spoilers at the end for all those who want to join us for fun speculations through the series.
Next week - The Great Hunt.  Just the Prologue.
Find our social media pages, Patreon information, and Threadless shop here: https://roadtotarvalonawheeloftimepodcast.wordpress.com

fields.title: E54 Off-screen dreams DO come true! Trailer live reaction!
fields.description: Heads up, FULL SPOILER episode!  There were just too many ideas floating around in our reaction to the new Amazon Wheel of Time teaser trailer for us to keep spoilers from seeping into the conversation.  We know you’ve watched it already, and if you’re like us, you have maybe lost track of how many times you have rewatched it.  This was such a fun experience!  We had several of our listeners join us for the live chat we hosted on our Discord server, adding to the conversation in the best way possible. Find our social media pages, Patreon information, and Threadless shop here: https://roadtotarvalonawheeloftimepodcast.wordpress.com

fields.title: E53 Westlands 101 Warders: Walking Death
fields.description:
E 1  Westlands 101  Warders: Walking Death

Warders are nearly as mysterious and feared as the Aes Sedai they are bonded to, and with good reason.  In this episode we ask some crucial questions: what does a Warder get out of being bonded, how do Aes Sedai and Warders handle the trauma of a broken bond, and will Amber’s idea for fan-cloth fashion cuts take off?

First half of the show is spoiler free, second half is where the spoilers come out to play. Thanks for joining us!

Short term stopgap to stave off the emotional trauma of a broken bond.

Find our social media pages, Patreon information, and Threadless shop here: https://roadtotarvalonawheeloftimepodcast.wordpress.com

fields.title: E 52 WoT on Prime, let’s party! The Birthday Episode *FULL SPOILERS*
fields.description:
Death masks in trolloc cookpots, declarations against being avocados, and curiosity over whether or not the Greens can truly claim the title of BATTLE Ajah are just a few of the things you will find in this episode along with a ton of spoilers, so if you are not all the way through the series, you may want to skip this one for now. The passing of year in podcast land is no small feat and we celebrated with our friends in a raucous live chat, veering away from our the books for a moment to focus more on the upcoming TV series and took questions for our first AMA.

Thank you to everyone for being with us through this year! We couldn’t do this without you, our friends and travel companions.

Find our social media pages, Discord, Patreon information, and Threadless shop here: https://roadtotarvalonawheeloftimepodcast.wordpress.com

fields.title: E 51 Westlands 101: The Gift (The Ways)
fields.description:
The Gift, also known as The Ways, was a sincere form of gratitude from male Aes Sedai who had been invited by the Ogier to shelter in Steddings during the Time of Madness and the Breaking of the World.  While the idea of fast travel for the Ogier who are attached to their Steddings was indeed a marvelous gift, centuries later it would become a place banned to all travelers, a death trap to those who attempted to use them anyway.  This may be one of our nerdiest episodes yet, and a new surprising favorite.  We hope you enjoy this episode as much as we did!
First half of the show is spoiler free, second half is where the spoilers come out to play. Thanks for joining us!
Find our social media pages, Patreon information, and Threadless shop here: https://roadtotarvalonawheeloftimepodcast.wordpress.com

fields.title: E 50 Westlands 101: Egwene al’Vere
fields.description:
The first of our Emond’s Field Five coverage and yes, it was nerve wracking, and yes, we still had a lot of fun as well as some surprising moments spun off from those famous two words “What if…?”
First half of the show is spoiler free, second half is where the spoilers come out to play. Thanks for joining us!
Find our social media pages, Patreon information, and Threadless shop here: https://roadtotarvalonawheeloftimepodcast.wordpress.com

fields.title: E 49 Westlands 101: The Watcher of the Seals, The Flame of Tar Valon, The Amyrlin Seat…
fields.description:
She comes, she comes!  It’s another Westlands 101, friends, and this time we went straight for the top with the Amyrlin Seat of the White Tower.
First half of the show is spoiler free, second half is where the spoilers come out to play. Thanks for joining us!
Find our social media pages, Patreon information, and Threadless shop here: https://roadtotarvalonawheeloftimepodcast.wordpress.com

fields.title: E 48 Westlands 101: The Horn of Valere
fields.description:
This mythical artifact has been the catalyst for legend upon legend in the Wheel of Time series, shared by gleemen across the Westlands, but is it a legend based on fact or fantasy?  Not much is known of its origins so we were forced to wildly speculate in some areas.  More speculation is always welcome!

First half of the show is spoiler free, second half is where the spoilers come out to play. Thanks for joining us!

Find our social media pages, Patreon information, and Threadless shop here: https://roadtotarvalonawheeloftimepodcast.wordpress.com

fields.title: E 47 EotW Recap Chpts 51 - 53: This is the baby step...Wrapping up WoT Book One!
fields.description:
After reading the full 750 pages of the Eye of the World we know one thing for certain; these were just baby steps into Robert Jordan’s expansive tale.  We're looking forward to toddling our way into The Great Hunt as soon as we quench our thirst for creating new 101 episodes.  This episode the first half is spoiler free and in the second half, expect theories and spoilers.  As always, thanks for joining us!

Find our social media pages, Patreon information, and Threadless shop here: https://roadtotarvalonawheeloftimepodcast.wordpress.com

fields.title: E 46 Westlands 101: The Age of Legends and its Sci-fi Roots with special guests Malkier Talks and Call Me Nakomi!
fields.description:
Robert Jordan cleverly left hints of a more technologically advanced society that existed before  the one we find in the series, making items that are science based seem like magic.  We pull apart some of the places where sci-fi meets fantasy in the Wheel of Time with our good friends Rob from Malkier Talks and Felicia from Call Me Nakomi.  This episode the first half is spoiler free and all the spoilers we could think of in the second half.  As always, thanks for joining us!

Find our social media pages, Patreon information, and Threadless shop here: https://roadtotarvalonawheeloftimepodcast.wordpress.com

fields.title: E 45 EotW Recap Chpts 47 - 50: The Borderlands, The Blight, and Broken Hearts
fields.description:
The news Moiraine extracts from Padan Fain makes a rapid departure to the Eye of the World an imperative; Moiraine fears she may already be too late.  These chapters take us to the most dangerous location known to humankind, but our small group rides with hope.  Our general format applies: the first half is spoiler free and in the second half, spoilers.  As always, thanks for joining us! 

  • Find our social media pages, Patreon information, and Threadless shop here: https://roadtotarvalonawheeloftimepodcast.wordpress.com

fields.title: E 44 EotW Recap Chpts 43 - 46: Glory to the Builders!
fields.description:
Loial left us hanging last time when he declared that stepping into The Ways would mean death for them all and now it’s time to find out what he meant. No history lesson is going to stop Moiraine from shepherding this crew along the most dangerous path they have faced yet.  What perils will they face in The Ways and is their haste leading them to a trap that may darken the world forever?

Possible set design for the gateways! 

As usual, the first half is spoiler free and the second half is more theories that lean on spoilers in the later series.

In case you missed it; we have a Patreon page!  Amber cleverly came up with a travel themed set of tiers ranging from $3 to $25 a month.  You can help fund the growth of this podcast and in return, we will make sure you have access to things like our ridiculous outtakes, video clips, VIP status, and merch not available on our Threadless shop.

Speaking of Threadless...We have a shop where you can find Wheel of Time inspired designs on t-shirts, coffee mugs, phone cases, stickers, buttons, and MORE.  Seriously.  You need to go look.  It’s so cool.  There are new designs uploaded on the regular, as well as sales and specials that we will share with you on our social media pages.

https://roadtotarvalon.threadless.com/

We are really pleased with our beautiful website and would love for you to go check it out, even if it has one of the most needlessly long web addresses ever but we’re working on it. https://roadtotarvalonawheeloftimepodcast.wordpress.com

Thank you for joining us!  Contact us if you feel inspired to do so, at any of the links below.

Email: roadtotarvalon@gmail.com

Amber Twitter: @RoadtoTarValon

Traci Twitter: @MistressLaras

Instagram: roadtotarvalon an

If you haven’t done so already, come join us on Discord!   There’s food and things that grow, including animals and plants, sometimes we chat WoT.  The link is pinned to Amber’s Twitter page.

fields.title: E 43 EotW Recap Chpts 39 - 42: Foretellings and Fortuitous Arrivals
fields.description:
Rand is carried through Caemlyn by the crowds to see the false Dragon, Logain, while Mat remains huddled in their room, rarely leaving and his trust dwindles by the day.  Strange circumstances force Rand to choose a precarious seat to watch the procession and ends with him running back to the Queen’s Blessing with a story he can hardly believe himself.  Enemies threaten the inn, but stout hearts stand unified against the demands of swaggering Whitecloaks and would be cat-nappers.  A ray of happiness and hope is short lived by the revelation of an unknown and urgent need.

For anyone looking for extra info on the history of the Forsaken, we have two spoiler free episodes for you to check out: The Forsaken Part 1/The Forsaken Part 2

As usual, the first half is spoiler free and the second half is more theories that lean on spoilers in the later series.

In case you missed it; we have a Patreon page!  Amber cleverly came up with a travel themed set of tiers ranging from $3 to $25 a month.  You can help fund the growth of this podcast and in return, we will make sure you have access to things like our ridiculous outtakes, video clips, VIP status, and merch not available on our Threadless shop.

Speaking of Threadless...We have a shop where you can find Wheel of Time inspired designs on t-shirts, coffee mugs, phone cases, stickers, buttons, and MORE.  Seriously.  You need to go look.  It’s so cool.  There are new designs uploaded on the regular, as well as sales and specials that we will share with you on our social media pages.

fields.title: E 42 EotW Recap Chpts 35 - 38 Caemlyn and Shadows of Death
fields.description:
Mat and Rand have reached Caemlyn and have been able to find refuge of sorts at the Queen’s Blessing with Thom’s friend, Master Basel Gill.  Rand faces hopelessness in Mat’s furthering withdrawal into himself, but has it rekindled through the help of a new and unusual friend.  Moiraine has led Lan and Nyneave to the place of rescue while shadows of death swarm about them and the question is, are they there to harm or help?
As usual, the first half is spoiler free and the second half is more theories that lean on spoilers in the later series.  For those who make it to the spoiler section, Traci’s new puppy Eleanor made a jangly first time appearance when she settled in for a nap during recording.  Our apologies for the noise disruption, but not for our love of all things pet related.
This is the link to the article with the images we discussed in the spoiler section about the Production Designer for WoT on Prime, Ondrej Nekvasil, and how much we are looking forward to seeing everything finished. https://www.vice.com/en/article/mgpvba/we-talked-to-snowpiercers-production-designer-about-building-a-world-inside-a-train

fields.title: E 41 Westlands 101: Thom Merrilin, Gleeman of Mystery and Owner of Badass Blades
fields.description:
SPOILER WARNING: In order to avoid any spoilers regarding our favorite gleeman, you should have read up to Chapter 26 in Eye of the World.
Did you really think now that we are past Whitebridge we wouldn’t have a few words to say about our beloved Thom?  We dig into what it meant to be a gleeman in the Westlands and why Thom was so exceptional.
As usual, the first half is spoiler free and the second half is more theories that lean on spoilers in the later series.
The music at the beginning of the spoiler section was a fun little exercise in inspiration and the power of community.  Thanks so much to James for giving us proper Thom tribute music.  More of James content can be found on his YouTube page https://youtube.com/channel/UCugWDodqLjHkzr8WpBEyY7g. fields.title: E 4o EotW Recap Chpts 31 -34 Mat’s just a teenage dirtbag, baby...or is he?
fields.description:
Rand and Mat are on the run, on their own, and there is literally danger waiting to pounce from every direction.  Sleep deprivation and paranoia take hold, but Rand is determined to hold on to the hope that the others are still alive...maybe even Thom.  On the road this week Rand squirms under the attention of a Miss Else Grinwell, Mat angry juggles, the boys are saved by lightning, and the layer of their innocence has begun to erode like a sand castle in rain.  There are moments of hope and a heartwarming depth of friendship displayed between the two young men as they take care of each other in these dire moments.

As usual, the first half is spoiler free and the second half is more theories that lean on spoilers in the later series.

fields.title: E 39 EotW Recap Chpts 27 - 30: The Tinkers, Theology, and Tears
fields.description:
We laugh AND cry in this episode.  This is a Road to Tar Valon first and it happens in the spoiler free section.  These four chapters feel particularly pivotal to the direction our main characters are taking, the choices they are facing, the decisions that are made for them. There is hope, always, but chapter 30 ends with a death and a death sentence.  We have questions. It gets deep.  But never fear, there’s plenty of humor and appreciation for our intrepid crew to be found!
As usual, the first half is spoiler free and the second half is more theories that lean on spoilers in the later series. ***A small correction, from the spoilers section, Robert Jordan served in the Vietnam War, Not Korean War. Thanks for being understanding! fields.title: E 38 EotW Recap Chpts 23 - 26: Wolves, Wonders, and Whitebridge
fields.description:
Egwene and Perrin gain some unusual traveling companions while Rand, Mat, and Thom survive their journey down the Arinelle (mutiny free, right Thom?) to arrive in Whitebridge where a familiar threat to their party has been waiting for them.  Our adventure is branching out along paths unknown, and a further loss to the group, increases their vulnerabilities while depleting their resources.  We do our best to not make this too heavy, but let’s face it, some of this stuff is dark, and real, and frequently hits way too close to home.  That said, we approach most everything in our lives with a sense of humor so that will always be where we land.

As usual, the first half is spoiler free and the second half is more theories that lean on spoilers in the later series.

fields.title: E 37 EotW Recap Chpts 19 - 22: Mordeth = Figure Skater Vibes
fields.description:
We are a wee bit heavy on the spoiler free front “half” of our episode this week, and we are not sorry for it.  There was just so much to digest from these four chapters as our group is split up and we begin to see the story from more than just Rand’s point of view.  Perhaps there is a lull in the danger at this point, but we all know never to trust a momentary sense of safety.  As usual, we are spoiler free before the break with spoilers and theories to follow after.

fields.title: E 36 Westlands 101: Sentient Creature Feature
fields.description:
That’s right!  It’s 101 time!  Hopefully you are as excited as we are about taking a topic and pulling it apart for our mutual amusement and edification.  This week we are focusing on some of the sentient creatures we have met in the Eye of the World as well as a couple that will be making their appearance by the end of Eye of the World.  Our breakdown includes Myrddraal, Trollocs, Draghkar, Ogier (not to be confused with Trollocs), and the Nym.  The first half follows our regular format; spoiler free first half and all the spoilers after the break.

If you are able to join us into the spoiler section, we’ve included a mini 101 on two of our favorite, tricksy creatures that don’t make an appearance until later in the series. We felt compelled to do it, to include a tantalizing glimpse into the savor

fields.title: E 35 EotW Recap Chpts 15 - 18: Singing and Slaughtering...and Nyneave
fields.description:
At this point in the series our intrepid travelers have a growing list of people and things to be afraid of: trollocs, myrddraal, draghkar, maybe the Dark One, definitely Nyneave.  The wisdom has indeed made her way from Emond’s Field and tracked them to Baerlon.  She is set on bringing these runaways back, but the path they are taking proves to be every bit as dangerous as Moiraine has tried to explain to all of them and it will only increase from here.  These four chapters are a little bit jolly, a little bit WTF, sprinkled generously with the dark and dangerous that is so characteristic of Robert Jordan’s writing.
Annnnd! fields.title: E34 EotW Recap Chpts 11-14: Welcome to J̶u̶r̶a̶s̶s̶i̶c̶ P̶a̶r̶k Baerlon!
fields.description:
It’s a mad cap dash out of the Two Rivers, a week’s worth of hard bread and cheese, topped off by the grandest welcome you could ask for at the Stag and Lion in the first “city” our down country folk have ever seen.  There’s a special musical moment towards the end of the first half that we are pretty darn tickled over and we hope you like it as much as we do.  The format is the same as all our other episodes: contained to spoiler free in the first half, followed by our musings and questions that land us square in spoiler territory.

Annnnd! We have a shop where you can find Wheel of Time inspired designs on t-shirts, coffee mugs, phone cases, stickers, buttons, and MORE.  Seriously.  You need to go look.  It’s so cool.  There are new designs uploaded on the regular, as well as sales and specials that we will share with you on our social media pages.

https://roadtotarvalon.threadless.com/

There’s a new website we’ve poured some time and love into and we would love to check it out, even if it has one of the most needlessly long web addresses but we’re working on it. https://roadtotarvalonawheeloftimepodcast.wordpress.com

As always, thank you for joining us!  Contact us if you feel inspired to do so, at any of the links below.

Email: roadtotarvalon@gmail.com

Amber Twitter: @RoadtoTarValon

Traci Twitter: @MistressLaras

Instagram: roadtotarvalon

We also have a Discord channel we would love to have you join!  The link is pinned to Amber’s Twitter page.  We’ve been told it’s a nice place to be and, perhaps a bit biased, we agree.  You can also leave us a voice message from the Anchor and Spotify app.  Mostly, we just want to grow this wonderful conversation with the WoT community.  Take care!

Note from the editor:

The music for the serendipitously created Jurassic Park theme song/melodica cover is the highlight of my life at the moment.  Amber found this gem on YouTube and we had to use it!  Thank you to the musical genius who made this.

Correction at the end of spoiler discussion, Them on Amazon Prime is a different show than the one I had mentioned, although it also looks really good.  The show that Lily Rabe is in is Tell Me Your Secrets.

We do meander into our hopes and fears for the show at the end of the spoiler free half, we talk American Horror Story and the Expanse and what Amazon Prime has made recently that might give us an idea of what to expect.

fields.title: E33 EotW Recap Chpts 7-10 Moiraine: White Tower Baton Twirling Champion
fields.description:
Moiraine is already an imposing figure, but when she adds pyrotechnics into her storytelling, she’s straight up mesmerizing.  Not to mention an excellent diversion for the real main event happening in the shadows. This episode was straight up fun, and more than just a little ridiculous which is even more reason to listen to it, we’ve got Moiraine the distraction tactic, Lessons with Lan, and a mini 101 about Draghkar all in the spoiler free section. Our conversation becomes even more raucous in the second half when the restraints come off and the spoilers come out.

Our group of main characters are leaving the Two Rivers behind and starting their journey out into the great, wide world, a place where, as Mat says, all the stories happen.  He is not wrong. Join us next week for Chapters 11 - 14 of Eye of the World.

Annnnd! We have a shop where you can find Wheel of Time inspired designs on t-shirts, coffee mugs, phone cases, stickers, buttons, and MORE.  Seriously.  You need to go look.  It’s so cool.

fields.title: E32 EotW Recap Chpts 3-6: Maybe Cenn Buie was right…?
fields.description:
Frankly, we can’t believe that we find this cranky little thatcher making sense either, but somehow that’s where we are.  This week we meet the peddler and the gleeman, and Winternight is filled with a lot more nightmare fuel and a lot fewer honeycakes. For the episode, the routine is the same as per usual: spoiler free first half, spoilers second half.  We had a great time on both sides of the conversation and hope you do, too.

We aren’t diverting away from Eye of the World anytime soon, not just as the story is starting to carry us further into the world of the unknown, so next week you can expect a recap/react to chapters 7 - 10.

Annnnd! We have a shop where you can find Wheel of Time inspired designs on t-shirts, coffee mugs, phone cases, stickers, buttons, and MORE.  Seriously.  You need to go look.  It’s so cool.

Instagram: roadtotarvalon

We also have a Discord channel we would love to have you join!  Send Amber a message and she’ll be sure to send you an invite.  You can also leave us a voice message from the Anchor and Spotify app.  Mostly, we just want to grow this wonderful conversation with the WoT community.  Take care!

fields.title: E31 EotW Recap: Tiny Egwene & the Ravens Chapter
fields.description:
The time has arrived! We are really excited to be jumping into our own re-read of The Eye of the World.  This episode we cover the chapter Ravens, the prologue and the first two chapters.  Our general format remains the same; spoiler free in the first half, and spoilers in the second half.
We each read this series at different times in our lives and with different ideas that have adapted to what we have gained through our life experiences.  Robert Jordan’s series offers an opportunity to reflect on history, philosophy, the horror of warfare, and, ultimately, the value of hope, not to mention the opportunity for hilariously offbeat theories, and new found friendships.  We love what we have shared with everyone so far and we hope you will join us in our romp through the book that, for most of us, started it all.
Exciting news!  We have a merch shop with Wheel of Time inspired designs for t-shirts, totes, stickers, phone cases and much more.  It’s a pretty fantastic shop, if we do say so ourselves, and we would love for you to check it out: https://roadtotarvalon.threadless.com/
Next week, we will keep moving forward with our re-read of Eye of the World, chapters 3-6
As always, thanks for joining us!  If you want to get in touch with us you can reach us in several different ways:
Email: roadtotarvalon@gmail.com

fields.title: E30 The Ineptitude of the White Tower
fields.description:
For anyone who may have missed it, we have a bone to pick with the White Tower so this week we are putting it under a microscope and pulling out some of the main shortcomings of this centuries old institution.  It’s not that we hate the White Tower, it’s just we think some of the stuff they do is...questionable.  Join us if you’re down for a cynic’s approach to the manuevering’s of the Aes Sedai.

The time has arrived! We are really excited to be jumping into our own re-read of The Eye of the World beginning next week.  We each read this series at different times in our lives and with different ideas that have adapted to what we have gained through our life experiences.  Robert Jordan’s series offers an opportunity to reflect on history, philosophy, the horror of warfare, and, ultimately, the value of hope, not to mention the opportunity for hilariously offbeat theories, and new found friendships.  We love what we have shared with everyone so far and we hope you will join us in our romp through the book that, for most of us, started it all.

As always, thanks for joining us!  If you want to get in touch with us you can reach us in several different ways:

fields.title: E29 Westlands 101: Manetheren
fields.description:
Tai’shar Manetheren! The true blood of Manetheren flows strong in the Two Rivers; but what does that mean? This week’s 101 is going to focus on the history of this great nation that formed after the Breaking of the World, as well as its crucial role in the series as a whole.  The first half will be spoiler free for new readers, and after the break, proceed at your own risk! There will be spoilers!

If you feel we glossed over Moiraine's mesmerizing tale of Manetheren in Eye of the World, it's only because we knew we would never be able to match the perfection of Recappa Sedai's Lego masterpiece retelling.  Please, do yourself a favor, and go watch it if you haven't already. 

For anyone who may have missed it, we have a bone to pick with the White Tower, so next week we are putting it under a microscope and pulling out some of the main shortcomings of this centuries old institution.  It’s not that we hate the White Tower, it’s just we think some of the things they do are...questionable.  Join us if you’re down for a cynic’s guide to some of the unsavory antics of the Aes Sedai. (That's for you, Snakes and Foxes :) ) 

As always, thanks for joining us!  If you want to get in touch with us you can reach us in several different ways:

Email: roadtotarvalon@gmail.com

Amber Twitter: @RoadtoTarValon

Traci Twitter: @MistressLaras

Instagram: roadtotarvalon

We also have a Discord channel we would love to have you join!  Send Amber a message and she’ll be sure to send you an invite.  You can also leave us a voice message from the Anchor and Spotify app.  Mostly, we just want to grow this wonderful conversation with the WoT community.  Take care!

fields.title: E28 Westlands 101: Ta’veren with Call Me Nakomi!
fields.description:
Just a quick heads up, we did have a moment where a conversation started to take a bit of a spoilery turn in the first half and we found a...more creative way to “bleep” out what shouldn’t be heard.  One word: sandwiches. 

We continue our exploration into the bare bones of the Wheel of Time series with another Westlands 101 episode and will be focused on ta’veren; what it is, who’s got it, and how it affects the plot line of the series.  The first half will be spoiler free for new readers, and after the break, proceed at your own risk! There will be spoilers!

Our conversation this week is enhanced with the insight and humor of Felicia James of Call Me Nakomi.  If you want to check out the episode (and you do), Favorite Nyneave Moments,  we kept mentioning, follow either one of these links to find it.  We look forward to our next chance to work together. We do believe there do be a friendship here! 

Next week, we cover our first nation in the Westlands 101 series: Manetheren! We learned a lot about this nation and encourage anyone who may be looking for a little extra knowledge, or a refresher, to check out Recappa Sedai’s video, Cry Me Two Rivers.  The LEGO recreation of the Battle of Manetheren in that episode should not be missed. 

As always, thanks for joining us!  If you want to get in touch with us you can reach us in several different ways:

Email: roadtotarvalon@gmail.com

Amber Twitter: @RoadtoTarValon

Traci Twitter: @MistressLaras

Instagram: roadtotarvalon

We also have a Discord channel we would love to have you join!  Send Amber a message and she’ll be sure to send you an invite.  You can also leave us a voice message from the Anchor and Spotify app.  Mostly, we just want to grow this wonderful conversation with the WoT community.  Take care!

fields.title: E27 Started in 1992, now we’re here. Traci finishes AMOL. We react.  *FULL SPOILERS*
fields.description:
There are two momentous occasions we are celebrating today: Traci, after starting the series 29 years ago, was finally able to finish reading A Memory of Light AND it’s our six month anniversary!  There’s no way these two achievements could not be celebrated in some way, and this seemed the most fitting way to do it.

We also have a HUGE thank you to the absolutely wonderful, constantly welcoming, and pleasantly supportive people we have met in the Wheel of Time community.  Six months seems like a long(ish?) time, but instead it has flown by, filled with lots of laughter and new friends.  Nothing but gratitude from the two of us!  You guys are the best.

As always, thanks for joining us!  If you want to get in touch with us you can reach us in several different ways:

Email: roadtotarvalon@gmail.com

Amber Twitter: @RoadtoTarValon

Traci Twitter: @MistressLaras

Instagram: roadtotarvalon

We also have a Discord channel we would love to have you join!  Send Amber a message and she’ll be sure to send you an invite.  You can also leave us a voice message from the Anchor and Spotify app.  Mostly, we just want to grow this wonderful conversation with the WoT community.  Take care!

fields.title: E26 Westlands 101: Verin Mathwin of the Brown Ajah
fields.description:
There are some characters in the WoT world who are written so well, you don’t realize what role they have played until the very end.  This could indeed be said of today’s 101 subject, Verin Mathwin. Our first half is recorded spoiler free for our pals who are still in their early days of the series, while the second half is where we get to let loose and discuss Verin's role, and our appreciation of her,  more deeply.  If you have any particular feelings around Verin Sedai, we would love to hear them!

Happy half-iversary to us!  That's right!  The Road to Tar Valon is six months old!  Next week, Traci and Amber reflect a bit on what these months have been like, but then take time to celebrate this milestone with another one: Traci finally, after nearly three decades, finished the series.  Of course we have to talk about that! 

As always, thanks for joining us!  If you want to get in touch with us you can reach us in several different ways:

Email: roadtotarvalon@gmail.com

Amber Twitter: @RoadtoTarValon

Traci Twitter: @MistressLaras

Instagram: roadtotarvalon

We also have a Discord channel we would love to have you join!  Send Amber a message and she’ll be sure to send you an invite.  You can also leave us a voice message from the Anchor and Spotify app.  Mostly, we just want to grow this wonderful conversation with the WoT community.  Take care!

Link to the letters written by Verin mentioned in the spoiler section.

fields.title: E25 - Westlands 101: The Children of the Light: Converting to Combat
fields.description:
Our topic today was inspired by my dear friend Tim who has just started reading through the series for the first time.  He’s been sending me a flurry of text messages as he races through the books with his ideas and theories and I have just loved it, but there was one in particular where I just was like “yes! That needs to be a topic for us!” and the message was this, “Boy.  Them White Cloaks, eh?” Today, our 101 is dedicated to the Children of Light - converting to combat.

Tim joins us for our spoiler free first half and takes his leave when Amber and I jump into full spoiler territory.  There’s history, torture, favorite moments, and, as always, lots of laughs.

Tim is also working to get off the ground as a content creator in the fantasy and gaming realm.  He has a YouTube channel called “Really High Fantasy” and if you want to get in touch with him to ask any questions about what he’s working on, you can reach him at reallyhighfantasy@gmail.com

Verin Mathwin, Aes Sedai of the Brown Ajah is the next subject of our Westlands 101 series.  Come join us, whether you're new or a long time reader of the series.  We love sharing our love with you!

As always, thanks for joining us!  If you want to get in touch with us you can reach us in several different ways:

Email: roadtotarvalon@gmail.com

Amber Twitter: @RoadtoTarValon

Traci Twitter: @MistressLaras

Instagram: roadtotarvalon

We also have a Discord channel we would love to have you join!  Send Amber a message and she’ll be sure to send you an invite.  You can also leave us a voice message from the Anchor and Spotify app.  Mostly, we just want to grow this wonderful conversation with the WoT community.  Take care!

Note from the editor:

Hey friends!  Just in case you’re interested in learning a little more about some of the historical topics we touched on today, here are the documentaries on the Templars and The Spanish Inquisition.

fields.title: E24 Favorite Battle Moments! With the Black Tower Podcast and special surprise guest, Malkier Talks!
fields.description:
Beware bouts of loud laughter, boisterous commentary, and a genuine good time.  Oh, and spoilers the whole way through.  Consider yourself warned :)

We are joined by the delightfully raucous crew of The Black Tower Podcast in our discussion over something that makes The Wheel of Time stand out when it comes to the world of Fantasy; battles. Whether it's a siege, skirmish, or all out war, Robert Jordan flexes his real world military knowledge and gives us so many epic battles within the series.  We were also joined by our favorite Malkieri chef, Rob from Malkier Talks.  This was a great time and we hope you enjoy our battle moments as much as we did.

Next week, how do you feel about the Children of the Light?  We are going to dig in on this notoriously unpopular group of religious militants.

As always, thanks for joining us!  If you want to get in touch with us you can reach us in several different ways:

Email: roadtotarvalon@gmail.com

Amber Twitter: @RoadtoTarValon

Traci Twitter: @MistressLaras

Instagram: roadtotarvalon

We also have a Discord channel we would love to have you join!  Send Amber a message and she’ll be sure to send you an invite.  You can also leave us a voice message from the Anchor and Spotify app.  Mostly, we just want to grow this wonderful conversation with the WoT community.  Take care!

fields.title: E23 Westlands 101: Elaida
fields.description:
Ah yes… Elaida “I am Tower law!” do Avriny a'Roihan. She is a very special character just because we can’t think of someone we love to hate any more than Elaida. This will be another Westlands 101 episode, so we will be keeping the first half of the episode as spoiler free as possible. There will be a few moments from Eye of the World, and New Spring included, but no major spoilers until after the break.

Some of the best moments to come out of the WoT series are the battle scenes.  We were incredibly lucky to be joined by the guys from the Black Tower Podcast to talk about our favorite battle scenes and we had a blast (pun intended?) discussing the epic showdowns as well as the plotlines that led us there.  We were also pleasantly surprised to have Rob from Malkier Talks skype bomb us for the conversation.

As always, thanks for joining us!  If you want to get in touch with us you can reach us in several different ways:

Email: roadtotarvalon@gmail.com

Amber Twitter: @RoadtoTarValon

Traci Twitter: @MistressLaras

Instagram: roadtotarvalon

We also have a Discord channel we would love to have you join!  Send Amber a message and she’ll be sure to send you an invite.  You can also leave us a voice message from the Anchor and Spotify app.  Mostly, we just want to grow this wonderful conversation with the WoT community.  Take care!

Note from the Editor:

To all of my history geeks who may be interested in a modern inspection of the body of King Henry VIII, from youth to death, you can follow this link to the documentary: Henry VIII Documentary 

Much love!

Traci

fields.title: E22 Westlands 101- Saidin: Devastation and Redemption
fields.description:
The presence of saidin and men who can channel in the Wheel of Time series is...complicated.  Moving along in the 101 series and going into depth on the male half of the One Power.  We feel like it’s time to give some of our focus to saidin along with the consequences and condemnation that followed the men who had the ability to wield its awesome power.   Everything up to the break is spoiler free and then we dive into spoilers, theories and all the other bits of WoT things that float through our conversation. CORRECTION: We incorrectly stated Far Madding was built on a stedding, it's actually a Ter'angreal that blocks channeling in the city. Next week,
Elaida graces us for next week’s 101 episode.  You’ll want to join us for that, we definitely have opinions and we are not holding back.
As always, thanks for joining us!  If you want to get in touch with us you can reach us in several different ways:
Email: roadtotarvalon@gmail.com

We also have a Discord channel we would love to have you join!  Send Amber a message and she’ll be sure to send you an invite.  You can also leave us a voice message from the Anchor and Spotify app.  Mostly, we just want to grow this wonderful conversation with the WoT community.  Take care!
Editor’s note:
We mentioned a few things in the episode that I went ahead and grabbed links for.  It's nice when life can be just a bit easier :) Take care! Traci
Winter’s Dragon video

fields.title: E21 - Westlands 101: The Prophecies of the Dragon
fields.description:
With this episode we prove our love and dedication to fully understanding this series by taking on a topic that, approached any other way, would make us glaze over like a batch of donuts, but our approach to the 101 series really felt like it would benefit from a deeper dive into the Prophecies of the Dragon.  Everything up to the break is spoiler free and then we dive into spoilers, theories for the tv show and all the other bits of WoT things that float through our conversation.

Next week, we continue our Westlands 101 series with a look at the role of saidin in the Wheel of Time.  We’ve spoken quite a bit in past episodes about the use of saidar as well as the women who channel it, and now we feel like it’s time to give some of our focus to the male half of the true source along with the consequences and condemnation that followed the men who had the ability to wield its awesome power.

As always, thanks for joining us!  If you want to get in touch with us you can reach us in several different ways:

Email: roadtotarvalon@gmail.com

Amber Twitter: @RoadtoTarValon

Traci Twitter: @MistressLaras

Instagram: roadtotarvalon

We also have a Discord channel we would love to have you join!  Send Amber a message and she’ll be sure to send you an invite.  You can also leave us a voice message from the Anchor and Spotify app.  Mostly, we just want to grow this wonderful conversation with the WoT community.  Take care!

fields.title: E20 WoT-A-Holiday: Festivals and Celebrations with Cheyenne Sedai!
fields.description:
WoT-A-Good-Time! Couldn’t resist.  We also couldn’t resist a chance to promote a good cause...for the second time! We were able to grab the audio from our video segment during the WoT-A-Holiday fundraiser for The Lightweaver Foundation, the charity promoting literacy, filling up libraries and providing video games for those who benefit greatly from these services, that was started by Brandon Sanderson and his wife, Emily.  Yep, that Brandon Sanderson. We were also given permission to use his audio giving more details into what the foundation is and how it does what it does.  There were many spectacular people who put this together and participated in the content created for the fundraiser and we feel truly fortunate to belong to a group that cares so much about giving back.  Thank you, everyone!

Next week we are going to tackle our next topic in the Westlands 101 Series; The Prophecies of the Dragon.  We would love to hear your opinion on the Prophecies.  Do you love them? Hate them? Confused by them? All of the above? It’s safe to say we sit in all of the above categories and thought this would be a great opportunity to actually pay closer attention to the quagmire of prophecies in the series.  We will begin with the Karaethon Cycle, as that is the most prevalent in the series, but we will focus a future episode on the rest of them at a later date. Feel free to drop your opinions to us on any of our social media sites.  We love hearing from everyone!

As always, thanks for joining us!  If you want to get in touch with us you can reach us in several different ways:

Email: roadtotarvalon@gmail.com

Amber Twitter: @RoadtoTarValon

Traci Twitter: @MistressLaras

Instagram: roadtotarvalon

We also have a Discord channel we would love to have you join!  Send Amber a message and she’ll be sure to send you an invite.  You can also leave us a voice message from the Anchor and Spotify app.  Mostly, we just want to grow this wonderful conversation with the WoT community.  Take care!

fields.title: E19 - Westlands 101: Laras, Mistress of the Kitchens
fields.description:
This week we couldn’t resist the pull of Laras, Mistress of the Kitchens in the White Tower. We talk about her unknown history, do a little speculating, and fan casting in the first half, then push on to the nitty gritty details for our long time readers. With New Spring wrapped up we came up with the idea of launching a Westlands 101 series. So if you see a "101" in the title, we start each episode with a spoiler free first half for new readers then follow up with deeper discussions and theories in the second. We're going to go through a wide range of topics like characters, nations, and prophecies, to get reacquainted before the TV show starts.


We are off next week for a holiday break, and after that we will tackle our next topic, "Prophecies of the Dragon".  We would love to hear your opinion on the Prophecies.  Do you love them? Hate them? Feel free to drop your opinions to us on any of our social media sites. As always, thanks for joining us!  If you want to get in touch with us you can reach us in several different ways: Email: roadtotarvalon@gmail.com / Amber Twitter: @RoadtoTarValon / Traci Twitter: @MistressLaras / Instagram: roadtotarvalon We also have a Discord channel, so shoot message and we will send you an invite.

fields.title: E18: The Fourth Age - Speculation and Game Play with Cheyenne Sedai!
fields.description:
We are thrilled to have Cheyenne Sedai, our Discord Angel, from the Weaves of the Wheel community join us to discuss the Fourth Age!  Cheyenne was kind enough to share her enthusiasm and information about the histories that have been developed within the community for their role playing game set in the Fourth Age, after The Last Battle.  Amber and Traci have their own ideas on what might have happened at the end of the Third Age making this a fun, and occasionally ridiculous, blend of ideas. It’s fun imagination and conversation time!

For anyone interested in learning more about The Weaves of the Wheel community, or how you can join the game, they can be found on Instagram and Twitter.

The holiday season brings with it thoughts of...food!  Next week we dig into one of our very favorite characters, Laras, Mistress of the Kitchens.  There are some seriously fascinating theories about her on the internet, not to mention her unexpected daring-do.  

As always, thanks for joining us!  If you want to get in touch with us you can reach us in several different ways:

Email: roadtotarvalon@gmail.com

Amber Twitter: @RoadtoTarValon

Traci Twitter: @MistressLaras

Instagram: roadtotarvalon

We also have a Discord channel we would love to have you join!  Send Amber a message and she’ll be sure to send you an invite.  You can also leave us a voice message from the Anchor and Spotify app.  Mostly, we just want to grow this wonderful conversation with the WoT community.  Take care!

fields.title: E17 - New Spring (Full Spoiler Wrap-up)
fields.description:
We ended the book last week, but we definitely still had things to say about New Spring.  So here we go, favorite moments and quotes, the Black Ajah (of course), things we hope to see in the show, and The Vileness, as well as comments from fellow New Spring readers to round out our impressions of this sadly underappreciated novel.
Next week we are thrilled to have a member of the Weaves of the Wheel community, Cheyenne Sedai, join us to discuss what they have created for their role playing game set in the 4th age, after the last battle, and what things Amber and Traci thought might happen.  It’s fun imagination and conversation time and we look forward to sharing it with you.
As always, thanks for joining us!  If you want to get in touch with us you can reach us in several different ways:
Email: roadtotarvalon@gmail.com
Amber Twitter: @RoadtoTarValon
Traci Twitter: @MistressLaras
Instagram: roadtotarvalon
We also have a Discord channel we would love to have you join!  Send Amber a message and she’ll be sure to send you an invite.  You can also leave us a voice message from the Anchor and Spotify app.  Mostly, we just want to grow this wonderful conversation with the WoT community.  Take care!

fields.title: E16 New Spring Recap Ch. 25, 26 & Epilogue: The End of the Beginning
fields.description:
We made it!  It’s the end of the road for New Spring, but it’s still early days for The Road to Tar Valon.  We’ve got plans for upcoming episodes, including doing a recap of the full series (because, gosh darn it, we just HAVE to read the series together now!), but we also have plans for many other topics to help ourselves and our listeners attain a fuller understanding of the series as well as more collaborations within the Wheel of Time community.  We would love for you to continue to join us!
Next week we are doing our last New Spring focused episode. We may have wrapped up reading it, but that just means we’re allowing all of that goodness to percolate in a full book wrap up.
As always, thanks for joining us!  If you want to get in touch with us you can reach us in several different ways:
Email: roadtotarvalon@gmail.com
Amber Twitter: @RoadtoTarValon
Traci Twitter: @MistressLaras
Instagram: roadtotarvalon
We also have a Discord channel we would love to have you join!  Send Amber a message and she’ll be sure to send you an invite.  You can also leave us a voice message from the Anchor and Spotify app.  Mostly, we just want to grow this wonderful conversation with the WoT community.  Take care!

fields.title: E15 Recap New Spring Ch. 23 & 24 Is It Coincidence or the Black Ajah?
fields.description:
Attempted kidnappings, horse thievery, and another visit to the seamstress for Moiraine and Siuan; our favorite gal pals are together again, dodging danger and scheming a way into the Aesdaishar palace to hopefully find the Dragon Reborn.
An extra special thank you to the Weaves of the Wheel community and everyone else who contributed for sharing your secret weaves with us. This is exactly the kind of feedback and connection we adore.
The end is racing towards up and we all know that Jordan doesn’t disappoint when it comes to delivering a slam bang finish.  Join us next week when we cover the last two chapters and the epilogue of New Spring.  It’s crazy and exciting that we have finished our first Wheel of Time book recap, but don’t go thinking that we are done.  We’ve got plans for upcoming episodes, including doing a recap of the full series (because, gosh darn it, we just HAVE to read the series together now!), but we also have plans for many other topics to help ourselves and our listeners attain a fuller understanding of the series.  We would love for you to continue to join us!
As always, thanks for joining us!  If you want to get in touch with us you can reach us in several different ways:
Email: roadtotarvalon@gmail.com
Amber Twitter: @RoadtoTarValon
Traci Twitter: @MistressLaras
Instagram: roadtotarvalon
We also have a Discord channel we would love to have you join!  Send Amber a message and she’ll be sure to send you an invite.  You can also leave us a voice message from the Anchor and Spotify app.  Mostly, we just want to grow this wonderful conversation with the WoT community.  Take care!

fields.title: E14 Recap New Spring Ch. 21 & 22: Moiraine and Lan - Culture Catastrophe
fields.description:
We’re still on the road to Chachin and we get a perspective from Lan and Moiraine and the culture clash that has them under each other’s skin. After facing bandits and disappointment on the road, the party finally reaches their destination and Lan gallops away from Moiraine as fast as he can, but he knows he only has one destination; a dangerous haven of sorts that would potentially keep Moiraine away from him physically, even if she remains gnarled in his thoughts.
Our next episode will be our second to last recap of New Spring!  In true Jordan style, the build up is simmering away, leading to an explosive finish.  But we aren’t there just yet.  Chapters 23 and 24 have Moiraine back together and plotting on how to make contact with the next woman on their list, the potential mother of the Dragon Reborn.  The fate of their mission is too dire for them to stay hidden and Moiraine pulls out all the stops as the Lady Moiraine Damodred, but will she fully display herself as the Lady Moiraine Damodred Aes Sedai? Join us next week to find out!
As always, thanks for joining us!  If you want to get in touch with us you can reach us in several different ways:
Email: roadtotarvalon@gmail.com
Amber Twitter: @RoadtoTarValon
Traci Twitter: @MistressLaras
Instagram: roadtotarvalon
We also have a Discord channel we would love to have you join!  Send Amber a message and she’ll be sure to send you an invite.  You can also leave us a voice message from the Anchor and Spotify app.  Mostly, we just want to grow this wonderful conversation with the WoT community.  Take care!

fields.title: E13 - Recap New Spring Chapters 19 & 20: Don’t Ryne on My Parade.
fields.description:
This is a fun one, because Lan and Moiraine finally cross paths on the way to Chachin.  Chapter 19 is from Moiraine’s point of view and chapter 20 is from Lan’s.  It was a spectacularly fun read and we had a great time chatting it over.  We split the book up into spoiler free at the beginning and after the ad we dive into theories which frequently cross over into spoiler land.

We are rapidly coming to the end of New Spring!  Next week we continue our journey to Chachin and we get a perspective from Lan and Moiraine and the culture clash that has them under each other’s skin. After facing bandits and disappointment on the road, the party finally reaches their destination and Lan looks to get as far away from Moiraine as he can, but he knows he only has one destination; a dangerous haven of sorts that would potentially keep Moiraine away from him physically, even if she kept creeping into his thoughts.

As always, thanks for joining us!  If you want to get in touch with us you can reach us in several different ways:

Email: roadtotarvalon@gmail.com

Amber Twitter: @RoadtoTarValon

Traci Twitter: @MistressLaras

Instagram: roadtotarvalon

We also have a Discord channel we would love to have you join!  Send Amber and message and she’ll be sure to send you an invite.  You can also leave us a voice message from the Anchor and Spotify app.  Mostly, we just want to continue and grow this wonderful conversation with the WoT community.  Take care!

fields.title: E12 - New Spring Recap Chapters 17 & 18: Pranksters and Pillow Friends Unite!
fields.description:
Chapters 17 and 18 brings us back to a Moiraine POV.  She’s landed in the Borderlands after her flight from Tar Valon and has begun her personal search for the Dragon Reborn.  Surprise encounters find Moiraine while she stays in Canluum.

Next week is a fun one, because Lan and Moiraine finally cross paths on the way to Chachin.  Chapter 19 is from Moiraine’s point of view and chapter 20 is from Lan’s.  It was a spectacularly fun read and we had a great time chatting it over.  There’s a short snippet we took from that recording that is up as a minisode where we discuss the recent audio trailer WoT on Prime that was released recently.  We would love for you to check that out, too, but if you miss it, it will still be part of next week’s full episode.

As always, thanks for joining us!  If you want to get in touch with us you can reach us in several different ways:

Email: roadtotarvalon@gmail.com

Amber Twitter: @RoadtoTarValon

Traci Twitter: @MistressLaras

Instagram: roadtotarvalon

We also have a Discord channel we would love to have you join!  Send Amber and message and she’ll be sure to send you an invite.  You can also leave us a voice message from the Anchor and Spotify app.  Mostly, we just want to continue and grow this wonderful conversation with the WoT community.  Take care!

fields.title: Minisode 1: Our Take on the WoT on Prime Audio Teaser
fields.description:
Full disclosure, there are some spoilers for the series in this recording.  This past Sunday, we absolutely had to disucss the new audio teaser trailer that was recently released.  We’re publishing this snippet now because we record a week ahead of time and didn't want to wait to share our opinions and reactions to what we heard and saw.

Thanks for joining us!  If you want to get in touch with us you can reach us in several different ways:

Email: roadtotarvalon@gmail.com

Amber Twitter: @RoadtoTarValon

Traci Twitter: @MistressLaras

Instagram: roadtotarvalon

We also have a Discord channel we would love to have you join!  Send Amber and message and she’ll be sure to send you an invite.  You can also leave us a voice message from the Anchor and Spotify app.  Mostly, we just want to continue and grow this wonderful conversation with the WoT community.  Take care!

Editor’s Note:

Thank you for listening!  I realized during the editing that we mentioned quite a few WoT content creators and I figured I would insert links here for anyone who wants to get to it quick and easy.

Unraveling the Pattern’s video on the audio trailer 

Malkier Talk’s discussion with Zuul and Vance over pronunciation in the WoT series

I think there was also a mention of Josh from the Black Tower Podcast.

And the Dusty Wheel has been covering this topic as well.

Hopefully I didn’t miss anyone and if I did, let me know and I’ll update things as needed.  Best wishes,

Traci

fields.title: E11 - Shadowspawn with Malkier Talks (Spoilers!)
fields.description:
It’s a Road to Tar Valon first: we have a guest joining us!  We are quite excited to announce that Rob of Malkier Talks joined us for a discussion about the Shadowspawn. The three of us had a lot of fun discussing our favorite shadowspawn, the best moments we found in the books, how they might be done in the shows, and theorized over things like whether or not Shadowspan have souls (thanks, Zuul!).  Consider it our spooky, or just downright disturbing, yet hilarious,  Halloween treat for you.

Links for where you can find Rob’s content:

Podcast: Malkier Talks - Google Play

‎Malkier Talks - A Wheel of Time Theory Podcast on Apple Podcasts

Malkier Talks - A Wheel of Time Theory Podcast • A podcast on Anchor

YouTube - https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCZXswsuLZIhYKlDICALD6HQ

Twitter - https://twitter.com/MalkieriR

Next week we are back to our recap of New Spring!  Chapters 17 and 18 brings us back to a Moiraine POV.  She’s landed in the Borderlands after her flight from Tar Valon and has begun her personal search for the Dragon Reborn.  Surprise encounters find Moiraine while she stays in Canluum.

Let us know what you thought of our content, correct us, send us things we may have missed to our email: roadtotarvalon@gmail.com You can find Amber on Twitter @Road to Tar Valon and Traci @MistressLaras, or Laras, Mistress of the Kitchens.  We are on Instagram, roadtotarvalon.  We would love it if you would subscribe to us on Spotify, Anchor, Apple podcast or anywhere else you listen.  You can find more information on our webpage, anchor.fm/roadtotarvalon.  And if you have the anchor app, you can leave us a voice message that we can use in upcoming episodes.  Just let us know in the message if that’s something you are comfortable with or not. Lastly, you can find us on Discord.  Amber has the link attached to her twitter page.  We would love for you to join us there as well.

So until next week,

Thanks for joining us!

Safe travels!

And walk in the light!

fields.title: E10 - New Spring Recap Chapters 15 & 16: Borderlands or Bust
fields.description:
We agree, these are the best two chapters of New Spring so far. Lan and Bukama are back in the Borderlands and everyone’s on edge. We had a fantastic time discussing our appreciation of how amazingly well written these two chapters are and where they are taking us. This episode is broken up into spoiler free in the first half, and the second half we theorize and discuss the importance of certain things like the Hadori and Lan’s gold signet ring.

Next week’s episode is a little something different for us. We have a guest joining us!  We are quite excited to announce that Rob of Malkier Talks will be joining us for a discussion about the Shadowspawn. The three of us had a lot of fun discussing our favorite shadowspawn, the best moments we found in the books, and theorized over things like whether or not Shadowspan have souls (thanks, Zuul!).

Consider it our spooky, or just downright disturbing, Halloween treat for you.

Links for where you can find Rob’s content:

Podcast: Malkier Talks - Google Play

‎Malkier Talks - A Wheel of Time Theory Podcast on Apple Podcasts

Malkier Talks - A Wheel of Time Theory Podcast • A podcast on Anchor

YouTube - https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCZXswsuLZIhYKlDICALD6HQ

Twitter - https://twitter.com/MalkieriR

Let us know what you thought of our content, correct us, send us things we may have missed to our email: roadtotarvalon@gmail.com You can find Amber on Twitter @Road to Tar Valon and Traci @MistressLaras, or Laras, Mistress of the Kitchens.  We are on Instagram, roadtotarvalon.  We would love it if you would subscribe to us on Spotify, Anchor, Apple podcast or anywhere else you listen.  You can find more information on our webpage, anchor.fm/roadtotarvalon.  And if you have the anchor app, you can leave us a voice message that we can use in upcoming episodes.  Just let us know in the message if that’s something you are comfortable with or not. Lastly, you can find us on Discord.  Amber has the link attached to her twitter page.  We would love for you to join us there as well.

So until next week,
