fields.title: Knife of Dreams: Chapters 16 and 17 (S11, Ep. 8)
fields.description: Chris cannot make it tonight because he decided to get married two years ago or something but we will (maybe... probably) have a guest with Ian to help with shenanigans! More Elayne chapters! Will there be baths? Find out this week on The Wheel Reads! Enjoy!

fields.title: Knife of Dreams: Chapters 13, 14, and 15 (S11, Ep. 7)
fields.description: Elayne chapters and it's WAR! And just Elayne doing Elayne things. Enjoy!

fields.title: Knife of Dreams: Chapters 11 and 12 (S11, Ep6)
fields.description: Mat gets his luck and Perrin makes a deal. Plus some pretty sweet fight scenes! Enjoy!

fields.title: Knife of Dreams: Chapters 9 and 10 (S11, Ep. 5)
fields.description: Text from Ian this week, "F you Alan" Alan: Oh I am guessing you read? Enjoy!

fields.title: Knife of Dreams: Chapters 6, 7, and 8 (S11, Ep4)
fields.description: Mat buys a horse, Mat spanks an Aes Sedai, Mat gifts said horse...I know it doesn't sound that good but it was? Enjoy!

fields.title: Knife of Dreams: Chapters 3, 4, and 5 (S 11, Ep 3)
fields.description: Forsaken, Seanchan, and Perrin...on a Monday! Should be a good one!

fields.title: Knife of Dreams: Chapters 1 and 2 (S 11, Ep. 2)
fields.description: Suian takes charge kinda and deception and treachery is afoot in the White Tower! Enjoy!

fields.title: Knife of Dreams: Prologue (S. 11, Ep. 1)
fields.description: This one was fun! No Alan what more could you ask for! Enjoy!

fields.title: Crossroads of Twilight: Chapters 27, 28, 29, 30, and Epilogue (S10, Ep. 14)
fields.description: Well the axe finally drops in this episode and wedding bells? Enjoy!

fields.title: Crossroads of Twilight: Chapters 24, 25, and 26 (S10, Ep. 13)
fields.description: Rand gets updates from the Black Tower and Loial and Perrin gets to So Habor. Enjoy!

fields.title: Crossroads of Twilight: Chapters 21, 22, and 23 (S10, Ep. 12)
fields.description: Tower politics and Caddy Cadsuane! Enjoy!

fields.title: Crossroads of Twilight: Chapters 19 and 20 (S. 10, Ep. 11)
fields.description: All the surprises! All the surprises! Enjoy!

fields.title: Crossroads of Twilight: Chapters 17 and 18 (S 10, Ep. 10)
fields.description: Egwene tries to figure out how to make cuendillar, Suian and Eggy talk, we get some news from Shadar Logoth! Enjoy!

fields.title: Crossroads of Twilight: Chapters 15 and 16 (S 10, Ep. 9)
fields.description: We get a glimpse of the other side of the Caemlyn succession and we check in with Eggy! Enjoy!

fields.title: Crossroads of Twilight: Chapters 13 and 14 (S 10 Ep. 8)
fields.description: Hey guess what?!?! More Elyane chapters!!!! I can just feel the excitement coming from Ian and Chris! Enjoy!

fields.title: Crossroads of Twilight: Chapters 11 and 12 (S10, Ep. 7)
fields.description: More Elyane chapters, I really have nothing else to say besides this shall be fun. Enjoy!

fields.title: Crossroads of Twilight: Chapters 9 and 10 (S 10 Ep. 6)
fields.description: Yay, Faile and Elayne chapters! At least we get by with a little help from our friends! Enjoy!

fields.title: Crossroads of Twilight: Chapters 7 and 8 (S. 10, Ep. 5)
fields.description: More Darkhound talk (Can I pet that DAWG!?!?!?) Also track down some Aiel! Enjoy! Saily: https://saily.com/?aff_id=4832&aff_offer_id=101&aff_transaction_id=10296b4302dd7c7a96cf38772d82c0&url=%7Burl%7D

fields.title: Crossroads of Twilight: Chapters 5 and 6 (S. 10, Ep. 4)
fields.description: Back to our normal selves. That was fun last week but now it's back to a "normal" episode! Enjoy!

fields.title: Crossroads of Twilight: Chapters 3 and 4 (S. 10, Ep. 3)
fields.description:
It is our 200th episode!!!! Also Alan's birthday! Join us as we attempt to actually cover these chapters! Special thanks to Delusions of Grandeal, Tree, Amys, Skeeter, Joe and Jen from Talk'aran'rhiod, Dan from The Way of the Leaf, Rob from Malkier Talks, and Melindhra and Leigh-A from Three Fold Talk. You guys all rock and for anyone else who was trying to join but couldn't thank you as well!

Let the Lord of Chaos Reign!!!! Enjoy!

fields.title: Crossroads of Twilight: Chapters 1 and 2 (S 10, Ep. 2)
fields.description: Mat, well-turned calves, and old man Noal, what more could we ask for? Enjoy!

fields.title: Crossroads of Twilight: Prologue (S 10, Ep. 1)
fields.description:
The longest prologue ever... A lot of new names, a lot of old names, a whole lot of Aes Sedai names. Let's Go! Enjoy!


Nord VPN: https://go.nordvpn.net/aff_c?offer_id=15&aff_id=89796&url_id=902⁠

fields.title: New Spring: Chapters 23, 24, 25, 26, and Epilogue (S. 9.75, Ep. 8)
fields.description: And so we come to a end. We end the prequel with a bang and so many implications for the main series just wish we had more time in the prequels. Enjoy!

fields.title: New Spring: Chapters 19, 20, 21, and 22 (S. 9.75 Ep. 7)
fields.description: About time Lan and Moiraine meet... but we all wish we had a whole other book of this plot line, but alas only one more episode left in New Spring... Enjoy!

fields.title: New Spring: Chapters 16, 17, and 18 (S. 9.75, Ep. 6)
fields.description: Spicy Lan? Caddy Cat? Pillow friends? Boy, this one should be good! Enjoy!

fields.title: New Spring: Chapters 13, 14, and 15 (S. 9.75, Ep. 5)
fields.description: We welcome Rob from Weekly Wheel News to the Pod! A little Moiraine, a little Lan, but a whole lot of cha cha changes! Enjoy!

fields.title: New Spring: Chapters 9, 10, 11, and 12 (S. 9.75, Ep. 4)
fields.description: A little Aes Sedai test and Lan is back, what more can I say? Enjoy!

fields.title: New Spring: Chapters 6, 7, & 8 (S. 9.75, Ep. 3)
fields.description: A much to do about nothing...this is an episode... we read about collecting names but hey all three of us are here!!! At least things pick up next week! Enjoy!

fields.title: New Spring: Chapters 4 and 5 (S. 9.75, Ep. 2)
fields.description: Once again a little bit of a bridge episode as we watch Moiraine and Suian head out of the Tower to collect names and run into a familiar character for us! Enjoy!

fields.title: New Spring: Chapters 1, 2, and 3 (S. 9.75, Ep. 1)
fields.description:
We are traveling back in time like Tam to cover some early Moiraine and Lan. Ian time travels during the podcast and we get to see young Moiraine and still old Lan! Enjoy!


Also, I lied about the NordVPN stuff... well not really but my affiliate link expired. Need to wait for the next campaign! Will post it then!

fields.title: Winter's Heart: Chapters 33, 34, & 35 (S9, Ep 15)
fields.description: Another book down and boy did this ending come out of nowhere! Also, be prepared Chris makes us bust out the floaties again! It's been awhile! Enjoy!

fields.title: Winter's Heart: Chapters 30, 31, and 32 (S9, Ep. 14)
fields.description: Well that's one way to propose?!?! Chris also coming in with mad predictions... this felt like one of our earlier episodes with all the predictions coming out. Enjoy!

fields.title: Winter's Heart: Chapters 28 and 29 (S9, Ep. 13)
fields.description: DefaultRand from Twitter of Time joins us for some really Matty chapters! Ian also always gets excited when he gets to talk about military stuff and Alan gets excited to talk about how good he was at sports! Enjoy!

fields.title: Winter's Heart: Chapters 26 and 27 (S9, Ep. 12)
fields.description: Yay Elayne chapters! Yay politics! Yay Birgitte! Enjoy!

fields.title: Winter's Heart: Chapters 23, 24, & 25 (S9 Ep. 11)
fields.description:
Cadsuane episode! Which means HBIC is back! Enjoy!


Also it would mean the world to us if you can support a charity that means a lot to The Wheel Reads. Here is a link to give if you feel so inclined!

Boys and Girls Club

fields.title: Winter's Heart: Chapters 20, 21, and 22 (S9, Ep. 10)
fields.description: So Tuon and Mat? Things are getting...interesting. Also Rand gets in a tussle in Far Madding! Enjoy!

fields.title: Winter's Heart: Chapters 18 and 19 (S9 Ep 9)
fields.description: Mat continues to plan his escape from Ebou Dar but things are getting....complicated and strange with Tuon! Dare I say creeper? Enjoy!

fields.title: Winter's Heart: Chapters 16 and 17 (S9, Ep. 8)
fields.description: Mat shows Smeagol his precious and then a certain someone tries to buy him! Enjoy!

fields.title: Winter's Heart: Chapters 13, 14, and 15 (S 9, Ep. 7)
fields.description: Mat is back! And newcomers arrive in Ebou Dar! Enjoy!

fields.title: Winter's Heart: Chapters 11 and 12 (S9, Ep. 6)
fields.description: Rand uses a disguise to get to Nynaeve! And then, giggity! Enjoy!

fields.title: Winter's Heart: Chapters 9 and 10 (S9, Ep. 5)
fields.description: Oh snap, Elayne, the tea...all the tea! Everyone is sus! Nothing is good! Enjoy!

fields.title: Winter's Heart: Chapter 7 and 8 (S9, Ep. 4)
fields.description: Straight outta Caemlyn!!!! The episode that was much to do about nothing but hey we had fun. I hope you all enjoy it as well! Enjoy?

fields.title: Winter's Heart: Chapters 4, 5, and 6 (S. 9, Ep. 3)
fields.description: More Perrin and Faile and Bearlain did WHAT?!?! Enjoy!

fields.title: Winter's Heart: Chapters 1, 2, & 3 (S9, Ep2)
fields.description: We begin the book with a little Perrin, a little Faile, and a whole lot of anger! Enjoy!

fields.title: Winter's Heart: Prologue (S9, Ep. 1)
fields.description:
Black Ajah! Elayne and Avi! Black Tower! And steam engines! What is not to love about this prologue!? Enjoy!

Website:

www.thewheelreads.com

fields.title: The Path of Daggers: Chapters 28, 29, 30, and 31 (S8, Ep. 14)
fields.description: Another book down and oh how this books end! So good and bad! Thank you Dain for joining us!!!! Enjoy! Website: https://www.thewheelreads.com

fields.title: The Path of Daggers: Chapters 26 and 27 (S8, Ep. 13)
fields.description:
Cadsuane, how we adore you! Also, what is Logain doing? Enjoy!

Website: https://www.thewheelreads.com

fields.title: The Path of Daggers: Chapters 24 and 25 (S8, Ep. 12)
fields.description: A whirlwind of a chapter ending on a depressing note followed by some interesting White Tower stuff going on! Thank you Pevara for joining us for this one!!!! Enjoy!

fields.title: The Path of Daggers: Chapters 21, 22, and 23 (Season 8, Episode 11)
fields.description:
So how about a Seanchan killing spree surrounded by enemies? Sounds like a good idea to me! Enjoy!

Website: The Wheel Reads
Sponsor: NordVPN

fields.title: The Path of Daggers: Chapters 18, 19, and 20 (S8 Ep. 10)
fields.description:
Oh snap you all got lawyered!!!! These are some great set up chapters! Enjoy!

Website:

www.thewheelreads.com

fields.title: The Path of Daggers: Chapters 16 and 17 (S8, Ep. 9)
fields.description:
Look at Egwene playing the political game!!! Also there is a bunch of sketchiness going on all around. So many questions and of course our favorite character comes back!!!!! Enjoy!


www.thewheelreads.com

fields.title: The Path of Daggers: Chapters 14 and 15 (S8 Ep. 8)
fields.description: Going old school in this episode with the analog sound!!! Also, a friendly PSA, don't record and drive! Well, Taim is getting out of control, Lews is back, and Suian reveals her feelings! Yep, and the oath rod is bad... or it's good... or it's bad. I don't really know but Enjoy!

fields.title: The Path of Daggers: Chapters 12 and 13 (S8 Ep. 7)
fields.description: We welcome Omar from WoTSeries.com to the pod! Also, we have fun getting so many more questions about what is going on with the Forsaken! Cadsuane and Wise Ones alliance? Rand missing Lews? So much fun! Enjoy!

fields.title: The Path of Daggers: Chapters 10 and 11 (S 8, Ep. 6)
fields.description: An old friend joins Perrin's crew and hopefully will help Perrin as he deals with the Dragonsworn and the Shaido test out their own rod!!! Enjoy!

fields.title: The Path of Daggers: Chapters 8 and 9 (S8, Ep. 5)
fields.description: More Perrin being Perrin... as for Mat? But lets be honest these are Lini chapters!!!! Enjoy!

fields.title: The Path of Daggers: Chapters 6 and 7 (S8, Ep. 4)
fields.description: Well, that's one way to stop an army!!! And Perrin putting Dragonsworn in their place, what could go wrong? Enjoy!

fields.title: The Path of Daggers: Chapters 3, 4, and 5 (S8 Ep. 3)
fields.description: We welcome Winespring Cafe to the Pod for quite the episode. I laughed, I cried, mostly just cried from laughing so much! This was a fun episode if not a bit unhinged!!! Enjoy!

fields.title: The Path of Daggers: Chapters 1 & 2 (S. 8 Ep. 2)
fields.description: We start close to where we left off with everyone heading out of Ebou Dar. And then Aviendha does what?!?!?! It is truly a "I said what I said" or better "I did what I did" moment!!! Enjoy!

fields.title: The Path of Daggers: Prologue (S8, Ep. 1)
fields.description: And so it begins...again...I mean it was a beginning! And apparently, everyone is sus! Enjoy!

fields.title: A Crown of Swords: Chapters 39, 40, 41 (S7, Ep. 17)
fields.description: We come to the end of Book 7. So many questions were left unanswered... but are only halfway there!!!! WHOOAAA AHHH LIVING ON A... Enjoy!

fields.title: A Crown of Swords: Chapters 36, 37, and 38 (S7 Ep. 16)
fields.description: Epic duel, Padan Fain, The Bowl of the Winds, some crazy overpowered bad guy...what's more to ask for? Come listen as we near the end of Book 7 of The Wheel of Time!!! Enjoy!

fields.title: A Crown of Swords: Chapters 33, 34, and 35 (S7 Ep. 15)
fields.description: Tree joins us again for a fun filled episode of how many times can we make Tree blush!!!! Plus we are getting close to the end which means everything is intense!!!! Enjoy!!!!

fields.title: A Crown of Swords: Chapters 31 and 32 (S7 Ep. 14)
fields.description: Wow, what an episode! Thank you Leigh-A from Three Fold Talk for joining us!!!! Nynaeve, Elayne, and Elaida...these are some great chapters! Enjoy!

fields.title: A Crown of Swords: Chapters 28, 29, and 30 (S 7, Ep. 13)
fields.description: Listener discretion is advised.... We are joined by Thom from Dragonmount.com and Zuul for "that" episode. Lots to talk about and a lot of tough scenes.

fields.title: A Crown of Swords: Chapters 26 and 27 (S7, Ep. 12)
fields.description: Seanchan interview Morgase, what can go wrong? Morgase plans her escape, what can go wrong? Rand sends Perrin to deal with Masema...WHAT CAN GO WRONG? Enjoy!!!

fields.title: A Crown of Swords: Chapters 23, 24, and 25 (S7 Ep. 11)
fields.description: The Kin and a Mindtrap...juicy...provocative...intriguing!!! Enjoy!

fields.title: A Crown of Swords: Chapters 20, 21, and 22 (S. 7, Ep. 10)
fields.description: It's too late to apologize...too late!!!! Plus Forsaken, a Watcher, and a sassy innkeeper.  Could we ask for more?  Enjoy!

fields.title: A Crown of Swords: Chapters 18 and 19 (S7 Ep9)
fields.description: We meet Kitty Kat aka Cadsuane! Listen to find out what Ian and Chris's first impressions are! Enjoy!

fields.title: A Crown of Swords: Chapters 15, 16, and 17 (S7, Ep.8)
fields.description: We are joined by the wonderful Wheel Weaves Podcast for a fun episode!  This week we learn how messy Whitecloaks must be (Gross), Mat meets Tylin (Gross), also some bodies in a wheel barrow...(Gross)  Still fun!  Enjoy!

fields.title: A Crown of Swords: Chapters 13 and 14 (S7, Ep. 7)
fields.description: Weather bowls, horse racing, and darkfriends.... YASSSS!!!!

fields.title: A Crown of Swords: Chapters 11 and 12 (S7, Ep 6)
fields.description: On this episode of A Crown of S Words for 100 Trebek, we get a lot of Daenerys saying "Bend the Knee"  Oh I meant Egwene.  Nonetheless, a fun filled episode filled with laughter and joy.  Enjoy!

fields.title: A Crown of Swords: Chapters 9 and 10 (S7, E5)
fields.description: Welcome back for another fun edition of The Wheel Reads...these chapters are...well...we had fun recording! Enjoy!

fields.title: A Crown of Swords: Chapters 6, 7, and 8 (S 7, Ep. 4)
fields.description: Muggydean is free!  Alan can't tell jokes! Chris is still a Perrin stan! And Ian is in quite the juxtaposition!  Enjoy!

fields.title: A Crown of Swords: Chapters 3, 4, and 5 (S7, Ep. 3)
fields.description: There is really only one theme for this episode... don't put a full house humidifier on the same circuit as your WiFi!!! Also F around and find out!!!  Enjoy!

fields.title: A Crown of Swords: Chapters 1 and 2 (S 7, Ep. 2)
fields.description: CAN YOU SMEEEEELLLLLLL WHAT PERRIN IS SNIFFING?!?!?!  A whole lot of smells!  Enjoy!

fields.title: A Crown of Swords: Prologue (S 7, Ep. 1)
fields.description: We are joined by Vancey Pants from Bard of the Red Hand for Dumai's Wells part deux, also known as the prologue to A Crown of Swords and some sad stabby stabs.  Enjoy!

fields.title: Lord of Chaos: Chapters 55 and Epilogue (S 6, Ep. 25)
fields.description: Kneel or you will be knelt!  It's here the final episode of Lord of Chaos!  Come listen and enjoy!

fields.title: Lord of Chaos: Chapters 53 and 54 (S 6, Ep. 24)
fields.description: We come!  Gives me chills every time!  Enjoy!

fields.title: Lord of Chaos: Chapters 50, 51, and 52 (S6, Ep 23)
fields.description: What's in the box!?!?  We are joined by Jess from the Amyrlin's Study for a fun filled episode including The Taking!  Need I say more!  Enjoy!

fields.title: Lord of Chaos: Chapters 48 and 49 (S6, Ep. 22)
fields.description: Ian get well soon because we need you back!!! Short, sweet, to the point!  That sums up these chapters and how Rand handled this group of Aes Sedai!  Hopefully will have just as much success with the next group....    Enjoy!

fields.title: Lord of Chaos: Chapters 46 and 47 (S6 Ep. 21)
fields.description:
So Perrin gets to meet mommy and daddy Bashere!  Also we get to Ebou Dar.  Some interesting cultures to introduce at the end of a book but we are only four weeks away from the end!  Excited as the tension builds for our first time readers!!! Enjoy!


Website: www.thewheelreads.com

fields.title: Lord of Chaos: Chapters 43, 44, and 45 (S 6, Ep. 20)
fields.description:
We are being invaded by the wonderful puppets of The Way of the Leaf!  This week we try to figure out who the Perrin guy is? What is the actual Color of Trust? And what is a poophole loophole?!?!?! There may be answers...there probably will just be mayhem...but it is guaranteed to be a fun listen! Enjoy!

The Way of the Leaf: https://www.thegreatblight.com/thewayoftheleaf-creator
The Wheel Reads: www.thewheelreads.com

fields.title: Lord of Chaos: Chapters 40, 41, and 42 (S6, Ep 19)
fields.description:
Well get your towels ready because we have hit Chapter 42 for the 6th time and did we find the meaning of life? Well unless its Taim and his army of Ashaman...probably not but Alan actually has a few funny moments.  It only took over 130 episodes!  Enjoy!

Website: www.thewheelreads.com

fields.title: Lord of Chaos: Chapters 37, 38, and 39 (S 6, Ep. 18)
fields.description:
So many point of views! But a great Mat one! So many implications! So many possibilities!  Enjoy!


Website: www.thewheelreads.com

fields.title: Lord of Chaos: Chapter 34, 35, and 36 (S6, Ep. 17)
fields.description:
She comes, She comes!  The Amyrlin is Raised! We welcome Chris's much better half Chanel to the podcast for a great episode!  A New Amyrlin is Raised and lots of speculation is made!  Also be thinking of Ian for his ribbon cutting ceremony!  Enjoy!

Website: www.thewheelreads.com

fields.title: Lord of Chaos: Chapters 31, 32, and 33 (S6 Ep. 16)
fields.description: So much happens in the episode we take a moment of silence for one of our favorite characters, Egwene get summoned to Salidar, Mat plays board games, Alan has too much to drink and tunes out for a whole rant by Ian and Chris.  This felt like old times, it twas goooooodd!  Enjoy!

fields.title: Lord of Chaos: Chapters 29 and 30 (S 6, Ep. 15)
fields.description:
You are HEALED! And you are HEALED! And you are HEALED!  We welcome Nerdy Nightly as guests to this episode for some great chapters with soooo many implications for not just this book but perhaps the rest of the series! This was a lot of fun to record and hopefully you all have a lot of fun listening!  Enjoy!

Nerdy Nightly Website: https://www.nerdynightly.com/


The Wheel Reads Website: https://www.thewheelreads.com/

fields.title: Lord of Chaos: Chapters 27 and 28 (Season 6, Episode 14)
fields.description:
We got the whole crew from Talk'Aran'Rhiod to agree to join us for a night of fun!  Rand handles the Tower embassy and manages to make Egwene upset all at the same time.  Then we get some 50 shades of grey man and then switch to Padan Fain POV that is to say the least disturbing... Had a ton of fun recording this episode and please go check out Talk'Aran'Rhiod Showcast at www.talkaranrhiod.com


The Wheel Reads website: www.thewheelreads.com

fields.title: Lord of Chaos: Chapters 25 and 26 (S6 Ep. 13)
fields.description:
In what might be the shortest episode we have ever done (Thanks to the premiere of Rings of Power) we start with Eggy sensing a ton of channeling from Aes Sedai that are super sus, then she bumps in lover boy for Ian's favorite part of this book, we switch to Rand and some Whitecloaks that obviously did not think this through (Do they ever?) and end with Rand Cairhean!  Enjoy!

Website: www.thewheelreads.com

fields.title: Lord of Chaos: Chapters 22, 23, and 24 (S 6, Ep. 12)
fields.description:
We welcome back the doctor to the podcast!  Alan's brother that is! Legal Disclaimer: All medical opinions rendered on this podcast are jokes and are not to be taken seriously.  Welp we learn about Ian's rash?!?!? Mat does not pretty sweet bo staff skills, the Forsaken still have us guessing WHATS IN THE BOX?????, and there is an Egwene chapter. We love Egwene but not the most interesting of chapters but we still had fun!  Enjoy!

Website: www.thewheelreads.com

fields.title: Lord of Chaos: Chapters 19, 20, and 21 (S6 Ep. 11)
fields.description: Will Avienda decide to try to kill Rand? Is she pregnant? Do all Ogier really sound the same? What really happened in Shadar Logoth? I don't think Ian or Chris really figured any of this out but it was still fun to hear them ramble about it!  Enjoy!

fields.title: Lord of Chaos: Chapters 17 and 18 (S6 Ep 10)
fields.description: This week we spend more time with Rand.  We spend this week in Cairhean passing judgement for a crime and then visiting a school.  We also find the Harid Fel is Alan.  So promoted from Gawyn to Fel.  Alan is thrilled!  Enjoy!

fields.title: Lord of Chaos: Chapters 15 and 16 (S 6, Ep. 9)
fields.description:
What in the Alabama, Austrian Nobility is going on here? Rand's mom is who? So Rand is related to...? Wait but no not that one, but maybe that one? Enjoy!

Website:

www.thewheelreads.com

fields.title: Lord of Chaos: Chapters 13 and 14 (S 6, Ep. 8)
fields.description:
This podcast is a 10 but says giggity way to much... Gawyn's wet dream and Michael Buble makes another appearance!  What more could we ask for?!?!  Enjoy! 

Website:

www.thewheelreads.com

fields.title: Lord of Chaos: Chapters 11 and 12 (S6, Ep. 7)
fields.description:
Zuul takes the helm this week as Verin and Alanna discuss implications on what Alanna did! We then get a little bit with Taim and Rand followed by some time in Salidar.  All in all a pretty packed full episode of fun!  Enjoy!  

Website: www.thewheelreads.com

fields.title: Lord of Chaos: Chapters 9 and 10 (S 6, Ep 6)
fields.description: We welcome Jenn from Goldey Thoughts this week.  Will the Aiel ever become friends with wetlanders? Will Rand calm down from what happened? Are Whitecloaks the good guys?  Find out this week...kinda...   Enjoy!

fields.title: Lord of Chaos: Chapters 7 and 8 (S 6, Ep. 5)
fields.description: Join us this week as we nap again...of course naps are good.  Don't let anyone ever try to nap shame you!  Well this nap was more of a nightmare but still we support naps!  Enjoy!

fields.title: Lord of Chaos: Chapters 5 and 6 (S 6, Ep. 4)
fields.description:
Guess whose back?!?! Ali and Gus from the fabulous Wheel Takes Podcast!!!! Yes, it was fun!  Yes, it was amazing!  Yes, we laughed a lot! And Yes, we actually did talk about Wheel of Time... a little bit!  Always a pleasure to record with them!  Enjoy!

Website: http://thewheelreads.com

fields.title: Lord of Chaos: Chapters 3 and 4 (S 6, Ep. 3)
fields.description: We got jokes!  Well at least Ian does!  Does he appreciate Rand's humor? Will he get wetlander humor?  Listen and Find Out!  Also Lews is going crazy and Mazrim feels underutilized!  Come listen and as always... Enjoy!

fields.title: Lord of Chaos: Chapters 1 and 2 (S 6, Ep. 2)
fields.description: So Davrim Bashere plus Mazrim Taim!!!! Sounds like all I need to say about this episode!  Besides an apology for Alan not knowing how to turn on the correct microphone!!!  Enjoy!

fields.title: Lord of Chaos: Prologue (S6, Ep 1)
fields.description:
Sooo many perspectives, sooo much happened, Chris got Perrin, Ian got giggities, and Alan may have sneaked in a BEEEELLLLAAAAA!!!!!!  So much fun recording this episode, so much happening, and as Chris said "It's about to go down"  Enjoy!

Website: www.thewheelreads.com

fields.title: The Fires of Heaven: Chapters 54, 55, and 56 (S 5, Ep. 23)
fields.description:
The final episode of The Fires of Heaven!!! We welcome Loial's Bookclub Podcast back for this final episode!  Its the end of a book and its a good one!  Do I need to say more?  Come have a listen and enjoy!

Website: www.thewheelreads.com

fields.title: The Fires of Heaven: Chapters 51, 52, and 53 (S5 Ep 22)
fields.description:
In our penultimate episode we had a rollercoaster ride of emotions and speculation.  Couple of big predictions came true while others were missed completely.  These iconic chapters definitely got our first time readers going and of course not believing some deaths.  Stakes are high as we near the end but of course we still manage to have a few laughs inbetween the serious moments.  Enjoy!


Website: www.thewheelreads.com

fields.title: The Fires of Heaven: Chapters 48ish, 49, and 50 (S 5 Ep. 21)
fields.description:
Welcome to armature hour with the Wheel Reads when Alan forgets to hit record, sorry.  Chapter 48 will live in infamy as the missing chapter!  Honestly not much happened.  But the rest of this episode is great as we lead up to the end of the book!  Only two episodes left after this!!!!!  Enjoy!


Website:  www.thewheelreads.com

fields.title: The Fires of Heaven: Chapters 46 and 47 (S5, Ep. 20)
fields.description: Welcome back to another fun episode of The Wheel Reads as we cover a bit of what happened at JordanCon and Other Battles, Other Weapons and The Price of a Ship.  Some bold predictions made here about Nynaeve's love interest, where we are heading with both Rand and Nynaeve and Elayne!  Interested to see if Ian and Chris got some right?  Come listen and find out! Enjoy!

fields.title: The Fires of Heaven: Chapters 44 and 45 (S 5 Ep. 19)
fields.description:
Another weekly edition of the Wheel Reads coming at you guys!  Fun chapters although I will say one death would have been a lot cooler if Robert Jordan showed it but fun chapters nonetheless.  Sit back, relax, and enjoy!!!!


Website: www.thewheelreads.com

fields.title: The Fires of Heaven: Chapters 41, 42, and 43 (S5 Ep. 18)
fields.description: Welcome back to the Wheel Reads!  This week we are joined by our Patron Remy in a fun filled episode of Mat being Mat and we are here for it! As we get ready to battle we bounce back and forth between Rand and Mat and really get into Mat's head.  Jokes are made, stories are told, and songs are sung in this fun episode!!! Enjoy!

fields.title: The Fires of Heaven: Chapters 38, 39, and 40
fields.description: This week we get to see what the Prophet is up to and McDreamy himself Galad!  Lots of fun following Nynaeve around Samara as she accidently starts to raise an army maybe and finally finds out where they need to go!  Enjoy!

fields.title: The Fires of Heaven: Chapters 35, 36, and 37 (S5, Ep. 16)
fields.description:
This week we are joined by Jim from Fantasy for the Ages!!!! And I would do any other description injustice than just to say Birgitte!  That is all!  Enjoy!


Website: www.thewheelreads.com

fields.title: The Fires of Heaven: Chapters 32, 33, and 34 (S5, Ep. 15)
fields.description:
We welcome our top tier Patron David back again for another time as a guest as we discuss the fall out of the Quickie Quinzhee and run into some good ole Seanchen!  But more importantly we have Nyneave has a run in with Moghedien and we speculate the fall out from this encounter!  Lots of fun predictions, lots of good drinks, and fun times.

Website: www.thewheelreads.com

fields.title: The Fires of Heaven: Chapters 29, 30, 31 (S5 Ep. 14)
fields.description:
This week we are week we are joined with the Aiel from Three Fold Talk!  Sooo much fun!  Lots of toh! Lots of laughs! Lots of talk of igloos and quinzhees! And yet we were told never again!  #QuinzheeQuickie Enjoy!
Three Fold Talk can be found on Malkier Talk's YouTube:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCZXswsuLZIhYKlDICALD6HQ
The Wheel Reads Website:
www.thewheelreads.com
The Wheel Reads Merchandise:
https://www.newcreationsbyjen.com/collections/thewheelreads

fields.title: The Fires of Heaven: Chapters 27 and 28 (S5 Ep. 13)
fields.description:
This week on "A Way With Words" we learn what diffidence means.  Also we ponder the chapter title Trapped...was he really trapped? Choices might have been a better title and Trapped would have been better for Choices.  Just sayin'  Anywho, come listen to us dive deep into Salidar and everything it has to offer.  As always... Enjoy!
Website: www.thewheelreads.com

fields.title: The Fires of Heaven: Chapters 24, 25, and 26 (S 5, Ep. 12)
fields.description:
The Wheel Reads brings you a new episode filled with joy! Well these are mostly filler chapters but we still had fun.  I know I know there is still a lot of good nuggets in here.  Also we talk about why Mat has not knocked anyone up yet?  Theories abound!!! Enjoy!

Website: www.thewheelreads.com

fields.title: The Fires of Heaven: Chapters 21, 22, and 23 (S5, Ep. 11)
fields.description:
After taking a week off of recording for Alan and his wife to welcome their third child into the world, The Wheel Reads is back again!  Ian and Chris think the gift of the blade is not the only gift Aviendha wants give Rand, Ian shares his favorite bird call, and we talk more about the "choices" Rand must make.  Enjoy!

Website:

www.thewheelreads.com

fields.title: The Fires of Heaven: Chapters 19 and 20 (S 5 Ep. 10)
fields.description:
This week we are joined by the amazing duo from The Gleeman's Apprentice Podcast!  Lots of fun to be had working through Morgase's first Point of View and the checking back in with our good friend Paden Fain!  We also get to see a lot of growth from Rand.  All in all a fun time with a few good laughs!  Enjoy!

https://twitter.com/GleemanTwitch


Wheel Reads Website: www.thewheelreads.com

fields.title: The Fires of Heaven: Chapters 16, 17, and 18 (S5, Ep.9)
fields.description:
Muggydean!!!!!  Good old Moggy! Got to love her.  How wonderful life is now she's in our world!  Also Ryan Reynolds aka Galad comes back into the picture for a bit and we are off to join the circus!  Lots of fun, theories, and insight... oh and a bit of singing.  Also I promise next time Ian won't forget his microphone or ten demerits for him!  

Intro done by the wonderful voice of Remy!

Website: www.thewheelreads.com

fields.title: The Fires of Heaven: Chapters 14 and 15 (S 5 Ep. 8)
fields.description:
This week we are joined by the North Harbor Podcast!  Will we finally find the North Harbor?  Will we get through an episode without any technical difficulties?  Will we be sued by Martha Stewart?  Find the answers (maybe) to all these questions and more on The Wheel Reads!!! Enjoy!


Website: www.thewheelreads.com

fields.title: The Fires of Heaven: Chapters 11, 12, and 13 (S5 Ep. 7)
fields.description:
This week on The Wheel Reads we find out Suian can't sing, Paitr get mentioned?, Bela comes back (Thank you The Way of the Leaf), and we run into a circus!!! Wow this is random and find out the kind of gas stations Ian likes to go to!!!!!!!  Enjoy!


Website: www.thewheelreads.com

fields.title: The Fires of Heaven: Chapters 8, 9, and 10 (S 5, Ep. 6)
fields.description:
In our 100th... yes 100!!!!! episode we are back with Nynaeve and Elayne making their way out of Tanchico.  The beaches were great but all good things must come to an end and boy do they really mess this one up!  Still love them but ya think by now they would be better at this!  Some great predictions were made on this episode both for the book and where we will be personally by episode 200!  Enjoy!


Website: www.thewheelreads.com

fields.title: The Fires of Heaven: Chapters 6 and 7 (S 5, Ep. 5)
fields.description:
Guess whose back? Back again? CHRIS!!!  Yep we got Chris back and boy do we go deep this episode.  A whole lot of explanation of fingerblasting and gateways!!!! And some of Ian's fiancé?!?!  This is definitely a fun episode!  Enjoy!


Website: www.thewheelreads.com

fields.title: The Fires of Heaven: Chapters 4 and 5 (S.5, Ep. 4)
fields.description:
This week we are joined by the one and only Kritter XD known for TikTok, Twitch, and Youtube amongst other places!  Unfortunately Chris could not join us this week because he had to have a birthday that his fiancé planned a birthday party on recording night!  All jokes aside Happy Birthday Chris!!!! 

So in this episode a whole lot of Aiel talk first with Rand and then Egwene, and some good old college/military hazing!  Enjoy!


Website: www.thewheelreads.com

fields.title: The Fires of Heaven: Chapters 2 and 3 (S.5, Ep. 3)
fields.description:
Mufasa, ooo say it again... Mufasa!  Welcome back for another fun episode.  This week we hang out in the waste and get inverted.  Laughs are had, theories are given, and we learn a cool new drinking game! *Disclaimer: Any drinking game discussed in an episode should be considered a pretty bad idea and should not be attempted at home.  At least we wholeheartedly DO NOT recommend it!  


Website: www.thewheelreads.com

fields.title: The Fires of Heaven: Chapter 1 (S 5, Ep. 2)
fields.description:
Audio issues equals fixed (mostly), great guests (WoT Spoilers Podcast) equals positive, Chris deep dives equals positive, Ian giggity and that's what she says equals positive.  Final conclusion equals a great episode.  Enjoy!

WoT Spoilers website: https://www.wotspoilers.com/

The Wheel Reads website: www.thewheelreads.com

fields.title: The Fires of Heaven: Prologue (S 5, Ep. 1)
fields.description:
Welcome to The Fires of Heaven.  We start this book off with a bang with special guest TWoTCast!!! Fun was had by all and was a joy to record.  Was not a joy to edit.  

*As a note, in case you didn't know Ian has deployed for the Army and with that his internet is sketchy at best.  Apologies for some of the poor audio quality but I (Alan) spent over 12 hours this week editing trying to make it passable.  We have found a fail safe solution and audio quality should not be an issue moving forward. 

Thank you all for sticking with us and look forward to all the crazy theories and ups and downs of this book in the weeks/months to come!!!

Enjoy!!!

tWoTcast: http://www.twotcast.com/

The Wheel Reads Website: www.thewheelreads.com

fields.title: The Shadow Rising: Chapters 57 and 58 (S 4, Ep. 28)
fields.description:
Nobody panic, everybody stay calm, it's happening!!! OMG ITS HAPPENING!  The Wheel Reads is finishing The Shadow Rising.  Join us this week as we make it rain, fight with Asmodean through the void, and some how come out alive at the end!  Much thanks to our Patron David Russell for joining us for the end!  Stay tuned next time as we begin The Fires of Heaven!  Enjoy!

Website: www.thewheelreads.com

fields.title: The Shadow Rising: Chapter 56 (S4 E. 27)
fields.description:
Lord Goldeneyes! Lord Goldeneyes! Lord Goldeneyes!  Yep this is that episode.  Enjoy!!!!


Website:

www.thewheelreads.com

fields.title: The Shadow Rising: Chapters 54 and 55 (S4, Ep. 26)
fields.description:
I would like to first apologize to any one listening to this episode and especially CallMeNakomi.  This episode was full of technical difficulties and although I can usually edit things like volume this week had a ton of problems, including the audio from our fantastic guest CallMeNakomi.  Content is still good but you may have a hard time understanding CallMeNakomi and I was unable to adjust Chris's volume. So this will be known as the ...

It is what it is episode....
Also Nynaeve is badass!  The end!
Enjoy!

CallMeNakomi: https://www.instagram.com/callmenakomi/
The Wheel Reads: https://www.thewheelreads.com

fields.title: The Shadow Rising: Chapters 52 and 53 (S4 Ep 25)
fields.description:
Nants ingonyama bagithi baba! Sithi uhm ingonyama! Sung as the sun rises on a great day for a new podcast episode!  This week Nynaeve walks the dream, Perrin walks the dream, Lord Luc walks the dream, and Faile and Perrin's dream come true, in mwarriage!  Enjoy!

Website: www.thewheelreads.com

Also no transcripts from this episode.  The program I was using failed three times to generate them and honestly looking into an alternative I am can pull them off YouTube but that doesn't show who is talking so it would be super confusing.

fields.title: The Shadow Rising: Chapters 50 and 51 (S4 Ep 24)
fields.description:
This week we find out Draghkar sing like Ryan Reynolds, the Shaido are up to something, and the three stooges make an appearance!  Enjoy!

Website: www.thewheelreads.com

Transcripts: Click Here

fields.title: The Shadow Rising: Chapters 48 and 49 (S4, Ep. 23)
fields.description:
This week on the Wheel Reads we are back in the Waste, lots of Aiel culture to be learned, lots of suspicion to be had, and lots of speculation to be said.  Enjoy!

Website: www.thewheelreads.com 

AI generated text of episode: Text

fields.title: The Shadow Rising: Chapters 46 and 47 (S 4, Ep. 22)
fields.description:
This week we meet a mysterious new forsaken and the Suian is deposed.  On the plus side we get to see Bela again...we missed her!  So come listen to wild theories and a tiny bit of shenanigans.  Enjoy!

Thank you The Way of the Leaf for BELA track!  If you have never watched The Way of the Leaf...you should!


Website:

www.thewheelreads.com

fields.title: The Shadow Rising: Chapters 43, 44, and 45 (S 4, Ep. 21)
fields.description:
This week we welcome Loial's Bookclub podcast as guest for a episode full of song, predictions, and devolves into madness! I mean trollocs and a tinker with sharp objects...its gonna be fun!

Prince Perrin mighty is he, Perrin Aybara, Strong as ten regular men, definitely! He faced the trolloc hordes, A hundred Whitecloaks with swords, Who sent those fades to their lords? Why, Prince Perrin!!!! 

Enjoy!!!!

Loial's Bookclub:

https://anchor.fm/loialspodcast

Wheel Reads Website:

www.thewheelreads.com

fields.title: The Shadow Rising: Chapters 40, 41, and 42 (S4 Ep 20)
fields.description:
This week on the Wheel Reads we will never give you up, we will never let you down, we will never turn around and desert you... Also a little Misty Mountain hopping action from our boy Perrin... oh yeah and Trollocs...and a Fade...and predictions...yeah just listen its a lot of fun!!!! Enjoy!

Website:

www.thewheelreads.com

fields.title: The Shadow Rising: Chapters 38 and 39 (S 4, Ep. 19)
fields.description:
This week we are Definitely Not joined by Odin all the way from the future in Australia!  N'Odin is one of our Patrons and definitely did add to this episode.  Honestly these chapter felt a like filler chapters so jokes and tangents were made along with some more serious talk around Elyane getting drunk.  Enjoy!  Also make sure to watch N'Odin's reaction video to the trailer!


N'Odin's reaction video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-BR_wjOHAT0

fields.title: The Shadow Rising: Chapters 36 and 37 (S 4, Ep. 18)
fields.description:
We welcome the sultry voices of our favorite puppets from the Way of the Leaf!!! Great episode or is it?  It is what it is.  Also a lot of horror talk.  Enjoy!

The Way of the Leaf:

https://www.youtube.com/c/TheWayOfTheLeaf

The Wheel Reads:

www.thewheelreads.com

fields.title: The Shadow Rising: Chapters 34 and 35 (S 4 Ep. 17)
fields.description:
Finally another episode and although things derailed a bit... just tangents...this was a fun episode.  Ian and Chris make some great predictions about the future of these books as Rand has been finally named He Who Comes With the Dawn!!!  Also we talk about Chris's bedframe, Mrs. Body Fluids, and much more... Enjoy!

Website:

www.thewheelreads.com

fields.title: The Shadow Rising: Chapters 32 and 33 (S 4, Ep. 16)
fields.description:
This week we join Perrin to gather a small army to rescue the captured Edmond's fielders.  We learn that Tam is Tam Traveling Poop and Verin and Loial are destined to be together.  Apparently Ian is shipping them!  Come listen and enjoy!!!

Website: www.thewheelreads.com

fields.title: The Shadow Rising: Chapters 29, 30, and 31 (S4 Ep. 15)
fields.description:
This week we are joined by Vance from Bard of the Red Hand!  In this somber episode we learn the fate of Perrin's family and begin to hash out a plan on what to do next. We finally learn what the Someshta actually means. (Don't care if it is right it is canon now) Also Ian may or not be in the dog house!  Dun Dun Duuuuuunnnn!!!!! Enjoy!

Bard of the Red Hand:

https://linktr.ee/RedHandBard

Wheel Reads Website:

www.thewheelreads.com

fields.title: The Shadow Rising: Chapters 27 and 28 (S4 Ep. 14)
fields.description:
We are back with Perrin and crew....or should we say Loial and crew.  This week we deal with a uncomfortable scene in the Ways and meet a new mysterious character...Slayer... we also level up a bunch in the wolf dream before stumbling on a familiar tower with a familiar woman outside giving guidance about a familiar guy with in the tower next to a familiar wolf.  Sounds sus to me.  Enjoy!

Website: www.thewheelreads.com

fields.title: The Shadow Rising: Chapters 25 and 26 (S 4, Ep. 13)
fields.description:
This week we take a stroll through the glass columns of Rhuidean! Do I need to say more? So much to talk about. Enjoy!

Website: www.thewheelreads.com

fields.title: The Shadow Rising: Chapters 23 and 24 (S4, Ep. 12)
fields.description:
This week on The Wheel Reads we are in the waste!  Mat has a few knives, Rand and everyone else head to Rhuidean (but the girls do it naked...why?), Mat walks through a door and all the crap hits the fan!  So much happens but so good!  Enjoy! 

Website: www.thewheelreads.com

fields.title: The Shadow Rising: Chapters 21 and 22 (S4, Ep. 11)
fields.description: This week we are joined by special guest Meatwad from Aqua Teen Hunger Force!  We get in Moiraine's head and realize for once she has no clue about what is going on! Rand makes his pronouncements and then decides to bounce to the Waste.  What could go wrong?  Predictions fly, laughs are had, and solid parenting advice is given (kinda...not really)  Enjoy!

fields.title: The Shadow Rising: Chapters 18, 19, and 20 (S 4, Ep. 10)
fields.description:
In this very "mature" episode we head down to the Ways and get on a boat (not at the same time with the same people).  We get introduced to the sea folk culture, see Loial get angry?, and make speculate about what just happened.  Probably something to do with Thom's mustaches!  Enjoy!

Website: www.thewheelreads.com

fields.title: The Shadow Rising: Chapters 16 and 17 (S4, Ep. 9)
fields.description:
This week we are joined by Tree as a guest to go through the high school musical, Wheel of Time edition so grab your red rods, we are getting heavy! Enjoy!

Tree's Discord: https://discord.gg/ubNUwdPwb7

The Wheel Reads Website: www.thewheelreads.com

fields.title: The Shadow Rising: Chapters 13, 14, and 15 (S4, Ep. 8)
fields.description:
We're back again and boy is it a good one.  DeeTee for WoT Trivia joins us for this episode as we spend most of the episode talking about Berelain.  But wait there's more we also enter a little doorway with Mat!!!! The predictions run wild, jokes flow, stories are told.  Come listen and enjoy!

WoT Trivia: https://discord.gg/rVzUaZ46hu

Wheel Reads website: www.thewheelreads.com

fields.title: The Shadow Rising: Chapters 11 and 12 (S4, Ep. 7)
fields.description: This week on The Wheel Reads, we meet Amys.  Egwene finds out she knows nothing Jon Snow soooo she is going to the waste to train.  We also learn a whole lot more about Aiel culture.  And finally we learn Ian can detach his lower jaw or something...I still don't really know what happened there.  Enjoy!

fields.title: The Shadow Rising: Chapters 9 and 10 (S 4, Ep. 6)
fields.description:
This week on The Wheel Reads, we are joined by the one and only Notorious D.O.G. Delusions of Graendal!!! In these action packed chapters, Ian fiancé comes back and then all hell breaks loose.  I mean literally dead bodies everywhere.  And even throughout all this we are still able to schedule some Wings and Pizza night!  Come listen and enjoy!!!

Feather and Mountain Podcast: https://anchor.fm/feather-and-mountain

The Wheel Reads website: www.thewheelreads.com

fields.title: The Shadow Rising: Chapters 7 and 8 (S4, Ep. 5)
fields.description:
This week we are joined by the lovely voices of The Road to Tar Valon Podcast!  We learn so much about the gender dualism of the power and Elyane gets all googly eyes for Rand.  This was a ton of fun to record and hope you all have as much fun listening! Enjoy!

Road to Tar Valon Podcast: https://anchor.fm/roadtotarvalon

The Wheel Reads Website: www.thewheelreads.com

fields.title: The Shadow Rising: Chapters 5 and 6 (S4, Ep.4)
fields.description:
In this episode we find Moiraine mad at Rand, Egwene and Elyane having a bonding moment, and something about a door.  What's in the door?!?!? Enjoy! 

Special thanks to The Way of the Leaf for providing a lovely recording of Bela!

Website: www.thewheelreads.com

fields.title: The Shadow Rising: Chapters 3 and 4 (S4, Ep. 3)
fields.description:
This week on The Wheel Reads...we start with Perrin going to confront Rand and learn a lot about bubbles.  Also some pretty good dialogue between Lan and Rhuarc.  Next we switch to Thom and Mat which just leads more to the question...who is Thom really?  Songs were sang, giggities were given, all around fun was had!  Enjoy!!!

Website: www.thewheelreads.com

fields.title: The Shadow Rising: Chapter 2 (S 4, Ep. 2)
fields.description:
Craziness....just all around craziness.  I give the episode 3 out of 3 giggitys: Giggity, Giggity, Giggity!  Thank you WoTCensus for joining us! Sorry about some of the audio towards the end of the episode I did my best to get the volume turned up but it is what it is!  Enjoy!

Links:

Website: www.thewheelreads.com

Red Rod Ter'Angreal for sale: https://shopwheeloftime.com/products/red-rod-terangreal

fields.title: The Shadow Rising: Chapter 1 (S4 Ep. 1)
fields.description:
We begin The Shadow Rising!!! This episode features a bit a Min, a bit of Elida, a bit of Whitecloaks, a bit of Seanchan, and a whole lot of rum!  I mean a whole lot of rum!!! Twas fun to record, I hope you all enjoy it as much as we did making it!!!!

Website: www.thewheelreads.com

fields.title: The Dragon Reborn: Chapters 54, 55, and 56 (S 3, Ep. 22)
fields.description:
The Final episode of The Dragon Reborn!  We welcome Alan's brother Hunter for a fun filled adventure to the end!  It's a wild ride and a ton of fun but we made it through the chapters and some technical difficulties and a persistent Aiel train!  Enjoy!

Website: www.thewheelreads.com

JordanCon 2022 Go Fund Me: https://charity.gofundme.com/o/en/campaign/jordancon1

New YouTube: https://youtu.be/ol4DZQM3mOk

fields.title: The Dragon Reborn: Chapters 51, 52, and 53 (S 3, Ep. 21)
fields.description:
Chris has some big news for you guys...like really BIG news...but on to the episode... the girls get captured...again! Thom has COVID-19 and Perrin goes to save his girl while Loial pulls a classic Gandalf!  Enjoy!

Website: www.thewheelreads.com

JordanCon 2022 GoFundMe: https://charity.gofundme.com/o/en/campaign/jordancon1

fields.title: The Dragon Reborn: Chapters 49 and 50 (S 3, Ep. 20)
fields.description:
Let the Lord of Chaos Reign on this fun filled episode.  We are joined by the Black Tower Podcast and boy do we have some fun.  First with the girls meeting our thief catcher, then Mat being the wild card, and ending with Perrin going back to his roots.  Did I say we had fun...yeah we had fun!!!! Enjoy!!

Website: www.thewheelreads.com

JordanCon 2022 Go Fund Me: https://charity.gofundme.com/o/en/campaign/jordancon1

fields.title: The Dragon Reborn: Chapters 46,47, and 48 (S 3, Ep. 19)
fields.description:
This week Mat plays Splinter Cell in Caemlyn, Thom gets all sentimental, and then DOOO YOOUUU SMELLLLLL WHAT THE ROCK IS COOKING?!?!? We welcome Zuul back to help guide Ian through this one and Chris will be back next week!!!!  Enjoy!

Website: www.thewheelreads.com

fields.title: The Dragon Reborn: Chapters 44 and 45 (S. 3, Ep. 18)
fields.description:
This week Perrin can't keep his mouth shut, Faile is going...nowhere now, Mat plays with fireworks, and Thom and Mat arrive in Caemlyn!  Good predictions, fun readings, and more!  Enjoy!

Website: www.thewheelreads.com

fields.title: The Dragon Reborn: Chapters 42 and 43 (S. 3, Ep. 17)
fields.description:
This week we explore what easing the badger really means, is it the meaning of life? Easing the Badger is Chapter 42 after all.  Grey Men, Darkhounds, and Forsaken....oh my!  Enjoy!

Website: www.thewheelreads.com

fields.title: The Dragon Reborn: Chapters 40 and 41 (S 3, Ep. 16)
fields.description:
This week we have the pleasure of being graced with the amazing voice of Androl: Bard of Time!!! We start with Mat and he gets some boom booms which can't go wrong....right? Then we switch to Perrin and crew where Faile officially joins the group.  Enjoy!

Website: www.thewheelreads.com

fields.title: The Dragon Reborn: Chapters 38 and 39 (S 3, Ep. 15)
fields.description: We welcome on of our Patrons Jake as a guest on this episode! Lots for fun learning more about Aiel and Balefire (Finger blasting)!!!! Plus some pretty crazy theories from Ian and Chris.  Enjoy!

fields.title: The Dragon Reborn: Chapters 36 and 37 (S 3, Ep. 14)
fields.description:
In this week's episode we start with some dreams, Ian sees his fiancé, Rand goes all psycho killer, and we run aground on a ship.  Lots of storytime and fun!  Enjoy! 

Website: www.thewheelreads.com

fields.title: The Dragon Reborn: Chapters 33, 34, and 35 (S 3, Ep. 13)
fields.description:
This week we are back with Loial and gang...or Perrin and gang... We also meet a few new characters, some hunters of the horn, a new innkeeper...and oh yeah Gaul and Mandarb ... I mean Zarine ... or Faile (Whatever she calls herself)  Enjoy!


Website: www.thewheelreads.com

fields.title: The Dragon Reborn: Chapters 30, 31, and 32 (S 3, Ep. 12)
fields.description:
Its all about Mat!!! Three Mat chapters and THOM!!!! A fun episode full of adventure and the sultry voice of Rob from Malkier Talks!! Come listen and enjoy!

Website: www.thewheelreads.com

fields.title: The Dragon Reborn: Chapters 27, 28, and 29 (S 3, Ep. 11)
fields.description:
This week we have some fun with dreams, lots of dreams.  The other two chapters were more bridge chapters...important to plot but not a lot happening besides maybe Lanfear... and Mat finding a way out... and the girls leaving for Tear... ok a lot happens!!! Enjoy!


Website: www.thewheelreads.com

fields.title: The Dragon Reborn: Chapters 24, 25, and 26 (S 3, Ep. 10)
fields.description:
In this girthy episode, we are joined by the wonderful Wheel Takes Podcast and boy was it fun!!! Many tangents were had, many wisecracks were made, and many stories told....oh and we did talk about these chapters a bit.  Mat does his thing and the girls chase Else around!  Enjoy!


Website: www.thewheelreads.com

fields.title: The Dragon Reborn: Chapters 22 and 23 (S 3, Ep. 9)
fields.description:
This week on The Wheel Reads, Egwene gets raised and Chris goes on quite the prediction and theorizing spree...like full on floaty moments.  Tis was a good one....Listen and Enjoy!!!!

Website: www.thewheelreads.com

fields.title: The Dragon Reborn: Chapters 19, 20, and 21 (S 3, Ep. 8)
fields.description:
This week we get Mat's first point of view chapters!!!! We find Mat is more deep than we thought, Selene comes back and Ian starts to think she is actually good...probably because she is really hot, then Egwene gets a ring to sleep with! Sorry about the buzz in the recording, we will just call that foreshadowing! 

Website: www.thewheelreads.com

fields.title: The Dragon Reborn: Chapters 16, 17, and 18 (S 3, Ep. 7)
fields.description:
Things I learned this year doing a podcast... 1) Podcasting around the holidays is tough 2) Ian and Chris make awesome if not sometimes crazy predictions 3) I love all of the interactions with all our listeners and finally 4) Jabba the Hutt says Die Hard is a Christmas movie.  Enjoy a fun filled episode as we finally heal Mat...or do we?  Enjoy!!!!!

Website: www.thewheelreads.com

fields.title: The Dragon Reborn: Chapters 13, 14, and 15 (S 3, Ep. 6)
fields.description:
This week we had the pleasure of having Lauren from Unraveling the Pattern on our show!  The girls get punished but also find that they will be hunting the Black Ajah and then are almost assassinated by a new kind of threat!!!  This episode was a ton of fun and I hope you all enjoy!

Website: www.thewheelreads.com

fields.title: The Dragon Reborn: Chapters 10, 11, and 12 (S 3, Ep. 5)
fields.description:
In this episode we switch back to the girls and Egwene and company go crazy on some Whitecloaks. We get a nice map of "Tar Valon" and find out all the girls are in so much trouble!  Sorry for the delay on the episode but these things happen.  Enjoy!
Website: www.thewheelreads.com

fields.title: The Dragon Reborn: Chapters 7, 8, and 9 (S 3, Ep. 4)
fields.description:
We finally leave the mountains and head right into the town of Jarra! We see wolf boy and have some crazy dreams about wolves and then rand is attacked by "wolves"  a very wolfy episode indeed! Also at the end we welcome Vance from The Gleemen youtube channel as a quick guest!!!! 

Website: www.thewheelreads.com

fields.title: The Dragon Reborn: Chapters 4, 5, and 6 (S 3, Ep. 3)

This week on The Wheel Reads....Rand creates quite the disturbance if you know what I mean....no literally an earthquake...Ian and Chris try to find innuendos in everything.  Then we get some news about strange stuff happening on the plain or is it plane or.... anyways kinda filler chapters but we diffidently make the most of it. Come listen! Enjoy!

Website: www.thewheelreads.com

fields.title: The Dragon Reborn: Prologue and Chapter 1 (S 3, Ep. 1)
fields.description: We begin book three of The Wheel of Time!!!! Well the prologue is fun with Whitecloaks and all but then we wait on the mountain, and wait, and wait.  Come listen to a beginning! Enjoy!

We welcome Zuul as our guest for the final episode of The Great Hunt!!!! Yes you read that right five chapters!!! Its the end of The Great Hunt and boy is it a ride to the end!  Enjoy!

Website: www.thewheelreads.com

fields.title: The Great Hunt: Chapters 44 and 45 (S 2, Ep. 19)

This week we found Fain's trail but now there are Whitecloaks close by, Verin draws in the dirt, Perrin calls dibs, Loial is upset, and then five ride forth! Smash to Nynaeve making a power whip and then pulling off a kidnapping then we switch to Rand with a totally crazy end to this episode....Its a lot, its fun, and predictions are flying everywhere.  Enjoy!
Website: www.thewheelreads.com

fields.title: The Great Hunt: Chapters 41, 42, and 43 (S 2, Ep. 18)

On this weeks episode we start with Rand and company visiting villages and Rand has another dream, then smash to our girls, Nynaeve and Elayne are planning a rescue, Egwene is being tortured, oh and there do be some Bayle Doman in this episode!  Enjoy!

Website: www.thewheelreads.com

fields.title: The Great Hunt: Chapters 38, 39, and 40 (S 2, Ep. 17)
fields.description:
Lots of ball talk in the beginning, followed by the Ways, and then that B*tch!  Oh yeah Bela too!  Listen and Enjoy!
Website: www.thewheelreads.com

fields.title: The Great Hunt: Chapters 35, 36, and 37 (S 2, Ep. 16)
fields.description: We hang out with a bunch of Ogier and then... flicker, flicker, flicker, flicker, flicker, flicker, flicker, flicker, flicker, flicker, flicker, flicker, flicker!!! Website: www.thewheelreads.com

fields.title: The Great Hunt: Chapters 32, 33, and 34 (S 2, Ep. 15)
fields.description: This week the game gets real...the horn goes to Falme, people start dying sending Cairhien into chaos, Thom goes full revenge of the gleeman, Rand takes charge and decide they need to go to the other side of the world.  Also apologies for all the technical difficulties this episode it was a little rougher than normal.  Enjoy!  www.thewheelreads.com

fields.title: The Great Hunt: Chapters 30 and 31 (S 2 Ep. 14)
fields.description: This week we play the great game, we lose the horn, we have a reunion, a fire, and a plan!  Come join us for all the fun! All links can be found at www.thewheelreads.com  Enjoy!

fields.description:
Soooo much this episode! We start in Cairhien and play with some fire works, then we go to Kinslayer's Dagger to dance with an Aielman, then we go to the Almoth Plain to check in with Whitecloaks, before joining Bayle Doman just in time to be captured by Seanchan.  So many cultures, so many new plots, a few new predictions and as always a ton of fun! Enjoy!  
Website: www.thewheelreads.com

One really one thing to say.....THOM!  That sums up this episode.

In this episode, Desmond and his wolf brother dive deep into the latest revelations from "The Wheel of Time." With a mix of humor and critical analysis, our hosts dissect the complexities of character motivations, power dynamics, and the impact of recent events on the storyline. As they explore the intricate relationships between Rand, Egwene, and Lanfear, they also tackle the moral dilemmas faced by the characters and the consequences of their choices. Expect lively discussions about the implications of Leandrin's actions, the significance of the Aiel's presence, and the foreshadowing of future conflicts. Will Rand be able to navigate the treacherous waters of his destiny, or will the shadows of the past drag him down? Tune in for an engaging conversation that promises to illuminate the latest developments in this epic saga!

fields.title: S4 Ep10: Season 3: Episode 5: Tel'aran'rhiod
fields.description:
In this episode, join Desmond and his wolf brother as they navigate the twists and turns of the latest installment of "The Wheel of Time." Our hosts dive into the complexities of the narrative, exploring the intricacies of character arcs and the implications of key plot developments. From the challenges faced by Rand and Moraine to the political machinations within the White Tower, they dissect the episode's themes with humor and insight. As they discuss the significance of the Aiel's presence in the Two Rivers, the nature of power dynamics, and the growing tensions among the characters, expect a lively exchange filled with theories and fan reactions. They tackle burning questions about character motivations, the adaptation's fidelity to the source material, and the impact of recent events on the storyline. Also, this episode's audio quality might differ from our usual standard, with all our guests sharing a single track, but rest assured, the content remains as engaging as ever. So, strap in for a thought-provoking session with the Wolf Brothers and White Cloaks, and remember to keep an open mind as you navigate through this tapestry of perspectives.

At the beginning of this book, all major protagonists are together at the Stone of Tear, where Rand al'Thor had recently, at the end of The Dragon Reborn, shown to the world that he was the Dragon Reborn by wielding Callandor.

"I think I am part of Rand's destiny, somehow. Mat, too. I think he can't do what he as to unless we do our part, as well. That is the duty. How can I walk away if it might mean Rand will fail."
   — Perrin Aybara to Faile

Two weeks have gone by since the Stone of Tear fell to Rand and the Aiel. Perrin and Faile Bashere are in their quarters in the Stone of Tear. Faile comments on Perrin's lackluster quarters and is sure Mat has better, but Perrin is more than satisfied and wants nothing fancy. Faile tries to talk Perrin into leaving Tear with her, but Perrin insists that he cannot leave because he is ta'veren and too closely tied to Rand. Perrin takes his hammer off the wall and holds it, which makes him feel better.
A cock crows…

fields.title: S2 Ep50: Daes Dae'Mar (207) Commentary
fields.description:
Daes Dae'mar is a phrase in the Old Tongue which translates to The Great Game, but is more commonly known as The Game Of Houses.
It refers to the political and social maneuvering employed by the nobility of various nations to gain status or wealth, or to cause the downfall of others they dislike.
The Great Game is played the most heavily in Cairhien, where the most seemingly irrelevant act can cause lords and ladies to speculate endlessly about one's motives; even servants of the Cairhienin nobility play their own version of Daes Dae'mar. Conversely, it is rarely seen in the Borderlands, as Borderlanders are more concerned with Shadowspawn and the Blight than individual power, status or wealth.

 - https://wot.fandom.com/wiki/Daes_Dae'mar?so=search

Mat is abducted from Cairhien by Lanfear and brought to Ishamael in Falme, who gives him a tea that shows him visions of himself as a murderer. Nynaeve and Elayne manages to use the a'dam to take a sul'dam captive after learning from Loial that only sul'dams can approach the kennels where Egwene is held. Perrin and Aviendha meet up with two other Aiel warriors, Bain and Chiad, who join them in their journey to Falme. In Cairhien, Rand is brought to Siuan Sanche, who takes him captive, intending to use him as a weapon against the Dark One. Barthanes is revealed to be a Darkfriend, and tasked by Liandrin with killing Moiraine, but Anvaere uncovers the plot and locks him in a cell. Lan learns from Logain that Ishamael didn't still Moiraine, but shielded her. Rand persuades Lanfear to help him get to Falme, and she assaults the Foregate to distract Siuan, allowing Moiraine and Lan to escape with Rand, who uses the One Power to cut the shield around Moiraine, allowing her to channel again. Siuan finds them as they are about to leave Cairhien through a Waygate, but she is ambushed by Lanfear, who easily defeats her and opens the gate, allowing Rand, Moiraine and Lan to leave for Falme.

 - https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Wheel_of_Time_(TV_series)

fields.title: S2 Ep49: Eyes Without Pity (206) Commentary
fields.description:
Please Like, Subscribe, and tell a friend about Thank the Light.

Want more Phatty, Jeremy and Desmond? 
Check out our Patreon page at patreon.com/thankthelight

Eyes-and-ears is a term used loosely to describe a network of spies, or an individual informant loyal to a group or individual. Eyes-and-ears is a term most commonly used by the White Tower, though other organizations and rulers employ eyes-and-ears as well. Eyes-and-ears are also sometimes known in those circles simply as spy networks, though the term is interchangeable. - wot.fandom.com

In Falme, Renna, a sul'dam, tries to break Egwene and make her understand that she is nothing but a damane, a magic user who needs to be leashed and controlled by sul'dam through the a'dam, a collar used to control damane. Renna demonstrates to Egwene how sul'dam control damane, and slowly breaks her through physical and psychological torture. Nynaeve and Elayne hide with Ryma in Falme, and they try to open an a'dam to rescue Egwene. Unfortunately, Nynaeve channels too much during their attempts, alerting the Seanchan, who come for them. Ryma fights the Seanchan to protect Elane and Nynaeve, but is captured as a damane. In Tel'aran'rhiod, Lanfear tries to convince Rand to join her by promising to protect him from Ishamael and showing him that Egwene is in Falme. She also tells Rand that she will kill Moiraine if she sees them together. At the same time, Mat and Min arrive in Cairhien, and Rand and Mat meet in the Foregate and catch up on their adventures. Rand tells Mat that Egwene has been captured in Falme. However, Min warns Mat that Ishamael intends for him to go to Falme with Rand, where he may try to kill Rand. This causes Mat to avoid leaving with Rand. Siuan Sanche, the Amyrlin Seat, summons Moiraine for an audience after Lan warns Siuan of Moiraine's actions. Before Rand can leave to attempt a rescue mission, he is intercepted by Lan, Alanna, and her warders, who tell him they can't let him leave. - wikipedia

fields.title: S2 Ep46: Daughter of the Night (204) Commentary
fields.description:
Rand al'Thor has started a new life in the City of Cairhien after seemingly defeating The Man at the Eye of the World. He is living in the Foregate with Selene, an innkeeper, and the two have a "no strings attached" relationship. Rand also has a job as an orderly in a sanitarium in the city, where Logain Ablar is now being treated since he was gentled by the Aes Sedai.
While searching for a bottle of Ghealdanin red wine for Logain, Rand and Selene gatecrash a party being held for the nobility. They receive a great amount of attention, as many assume that Rand is an outlander lord who they can take advantage of. Rand also begins causing damage to the Foregate as he struggles with his sanity.

fields.title: S2 Ep45: What Might Be (203) Commentary
fields.description:

Moiraine and Lan recover after the attack from the Fades, and prepare to leave for the White Tower despite Moiraine being exiled by the Amyrlin. While on their way there, Verin deduces that Moiraine found the Dragon Reborn, and intends to serve him no matter what. Meanwhile, Rand has gone into hiding at the Foregate in Cairhien, and been taken in by an innkeeper named Selene whom he has developed a romantic relationship with. He works at an asylum and manages to gain access to the False Dragon Logain, a patient there. At the White Tower, Liandrin pushes for Nynaeve to undergo the testing and become an Accepted, which would allow Liandrin to train her. Alanna protests but leaves the Tower to aid Moiraine. Meanwhile, Egwene befriends Elayne Trakand, the daughter-heir of Andor and fellow Novice. Nynaeve follows Liandrin through a secret passage in the Tower, and sees her caring for a sick man. Mat befriends Min, who Liandrin has also locked up, and Min has a vision of Mat stabbing Rand, which she keeps to herself. Moiraine releases Lan from her service, claiming that he can't protect her anymore, and has Alanna and her warders escort him to the Tower. Perrin and the Shienarans find the site of a massacre where innocent people have been slaughtered and a Fade nailed to a wall. They later arrive at a small village, which is attacked by a Seanchan force soon after. Perrin, Loial, and the Shienarans are captured, as the Seanchan leader Suroth arrives along with Ishamael.

-Wikipedia

fields.title: S2 Ep26: People Should Kneel For I Am The Dragon Reborn
fields.description:
The Dragon Reborn: Chapter 36 - Daughter of the Night

The Episode that almost wasn’t. I spent 4 hours editing this masterpiece and another 4 resurrecting it from an emptied trash bin, Rand ain’t got nothing on me! Enjoy!!

"I have served the Lord of the Twilight long. Long did I lie imprisoned for my service, in an endless, dreamless sleep. Only Gray Men and Myrddraal are denied dreams. Even Trollocs can dream. Dreams were always mine, to use and walk. Now I am free again, and I will use what is mine."
   — Lanfear

He leaves their bodies in a kneeling fashion, quipping that people should kneel to him if he is indeed the Dragon Reborn.

fields.description:

"The Creator is good, Perrin. The Father of Lies is evil. The Pattern of Age, the Age Lace itself, is neither. The Pattern is what is. The Wheel of Time weaves all lives into the Pattern, all actions. A pattern that is all one color is no pattern. For the Pattern of an Age, good and ill are the warp and the woof."

“Perrin recalls the various villages and towns they traveled through, seeing different events that happened in Rand’s wake.”

fields.description:

"I have never been able to like Elaida, but I cannot truly believe she is Black Ajah. And Sheriam? It's impossible."
   — Elayne to Egwene and Nynaeve

“Elayne says they have no pattern in their birthdays, names, Ajahs or nationalities. The sisters are evenly distributed with two in each Ajah and Liandrin as the only Red. This means there is a pattern in no pattern and that there must be more Black Ajah still in the tower. There must be an extended number of Black Ajah in order for them to be able to choose such an even distribution.”

fields.description:
“The Wheel of Time turns, and Ages come and pass, leaving memories that become legend. Legend fades to myth, and even myth is long forgotten when the Age that gave it birth comes again. In one Age, called the Third Age by some, an Age yet to come, an Age long past, a wind rose above the great mountainous island of Tremalking. The wind was not the beginning. There are neither beginnings nor endings to the Wheel of Time. But it was a beginning.”

fields.title: S2 Ep19: The Wheel Weaves…
fields.description:
We are talking about WoT news, some good, some bad, much speculated.

“Moiraine, Lan, Uno and Loial join them. Moiraine relates the news from Leya. Almoth Plain is in chaos. Hunters for the Horn of Valere have appeared on the plain, but they won't find the horn since it has already been found. A huge force of Whitecloaks is pushing out the Taraboners and Domani rather than attacking those following Rand.[1] The Whitecloaks seem to be intentionally avoiding the Dragonsworn; they publicly announce that they will bring down the false Dragon but always arrive too late to find large bands of Dragonsworn. Loial suggests that Rand could go to his supporters as he wishes then, but Lan is sure that it is some convoluted Whitecloak plot. Three boys resembling Rand have been murdered, probably by Gray Men.”

fields.title: S2 Ep14: Twisted Stone Ring
fields.description:
The Dragon Reborn -  Chapter 21 - A World Of Dreams

"There is one Creator, who exists everywhere at once for all of these worlds. In the same way, there is only one Dark One, who also exists in all of these worlds at once. If he is freed from the prison the Creator made in one world, he is freed on all. So long as he is kept prisoner in one, he remains imprisoned on all."
   — Verin Mathwin

“There are many possible worlds, some of which can be reached by the Portal Stones, but they are all linked by the World of Dreams, Tel'aran'rhiod. Although there are countless different worlds, there is only one Creator and one Dark One; if the Dark One is freed in one, he is free in all.” 

- https://wot.fandom.com/wiki/The_Dragon_Reborn/Chapter_21

"You can turn the worst that comes to your advantage if you only think."
   — Abell Cauthon

“Mat awakens and cannot tell if the thoughts of battles and Moiraine are dreams. Everything is bits and fragments. He thinks of a battle where he is giving commands and knows that he must win or die. Mat does not know if this is real but he is known as a gambler.[1] Mat remembers Moiraine and knows something of Shadar Logoth, and a dagger. Something about going to Tar Valon to be Healed.”

fields.title: S2 Ep9: Black Ajah
fields.description:
The Dragon Reborn - Chapter 13 - Punishments / Chapter 14 - The Bite of the Thorns

"And lest you start thinking it's some sort of reward, remember that the first few weeks as one of the Accepted are used to pick the rotting fish out of the basket of good ones."
"Trust is as slippery as a basket of eels, sometimes. The point is, you two are what I have to work with, thin reeds though you may be."
   — Siuan Sanche

Liandrin and twelve others stole several ter'angreal from the Tower and tried to steal angreal and sa'angreal. They also killed twenty-one people including three Aes Sedai to hide their theft and escape. Even though they were tricked into leaving without permission, they are to be sent to Sheriam for a sound switching and they will work in the kitchens until further notice. The punishments are to be announced publicly which is also part of the punishment.
-https://wot.fandom.com/wiki/The_Dragon_Reborn/Chapter_13

Egwene and Nynaeve are to hunt the Black Ajah for the Amyrlin. Siuan does not assign the task to Elayne even though she trusts her also, since Siuan must be able to tell Morgase that she did not bring any more danger to her.
https://wot.fandom.com/wiki/The_Dragon_Reborn/Chapter_14

fields.title: S1 Ep21: Dreamshards
fields.description:
We start the discussion with another reading from the books of WoT. 
The Dragon Reborn - Chapter 36 - Daughter of the Night

Desmond learns about Tel'aran'rhiod along with Parrin and Rand. 

Tel'aran'rhiod (tel-AYE-rahn-rhee-ODD; Old Tongue: The Unseen World), also known as the World of Dreams and the Wolf Dream, is a parallel world where all the possibilities of the Wheel of Time connect. It is linked to the myriad of worlds that exist within the Wheel. It is both of those worlds and apart from them.

 Other topics discussed:
Tear Seasoned Trolloc Meat
Callandor
Traveling
Desmond's Book Update

If you liked episode 7 commentary, you’re going to LOVE this one, Justin and Jeremy wax on about hopes and dreams of the series to come, dropping lots of wish crumbs without spoilers for the new fans, it’s fucking great.

Have the last few commentaries been a little thin with chatter for you, well don’t give up yet, Cousin Jeremy has joined the show for episode 7 and 8 commentaries. Another long time fan of the books, he and Justin fill the airways with all kinds of theories, thoughts, and hopes for the visual interpretation of The Wheel of Time going forward.

fields.description:
With Special Guest, Cousin Jeremy

Have the last few commentaries been a little thin with chatter for you, well don’t give up yet, Cousin Jeremy has joined the show for episode 7 and 8 commentaries. Another long time fan of the books, he and Justin fill the airways with all kinds of theories, thoughts, and hopes for the visual interpretation of The Wheel of Time going forward.

Please send questions and comments to thankthelight@gmail.com 

Please Like, Subscribe, and tell a friend about Thank the Light.

Find more great podcasts here at What Sounds Awesome from We Mixed It

fields.title: S1 Ep12: The Flame of Tar Valon (106) Commentary
fields.description:
With every episode comes a little more silence as we experience these episodes in real time and get into what is happening on screen. Press play on the podcast then press play on Amazon and take us with you as you relive exciting moments from season one. 

And, hey, maybe you’re doing your own rewatch and don’t need two ding dongs yammering on while you’re trying to experience these great episodes again. Well then, keep us in mind for a future viewing, all you have are these 8 episodes for a couple months, so throw these on during your 5th, 6th or 20th watch to spice things up when your meatspace friends can’t stand another episode of WoT.

Spoiler alert: we already recorded commentaries for episode 7 and 8 and we have a special guest lined up that will help fill all of our silent moments. 

Please send questions and comments to thankthelight@gmail.com 

Please Like, Subscribe, and tell a friend about Thank the Light.

Find more great podcasts here at What Sounds Awesome from We Mixed It

fields.title: S1 Ep11: Blood Calls Blood (105) Commentary
fields.description:
