fields.description: One more time, from the top! Join us as we embark on the journey that is book 9, Winter's Heart.  In the prologue we check in with Seaine and Pevara as they hunt the Black ajah in the White Tower.  We jump over to Elayne who is dealing with the current state of affairs in Andor, including the Black Tower, as well as partaking in a sacred Aiel ceremony.  Toveine is coming to grips with what has happened to the captured sisters and the political undercurrents in the Black Tower.  And finally Ra...

fields.title: Ep83: The Path of Daggers, Chapters 28 - 31
fields.description: It's that time again! A book finale! And boy, what a finale it is. After the wild events of our previous episode, there is plenty more to chew on here.   Elayne has to deal with new developments in the Kin/Aes Sedai relationship, and finally arrives in Caemlyn to begin her claim in earnest.   We bid farewell to Jaichim Carridin, but before you gett too excited, he's replaced by arguably an even more hateful character in Daved Hanlon.   In Cairhien the Aes Sedai kidnappers under...

fields.title: Ep82: The Path of Daggers, Chapters 24 - 27
fields.description: Book 8 is almost done and stuff is HAPPENING!  Rand faces the full Seanchan force at Ebou Dar and stuff goes a little wild.  In the White Tower Elaida is bossed about by Alviarin, who in turn has a meeting with Mesaana and starts to get a little ahead of herself...  The hunt for the Black Ajah in the White Tower has begun in earnest and quickly reaps some rewards. While near the Black Tower, things are not much better for the Aes Sedai.  Rand returns to Cairhien where he has to reckon with Mi...

fields.title: Ep81: The Path of Daggers, Chapters 20 - 23
fields.description: Welcome back friends!  In this episode we check in briefly with the women who fled the farm near Ebou Dar as it was attacked by the Seanchan. When everyone is healed and rested up, the party of Aes Sedai, Kin, Seafolk and other hangers on make their way to Caemlyn  We then jump to Rand who has undertaken a massive task. He's planning on rooting out the Seanchan from the mountains between Ebou Dar and Illian, and he's doing it with a handful of soldiers, nobles plotting against him and around ...

fields.title: Ep80: The Path of Daggers, Chapters 16 - 19
fields.description: And we're back! Guess who else is back? Egwene. The young, rebel Amyrlin Seat with a plan. And it all plays out in this episode.  From the setup at camp, the meeting on the ice, the interactions with all the Aes Sedai factions along the way and finally, the showdown with the Hall.  Great stuff and thouroughly compelling! But did you enjoy it? Let us know, using th social media links below! Twitter - @BloodAndAshPodEmail - moritz@bloodandashespodcast.comYouTube - Blood and AshesFacebook - Bloo...

fields.title: Ep79: The Path of Daggers, Chapters 12 - 15
fields.description: What a mix in this episode!  Three forsaken in one room. That goes about as well as you'd imagine. ThenCadsuane and Sorilea in one room, another clash of strong personalities...  Rand is scooping up the remnants of Lord Brend's army in the countryside and then gets reports from Eben Hopwill, Fedwin Morr and Torval before sending them all off. Narishma gets some special instructions too...  And we get back to Egwene who has had another obstacle put in her way. Quite literally. An army.  Let us...

fields.title: Ep78: The Path of Daggers, Chapters 9 - 11
fields.description: Things are happening!  Well, sort of. Perrin is trying to manage his hodge podge army while at the same time meddling in Wise Ones' affairs. Seems foolhardy.  But things suddenly take a turn when Alliandre shows up in camp and Perrin stumbles his way to a small victory. And then some hangings. Also, Elyas!  We catch up with the loathemsome Sevanna who is holding on for dear life trying to control the Shaido Wise Ones, and Galina ends up swearing an oath to obey Sevanna and Therava, and it's s...

fields.title: Ep77: The Path of Daggers, Chapters 6 - 8
fields.description: We're back after a loooong break and we're rearing to go!  Much like Nynaeve, Elayne and Aviendha as they flee the Kin's farm to avoid Seanchan capture. In the process Elayne attempts something dangerous and almost pays the ultimate price...  Perrin in the meantime sends Berelain to meet with Queen Alliandre and on the way back to his camp saves Morgase and co. from a Dragonsworn attack. They join his army and suddenly Faile has a bunch of staff!  Also, Tallanvor continues his tortured courts...

fields.title: Ep76: The Path of Daggers, Chapters 2 - 5
fields.description: Welcome back everyone! In this episode we finally get to see the use of the fabled Bowl of the Winds! But first we have a bit of housekeeping to do.  The girls, Windfinders, Kin and Aes Sedai travel through the gateway to the Kin's farm while being observed by both Moridin and the gholam. Even Moridin is impressed by Aviendha's skill at unweaving.  On the other side of the gateway there is a ride of a couple hours until they reach the farm and the various groups put Elayne's skills as a leade...

fields.title: Ep75: The Path of Daggers, Prologue - Chapter 1
fields.description: Well well well! What's this? A brand new book? Excellent!  We join the leaders of the Borderlands as they make a blood pact to... do something?  Verin meanwhile is running her own little game from within the Aiel camp outside Cairhien.  And Aviendha is struggling with her own growing fondness for wetlander extravagances like dresses and horses, much to her consternation. She, Elayne and Nynaeve prepare to move the Kin and the Windfinders to the Kin's farm outside the city so they can use The ...

fields.title: Ep74: A Crown of Swords, Chapters 39 - 41
fields.description: It's the book 7 finale and the halfway point of the series!  Mat tries desperately to get the channelers to listed to him after the Gholam attack and finally gets some traction only to learn Olver is gone. So while everyone prepares to set off with the Bowl of the Winds, Mat heads into the city to find Olver when all hell breaks loose.  Then we check in with a number of villains. Galina, Sevanna, Therava, Sammael, Graendal and even Shaidar Haran make an appearance and Sammael scatters the sha...

fields.title: Ep73: A Crown of Swords, Chapters 36 - 38
fields.description: We're getting close to the end and it's white knuckle stuff!  Rand shows off his sword techniques before he, Min, Cadsuane and others are accosted by Padan Fain and Mashadar 2.0!  Rand takes a ruby hilted dagger to the side and almost dies before Sumitsu and Damer Flinn stabilize his and save his life.  Meanwhile Mat is preoccupied with thoughts of Tylin and her treatment of him while they prepare to retrieve The Bowl of the Winds from the Rahad. But things go terribly wrong and a gholam infl...

fields.title: Ep72: A Crown of Swords, Chapters 32 - 35
fields.description: Hello hello hello!  In this week's episode we check in with everyone's least favourite Amyrlin as she is deftly cornered and manoeuvred by Alviarin. However, the Black ajah sister's actions indirectly result in a fresh hunt for the shadow sisters in the Tower.  Rand is sad. Min makes him feel better and he is bathed and ogled by Min and the Maidens. Now fresh of odour and mind, Rand meets with the Seafolk to finally strike a deal.  Riding his ta'veren fortunes he decides to take on the rebels...

fields.title: Ep71: A Crown of Swords, Chapters 28 - 31
fields.description: Welcome back, friends! Or are we the ones that are back? I forget.  In this episode we bear witness to poor Mat being completely victimised by Tylin. At least he doesn't seem too cut up about it, but it does generate a good conversation about consent.   Elayne puts her foot down with the rebel Aes Sedai and finally gets to show Reanne and The Kin who she really is.  And Moghedien shoots her shot, and misses, effectively freeing Nynaeve from her block. Happy days!  Let us know what you th...

fields.title: Ep70: A Crown of Swords, Chapters 23 - 27
fields.description: Hello and welcome back to the kidnapping corner!   All jokes aside, wtf tries to kidnap Nynaeve and Elayne in Ebou Dar? TThey meet the Kin, get bustled out and immediately fall afoul of some would-be assailants.  In the meantime Moghedien has to face her fate as a Moridin puppet, and Morgase and co live through the Seanchan invasion of Amadicia. Then walk out the front door.  And finally we have Perrin leave Cairhien behind with quite the entourage.   Let us know who planned the kid...

fields.title: Ep69: A Crown of Swords, Chapters 18 - 22
fields.description: We're back and better than ever!  In this episode we see the entrance of everyone's favourite scary grandma, Cadsuane!  We check in with Sevanna, Sammael and Graendal, all being spied on by Moridin who makes his entry into the series. Just who is more crazy or delusional between those is debateable.  We also hop back to Ebou Dar where Birgitte and Mat bond over some pitchers of wine and Nynaeve is forced by Elayne to go apologise to Mat for their their treatment of him after Aviendha schools ...

fields.title: Reasons I'm Excited for Season 2 of Wheel of Time
fields.description: Hello friends!  Here's a little odd one for you! I'm working on a youtube video, which may or may not see the light of day.  But since we missed the last episode in our cycle, I thought I'd sahre the audio with you in podcast form.  Go subscribe to our YouTube channel so you'll see when it's posted! Or send feedback via all the usual links below. Twitter - @BloodAndAshPodYouTube - Blood and AshesFacebook - BloodAndAshesPodcastWeb - www.bloodandashespodcast.com (Now with voicemail capabilities...

fields.title: Ep68: A Crown of Swords, Chapters 13 - 17
fields.description: Welcome back to Ebou Dar! In this episode we leave Egwene and the rebel Aes Sedai behind and check in on our intrepid girls, plus Mat.  Elayne, Aviendha and Nynaeve decide to approach the many Sea Folk anchored in the Ebou Dar bay to ask for help finding what they now know to be The Bowl of the Winds.  Mat, on the other hand, is gambling. He spots a familiar face in a crowd and follws her to the palace used by Jaichim Carridin. When we switch points of view to Bors, he's meeting with all sort...

fields.title: Ep67: A Crown of Swords, Chapters 10 - 12
fields.description: In this episode we focus in on Egwene as she tries deperately to carve out her place within the Aes Sedai while maintaining her link to the Wise Ones and Rand.  First she deals with Faolain and Theodrin with great results! But she is quickly reminded of the work she has cut out for her when she's cornered by Romanda and Lelaine. To the point that she just walks away from them in order to follow up with a request from Gareth Bryne and simultaneously question Myrelle over some suspicious behavi...

fields.title: Ep66: A Crown of Swords, Chapters 6 - 9
fields.description: Welcome back, friends! Sit back, relax, and listen to Willie and I bloviate while Jody sinks deeper into his chair.  Perrin and Faile reunite and make up, and Rand immediately tries to send Perrin to Tear and Illian. Tsk tsk.  Rand then travels to Caemlyn himself to meet with Bashere and Bael. He tells them the army will march on Illian, much to Bael and Bashere's glee.  Meanwhile, Egwene is squeezing Sheriam for info when she senses Moghedien escape. She has one on ones with Siuan and Leane ...

fields.title: Ep65: A Crown of Swords, Chapters 2 - 5
fields.description: We love when RJ focuses in on a short period of time and lays it out over multiple chapters.  In this episode we basically have Rand and co. travel from Dumai's Wells via gateway, and take a day's ride to Cairhien.  There they head straight to the palace and confront lady Colavere who has been crowned queen in Rand's absence.  All of this plays out in a pressure cooker with almost every single faction at each other's throats.  Aiel, Asha'man, Aes Sedai, Two Rivers men, Mayeners, Warders,...

fields.title: Ep64: A Crown of Swords, Prologue - Chapter 1
fields.description: Mmmmm, that's the smell of a brand new book!  We start A Crown of Swords pretty much exactly where we left off with Lord of Chaos: Dumai's Wells.  Elaida and Alviarin catch up and we get a clear view of Elaida's state of mind. Spoiler: it's no bueno.  We see Sevanna's point of view just before, during and immediately after the battle at Dumai's wells  Alviarin gets a visit from a Forsaken and learns a new trick.  Pedron Niall is assassinated and Eamon Valda immediately moves in to capitalise....

fields.title: Ep63: Lord of Chaos, Chapter 53 - Epilogue
fields.description: Ok, get comfy. It's not our beefiest episode yet, but it's beefy nonetheless.  Everyone realises what's happened to Rand, so Perrin leads an all star team to rescue him and they set off after the kidnappers.  Rand is not doing so well, physically or mentally.  By the time Perrin arrives chaos erupts in one of the most iconic battles in the series.   Join us as we discuss Dumai's Wells and the events leading up to and immediately after the battle itself, then let us know what you think of...

fields.title: Ep62: Lord of Chaos, Chapters 48 - 52
fields.description: Oooooooo, we're getting close now! In this episode we set up for the explosive finale for Lord of Chaos and things are really heating up!  Nynaeve, Elayne, Mat and co set out on their mission in Ebou Dar after the wonder girls meet with Queen Tylin. Who turns out to be a formiddable figure but ultimately friendly to the ladies. the girls have no luck in the Rahad butt do catch a glimpse of a healer who seems to be able to channel...  Mat's luck is ebbing slightly as he tries desperately, and ...

fields.title: Ep61: Lord of Chaos, Chapters 43 - 47
fields.description: Welcome back to another great mix of storylines in our latest episode!   We're nearing the pointy end of Lord of Chaos and all the pieces are moving a lot:  The Salidar Embassy is trying to figure out what to do about Rand while also trying to figure out how to cooperate with Verin and Allana.  Mat refuses to stew in Salidar and goes dancing. With a Forsaken. And some Aes Sedai. He gets propositioned by Myrelle to be bonded as her warder and he gets thouroughly kissed by Leanne. Way to m...

fields.title: Ep60: Lord of Chaos, Chapters 37 - 42
fields.description: We are spoilt for POVs this episode with pretty much the whole gang here. Except for Perrin...  Egwene is running things in Salidar with the help of Siuan, Nynaeve and Elayne. She also takes control of Mogehedien.  Mat Salidar and immediately things get comical. He also links back up with Thom who seems to be moved by the letter Mat brought him.  Aviendha finally comes clean to Elayne, but for her trouble is informed there is another woman in the mix!  Speaking of which, Min arrives in Caemly...

fields.title: Ep59: Lord of Chaos, Chapters 31 - 36
fields.description: We're back, baby! And so is Egwene!  Undoubtedly the highlight of this stretch is what happens with Egwene as she says goodbye to her Aiel Wise One mentors and heads back to Salidar to face... punishment?  Rand drops Aviendha off with Mat and gives Mat a new mission: Find Elayne and put her on the Lion Throne. Plus some side quests.  And we also get a bunch of Whitecloak info with POVs from Eamon Valda and Raddam Asunawa. Ugh.  Let us know what you thought of this episode! You can do so by fo...

fields.title: Ep58: Lord of Chaos, Chapters 27 - 30
fields.description: Only 4 chapters and so much happens.  Elaida's delegation of Aes Sedai drop in on Rand and they square off for the first time. Ominous times.  Back in Caemlyn Rand has some meetings and during the course of the day he's attacked by a Gray Man.    We get a quick reminder of how foul Padan Fain is, and move over to Salidar where Nynaeve is hung over. Oh, and then she heals both gentling and stilling.   Salidar is abuzz with Nynaeve's discovery and in the midst of the excitement, Asan'...

fields.title: Ep57: Lord of Chaos, Chapters 21 - 26
fields.description: This was a great episode, with loads to discuss, so get stuck in!  We pick up right where we left off with the Ogier as Rand takes them and some Aiel on a day trip to Shadar Logoth before depositing them in the Two Rivers.  Mat and the Band are on the move South from Maerone toward Illian when they hit some spear shaped snags.  Graendal and Sammael duke it out in a game of bluff and Egwene has gone full Aiel when the Aes Sedai embassy from the Tower arrives in Cairhien and we meet the sisters...

fields.title: Ep56: Lord of Chaos, Chapters 16 - 20
fields.description: It's good to be back after a nice long holiday as we leave the inaction of Salidar behind and get back to... Rand and his moods. But don't despair! Things do get interesting.  Rand first entertains some Andoran nobles, adds two and two with regards to his lineage, and then entertains a meat puppet from Sammael.  He jets off to Cairhien where he has to make some tough choices (for a change!?) and has a relatively fruitless conversation with Egwene. He does however have a great philosphical cha...

fields.title: Ep55: Lord of Chaos, Chapters 12 - 15
fields.description: Hello and welcome back to Salidar! I mean, Blood and Ashes!  We spend the majority of our time with Nynaeve as she's desperately trying to learn about what direction the Hall will take, trying to break her block and looking for a way out of salidar where she suddenly feels very claustrophobic.  Elayne is less keen to leave but she and Nynaeve make a trip to Tel'aran'rhiod to find something via the "need" method and end up in Ebou Dar.  But back in the waking world they have to navigate the pr...

fields.title: Ep54: Lord of Chaos, Chapters 8 - 11
fields.description: Man, Lord of Chaos just keeps throwing punches.  We start off with arather innocuous chapter following Nynaeve through Salidar as she picks up bits of information from Logain, Siuan, Theodrin, Lelaine and even Moghedien.  We check in Pedron Niall and his spy master(s) as well as Morgase.  And then we switch to Rand who runs into some familiar faces! Some of those faces are a welcome sight, others, not so much. Things go down and they have repercussions for the rest of the story. Huge moment. ...

fields.title: Ep53: Lord of Chaos, Chapters 5 - 7
fields.description: If you love reading about the Forsaken, you're in for a treat.  In this episode we get some meaty Graendal, Sammael and Semirhage points of view with a coating of vileness and a sprinkle of Shaidar Haran.  But not before we rejoin Mat and the Band of the Red Hand on their way to meet up with Rand's main force on the border of Illian. We get to see Mat try really hard to win the attentions of a bar maid, and we meet everyone's favourite scamp, Olver!  Elayne, Nynaeve, Siuan and an assortment o...

fields.title: Ep52: Lord of Chaos, Chapters 1 - 4
fields.description: Here we go! Lord of Chaos is officially underway as we move on from the lengthy prologue and into the chapters proper.  In this episode we cover 4 chapters, all from Rand point of view. In fact, they span a single day, and what a day it is.   Rand meets Mazrim Taim and sets in motion Taim's Black Tower arc. We even get to meet some of our favourite Asha'man, some of whom feature heavily in future events!  The cherry on the cake though is Rand trying to trade jokes with the Aiel. And fail...

fields.title: Ep51: Lord of Chaos, Prologue
fields.description: Ah, a brand new episode for a brand new book. Let the Lord of Chaos rule!  And things are chaotic in Randland. In this episode we check in with the Forsaken (including Demandred, Mesaana and Semirhage!), Nynaeve, Elayne and Min, Gawyn, some Tower Aes Sedai and Shaido, Morgase and Pedron Niall, and two new players on the scene in Osan'gar and Aran'gar.  It's a lot.  As always, we get right into the nitty gritty. So join us! And you can do so by sending in your thoughts via any of the social me...

fields.title: Ep50: The Fires of Heaven, Chapters 52 - 56
fields.description: Holy moly. I feel like I say this all the time, but this one's a beefy boy!  Join the boys and I as we're joined by friends of the show, Kerri and Rowan, as we dissect the final 5 chapters and the explosive conclusion to The Fires of Heaven.  We join the gang as they face down THREE forsaken and deal the shadow a massive blow. But not before we're dealt a number of gut punches ourselves as we see some all time favourite characters die. Luckliy, some come back almost immediately!  Rowan's audi...

fields.title: Ep49: The Fires of Heaven, Chapters 47 - 51
fields.description: Welcome back to this, our penultimte episode for The Fires of Heaven!  Nynaeve and Elayne make it to Salidar where they're given a rather cold welcome, and their companions find their own way of integrating with the group already gathered there. But before then they have to fight their way through the streets of Samara to make it onto a boat.  Min finally comes clean to Elayne about being one of Rand's love interests, and Elayne is thankfully quite gracious about it.  Back in Cairhien Rand is...

fields.title: Ep48: The Fires of Heaven, Chapters 43 - 46
fields.description: Oh boy oh boy oh boy, this episode. Wow.   All four chapters covered in this episode centre around the battle for Cairhien and the immediate aftermath.   Not much else to say here. Stop reading and jump in!  Ok, you can continue reading now that you've listened to the episode. How good is it? Let us know using any of the links below! Twitter - @BloodAndAshPodYouTube - Blood and AshesFacebook - BloodAndAshesPodcastWeb - www.bloodandashespodcast.com (Now with voicemail capabilities!)E...

fields.title: Ep47: The Fires of Heaven, Chapters 37 - 42
fields.description: We're back once again with another great primer episode!  Elayne performs before her frist real crowd and Nynaeve finds Uno. She also finds The Prophet and Galad though, but at least both of them present a possible escape from the whitecloak and dragonsworn infested Samara.  Rand surveys the battleground around Cairhien as they prepare to take on the Shaido, but not before Lan coaxes a detailed battle plan from Mat. Poor Mat, he thinks he's leaving, haha!  Lots of great setup in the episode a...

fields.title: Ep46: The Fires of Heaven, Chapters 33 - 36
fields.description: Hello and welcome to our cozy little episode set almost completely in Valan Luca's menagerie!  Nynaeve meets up with Birgitte in Tel'aran'rhiod, decides a good idea to spy on Moggy, who's spying on the other fab four forsaken, and is ultimately captured by the Spider.  But before Moghedien can enact her evil pla, Birgitte puts an arrow through hjer chest before being unceremoniously ripped from T'A'R by the felled forsaken.  Liandrin pays a hefty price for attempting to strike at Moghedien wh...

fields.title: Ep45: The Fires of Heaven, Chapters 26 - 32
fields.description: Welcome back for a doozy of an episode! 7 chapters covered in this one...  Siuan, Min, Leanne and Logain make it to Salidar where they get a bit of a cold welcome, followed shortly by Gareth Bryne who promptly joins the Salidar cause as their shiny new general! Partly because he can't helphimself, but mostly because he's kinda into ol' Siuan...  We have a brief moment of horror with Hadnan Kadere, just to remind us how vile he is, but then we switch to Rand who sends some Aiel ahead to recon ...

fields.title: Ep44: The Fires of Heaven, Chapters 20 - 25
fields.description: And just like that we're back from the dead! Well, a 2 week break, but it feels like forever!  In this episode we cover, basically, a long walk through a mountain pass. Rand and the Aiel come across a village at the mouth of Jangai Pass that's been ravaged by the Shaido, and Rand has to start managing the Aiel perception and treatment of wetlanders.  Rand and Aviendha continue their dance of cluelessness vs. stubborness, Mat goes one on one with a Fade and Egwene meets up with Elayne in T'A'R...

fields.title: Ep43: The Fires of Heaven, Chapters 15 - 19
fields.description: Welcome back friendly friends!  In this episode we are... treated? To a bunch of darkfriendery.  First Nynaeve has Birgitte report back on Forsaken activity in Tel'aran'rhiod, and then uses the world of dreams to spy on [GASP] the new Amyrlin Seat!   Egwene swings the power pendulum back in her own direction, getting one over on an obviously rattled Nynaeve, and then has a lovely conversation with Moiraine as an equal.  BAck in the waking world Nynaeve and Elayne run into Galad and panic...

fields.title: Ep42: The Fires of Heaven, Chapters 9 - 14
fields.description: Welcome back to Blood and Ashes: Eyes and Ears Edition!  Nynaeve and Elayne identify a member of the Yellow Ajah message network but their interaction does not go down well. Not as well as a delicious cup of Forkroot tea. Luckily Thom and Juilin have their wits about them.  Then Siuan gets a crucial clue from a bawdy tavern, giving her their next destination, but the wily ol' Gareth Bryne and his group of geriatric soldiers are surprisingly, hot on their heels!  The girls then have a brief en...

fields.title: Ep41: The Fires of Heaven, Chapters 4 - 8
fields.description: Welcome back to a very special episode of the podcast. One with a touching dedication which I'll let Jody make in the episode itself.  Then we get back to our regular shenanigans, recapping and discussing Rand's coterie of women that can't seem to leave him alone, Egwene and Aviendha's burgeoning friendship, a healthy dose of teaching from the Wise Ones, and a darkhound attack. Mat is also there. And you can cut the tension between Rand and Aviendha with a knife.  Rand reveals his next move t...

fields.title: Ep40: The Fires of Heaven, Prologue - Chapter 3
fields.description: Oh boy, oh boy, oh boy! A new episode and a new book!  Right off the bat we get into some serious plotting. First between Elaida and her cronies and then 4 of the Forsaken working together! For now...  Meanwhile Rand is in Rhuidean planning his next move and taking Saidin 101 with his pet Forsaken bard, while Mat spends his time gambling, drinking and philandering.  We also join up with the White Tower escapees as they come face to face with none other than Gareth Bryne himself! Setting into ...

fields.title: Ep39: The Shadow Rising, Chapters 56 - 58
fields.description: Well here we are again, a season finale!  We have a very cathartic end to "The Siege of the Two Rivers", Rand throws the cat among the pigeons in the Aiel Waste and then has a showdown with a Forsaken while wrecking an entire city. Good times!  We also discuss the book as a whole and talk about our favorite moments from The Shadow Rising.  Let us know what you think of the book, of the podcast or even our thoughts by using any of the links below: Twitter - @BloodAndAshPodYouTube - Blood and A...

fields.title: Ep38: The Shadow Rising, Chapters 53 - 55
fields.description: Right! We're in it now folks! The penultimate episode for The Shadow Rising.  Perrin has a showdown with Slayer in the Wolf Dream, Loial and Gaul return from their mission to seal the Waygate, and Perrin and Faile tie the knot. All in one chapter.  Then we have our intrepid Black Ajah hunters in Tanchico pull off a heist from the Panarch's palace, managing to find their quarry, face down one of the Forsaken, take out a Black Ajah sister, rescue the Panarch and avoid a balefire blowout. Also a...

fields.title: Ep37: The Shadow Rising, Chapters 49 - 52
fields.description: Hello friends! Things are really starting to hot up now...  Rand and friends arrive at Cold Rocks hold and get a crash course in Aiel custom. Rand ingratiates himself with the Maidens of the Spear, but the hold is attacked in the night by trollocs and multiple Draghkar! But not before Rand has a steamy Waterwood dream...  In Tanchico our intrepid investigators have located the Black Ajah sisters, and after a bit of dream exploitation they also find the object they're looking for: The Dominati...

fields.title: Ep36: The Shadow Rising, Chapters 45 - 48
fields.description: And we're back!  In this week's episode we get a great mix of plotlines.  Perrin settles into the leadership role in Emond's Field and finally comes face to face with Dain Bornhald and his Whitecloaks.  Nynaeve and Elayne bumble their way through the dangerous streets of Tanchico but get their bacon saved by everyone's least hated Seanchan officer, before coming face to face with someone truly terrifying.  Rand and Mat shoot the breeze with the shifty peddlers they met in the waste and finall...

fields.title: Bonus Episode: The Strike at Shayol Ghul
fields.description: Hello friends!  In December Willie and I participated in the WoTaHoliday 24h charity stream for the Lightweaver Foundation where we discussed the short story "The Strike at Shayol Ghul".   In the season 1 finale of the Wheel of Time series on Amazon they actually did a cold open set in this time, so it turns out our discussion was quite timely!  The stream itself is archived and available on the Malkier Talks YouTube channel, and the charity we were supporting can be found here.  Hope you enj...

fields.title: Ep35: The Shadow Rising, Chapters 41 - 44
fields.description: In this stretch of chapters we focus solely on Perrin and his exploits in the Two Rivers as he comes to grip with the expectations placed on him by his fellow farmers and villagers.  First he stuns his trolloc hunting party by being very familiar with the Tinkers and their ways, undergoes a bit of healing in the Tinker camp and eventually makes his way back to a now well fortified Emond's Field where his work truly begins organising the locals.  The Aes Sedai are there, out in the open now, a...

fields.title: Ep34: The Shadow Rising, Chapters 37 - 40
fields.description: We get treated to wide range of points of view this week as we check in with our main cast and a number of ancillary characters we haven't seen in a while. Some pleasant, some less so...  Rand, Mat, Moiraine, Lan and the Aiel have departed from Rhuidean and have made their way to Imre Stand. But things are not exactly going to plan.  We jump to Tanchico as Nynaeve, Elayne, Thom and Juilin arrive on the Seafolk Raker, and get some great plot development from Egeanin's point of view as she glim...

fields.title: Ep33: The Shadow Rising, Chapters 31 - 36
fields.description: Welcome back! In this episode we stick with the two main plotlines: Perrin in the Two Rivers and Rand, Mat & Egwene in the Waste.  Perrin is starting to come into his own, giving orders to respected Two Rivers elders, barking at Aes Sedai and organising the farm folk against the dual assault of Whitecloaks and Trollocs. He also puts Slayer in his place and it all just feels... right. And everyone agrees!  Rand and Mat emerge from Rhuidean to, well, not exactly exultation and fanfare. In f...

fields.title: Ep32: The Shadow Rising, Chapters 25 - 30
fields.description: And now for something completely different... Well, somewhat different.  Join us for a trip down memory lane as we travel with Rand through the history of the Aiel in the glass columns in Rhuidean. We recount his visions in chronological order in a bid to make it more digestible. Let us know if we succeeded at all!  Then Perrin, Faile, Gaul, Bain, Chiad and Loial have an encounter in the Ways before making it to Emond's field and getting some bad news.  It's an emotional roller coaster this e...

fields.title: Ep31: The Shadow Rising, Chapters 19 - 24
fields.description: We're in for a real treat here, folks!  Not only do we get a very rare glimpse into the thoughts of our favorite Blue Ajah champion, but we get a big dose of culture and lore dumps from not one, but TWO thus far mysterious nations: The Sea folk and our beloved Aiel!  Nynaeve and Elayne book passage on a Sea Folk raker, making some interesting discoveries in the process. They're joined by Thom and Juilin as the group sets off for Tanchico.  Rand, Mat, Egwene, Moiraine and Lan set off for the W...

fields.title: Ep30: The Shadow Rising, Chapters 11 - 18
fields.description: There's a lot going on here.   In this episode Perrin sets off via the Ways on his quest to liberate the Two Rivers from the Whitecloaks, in a bizarre and spiteful arrangement with Faile. Good thing they have Aiel backup.  Egwene meets Amys in Tel'aran'rhiod and is summoned to The Waste to learn about Dreaming.   Nynaeve, Elayne and Aviendha prepare to leave for Tanchico, and Moiraine asks Thom to accompany them after meeting with the Aelfinn.   Oh, and Rand and Mat also go see...

fields.title: Ep29: The Shadow Rising, Chapters 5 - 10
fields.description: I hope you like The Stone of Tear, because we're still here. Much to the frustration of Moiraine.  The girls are having no luck squeezing information out of the captured Black Ajah sisters. And Moiraine is having no luck pushing Rand into action.   Elayne is trying to process her feelings for Rand, so after she and Egwene take a crack at learning something about Saidin and Saidar and their differences, Elayne hangs back and declares her feelings for Rand. Sort of.  Speaking of hanging, R...

fields.title: Ep28: The Shadow Rising, Chapters 1 - 4
fields.description: It might be a new book but we pick up right where we left off. Almost.  After checking in with Min who's finally made her way to the White Tower we also get a brief catch up with some of our least favourite characters. Padan Fain, Dain Bornhald and High Lady Suroth. Gross.  And then it's straight back to The Stone of Tear where all breaks loose when a bubble of evil targets our 3 favourite ta'veren. It's an action packed stretch but somehow we still get distracted by a double entendre, revel ...

fields.title: Ep27: The Dragon Reborn, Chapters 52 - 56
fields.description: And here we are, the finale for The Dragon Reborn!  Mat, Perrin, Rand, the girls, Moiraine, the Aiel and just about every person you can think of converge on The Heart of the Stone and action ensues!  We summarize the final chapters, pick our favorite moment from the episode and then spend a bit of time talking about the book as a whole and pick our favorite moment (thing?) from the book as a whole.  Clear your schedule, sit back and enjoy the climactic end of The Dragon Reborn!  Mo, Willie &...

fields.title: Ep26: The Dragon Reborn, Chapters 48 - 51
fields.description: Oh boy, Tear is bursting with ta'veren as virtually everyone converges on the troubled city.   Nynaeve, Egwene and Elayne arrive and immediately set about tracking down the Black Ajah with the help of a fan favorite character.   Perrin, Moiraine, Lan, Faile and Loial arrive and take up lodging next to a smithy where Perrin gets to flex some old muscles. Literally and figuratively. And as a result his axe gets some competition from a new hammer...  Mat and Thom arrive in the rain, at...

fields.title: Ep25: The Dragon Reborn, Chapters 42 - 47
fields.description: Things are getting pretty hectic right off the bat with Perrin and co. arriving in Illian, getting attacked almost immediately, discovering some disturbing things about forces of the Shadow and making a run for Tear.  Mat also fends off an attempt on his life with the help of Thom, on their way to Caemlyn to deliver Elayne's letter. The city seems to be under a malevolent influence but Mat makes his way to the Queen and her... advisor. He learns of a plot on Elayne's life and immediately sets...

fields.title: Ep24: The Dragon Reborn, Chapters 36 - 41
fields.description: And we're back! Join us as we dust off the ol' brain cobwebs after a full week's break and dive right back into The Dragon Reborn. And BOY, what a set of chapters...  Perrin spies on some Forsaken, manages to piss off Moiraine to no end and has to constantly spar with Faile. Verbally, obviously.  Rand is... struggling. Haggard from the constant attacks he's lashing out in spectacular fashion.  Mat pretends not to be a hero while acting extremely heroically and cracking wise.  But the women st...

fields.title: Ep23: The Dragon Reborn, Chapters 30 - 35
fields.description: Just as we get used to being in the Tower, everyone hits the road! Or the river, as the case may be.  Mat defies all laws of physics in both an altercation in the streets of Tar Valon, and at the dicing tables. Plus he runs into an old friend and they set off together on another grand adventure!  We also catch up with Perrin who is suddenly confronted by two elements from Min's viewings about him. His life is about to get really complicated...  We have our usual mix of irreverence and pedantr...

fields.title: Ep22: The Dragon Reborn, Chapters 24 - 29
fields.description: Well, Mat's back and immediately the whole episode becomes a barrel of laughs. Naturally.  Mat gets hungry, kicks some ass and then charms us all over again. That loveable scamp!  The girls shift gears in their investigation, going so far as to charge headlong into danger in attempt at learning something, anything that will help them mitigate the threat of the Black Ajah. But they do come out with a plan.  These chapters hardly move the timeline along at all, but it's such a fun stretch we we...

fields.title: Ep21: The Dragon Reborn, Chapters 18 - 23
fields.description: Welcome back to the Tower of Mysteries! We learn some shocking statistics about the Black Ajah right off the bat, before we even start with our chapters.   Then we hit the ground running with Mat being severed from the Dagger (I think I'll capitalize that from now on) and having a chat with both a Forsaken and the Amyrlin Seat in his bedroom.  And reminiscing about commanding troops in an ancient battle for good measure.   Egwene scrubs some pots, is entrusted with an extremely...

fields.title: Ep20: The Dragon Reborn, Chapters 12 - 17
fields.description: Welcome back to Murder on the Orient Express! Or at least, the White Tower version thereof.  We're right in the guts of the White Tower now as the girls report to the Amyrlin's study to explain themselves after disappearing for months. More accurately, to have things explained to them. Specifically about how naughty they are and what their punishment will be. At least that's how the sisters see it, but our intrepid team are no shrinking violets. They take the Amyrlin's bombshell task and boy,...

fields.title: Ep19: The Dragon Reborn, Chapters 6 - 11
fields.description: Finally, the gang emerges from the Mountains of Mist. Perrin and Moiraine participate in a short lived power struggle until Perrin is made to clean her prize trout and eventually asks her for help with his wolfishness. This after encountering a man who lost his battle against "going full wolf" and Perrin having to face his greatest fear.  We catch a brief glimpse of Rand as he's being hunted by... what exactly? We can barely decide.  And the girls make their way back to Tar Valon, but not bef...

fields.title: Ep18: The Dragon Reborn, Prologue - Chapter 5
fields.description: Here we go friends! The Dragon Reborn has been kicked off!  We join Pedron Niall as he entertains a parade of ne'er-do-wells who all relay their version of events at Falme, culminating in the appearance of the contemptable Padan Fain.   But then we venture North into the still snowy Mountains of Mist where the fledgling army of the Dragon Reborn is hiding from the chaos they caused on the Almoth Plain.  We get to spend 5 straight chapters in the head of our favorite beefy boy as he and t...

fields.title: Ep17: The Great Hunt, Chapters 43 - 50
fields.description: At last, our Great Hunt finale is here and it's a beefy, beefy boy!  Suffice it to say things hit the fan in Falme.   A daring escape from the Damane kennels, a one on one showdown between a blade master and a farm boy, the blowing of the Horn of Valere (!), a battle between three opposing forces, a wonderful redemption arc, a showdown with an old enemy and an added wrinkle in the form of a Forsaken thrown into an already complicated love triangle. Or, love trapezoid. I lose track...  As...

fields.title: Ep16: The Great Hunt, Chapters 36 - 42
fields.description: Get ready for the home stretch! In our penultimate episode for The Great Hunt all the pieces on the board are being positioned and primed for action.  The boys, Verin and the Shienarans experience a bad trip when trying to use the Portal Stones to get to Toman head. Not even the horses are spared this brain bending ordeal. But they make it to Toman head and are now within striking distance of Falme.  Egwene, Nynaeve, Elayne and Min experience the ultimate betrayal from Liandrin and are delive...

fields.title: Ep15: The Great Hunt, Chapters 30 - 35
fields.description: Well, we've done it again. These episodes are getting as beefy as our favorite beefy boy, Perrin.  In this episode we follow the gang as they try to navigate Daes Dae'mar in Khai-Rehen, I mean, Cairhien, which leads them to discovering a Waygate at a fancy party. But who crashes the party? A somewhat altered Machin Shin!  We speculate about Thom's sexual past before he's dealt a heavy blow and reciprocates with deadly blows of his own.   Throw in a blink-and-you'll-miss-it Simply Red ref...

fields.title: Ep14: The Great Hunt, Chapters 24 - 29
fields.description: And we're back! It's a biggie folks. We're rested and champing at the bit for a good ol' speculation. In this episode we're treated to a lot of varied story points and huge meetings.  Egwene meets two of her competition for Rand's affection at the White Tower, Mat and Perrin meet their first real Aielman and Bayle Domon meets his future wife! Who happens to be Seanchan. (BOO)  Rand, Loial and Hurin get sucked into The Game of Houses, Selene appears to stir the pot and lo and behold, Thom Merr...

fields.title: Ep13: The Great Hunt, Chapters 18 - 23
fields.description: Welcome back friends!   In this episode we join Egwene and Nynaeve as they do their damndest to raise the Amyrlin's ire, to no avail. Nynaeve gets manhandled and dosed with something disgusting for her efforts, but is fast-tracked up the corporate ladder nonetheless.   Rand, Loial and Hurin get real sneaky, real brave and real hungry, in that order. And Selene ruins all doubt that she is just the worst.   Moiraine and Lan go from mental jiu jitsu to outright survival mode in th...

fields.title: Ep12: The Great Hunt, Chapters 12 - 17
fields.description: Things are getting Weird, with a capital "W"!  Egwene starts having Dreams, with a capital "D"  (I'll stop now), Nynaeve gets mad and burns some blankets. The girls are also visited by a slew of Black Ajah members.  Perrin assumes the role of Sniffer for Ingtar as Verin suspiciously appears out of nowhere sans Warder.   Rand, Hurin and Loial can't figure out wtf is going on in the Portal Stone World they wake up in. And then Lanfear shows up to start messing with their heads! Is she...

fields.title: Ep11: The Great Hunt, Chapters 6 - 11
fields.description: Well, we've done it again. Beaten our own record for longest episode. At this rate the final episode of A Memory of Light will be 24h long... But I digress.   Fal Dara is under attack! The seemingly impenetrable fortress of Fal Dara is suddenly crawling with shadowspawn and darkfriends but somehow Rand still manages to be all "emo" about everything. He makes a grizzly discovery in the dungeons, Liandrin is the worst and Lan gives Nynaeve a get-out-of-jail-free card.   Also, the "tru...

fields.title: Ep10: The Great Hunt, Prologue - Chapter 5
fields.description: Here we are, The Great Hunt has begun!  We pick up the action almost immediately after we left off The Eye of the World with the whole gang in Fal Dara, which gets a surprise visit from the Amyrlin Seat herself!   We're introduced to a number of new Aes Sedai characters, some of which are downright evil. In fact, we start the book with glimpses of a gathering of about 100 high ranking Darkfriends at the now infamous "Darkfriend Social".  Rand is being an indecisive jerk and Moiraine is p...

fields.title: Ep9: The Eye of the World, Chapters 48 - 53
fields.description: Finally, it's here: Our season finale for The Eye of The World!  We were a little late on recording this one due to some scheduling challenges, and even though we made it work we had a couple of audio problems, but nothing that would diminish your ability to enjoy our ramblings. So without further ado...  In our final episode we follow "the fellowship" from Fal Dara into the godawful Blight where they get up close and personal with the Blight flora and fauna, find the Green Man and The Eye of...

fields.title: Ep8: The Eye of the World, Chapters 42 - 47
fields.description: We're really getting to the pointy end now...   In this episode we get introduced to The Ways and promptly look for the exit, the gang travel all the way to Fal Dara in the Borderlands where an army of Shadowspawn are gathering at Tarwin's Gap, and we get a big exposition dump from ol' Padan Fain. This is the last setup before the final climax, so naturally we get completely sidetracked by the history of Malkier and the horror poetry of Machin Shin.   We also have new social media l...

fields.title: Ep7: The Eye of the World, Chapters 36 - 41
fields.description: Welcome back, friends!  In our latest episode we dust off the dirt from the Caemlyn Road and revel in the festival-like atmosphere of Rex Manning... I mean, False Dragon Day in Caemlyn!  Lan, Moiraine and Nynaeve stage a daring rescue, we meet our first Ogier and Rand manages to fail utterly at laying low by attracting the attention of a crazed Padan Fain, The Daughter Heir of Andor, the Queen, her Captain General and one of the most terrifying Aes Sedai of the Red Ajah. Nice one, Rand.  As a...

fields.title: Ep6: The Eye of the World, Chapters 30 - 35
fields.description: Ok, I know I always start with "It's a big one this week!", but this time we really do have our biggest episode yet. Foolishly I thought this one would be thin, but it is WAY fat. In a good way!  We pick up with Egwene and Perrin as they jump from the frying pan of killer crows into the fire of seething Whitecloak contempt. Then we join Rand and Mat as they journey down the Caemlyn road, playing music and performing in inns while staving off constant attempts at their lives. It's dreary busin...

fields.title: Ep5: The Eye of the World, Chapters 24 - 29
fields.description: Oh my, it's our biggest episode yet!  This stretch of the book felt like it didn't have too much meat on it, but we managed to find some things to chew on, boy oh boy.  The group is still split with Mat, Rand and Thom passing through Whitebridge 2 days before Lan, Moiraine and Nynaeve. And Perrin and Egwene are escorted by Elyas and the wolves while travelling with the Tinkers for a while. We have a fight with a Fade, a dip into the history of the Aiel by way of the Tinkers and Perrin being c...

fields.title: Ep4: The Eye of the World, Chapters 18 - 23
fields.description: It's a meaty one!  As the gang leave Baerlon we see our first big Trolloc battle, we're introduced to Shadar Logoth and the crazy history of that city and its denizens, the group is splintered, Nynaeve figures out she can channel and Perrin learns about his awesome Wolfishness!   As always, please send any feedback to us via the website: bloodandashespodcast.com, or email me directly at moritz@bloodandashespodcast.com  We thoroughly enjoyed this episode and hope you do too!  Cheers,  Mo

fields.title: Ep3: The Eye of the World, Chapters 12 - 17
fields.description: Welcome back!   In this episode we follow the gang as they leave the Two Rivers behind and experience their first "city" in Baerlon. We encounter Min, Whitecloaks, spies, shadowspawn and worse and somehow we get fixated on the meaning of a beggar's staff in a vision and who burned the inn.  We continue our unbeaten run of pondering interesting aspects of the story without actually knowing what we're talking about. But we have a great time doing it.   Please leave any feedback on our...

fields.title: Ep2: The Eye of the World, Chapters 6 - 11
fields.description: Welcome back!   In this episode we take care of a bit of housework up front, touching on the episode naming convention and listener submissions via our website: www.bloodandashespodcast.com  We then join the Emond's Fielders as they deal with the attack on Winter's Night, Rand seeks help for Tam and the original adventuring party is formed before they set off on a desperate flight toward the edge of the Two Rivers on their way to Tar Valon.  As usual we digress into fun observations, tal...

fields.title: Ep1: The Eye of the World, Prologue - Chapter 5
fields.description: Our premiere episode! Welcome one and all.  First things first, Jody's microphone is not great in this premier episode, but it's definitely listenable. But from the next episode that problem has been solved and his audio is silky smooth, so please do keep that in mind!  In this episode we cover the prologue, "Dragonmount", all the way through to the end of chapter 5, "Winternight". Obviously with spoilers throughout.  We try to keep things moving along while at the same time letting our colle...

fields.title: Teaser
fields.description: Are you looking for a spoiler filled, excitement fueled, light hearted discussion about our favorite fantasy series? Then look no further! Join 3 middle aged dads as we re-read the series and have a great time squeezing as much pleasure from the books as possible.   Then write in and have your voice heard. Join the conversation, let's go!

fields.title: tWoTcast episode 161

fields.title: tWoTcast episode 158 (Jordancon 8 LIVE)

We ramble for about an hour because we had not show planned whatsoever, Jennifer Liang stops by to save us and tell a story, and we boo at Gary. a lot.

fields.title: tWoTcast episode 156 (The Wise Man’s Fear part 10)
fields.description:
tWoTcast episode 156 (The Wise Man’s Fear part 10)
Our ninth discussion of The Wise Man’s Fear, written by Patrick Rothfuss, covering chapters 125 – the end! Featuring: Jono, Joe, and Tom. We finish this book off in style with a phone to Fuss Fussy himself. He doesnt answer but its still humorous. Also Taffy Bennington Dry Mangina!

fields.title: tWoTcast episode 155

Our ninth discussion of The Wise Man’s Fear, written by Patrick Rothfuss, covering chapters 121 – 135. Featuring: Jono, Joe, and Tom. We keep jono to a tight hour so we can finally get through this book. It sort of works. Don’t pay attention to the episode number, we were drunk. This is episode 155.

fields.title: tWoTcast episode 157 (a tWoT Christmas Special)

tWoTcast episode 157 (a tWoT Christmas Special)
Our LIVE commentary of Home Alone 2: Lost in New York! Featuring: Jono, Joe, and Tom. It’s pretty straight forward guys. We blather on for afew minutes then watch Home Alone 2 and talk over it. Watch it with us!

fields.title: tWoTcast episode 154
fields.description:
tWoTcast episode 154 (Jordancon 7 LIVE)
    
Our LIVE discussion from Jordancon 7, Saturday nights tWoT against humanity panel. Featuring: Jono, Joe, and Tom with special guest Alan Romanczuk from team Jordan, Wheel of Time editor and Co-Author of The Wheel of Time Companion. We play some dumb games and in true tWoTcast fashion do not ask a single satisfactory question of our amazing guest. Thanks to the audience for doing that for us.

fields.description:
tWoTcast episode 153 (Jordancon 7 LIVE)
    
Our episode covering the WoT Limericks and Songs panel friday night of Jordancon 7! its mostly a garbled mess but its also rather funny. Featuring Jono, Joe and Kenny with a Tom mask on. thanks to mike for playing the guitar under duress and harriet for putting up with our stupidity and a special thanks to suzanne for playing the ukulele and sep (spelling?) for randomly having a ukulele.

fields.title: tWoTcast episode 152
fields.description:
tWoTcast episode 152 (The Wise Man’s Fear part 8)
    
Our eighth discussion of The Wise Man’s Fear, written by Patrick Rothfuss, covering chapters 107 – 120. Featuring: Jono, Joe, and Tom. We turn Jeff Goldblum into a verb as tom and joe goldblum all over jonos face, for some reason we break out the buzzers and finally tempi is a little short. In the brains.

fields.title: tWoTcast episode 151
fields.description:
tWoTcast episode 151 (The Wise Man’s Fear part 7)
    
Our seventh discussion of The Wise Man’s Fear, written by Patrick Rothfuss, covering chapters 89 – 106. Featuring: Jono, Joe, and Tom. We discuss Kvothe having a lot of sex with a goddess. I mean come on. A fight with a chandrian… sort of and finally we buy a zoo.

fields.title: tWoTcast episode 149
fields.description:
tWoTcast episode 149 (The Wise Man’s Fear part 6)
    Our sixth discussion of The Wise Man’s Fear, written by Patrick Rothfuss, covering chapters 74 – 88. Featuring: Jono, Joe, and Tom. Jono endlessly rambles about how every microscopic thing in this book is important, Joe and Tom disagree and irritatingly distract him. Is this the last episode?

fields.title: tWoTcast episode 148
fields.description:
tWoTcast episode 148 (The Wise Man’s Fear part 5)
    
Our fifth discussion of The Wise Man’s Fear, written by Patrick Rothfuss, covering chapters 59 – 73. Featuring: Jono, Joe, and Tom. What if the Hoover Dam was filled with Ecto-cooler and the Ghostbuster logo was projected on to it by lazers?! Lazers with a z.

fields.title: tWoTcast episode 147
fields.description:
tWoTcast episode 147 (The Wise Man’s Fear part 4)
    Our fourth discussion of The Wise Man’s Fear, written by Patrick Rothfuss, covering chapters 40 – 58. Featuring: Jono, Joe, and Tom. Tom and Joe discuss their rapidly fading interest in this book other than Auri while Jono tries desperately to get them to care, and finally for sme reason we talk about Duck Tales.

fields.title: tWoTcast episode 146
fields.description:
tWoTcast episode 146 (The Wise Man’s Fear part 3)
    
Our third discussion of The Wise Man’s Fear, written by Patrick Rothfuss, covering chapters 24 – 39. Featuring: Jono, Joe, and Tom. We discuss these chapters at light speed and in extremely limited detail due to the fact that its Joes birthday and people are about to show up at the house, also Tom is the fire.

fields.title: tWoTcast episode 145
fields.description:
tWoTcast episode 145 (The Wise Man’s Fear part 2)
    
Our second discussion of The Wise Man’s Fear, written by Patrick Rothfuss, covering chapters 10 – 23. Featuring: Jono, Joe, and Tom. We discuss…this book. The sort of beginning of it. Look. Im just trying to get these shows up. We are way behind.

fields.title: tWoTcast episode 144
fields.description:
tWoTcast episode 144 (The Wise Man’s Fear part 1)
    
Our first discussion of The Wise Man’s Fear, written by Patrick Rothfuss, covering chapters 1 – 9 and the prologue. Featuring: Jono, Joe, and Tom. We discuss…this book. The beginning of it. Do you really need a description?

fields.description:
tWoTcast episode 150 (Home Alone Commentary)
    
Our first and only discussion of Home Alone, the 1990 feature film written by John Hughes, directed by Chris Columbus and starring Macaulay Culkin! Featuring: Jono, Joe, and Tom. Watch along with us as we discuss our thoughts and weird sense of humor as Kevin kicks the crap out of Harry and Marv. Yes this episode is out of order but who cares? You're not even reading this. Maybe he commited suicide.

fields.title: tWoTcast episode 143

Our seventh discussion of The Ultimates, written by Mark Millar and drawn by Bryan Hitch, covering double-sized issue 13, the Finale! Featuring: Jono, Joe, and Tom. We discuss…things. You know what this episode is about a month late just listen.

Our sixth discussion of The Ultimates, written by Mark Millar and drawn by Bryan Hitch, covering issues 11 and 12. Featuring: Jono, Joe, and Tom. We discuss…Holy Shit Tom is back! We discuss Captain Americas enormous crotch shot on issue 11s cover and finally how have we talked about anything other than the wasp and giant man having sex.

fields.title: tWoTcast episode 141
fields.description:
tWoTcast episode 141 (The Ultimates part 5)
    
Our fifth discussion of The Ultimates, written by Mark Millar and drawn by Bryan Hitch, covering issues 9 and 10. Featuring: Jono, Joe, Shanda and Triumphantly Returning Guest-host Alessandro who declares himself the Unisex, we discuss Ginat Man throwing a temper tantrum and a tonka truck, random referneces to X-Men 2 and finally who do you have to get beaten by to get some water around here.

fields.title: tWoTcast episode 139
fields.description:
tWoTcast episode 139 (The Ultimates part 3)
Our third discussion of The Ultimates, written by Mark Millar and drawn by Bryan Hitch, covering issues 3 and 4. Featuring: Jono, Joe, Lauren and Tom. We discuss the Hulk in all his hilarity, runner up to the Master Rapist title, the size of his genitals, using giant mans skull as a toilet, his love of mardi gra specials, his horny face after being hit with a hammer, what superheroes could withstand hulk dick, and finally his emotional weakness Betty Ross.

fields.title: tWoTcast episode 138
fields.description:
tWoTcast episode 138 (The Ultimates part 2)
 Our second discussion of The Ultimates, written by Mark Millar and drawn by Bryan Hitch, covering issues 3 and 4. Featuring: Jono, Joe, Lauren and Tom. We discuss how the Avengers are sick of seeing giant man’s huge naked dick, Tony wants to dress up Betty as her father with a  fake mustache? And finally a lot of weird celebrity references plus three minutes of Lauren insanity.

fields.title: tWoTcast episode 137
fields.description:
tWoTcast episode 137 (The Ultimates part 1)
Our first discussion of The Ultimates, written by Mark Millar and Drawn by Bryan Hitch, covering issues 1 and 2. Featuring: Jono, Joe, Lauren and Tom. Jono coins the phrase of what Cap says every time he takes a shit, our friend Bret translates some nazi German for us and finally we discuss the finer points of a wasp-sized woman jerking someone off.

We discuss the winding down of the story… the climax was last episode, the naming of the sperm and finally tom thinks Kvothe’s sack looks like a koosh ball?

Our discussion of all things Jordancon 6 with your Toastmasters tWoTcast! Featuring: Jono and Joe, Tom and Lauren’s here too! Joe is freakishly NOT late?! Joined by our special guest, legendary artist Larry Elmore. We discuss a little Jcon recap and follow it with our LIVE recording from our panel, An Hour with Larry Elmore.

tWoTcast episode 134 (The Name of the Wind part 9)
Our ninth discussion of The Name of the Wind, written by Patrick Rothfuss, covering chapters 74 - 84. Featuring: Jono, Joe, Lauren and Tom. We discuss ugh…does anyone read these? A dragon having sex with a fire pit, Denna yells hymen and finally Toms skype is just not doing us any favors.

tWoTcast episode 133 (Jordancon 6 LIVE Show)
Our discussion of all things Jordancon 6 with your Toastmasters tWoTcast! Featuring: Jono and Joe, Tom is NOT mysteriously absent, but Joe is late again…Joined by our special guest, author Patrick Rothfuss. We discuss a little Jcon recap and follow it with our LIVE recording from our panel, A very tWoTcast podcast.

fields.title: tWoTcast episode 132

tWoTcast episode 132 (Jordancon 6 LIVE Show)
Our discussion of all things Jordancon 6 with your Toastmasters tWoTcast! Featuring: Jono and Joe, Tom is mysteriously absent, but we fill that gaping hole with our special guest, author Patrick Rothfuss. We discuss a little Jcon recap and follow it with our LIVE recording from our panel, An Hour with Patrick Rothfuss.

fields.title: tWoTcast episode 131
fields.description:
tWoTcast episode 131 (The Name of the Wind part 8)
Our eighth discussion of The Name of the Wind, written by Patrick Rothfuss, covering chapters 69 - 73. Featuring: Jono, Joe, Lauren and Tom. We discuss the state of Toms pubic hair, horse flesh and snuffling pockets and finally Tom gets a little frustrated that were not all on the same page during our reading.

fields.title: tWoTcast episode 130
fields.description:
tWoTcast episode 130 (Jordancon 6 Preview Show)
Our discussion of all things Jordancon 6 with your Toastmasters tWoTcast! Featuring: Jennifer and Jimmy Liang! As well as guest stars Jono, Joe and Lauren. We discuss geo caches or as Lauren calls it geo cash money, amazing panda sex and finally we throw in some jordancon 6 preview discussion.

fields.title: tWoTcast episode 129
fields.description:
tWoTcast episode 129 (The Name of the Wind part 7)
Our seventh discussion of The Name of the Wind, written by Patrick Rothfuss, covering chapters 60 - 68. Featuring: Jono, Joe, Lauren and Tom. We discuss liquid terminators in the fishery, Jono attempts his one hundred and thirtieth try to get Billy Joels We Didn’t Start the Fire played on the podcast and finally an odd voicemail message…

fields.title: tWoTcast episode 128
fields.description:
tWoTcast episode 128 (The Name of the Wind part 6)
Our sixth discussion of The Name of the Wind, written by Patrick Rothfuss, covering chapters 50 - 59. Featuring: Jono, Joe, Lauren and Tom. This is a long one guys. We discuss some of the greatest book titles ever made, Kvothes dick is a divining rod for his mysterious duet partner and finally we argue over whether or not Kvothe plays the lute… or the skin lute.

fields.title: tWoTcast episode 127
fields.description:

Our fifth discussion of The Name of the Wind, written by Patrick Rothfuss, covering chapters 40 - 49. Featuring: Jono, Joe, Lauren and Tom. We discuss how to make a vagina with a whip, what Davey Jones beard is actually made of and finally we all expected Elodin to be waaay more crazy than he turned out to be, maybe theres more to come.

fields.title: tWoTcast episode 126
fields.description:
tWoTcast episode 126 (The Name of the Wind part 4)
Our fourth discussion of The Name of the Wind, written by Patrick Rothfuss, covering chapters 30 - 39. Featuring: Jono, Joe, Lauren and Tom. We discuss how much Kvothe is like a girl for buying a purse, taking a bath and going clothes shopping the second he has a little cash, the character Josn is actually Brandon Sanderson and finally the bible is a complete rip-off of Harry Potter.

fields.title: tWoTcast episode 125
fields.description:

Our third discussion of The Name of the Wind covering chapters 20 - 29. Featuring: Jono, Joe, Lauren and Tom. We discuss Kvothe in Tarbean, the most boring part of the book says Jono, the importance of milk and bread in a snow storm, whether or not Joe breast feeds still and finally overhearing a kid being gang raped in an alleyway?!

fields.title: tWoTcast episode 123
fields.description:

Our second discussion of The Name of the Wind covering chapters 9 and 19. Featuring: Jono, Joe, Lauren and Tom. We discuss getting a hold of Abenthy’s medallion so we don’t have to sit on our hands anymore, some other stuff and finally we sing…way too much.

fields.title: tWoTcast episode 122
fields.description:

Our first discussion of The Name of the Wind covering chapters 1 and 8 and the prologue. Featuring: Jono, Joe, Lauren and Tom. We discuss Kirk Cameron proving we evolved from monkeys, Lauren tells us about a new super power in her sleep and finally Jono tricks us into reading a book about a Ginger.

fields.title: tWoTcast episode 124
fields.description:
tWoTcast episode 124 (…really 122!?)
Our hiatus from normal discussion. Featuring: Jono, Joe, Lauren and Tom also Special Guest of Honor Alessandro from Impetuous Windmills.com joins us. We discuss the Royal Ruuuuummmmmble! Round two? Last year we did this with Blade Masters from tWoT now everyone’s invited! This is becoming an annual event for us. Some interesting wild cards are thrown in and some small talk about public urinal practices is also had.

fields.title: tWoTcast episode 121
fields.description:

Our tenth discussion of The Cape the ill-fated NBC superhero television show, episode ten: Endgame. Featuring: Jono, Joe, Lauren and Tom. We discuss events of the last year and a few plans for the new year, the Blend is a weird looking human in frumpy clothes, The Legend of Bagger Max and finally what does it take to charge up spider silk? An electrical closet. Last but not least, press conference?

fields.title: tWoTcast episode 120
fields.description:

Our ninth discussion of The Cape the ill-fated NBC superhero television show, episode nine: Razer. Featuring: Jono, Joe, Lauren and Tom. We discuss Jono’s pubescent voice change during the show, the importance of pizza during a drive-by and finally how much would drops of turpentine hurt your naked eyeballs.

fields.title: tWoTcast episode 119
fields.description:

We discuss the tWoTcast World Tour and possible couches to sleep on, the incredibly lame fact that the Cape dvds do not have any extra features and finally finding fingerprints with spermicide.

fields.title: tWoTcast episode 118

We discuss Coming back to life somehow after inhaling coke, studying your math and finally tWoT Dungeons and Dragons! Part 7! With our DungetWoT Master Jimmy Liang!

fields.title: tWoTcast episode 117

We discuss Joe becoming a licensed Wheel of Time artist, an amazing new commercial voice we have and finally tWoT Dungeons and Dragons! Part 6! With our DungetWoT Master Jimmy Liang!

fields.title: tWoTcast episode 116
fields.description:

Our fifth discussion of The Cape the ill-fated NBC superhero television show, episode five: Dice. Featuring: Jono, Joe, Lauren and Tom. With our DungetWoT Master Jimmy Liang!

fields.title: tWoTcast episode 115
fields.description:

Our thirteenth and final discussion of the prequel book New Spring covering chapters 25 – 26 and the epilogue. Featuring: Jono, Joe, Lauren and Tom. We discuss brewing our own stomach or septic tank alcohol to save money, The finale of New Spring, Moiraine making the most perfect Mac n Cheese and finally CapeCast part four episode four: Scales.

fields.title: tWoTcast episode 114

Our twelth discussion of the prequel book New Spring covering chapters 23 and 24. Featuring: Jono, Joe, Lauren and Tom. Part 4! With our DungetWoT Master Jimmy Liang!

fields.title: tWoTcast episode 113
fields.description:

Our eleventh discussion of the prequel book New Spring covering chapters 21 and 22. Featuring: Jono, Joe, Lauren and Tom. We discuss Green lantern force fields made of air to death, sexting using letters and drawings of the map of Tar Valon and finally CapeCast part three episode three: Cosmo.

fields.title: tWoTcast episode 112

Our tenth discussion of the prequel book New Spring covering chapters 19 and 20. Featuring: Jono, Joe, Lauren and Tom. Allesandro of impetious windmills (http://www.impetuouswindmills.com/) hangs out again and comments while we have a new segment, Sports Corner with Joe, Moiraine gets an HUI at 90 miles an hour and finally tWoT Dungeons and Dragons! Part 3! With our DungetWoT Master Jimmy Liang!

fields.title: tWoTcast episode 111

Part 2! With our DungetWoT Master Jimmy Liang!

fields.title: tWoTcast episode 110

fields.title: tWoTcast episode 109

Our seventh discussion of the prequel book New Spring covering chapters 13 and 14. Featuring: Jono, Joe, Lauren and Tom. We discuss the core building blocks to building a successful life, another Things Lauren Says, We find out what a thermostat is, every penis in the tower gets fired by the new Amyrlin and finally Capecast part two episode two: Tarot.

fields.title: tWoTcast episode 108

We discuss Independence Fly Park and Pacific Rim with Jennifer and Jimmy Liang from JordanCon fame, Jennifer’s parents call her the first pancake, Lan goes on vacation and finally tWoT Dungeons and Dragons with our new Dungeon Master Jimmy Liang!!!

fields.title: tWoTcast episode 107

Our fifth discussion of the prequel book New Spring covering chapters 9 and 10. Featuring: Jono, Joe, Lauren and Tom. We discuss Toms next big movie idea since Point Speed Net Break, Independence Fly Park, Moiraine and Suiane go through their Aes Sedai training and finally Blade Master Rooooyyyaaaalllll RUUUUUMMMMBLLLLLLLLLEE!!!

fields.title: tWoTcast episode 106
fields.description:

Our fourth discussion of the prequel book New Spring covering chapters 7 and 8. Featuring: Jono, Joe, Lauren and Tom. We discuss statute of limitations on looting someone shit after the last battle, Captain Eo, Moraineee Granger, Suian Weasley take their O.W.L. exams and finally Jono answers questions from the internet very poorly of a sexual nature.

fields.title: tWoTcast episode 105

Our third discussion of the prequel book New Spring covering chapters 5 and 6. Featuring: Jono, Joe, Lauren and Tom. We discuss composting while watching your servants have sex with each other, You always want more fish in nets, Jono needs Moiraine to rewrite his notes for him and finally Cape Cast!

fields.title: tWoTcast episode 104
fields.description:
