Our second discussion of the prequel book New Spring covering chapters 3 and 4 and the amazingness that is our two year anniversary episode. Featuring: Jono, Joe, Lauren and Tom. We talk to our spectacular Author guest of honor Dominic M Pileri about his new book Tungsten Spider: Book One: Advent of Cataclysm, and about writing and self-publishing and finally some new segments are introduced; stuff Lauren says while half asleep, and Who lived and Who died! Featuring Perrin, Faile, Berelain, and Galad.
You can purchase Tungsten Spider here:

fields.title: tWoTcast episode 103
fields.description:
tWoTcast episode 103 (New Spring part 1)
Our first discussion of the prequel book New Spring covering chapters 1 and 2. Featuring: Jono, Joe, Lauren and Tom. We discuss the way Gitara died like a fish in Siuan’s eyes, King Laman is apparently a French guy with a powdery wig and finally Jono brings up some topics Jono style so the three of us start talking about sex.

fields.title: tWoT ART: new logo!
fields.description:
Hey everyone! After a hundred and two episodes I finally got off my ass and made us a proper tWoTcast logo. So now you can finally have all those coveted tWoTcast products and tWoTshirts! (coined by G Kellum) youve been waiting for, and asking us for. Why you want to a wear our faces on your chests I'm not exactly sure but it makes me proud that you do. Thanks for helping support the show through sales of our stuff! Now you can hang us on a wall, put us on the outside of your iphone, ipad or computer, write things inside of us and mail it, put things inside of us and carry it around and best of all sleep on our faces. Here's some links. -Joe@tWoTcast
to buy stuff!
http://society6.com/JoHara/tWoTcast_Print
to look at art!
http://studiojohara.blogspot.com/

fields.title: tWoTcast episode 102
fields.description:
tWoTcast episode 102 (Jordancon 5)
Our discussion of the events of Jordancon 5 or more likely what we can drunkenly remember. Featuring: Jono, Joe, Lauren and Tom. We discuss the future of the show leading up to Jordancon 6 where your beloved tWoTcast will be the toastmasters, a few barely remembered details of some events during Jordancon 5, Tom becomes a sussudio guest on the 4thAge podcast, Joe talks about his art, Jono wears wizard sleeves and finally the disaster which was our live recording. The LIVE recording is also in this episode! …for better or worse.

fields.title: tWoTcast episode 101
fields.description:
tWoTcast episode 101 (Jordancon 5 Track Preview)
Our discussion of the Fifth Wheel of Time convention Jordancon and all that goes with it. Featuring: Jono, Joe and Lauren. Jennifer Liang from Dragonmount.com joins us to discuss the panels with her husband Jimmy Liang, who also helps run the tracks. We discuss the hilarious possibility of the Legendary tWoTcast being the toastmasters of Jordancon 6! We talk about the changes in Jordancon due to that fact that we’re hosting DeepSouthCon this year and finally Half of us get really drunk all in front of an audience of one, Jono’s sleazy girlfriend, Shanda.

fields.title: tWoTcast episode 100!
fields.description:
tWoTcast episode 100! (part 9 of 9)
Our ninth and final discussion of book fourteen of the Wheel of Time, A Memory of Light, covering chapter 38-THE END! Featuring: Jono, Joe and Tom. We discuss the oddity of all three of us giving a shit about Olver, Mat pulls a Pete Rose to not be a Hero for the Horn, Grady fingers letters, Elaine should have died at the hands of the greatest rapist ever, turns out Androl is black, Ol’Mog may have a penis, Talmanes has a wonderful smile, Rand gets a few more spaceships in his innerspace, Fain searching out a new Aridhol, and finally Rand and the Dark One play a game of repeater. Also the episodes of this book are super long! But so much happens we just left it in there.

fields.title: tWoTcast episode 99
fields.description:
tWoTcast episode 99 (part 8 of 9)
Our eighth discussion of book fourteen of the Wheel of Time, A Memory of Light, covering chapter 37 the Last Battle! pages 705-806. Featuring: Jono, Joe and Tom. We discuss everything that happened in the second half of the last battle, which is a lot of stuff, Jono suggests Abel, the racist farmer, might have disowned Mat because of Tuon, black tentacles coming out of cracks to nothing? The beginning of wheel of time tentacle anime porn begins and finally Tom’s incredibly sick and Lauren fills in a bit. He’ll talk more in the next episode trust us. Also the episodes of this book are super long! But so much happens we just left it in there.

fields.title: Cast Member Profile: Jono Coulborn
fields.description: Government employee, sexist bastard, podcaster and wild card between Tom and Joe. Jono loves all things Bond, James Bond and still plays Goldeneye64 to this day.  He will crush you.  Jono has been reading the Wheel of Time since he was eleven and has loved it ever since. Highlights include the painful years waiting to hear if Mat survived being crushed by a wall only to not have him show up for an entire book, masturbating to Rand's sex scenes with Min and Aviendah (not Elayne...), and getting drunk doing podcasts with two of his closest friends.  Isn't that sweet? Jono is a graduate of GSU with a Bachelors of Business Economics and Spanish.  He is currently working on an MBA. In his spare time he drinks and plays soccer as vigorous exercise can prevent any hangover. You can find him frightening women at your local bar, though he is somehow in a relationship; mostly naked at any and all JordanCon swimming pools; and on the podcast starring himself and his friends Joe and Tom, with Lauren editing.  He is also a ginger, which is frightening.

fields.title: tWoTcast episode 98
fields.description:
tWoTcast episode 98 (part 7 of 9)
Our seventh discussion of book fourteen of the Wheel of Time, A Memory of Light, covering chapter 37 the Last Battle! pages 617-704. Featuring: Jono, Joe and Tom. We discuss everything that happened in the first half of the last battle, which is a lot of stuff, during the sword fight we found ourselves wanting Demandred to win and not Gawyn and finally once again Tom runs wild off into drunk land and goes and hangs out with Lauren while Jono and Joe finish the show. Also the episodes of this book are super long! But so much happens we just left it in there and an email is answered from…Sallie Sugar. Again.

fields.title: tWoTcast episode 97
fields.description:
tWoTcast episode 97 (part 6 of 9)
Our sixth discussion of book fourteen of the Wheel of Time, A Memory of Light, covering chapters 30-36. Featuring: Jono, Joe and Tom. We discuss Moridin’s sword winning all the gold medals at the Olympics and Asian Spider-Man debuts also Faile has no uni-brow and finally we’re one episode away from The Last Battle and shits going down. Also the episodes of this book are super long! But so much happens we just left it in there and an email is answered from…Salli Sugar and Neil McCloud of the clan McCloud.

fields.title: tWoTcast episode 96
fields.description:
tWoTcast episode 96 (part 5 of 9)
Our fifth discussion of book fourteen of the Wheel of Time, A Memory of Light, covering chapters 23-29. Featuring: Jono, Joe and Tom. Tom makes an odd connection between Jesus and Hitler through a series of unconnected thoughts, the pathway up to and into Shayul Ghul may be like walking into Jaws anus and finally after the music is special text read by Siri to Tom. Also the episodes of this book are super long! But so much happens we just left it in there!

fields.title: tWoTcast episode 95
fields.description:
tWoTcast episode 95 (part 4 of 9)
Our fourth discussion of book fourteen of the Wheel of Time, A Memory of Light, covering chapters 17-22. Featuring: Jono, Joe and Tom. We argue about whether Cadsuane is being down-right bitchy or just snarky, Joe gets an intervention from Jono and Tom for his inexplicable defense of Elayne and Gawyn Trakand and finally Tom gets extremely drunk (more so than usual). Also the episodes of this book are super long! But so much happens we just left it in there!

fields.title: tWoTcast episode 94
fields.description:
tWoTcast episode 94 (part 3 of 9)
Our third discussion of book fourteen of the Wheel of Time, A Memory of Light, covering chapters 9-16. Featuring: Jono, Joe and Tom. We discuss Egwene dying a married virgin, we use the phrase “hey man” about ten too many times and finally Joe and Tom argue about when and how many gateways Androl may or may not have made during the dream-spike incident at the Black Tower. Also the episodes of this book are super long! But so much happens we just left it in there and an email is answered from…SallieSugar!

fields.title: tWoTcast episode 93
fields.description:
tWoTcast episode 93 (part 2 of 9)
Our second discussion of book fourteen of the Wheel of Time, A Memory of Light, covering chapters 3-8. Featuring: Jono, Joe and Tom. We discuss… Point Speed Net Break? And of course some Androl/Pevara telepathy, as well as Holy Hell Moiraine’s back! Again! Around Rand and other people and stuff and it’s amazing and touching and finally how shocked we all were when Elayne is put in charge of the forces of light…and how ridiculous that is.

fields.title: tWoTcast episode 92
fields.description:
tWoTcast episode 92 (part 1 of 9)
Our first discussion of book fourteen of the Wheel of Time, A Memory of Light, covering chapters 1, 2 and the prologue. Featuring: Jono, Joe and Tom. The first episode! …back from our brief hiatus waiting for the last book! We discuss Talmanes stepping up to a plate of badassery and totally eating every bite, the wind takes Rand’s path from the Two Rivers and finally Androl likes to finger that leather strap. Also the episodes of this book are super long! But so much happens we just left it in there. An email is answered from "Matthew" who has some thoughts.

fields.title: tWoTcast episode 91
fields.description:
tWoTcast episode 91 (part 8 of 8)
Our eighth discussion of book thirteen of the Wheel of Time, Towers of Midnight, covering chapters 51-57 and the epilogue. Featuring: Jono, Joe and Tom. The last episode! …before the last book that is. A memory of Light looms around the corner while we discuss Mat’s eye getting ripped out! Moiraine is back! Lan rides for battle at Tarwin’s Gap! Lanfear wants out! Perrin is set up for death and finally Graendal in the glossary…really? Also these last few episodes of this book are super long! But so much happens we just left it in there.

fields.title: tWoTcast episode 90
fields.description:
tWoTcast episode 90 (part 7 of 8)
Our seventh discussion of book thirteen of the Wheel of Time, Towers of Midnight, covering chapters 42-50. Featuring: Jono, Joe and Tom. Theories on what’s in Galad’s Verin letter abound, turns out Androl is the greatest paige boy of all time with his shuriken gateways and finally Tom thinks one of Rand’s children is a walking candied apple for some reason. Also these last few episodes of this book are super long! But so much happens we just left it in there.

fields.title: tWoTcast episode 89

tWoTcast episode 89 (part 6 of 8)
Our sixth discussion of book thirteen of the Wheel of Time, Towers of Midnight, covering chapters 34-. Featuring: Jono, Joe and Tom. Are we actually supposed to like Gawyn after his redemption? Egwene doesn’t know how to leave simple housekeeping instructions and finally Jono brings us back to Fifty Shades of tWoT with a Perrin chapter reading.

fields.title: tWoTcast episode 88
fields.description:
tWoTcast episode 88 (part 5 of 8)
Our fifth discussion of book thirteen of the Wheel of Time, Towers of Midnight, covering chapters 27-33. Featuring: Jono, Joe and Tom. Jono has new ideas on what to do inside the world of dreams, turns out all three of us still despise Elayne and finally are your horses making too much noise all the time? Try new horse mittens.

fields.title: tWoTcast episode 87
fields.description:

Our fourth discussion of book thirteen of the Wheel of Time, Towers of Midnight, covering chapters 21-26. Featuring: Jono, Joe and Tom. Tom has a new idea of what a blood feud involves, iron bound ipads are the secret to defeating the tower of ghenji and finally Mellar cuts a new hole in Elayne. Also an email is answered from Rebecca -sent from her iphone and Ask the DARK ONE! with minion, after the music.

fields.title: tWoTcast episode 86
fields.description:
tWoTcast episode 86 (part 3 of 8)
Our third discussion of book thirteen of the Wheel of Time, Towers of Midnight, covering chapters 15-20. Featuring: Jono, Joe and Tom. Tom proposes that Rand’s semen is pure light after his transformation, the dawn of a new theory with blueberry baby balloons and finally you don’t want trollocs getting car technology. Also we answer an email from @davidpflaherty.

fields.title: tWoTcast episode 85
fields.description:
tWoTcast episode 85 (part 2 of 8)
 Our second discussion of book thirteen of the Wheel of Time, Towers of Midnight, covering chapters 5-14. Featuring: Jono, Joe and Tom. If the wheel of time is a circle could Skynet send a terminator back to kill Rand? The gholam final destinations two redarms and finally we share a touching moment between father and son and Jono.

fields.title: tWoTcast episode 84
fields.description:
tWoTcast episode 84 (part 1 of 8)
Our first discussion of book thirteen of the Wheel of Time, Towers of Midnight, covering chapters 1-4 and the prologue. Featuring: Jono, Joe and Tom. We discover Jono is frighteningly close to the presidential line of succession, Galad gets naked and cleans himself like a cat and finally a prediction: Rand tricks everyone at the Fields of Merralor and breaks the seals the day before they meet.

fields.title: tWoTcast episode 83
fields.description:
tWoTcast episode 83 (part 8 of 8)
Our eighth discussion of book twelve of the Wheel of Time, The Gathering Storm, covering chapters 44-50 and the epilogue. Featuring: Jono, Joe and Tom. The pattern tells Rand he should have gone for that four way when he had the chance instead of just Elayne, we all agree to hate and love the Rand/Tam conversation and finally Rand doesn’t become Jesus… he reenacts the Grinch. Also after the music Jono and Joe answer an email from @BigJWilli.

fields.title: tWoTcast episode 82

tWoTcast episode 82 (part 7 of 8)
Our seventh discussion of book twelve of the Wheel of Time, The Gathering Storm, covering chapters 38-43. Featuring: Jono, Joe and Tom. Egwene plays Weekend at Bernie’s with Verin’s corpse, Jono decides Joe’s dick is Michigan J. Frog and finally Bryne is forced to cum, multiple, multiple, multiple times. (Michael Kramer and Kate Reading interview link. As mentioned in the email read at the end of the episode.) http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ooB6jAJbc8o&feature=youtube_gdata_player

Our sixth discussion of book twelve of the Wheel of Time, The Gathering Storm, covering chapters 32-37. Featuring: Jono, Joe and Tom. The second of two back to back recordings so Jono is super drunk right off the bat, enjoy that and then later is even more drunk and can barely string two thoughts together let alone keep track of what chapter we’re in and finally Tom and Joe catch up with him.

fields.title: tWoTcast episode 80
fields.description:
tWoTcast episode 80 (part 5 of 8)
Our fifth discussion of book twelve of the Wheel of Time, The Gathering Storm, covering chapters 26-31. Featuring: Jono, Joe and Tom. We ramble off into about ten different movie tangents while discussing the infamous Mat zombie/groundhog day chapter, rand calls the boner in his pants the sweat tent and finally we figure out that Gawyn is the Wheel of Times Jar Jar Binks.

fields.title: tWoTcast episode 79
fields.description:
tWoTcast episode 79 (part 4 of 8)
Our fourth discussion of book twelve of the Wheel of Time, The Gathering Storm, covering chapters 19-25. Featuring: Jono, Joe and Tom. Rand patrols the border for illegals, Wieramon becomes Pikachu, and finally Egwene could order Bryne off a cliff and he’d do it, especially if the ravine was filled with pillows, marshmallows and naked women.

fields.title: tWoTcast: Fifty Shades of tWoT
fields.description:
tWoTcast: Fifty Shades of tWoT
Our second official discussion of all things dirty in the Wheel of Time. Covering some filthy tWoT fan fiction (not written by us) and more disgusting twitter questions. Featuring: Jono, Joe and Tom with special guest hosts Jennifer Liang and Richard Fife. Tom plays game show host again and Jennifer, Jono, Joe and Fife answer some explicit questions, play a few games and read some horribly vulgar fan fiction. We know there’s an explicit tag on this but this is extra explicit. Really extra explicit.

fields.title: tWoTcast episode 77
fields.description:
tWoTcast episode 77 (part 3 of 8)
 Our third discussion of book twelve of the Wheel of Time, The Gathering Storm, covering chapters 12-18. Featuring: Jono, Joe and Tom. Meidani and S-ee-e joins the ranks of Nyneave from the old country, Min is Rand’s only girlfriend to go to college and finally we spend entirely too much time describing the sound a certain chapter icon makes.

fields.title: tWoTcast episode 76
fields.description:
tWoTcast episode 76 (part 2 of 8)
Our second discussion of book twelve of the Wheel of Time, The Gathering Storm, covering chapters 5-11. Featuring: Jono, Joe and Tom. Do athanmeire male channelers jetski to shore on their foam rocks? The yellow ajah is equivalent to a doctor who prescribes aspirin for anything, and finally we get off on the worst fish metaphor tangent imaginable. Also, after the music is Ask the DARK ONE with minion!

fields.title: tWoTcast episode 75
fields.description:
tWoTcast episode 75 (DragonCon tWoT Track)
Our discussion the Wheel of Time track at DragonCon and all that goes with it. Featuring: Jono, Joe and Lauren. Jennifer Liang from Dragonmount.com joins us to discuss the panels with her husband Jimmy Liang, who also helps run the track. We talk about a little of LibertyCon shenanigans as well as what will be coming up at DragonCon this year, the fact that Jimmy’s birth certificate says “yellow” for his race and finally Lauren thought the end of the world was last year, damn Mayans, all in front of an audience of one.

fields.title: tWoTcast episode 74
fields.description:
tWoTcast episode 74 (part 1 of 8)
Our first discussion of book twelve of the Wheel of Time, The Gathering Storm, covering chapters 1-4 and the prologue. Featuring: Jono, Joe and Tom. We discuss the forward letter by Brandon Sanderson, the cover and Robert Jordan’s death and the effect of the author switch all before even getting to the text. We finally figure out that the wind may be the last gasps of the Great serpent, Tom wants to know what color the little tower (tent) is and finally Jono paints us a beautiful mental image of Elaida and a ferret. After the music is Ask the Dark One with Minion.

fields.title: tWoTcast episode 73
fields.description:
tWoTcast episode 73 (LibertyCon AMOL Panel)
The Wheel of Time panel at LibertyCon 2012. Featuring: Jennifer Liang moderates Brandon Sanderson, Jeff Daniels and Joe O’Hara. Brandon Sanderson talks about the upcoming release of the last book in the Wheel of Time, A Memory of Light, how much more work needs to be done, how the project was tackled after being chosen to write it and thoughts on the future of Wheel of Time fandom. Also Jennifer plugs the Wheel of Time Hugo nomination! Get out there and vote!

fields.title: tWoT BLOG: twitpic caption
tWoTcast episode 72
fields.description:
tWoTcast episode 72 (part 8 of 8)
Our eighth discussion of book eleven of the Wheel of Time, Knife of Dreams, covering chapters 32-37 and the epilogue. Featuring: Jono, Joe and Tom. Jono’s mom’s breast milk comes up quite a bit for some ungodly reason, Joe’s favorite drink is pregnant woman urine and finally that Hanselle Renshar is so hot right now.

fields.title: tWoT ART: episode sketch
fields.description: Lauren, Editor and Chief of tWoTcast fame, periodically sketches us while we sit and record tWoTcast. 99% of the time they come out looking awesome! just like this one. those squiggly lines between us is the pattern? Probably not since Lauren has never read the books. We don't know what happens in Lauren's brain. Just let it happen. Pretty much the only time you can speak to her is at LIVE events. Come see us at LibertyCon July 2012 or DragonCon September 2012 and tell her how great she is.

fields.title: tWoTcast episode 71
fields.description:
tWoTcast episode 71 (part 7 of 8)
Our seventh discussion of book eleven of the Wheel of Time, Knife of Dreams, covering chapters 27-31. Featuring: Jono, Joe and Tom. Rand loses a hand and it may or may not be Min’s fault? No its not. Perrin and Faile get a celebrity name and finally Joe thinks Elayne is a stupid dumb bitch that endangers others for the betterment of herself.

fields.title: tWoT ART: episode sketch
fields.description: Lauren, Editor and Chief of tWoTcast fame, periodically sketches us while we sit and record tWoTcast. 99% of the time they come out looking awesome! just like this one. There's some DYFY in there, a "dick me" followed by some sort of medal and a horse head? there's a BOOM thrown in there too. We don't know what happens in Lauren's brain. Just let it happen. Pretty much the only time you can speak to her is at LIVE events. Come see us at LibertyCon July 2012 or DragonCon September 2012 and tell her how great she is.

fields.title: tWoTcast episode 70
fields.description:
tWoTcast episode 70 (part 6 of 8)
Our sixth discussion of book eleven of the Wheel of Time, Knife of Dreams, covering chapters 23-26. Featuring: Jono, Joe and Tom. Elaidas vagina may look like Davey Jones’ beard, Mat and Tuon start going at it right in front of everyone eating rabbit and finally Tom is chagrined that Perrin hasn’t taken full advantage of his wife not being around.

fields.title: tWoTcast episode 69
fields.description:
tWoTcast episode 69 (part 5 of 8)
Our fifth discussion of book eleven of the Wheel of Time, Knife of Dreams, covering chapters 18-22. Featuring: Jono, Joe and Tom. #FYDY we get a good chunk of Rand awesomeness in these chapters as well as Lews Therin spaceship, a brief discussion of the book of translation and finally Com and Doni argue about steam wagons. After the music, Ask the Dark One! with minion.

fields.title: tWoTcast episode 68
fields.description:
tWoTcast episode 68 (part 4 of 8)
Our fourth discussion of book eleven of the Wheel of Time, Knife of Dreams, covering chapters 12-17. Featuring: Jono, Joe and Tom. Tom would let that one power go right through his hole, Jono thinks Samwell Hark may be Haik long lost cousin and finally its an almost complete Elayne Trakand episode and if you know us at all you know we loved it.

fields.title: tWoTcast episode 67
fields.description:
tWoTcast episode 67 (part 3 of 8)
Our third discussion of book eleven of the Wheel of Time, Knife of Dreams, covering chapters 7-11. Featuring: Jono, Joe and Tom. The ALL Mat Cauthon episode!! Joe annoys Tom right off the bat with Lauren’s Chewbacca toy, Jono thinks Dragon’s Eggs are Rand’s testicles and finally Tom wonders if Tuon caught Mat cheating on her with an Aes Sedai would she consider it bestiality?

fields.title: tWoTcast episode 66
fields.description:
tWoTcast episode 66 (part 2 of 8)
Our second discussion of book eleven of the Wheel of Time, Knife of Dreams, covering chapters 1-6. Featuring: Jono, Joe and Tom. Jono loves to spoil now what we are going to talk about anyway five minutes later, Joe thinks Nyneave’s backbone is getting stiff again and finally Suian has too much brine in her stomach for it to turn into actual ice.

fields.title: tWoTcast episode 65
fields.description:
tWoTcast episode 65 (part 1 of 8)
Our first discussion of book eleven of the Wheel of Time, Knife of Dreams, covering just the prologue. Featuring: Jono, Joe and Tom. We find some confusion over whether or not the cover has buildings or a chair, Valda is great at your momma jokes and apparently Alviarian can light her burps on fire.

fields.title: tWoTcast episode 64
fields.description:
tWoTcast episode 64 (part 8 of 8)
Our eighth discussion of book ten of the Wheel of Time, Crossroads of Twilight, chapters 28-30 And the epilogue. Featuring: Jono, Joe and Tom. We find out Mat suffers from severe tunnel vision, Jonos really turned on by Tuon possibly looking like a small boy and finally Rand pees lightning blood. Ask the Dark One! with minion after the music.

fields.title: tWoTcast episode 63
fields.description:
tWoTcast episode 63 (part 7 of 8)
Our seventh discussion of book ten of the Wheel of Time, Crossroads of Twilight chapters 22-27. Featuring: Jono, Joe and Tom. We find out how Cadsuane earned all her hair ornaments, Tom discovers the origin of the ninja under Balwer, ChaFaile sword wielding aiel spymasters and finally Perrin goes to the dark side and cuts off an aiel hand.

fields.title: tWoTcast episode 62
fields.description:
tWoTcast episode 62 (JordanCon4 Recap)
Our discussion of all the official and not so official happenings of JordanCon4. Featuring: Jono, Joe and Tom with Lauren guest hosting. Our memories are shockingly similar with the amount of alcohol intake. Also join us after the music for tWoT after AFTER dark, our hungover morning conversation with Jason Denzel from Dragonmount.com and Leigh Butler of Tor.com and the Wheel of Time Reread blog also Richard Fife is with us. Be forewarned the conversation is meandering and ill-prepared.

fields.title: tWoTcast episode 61
fields.description:
tWoTcast episode 61 (part 6 of 8)
Our sixth discussion of book ten of the Wheel of Time, Crossroads of Twilight. Covering chapters 18-21. Featuring: Jono, Joe and Tom. Egwene deals with the hall, Hottits, dreams and an annoying folding chair that almost made Tom close his book, and last but not least Shadar Haran rapes Mesaana…of course.

fields.title: tWoTART: Jordancon4 artshow RAND
fields.description:
Joe, of tWoTcast fame, won Judges Choice on his Wheel of Time inspired pieces from Rand al’Thor to bloody Trollocs. Here are the final paintings of all eighteen portraits. Let him know what you think on twitter @tWoTcast or tWoTcast @gmail.com
Joe O'Hara’s art can be found at studiojohara.blogspot.com and dominicpileri.com Follow him on Twitter at @joeohara98

fields.title: tWoTcast: tWoT after dark
fields.description:
tWoTcast: tWoT after dark
Our first official discussion of all things dirty in the Wheel of Time. Covering everything from a male character beauty pageant to some pretty disgusting twitter questions. Featuring: Jono, Joe and Tom with special guest host Richard Fife. Tom plays game show host and Jono Joe and Fife answer some explicit questions while getting laughs and or boos from the crowd. Lauren keeps score. We know theres an explicit tag on this but this is extra explicit guys. really.

fields.title: tWoTcast episode 59
fields.description:
tWoTcast episode 59 (part 5 of 8)
Our fifth discussion of book ten of the Wheel of Time, Crossroads of Twilight. Covering chapters 15-17. Featuring: Jono, Joe and Tom. We cover the Dark One’s three pronged plan almost the entire podcast. Tom proposes Daved Hanlon would make and awesome Dark Friend Warder and finally Jono hates his friends who spoil things for him.

fields.title: tWoTcast episode 58
fields.description:
tWoTcast episode 58 (part 4 of 8)
Our fourth discussion of book ten of the Wheel of Time, Crossroads of Twilight. Covering chapters 10-14. Featuring: Jono, Joe and Tom. Hate Elayne Trakand? Yes or No. We talk about our newest Twitter poll because this episode is five awesome Elayne chapters in a row! We realize Birgitte is living the movie Momento, the Seafolk still suck and finally Reene Harfor is a gangster.

fields.title: tWoTcast episode 57
fields.description:
tWoTcast episode 57 (part 3 of 8)
Our third discussion of book ten of the Wheel of Time, Crossroads of Twilight. Covering chapters 6-9. Featuring: Jono, Joe and Tom. The all Perrin and Faile episode! There’s a lot of moodiness and emotional struggle but we still manage to make constant bad jokes and finally it’s the height of pollen season and Jono and Joe are snotty…excuse our sniffles please.

fields.title: tWoTcast episode 56
fields.description:
tWoTcast episode 56 (part 2 of 8)
Our second discussion of book ten of the Wheel of Time, Crossroads of Twilight. Covering chapters 1-5. Featuring: Jono, Joe and Tom. We discuss Wrestlemania with Petra and Perrin in the main event, Jono thinks Bayle Domon could double for Mr. T and finally Toms got a twenty pound tip.

fields.title: tWoTcast episode 55
fields.description:
tWoTcast episode 55 (part 1 of 8)
Our first discussion of book ten of the Wheel of Time, Crossroads of Twilight. Covering chapters 0-0 and the prologue. Featuring: Jono, Joe and Tom. Joe earns a new name, lawyer of Nuremberg, we find out how annoying it must be to be a servant in the White Tower and finally our hatred of Andoran politics is still at an all-time high.

fields.title: tWoTcast episode 54
fields.description:
tWoTcast episode 54 (part ? of ?)
Our newest discussion with Jennifer and Jimmy Liang from Dragonmount.com and Jordancon fame, the Robert Jordan Wheel of Time convention. Covering all things Jordancon4 from the schedule to what we’re all most excited for, the tWoTcast LIVE show of course. Featuring: Jono, Joe and Lauren and Special guests Jennifer and Jimmy Liang.

fields.title: tWoTcast episode 53
fields.description:
tWoTcast episode 53 (part 7 of 7)
Our seventh discussion of book nine of the Wheel of Time, Winter’s Heart. Covering chapters 30-35. Featuring: Jono, Joe and Tom. Jono makes an amazing flat tax joke, Joe traces a terrorist cell phone call to Blue Carp Street, Tom finds out how babies are made and finally we talk about Rand cleansing the source until we cant talk anymore… this probably should have been two episodes.

fields.title: tWoTcast episode 52
fields.description:
tWoTcast episode 52 (part ? of ?)
Our first anniversary discussion of ourselves, the Year of the tWoT! Covering our fan tweets and emails where we answer random questions from how the cast of tWoTcast met each other to what a Randland beauty pageant would be like. Featuring: Jono, Joe and Tom with guest host Lauren.

fields.title: tWoTcast episode 51
fields.description:
tWoTcast episode 51 (part 6 of 7)
Our sixth discussion of book nine of the Wheel of Time, Winter’s Heart. Covering chapters 25-29. Featuring: Jono, Joe and Tom. Joe and Tom struggle to get Jono to realize how much Cadsuane sucks and he just cant get it and also can Hurin the sniffer smell a rape? We spend some time on that one.

fields.title: tWoTcast episode 50
fields.description:
tWoTcast episode 50 (part 5 of 7)
Our fifth discussion of book nine of the Wheel of Time, Winter’s Heart. Covering chapters 20-24. Featuring: Jono, Joe and Tom. Jono thinks you could balefire the guardians of Far Madding or Mat with his medallion on, quibbling ensues, and we get a little out of control with boat metaphors.

fields.title: tWoTcast episode 49
fields.description:
tWoTcast episode 49 (part 4 of 7)
Our fourth discussion of book nine of the Wheel of Time, Winter’s Heart. Covering chapters 13-19. Featuring: Jono, Joe and Tom. Joe wonders if the gholam makes a Mario pipe sound when squeezing through tiny holes, Jono leaves for a bit to pleasure himself and finally Tom cant bring himself to say “year of the tWoT”.

fields.title: tWoTcast episode 48
fields.description:
tWoTcast episode 48 (part 3 of 7)
Our third discussion of book nine of the Wheel of Time, Winter’s Heart. Covering chapters 812. Featuring: Jono, Joe and Tom. Tom is back and dubs Shaidar Haran Best Rapist, Jono just likes the sound of the word summer ham and finally Joe wonders if Rand measures everything in whiskers.

fields.title: tWoTcast episode 47
fields.description:
tWoTcast episode 47 (part 2 of 7)
Our second discussion of book nine of the Wheel of Time, Winter’s Heart. Covering chapters 2-7. Featuring: Jono, Joe and Lauren. Lauren joins us because Tom is sick, just like waaaaay back in tWoTcast episode 2. Jono and Joe force their way through talking about Perrin and Faile…alone and Lauren throws in some wonderful color commentary.

fields.title: tWoTcast episode 46
fields.description:
tWoTcast episode 46 (part 1 of 7)
Our first discussion of book nine of the Wheel of Time, Winter’s Heart. Covering the prologue and chapter 1. Featuring: Jono, Joe and Tom. Jono wonders about sex and the ashamon bond, Joe contemplates the circumference of things, Tom ponders hands-free masterbation, and holy shit the Dark One and Minion sing.

fields.title: tWoTcast episode 45
fields.description:
tWoTcast episode 45 (part 7 of 7)
Our seventh discussion of book eight of the Wheel of Time, the Path of Daggers. Covering chapters 27-31. Featuring: Jono, Joe and Tom. We’re back! After a long break for the holiday season but that’s ok, this episode is pretty, pretty, pretty long. We think Vandene should have kept her sister’s body around after her death and not just her clothes, Weekend at Bernie’s style, also Tom thinks we’re racist for making Aviendha a blue space monkey for the Wonder Twins.

fields.title: Joe visits another podcast
fields.description:
Hey tWoTcast fans! In this time of the tWoTcastless holiday season, if you're truly desperate to hear one of us talk, listen to Joe guest hosting on another podcast. Be forewarned the Wheel of Time is NOT discussed. Below is the show notes and link to Impetious WIndmills episode 51. Just copy the link into your browser or visit iTunes and search Impetuous Windmills.

http://www.impetuouswindmills.com/2011/12/16/1508/







IMPETUOUS WINDMILLS PODCASTEPISODE 51 “A POET ONCE SAID...”Music for this EpisodeOpening: “Battlecry” by Joell OrtizTimes Tribune: “Latitude Remix” by NujabesMain Topic: “Misfits” by Travis Barker and Steve AokiDroppin’ Eaves: “Imaginary Folklore” by NujabesEnding: “Latitude” by Five DeezSpecial Guest: Joseph Daniel O’HaraIW Times TribuneHerman Cain Bows Out of the Presidential Race by Quoting Pokemon“The Last Guardian” Director Leaves Sony, will complete project on a “Freelance” basisSour Patch Candy and Method Man combine to bring you “World Gone Sour”Main TopicJoseph and Deprava discuss Art, and comics, and drawing, and inspirations, and stuff, for like thirty minutes.It’s pretty rambling.Droppin’ EavesDeprava:Playing: League of Legends, Dark Souls, Castlevania: Symphony of the NightReading: Worker’s Compensation LawWatching: Conan the Barbarian (2011), American Werewolf in London, Princess Tutu,  Romeo x JulietSagramore:Playing: League of Legends, Dark Souls, Knights of the ZodiacReading: The Wise Man’s FearWatching: Cowboys and Aliens, The Housemaid, .hack/SIGN, WarriorJoseph:Playing: NothingReading: Wheel of Time, Dr. NoWatching: The Muppets (2011)

fields.title: tWoTcast episode 44
fields.description:
tWoTcast episode 44 (part 6 of 7)
Our sixth discussion of book eight of the Wheel of Time, the Path of Daggers. Covering chapters 23-26. Featuring: Jono, Joe and Tom. We spend and extraordinary amount of time on two chapters talking about Rand but its good stuff, Tom thinks weaves from saidin are getting a little sexual in answer to one of our tweets, and finally this will be our last episode for the next two weeks and we’ll see you again after the new year!

fields.title: tWoTcast episode 43
fields.description:
tWoTcast episode 43 (part 5 of 7)
Our fifth discussion of book eight of the Wheel of Time, the Path of Daggers. Covering chapters 17-22. Featuring: Jono, Joe and Tom. Joe thinks snorting could be a second language, We all discuss what might have happened with the Hot Red Rod, and finally someone makes a bunch of racket outside the studio and it accidently gets on the podcast.

fields.title: tWoTcast episode 42
fields.description:
tWoTcast episode 42 (part 4 of 7)
Our fourth discussion of book eight of the Wheel of Time, the Path of Daggers. Covering chapters 12-16. Featuring: Jono, Joe and Tom. We all agree that Dashiva should have remained a random good guy Ashaman. He's too hilarious to lose.

fields.title: tWoTcast episode 41
fields.description:
tWoTcast episode 41 (part 3 of 7)
Our first discussion of book eight of the Wheel of Time, the Path of Daggers. Covering chapters 8-11. Featuring: Jono, Joe and Tom. Jono wonders what the black tower equivalent of a pillow friend is, Tom thinks Perrin would be more affective with a power wrought frying pan, and finally Joe revels in Galina’s pain during torture.

fields.title: tWoTcast episode 40
fields.description:
tWoTcast episode 40 (part 2 of 7)
Our second discussion of book eight of the Wheel of Time, The Path of Daggers. Covering chapters 3-7. Featuring: Jono, Joe and Tom. Joe thinks Lan could have single-handedly turned back the Seanchan invasion, Tom dubs Alise "mistress of everything", and Jono likens Basil Gill to a sausage casing.

fields.title: tWoTcast episode 39
fields.description:
tWoTcast episode 39 (part 1 of 7)
Our first discussion of book eight of the Wheel of Time, The Path of Daggers. Covering chapters 1-2 and the prologue. Featuring: Jono, Joe and Tom.  We debate a little about who can the game of Shara, Joe thinks Rand should just let the Seanchan win, and finally Tom has an interesting theory about what the gholam is doing up on a towertop.

fields.title: tWoTcast episode 38
fields.description: tWoTcast Special: Jennifer Liang Interview  We talk with Jennifer and Jimmy Liang in this special edition tWoTcast in anticipation of JordanCon 4 with Lauren guest hosting. Jennifer has some important news for JordanCon and A Memory of Light including getting your name in the book and the Wheel of Time being considered for the Hugo Awards and how you can help.  tWoTcast Archive Timeline:  tWoTcast Interviews:

fields.title: tWoTcast episode 37

Tom gets us started off in style with a hilarious butt cheek joke, we spare you the details of Rand and Min's first time together, and finally the dreaded Cadsuane appears. Tom hates her, Jono likes her, and Joe hates her currently but is willing to reconsider down the road. tWoTcast Patreon: (pssst...help us out.)  tWoTcast Archive Timeline:

Serious things are discussed. tWoTcast Patreon: (pssst...help us out.)  tWoTcast Archive Timeline:

fields.title: S4 Ep12: Season 3: Episode 7: Goldeneyes
fields.description:
In this episode, join Desmond and his wolf brother Justin as they unpack the latest twists and turns in "The Wheel of Time." With a mix of humor and insightful commentary, our hosts dive into character dynamics, plot developments, and the show's adaptation choices. They discuss the significance of the Two Rivers setting, the complexities of channeling, and the implications of recent character decisions, all while sharing their personal reactions and theories. From the mysterious fate of Loial to the evolving relationships among the characters, expect a lively discussion filled with fan theories and laughter. Will the characters find their way through the chaos, or will the shadows of their past catch up with them? Tune in for an engaging conversation that promises to shed light on the latest developments in this epic saga!

(00:00) Introduction and birthday wishes
(05:20) Nicknames and hometown pride
(10:45) The importance of character inclusion
(15:30) The significance of the Aiel and their interactions
(20:00) Exploring the nuances of character motivations
(25:10) Discussion of the Trolloc encounter
(30:15) The implications of channeling distance and power
(35:40) The fate of Loial and its narrative impact
(40:00) Analyzing the portrayal of the White Cloaks
(45:30) Predictions for future episodes and character arcs
(50:00) Closing thoughts and listener engagement

Join us LIVE! Thursday Night 8pm (PST)

https://www.youtube.com/@whatsoundsawesome/streams

Send Questions, Comments, and Recommendations to thankthelight@gmail.com

Please Like, Subscribe, and tell a friend about Thank The Light!

Find us on:  
Twitter @ParchedAielman  
Facebook @Thank The Light: The Wheel Of Time Podcast  
Instagram @parchedaielman  

Show notes created by https://headliner.app

fields.title: Marcus Rutherford Talks Season 3 of The Wheel of Time
fields.description: Join us as we delve into the complex world of Perrin Aybara with the actor who brings him to life, Marcus Rutherford! We explore Perrin's evolving journey in The Wheel of Time, discussing his intricate relationship with Faile, his reluctant but growing leadership arc, and the internal struggles that define this beloved character. Marcus shares insights into his preparation for the role, his thoughts on Perrin's development, and behind-the-scenes stories from the set.  Send us your though...

Hear Brendan reckon with a full Perrin episode! Hear Joe shockingly not have an issue with the distances in a battle! Hear Jen finally find a Faile flaw! All that, plus unabashed Dain love! The first part is spoiler-free, the last bit is spoiler-filled, and the whole thing will have his name sing in our ears forever. Send us yo...

Anyway, in today’s episode, Rand is naughty, Egwene has yet to meet a rule she can’t break, Perrin contin...

fields.title: The Wheel of Time Season 3 Book Changes Pay Off To Make A Better TV Show
fields.description:
Hey everyone!  The 7am UK release schedule for #thewheeloftime #season3 is really messing with my ability to get content out for it.  But today I wanted to talk about how The Wheel of Time Season 3 Book Changes pay off and make it a better tv show.

There have been many changes from the books so far in the three seasons of WoT that we've experienced. And let's be honest, all of us dislike at least some of them. But I'm here to discuss some that I think really pay off to make season 3 a better tv show that wheel of time has ever been before!

Please consider leaving a like, subscribing and sharing with your friends. Also, leave me your thoughts in the comments.  I love a chat!

Sign up to prime if you haven’t already as this one is a special one!
